作者: Pugni, J L
摘要: At this time there are about 20 Planned Parenthood teen theater groups throughout the US. The idea originated in New York in 1973, when the staff of the Family Planning Division of the New York Medical College needed an effective way to reach adolescents about important issues. FOCUS, a teen family life theater sponsored by Planned Parenthood of Greater Charlotte, performs skits about life as seen from the teenager's perspective. The teenagers do not use a script but create their performances from their own experiences, expressed through carefully learned improvisational techniques. This approach gives the presentations an authentic flavor that enables the troupe to connect with the audience. The topics dealt with vary. For example, 1982-83 shows included peer pressure, divorce, teenage pregnancy, drinking, teenage suicide, parent-teen relationships, and loneliness. The performances do not offer absolute answers but rather pose important questions to the audience. Following the performance the actors and actresses return to the stage, still portraying their characters, and invite the audience to ask questions and discuss possible alternatives for the characters. THE SOURCE is the Teen Council of Planned Parenthood of Southwest Florida. It works to inform the community of problems teenagers face by presenting short plays, written, directed, and cast by teens themselves. Through education, honest answers, healthy building of self esteem, and parent support, SOURCE members reach a higher level of self awareness. They then share what they learn with their families, peers, and the community through performance and special events. THE SOURCE, formed in October 1980, grew out of Planned Parenthood's belief that if teens feel self worth, their decision-making process will be affected less by peer pressure and negative social influences. The Youth Expression Theater (YET) of Cambridge is an education outreach project of the Planned Parenthood League of Massachusetts (PPLM). It grew out of the belief that improvisational drama, by permitting teens to portray their conflicts, is a more creative educational tool than a lecture series by adult professionals. YET productions deal with teen pregnancy, parenting, sexual responsibility, and decision making, alcohol and drug abuse, birth control, homosexuality, divorce, abortion, suicide, and sex-role stereotyping. In Dallas, Texas, Elena Love and Jim Roderick established the Teen Perspective Theater (TPT) as an arm of the Planned Parenthood of Greater Dalls education program. An acting company of 11 students aged 13-18 was drawn from public and private schools. Rehearsals began the end of July and included educational sessions as well as performance skill workshops. The presentation follows the format established by other Planned Parenthood theater groups: brief improvisational skits, in-character exchange with the audience, and personal exchange with the audience.
标题: Teen theaters grapple with issues.
标题翻译: 青少年剧院面临的问题
摘要翻译: 目前，美国约有20个计划生育青少年剧团。这个想法源于1973年的纽约，当时纽约医学院计划生育部的工作人员需要一种有效的方式来让青少年了解重要问题。FOCUS是由大夏洛特地区的计划生育机构赞助的青少年家庭生活剧场，演出通过青少年的视角来表现生活的短剧。青少年不使用剧本，而是根据自己的经验创作表演，通过认真学习的即兴表演技巧进行表达。这种方法赋予演出真实的风格，使剧团能够与观众产生联系。涉及的主题各不相同。例如，1982-83年的演出包括同伴压力、离婚、青少年怀孕、酗酒、青少年自杀、亲子关系和孤独感。演出不提供绝对的答案，而是向观众提出重要的问题。表演结束后，演员们重返舞台，仍然扮演他们的角色，邀请观众提问并讨论角色的可能选择。THE SOURCE是西南佛罗里达州计划生育的青少年委员会。它通过青少年自己编写、执导和参演的短剧，向社区传达青少年面临的问题。通过教育、诚实的回答、健康地建立自尊和父母的支持，SOURCE成员达到了更高的自我认知水平。然后，他们通过表演和特别活动与家庭、同龄人和社区分享所学。SOURCE成立于1980年10月，源于计划生育的信念：如果青少年感到自我价值，他们的决策过程将受到同龄人压力和负面社会影响的影响较小。剑桥的青少年表达剧场（YET）是马萨诸塞州计划生育联盟（PPLM）的一个教育外展项目。它源于这样一种信念：即兴戏剧通过允许青少年表现自己的冲突是一种比成人专业人士的讲座系列更具创造性的教育工具。YET制作的剧目涉及青少年怀孕、育儿、性责任、决策、酒精和药物滥用、避孕、同性恋、离婚、堕胎、自杀和性别角色刻板印象。在德克萨斯州达拉斯，Elena Love和Jim Roderick建立了青少年视角剧院（TPT），作为大达拉斯地区计划生育教育项目的一个组成部分。演员团体由来自公立和私立学校的11名年龄在13至18岁之间的学生组成。排练于7月底开始，既包括教育课程，也包括表演技能研讨会。演出的格式遵循其他计划生育剧团的既定模式：简短的即兴短剧、与观众的角色交流，以及与观众的个人交流。
摘要总结: Pugni（1984）基于美国20个计划生育青少年剧团的案例，探讨了通过青少年即兴表演的方式，讨论青春期重要议题。研究发现，此类表演不仅增强了青少年的自我意识，还促进了与观众的互动，鼓励探索问题的多种解决方案。

作者: WEICK, KE
摘要: The death of 13 men in the Mann Gulch fire disaster, made famous in Norman Maclean's Young Men and Fire, is analyzed as the interactive disintegration of role structure and sensemaking in a minimal organization. Four potential sources of resilience that make groups less vulnerable to disruptions of sensemaking are proposed to forestall disintegration, including improvisation, virtual role systems, the attitude of wisdom, and norms of respectful interaction. The analysis is then embedded in the organizational literature to show that we need to reexamine our thinking about temporary systems, structuration, nondisclosive intimacy, intergroup dynamics, and team building.
标题: THE COLLAPSE OF SENSEMAKING IN ORGANIZATIONS - THE MANN GULCH DISASTER
标题翻译: 组织中的意义建构崩溃 - 曼古奇灾难
摘要翻译: 在诺曼·麦克莱恩的《年轻人与火》中为人所知的曼戈尔奇火灾中，13名男子的死亡被分析为在一个最小组织中角色结构与意义构建的互动性解体。提出了四种潜在的韧性来源，以减少群体对意义构建中断的脆弱性，包括即兴创作、虚拟角色系统、智慧态度和尊重互动的规范。随后，将该分析嵌入组织文献中，以表明我们需要重新审视对临时系统、结构化、非披露性亲密关系、群体动态和团队建设的思考。
摘要总结: 维克(1993)基于曼古尔奇火灾的案例分析，探讨了在最小组织中角色结构和意义构建的互动解体，提出了四种增强韧性的潜在源泉，包括即兴发挥、虚拟角色系统、智慧态度和尊重互动规范，并呼吁重新审视临时系统和团队建设的相关文献。

作者: Dabade, BM; Ray, PK
摘要: In the face of stiff and demanding competition internationally, there is a growing resolve in the industrial community to provide the customers and the market in general products and services of superior quality. Quality engineering has been established as an important continuous performance improvement methodology during the last decade. Consequently, numerous developments and innovative methods have been reported in the literature by researchers and practitioners alike.In this paper, a critical appraisal of recent developments, improvisations, and innovations in the field of quality engineering has been made. It is observed that there exists an immense body of knowledge in terms of better approaches, techniques, methodologies, aids, analysis tools, etc. However, most of these are oriented toward product improvement or process improvement in a localized manner, and a systematic approach for the application of quality engineering encompassing all the importnat functions in an organization is lacking.In view of this a comprehensive quality engineering methodology is also proposed in this paper so that the implementation of quality engineering in an organization will be more effective, and the benefits to be achieved will. be substantial in real-life situations.
标题: Quality engineering for continuous performance improvement in products and processes: A review and reflections
标题翻译: 产品和过程中的质量工程：持续性能改进的回顾与思考
摘要翻译: 面对国际竞争的激烈和苛刻，工业界越来越决心向客户和市场提供优质的产品和服务。在过去十年中，质量工程已被确立为一项重要的持续绩效改进方法。因此，许多研究者和从业者在文献中报道了大量的发展和创新方法。本文对质量工程领域的近期发展、改进和创新进行了批判性评估。观察到在更好的方法、技术、方法论、工具和分析工具等方面，存在着庞大的知识体系。然而，这些大多数都是针对产品改进或过程改进的局部性方法，缺乏涵盖组织内所有重要职能的系统性质量工程应用方法。基于此，本文还提出了一种全面的质量工程方法论，以便在组织中实施质量工程时更加有效，并在实际情况下能够获得可观的收益。
摘要总结: Dabade和Ray（1996）对质量工程领域的近期发展进行了批判性评估，发现现有的许多方法多集中于产品或过程的局部改进。为了提高质量工程的实施效果，本文提出了一种全面的质量工程方法论，以期在组织内实现更显著的实际收益。

作者: Macredie, RD; Sandom, C
摘要: This paper presents an empirical study into a hierarchical organization's experience with the adoption and use of an adaptive information technology, in this case a workflow application. The paper takes an improvisational perspective on the change process and assesses it through a case study which examines the organization's experiences in terms of anticipated, opportunity-based and emergent changes to their processes, structure and culture that were enabled by the introduction of the workflow application. The findings build upon Orlikowski and Hofman's improvisational change model by evaluating the model in a different organizational context to that of the original study. The findings reveal that ongoing improvisational changes can occur in hierarchical organizations and that improvisations and adaptations can occur in organizations which adopt adaptive IT provided that ongoing support for change management is forthcoming. The findings also suggest that there is a correlation between the level of customer dissatisfaction and the emergence of any local improvisations regardless of the organization type. This implies that an improvisational perspective may be useful for hierarchical organizations which introduce new technology as the local improvisations which can occur may be leveraged for advantage. The study also raises important questions about the categorisation of technologies as adaptive and critically reflects on this aspect of the improvisational change model.
标题: IT-enabled change: evaluating an improvisational perspective
标题翻译: 信息技术驱动的变革：评估即兴演出的视角
摘要翻译: 本文对一个层级组织在采用和使用自适应信息技术方面的经验进行了实证研究，以工作流程应用程序为例。本文从即兴发挥的视角探讨变革过程，并通过案例研究评估该组织在工作流程应用程序引入后在其流程、结构和文化上所经历的预期、基于机会和新兴变化。研究结果基于Orlikowski和Hofman的即兴变革模型，在不同的组织背景下对该模型进行了评估。研究发现，层级组织中可以发生持续的即兴变革，且在提供了持续的变革管理支持的情况下，采用自适应信息技术的组织能够进行即兴发挥和适应。研究还表明，客户不满的程度与任何地方性即兴发挥的出现之间存在相关性，无论组织类型如何。这意味着即兴发挥的视角对引入新技术的层级组织可能是有益的，因为所发生的地方即兴发挥可以被利用以获得优势。此外，研究还提出了关于技术分类为自适应的重要问题，并对这一即兴变革模型的相关方面进行了批判性反思。
摘要总结: Macredie和Sandom（1999）通过案例研究探讨了一个层级组织采纳工作流应用程序的经验，从即兴变化的角度分析组织流程、结构和文化的变化，发现持续的即兴变化在层级组织中可能发生，并强调客户不满程度与局部即兴变革的相关性，为技术引入提供了新视角。

作者: Anderson, P
摘要: Complex organizations exhibit surprising, nonlinear behavior. Although organization scientists have studied complex organizations for many years, a developing set of conceptual and computational tools makes possible new approaches to modeling nonlinear interactions within and between organizations. Complex adaptive system models represent a genuinely new way of simplifying the complex. They are characterized by four key elements: agents with schemata, self-organizing networks sustained by importing energy, coevolution to the edge of chaos, and system evolution based on recombination. New types of models that incorporate these elements will push organization science forward by merging empirical observation with computational agent-based simulation. Applying complex adaptive systems models to strategic management leads to an emphasis on building systems that can rapidly evolve effective adaptive solutions. Strategic direction of complex organizations consists of establishing and modifying environments within which effective, improvised, self-organized solutions can evolve. Managers influence strategic behavior by altering the fitness landscape for local agents and reconfiguring the organizational architecture within which agents adapt.
标题: Complexity theory and organization science
标题翻译: 复杂性理论与组织科学
摘要翻译: 复杂组织表现出令人惊讶的非线性行为。尽管组织科学家研究复杂组织已有多年，但一系列正在发展的概念和计算工具使得对组织内部及之间非线性互动建模的新方法成为可能。复杂适应系统模型代表了一种真正简化复杂性的全新方式。它们的特点包括四个关键要素：具有框架的主体、自我组织的网络（通过输入能量维持）、在混沌边缘的共同演化，以及基于重组的系统演化。结合这些要素的新型模型将通过将实证观察与基于代理的计算机模拟相结合，推动组织科学的发展。将复杂适应系统模型应用于战略管理，强调构建能够快速演变有效适应解决方案的系统。复杂组织的战略方向包括建立和修改环境，使有效的、即兴的、自我组织的解决方案能够演变。管理者通过改变局部主体的适应性景观和重新配置主体适应的组织架构来影响战略行为。
摘要总结: Anderson（1999）提出复杂组织表现出非线性行为，利用复杂自适应系统模型，强调了代理、自我组织网络和共演化等四个关键元素。这种建模方法结合了经验观察和计算机模拟，推动组织科学发展，为战略管理提供了有效的适应性解决方案。

作者: Mascitelli, R
摘要: The ability to create a stream of revolutionary new products can represent a sustainable competitive advantage for firms in almost arty industry. Whereas evolutionary product improvements often follow predictable trajectories, breakthrough innovations involve unexpected leaps of creativity and insight. Despite its strategic importance, however; little is known about the process by which innovators achieve these valuable breakthroughs. This article proposes that break through innovations result from the harnessing of tacit knowledge possessed by individuals and project teams. Tacit knowledge lies below the surface of conscious thought and is accumulated through a lifetime of experience, experimentation, perception, and learning by doing. Managers who can tap into this vast pool of creative energy can elevate the innovative capabilities of their teams well beyond the incremental and mundane.The article begins by establishing the vital importance of breakthrough innovations to the competitiveness of firms. This strategic mandate is followed by a brief discussion of the nature and implications of tacit knowledge in the context of innovation The remainder of the article describes three mutually reinforcing methods for encouraging the explication and sharing of tacit knowledge among design team members. The ultimate goal is to establish a generative atmosphere for breakthrough innovation in which divergent thinking, improvisation, and artistic creativity merge with the practical demands of the product development process.The first step toward harnessing the creative power of tacit knowledge is to foster the emotional commitment and deep personal involvement of design team members. Managers can accomplish this goal through the development of inspiring innovation stories,  encouragement of reasonable risk-taking and experimentation, building of unique team identities, and displaying unbridled confidence in a team's creative abilities. Once the emotional commitment of team members has been assured, two techniques are proposed as catalysts for breakthroughs derived from tacit knowledge. These methods are based on evidence that intimate physical interaction during the creative process, both person to object mid person to person, may be a catalyst for tacit insights. The first technique highlights the use of early and frequent prototyping as a powerful focal point for the explication of tacit knowledge from both the design team and potential customers. The second technique involves the encouragement of face-to-face interaction between innovators during product development, thereby enabling creative improvisation and real-time knowledge sharing.Several implications for managers are highlighted including the need for a greater emphasis on employee retention, the importance of developing a nurturing environment for innovation, and the value of intimate physical interaction, including early prototyping, indwelling with customers, and co-location of teams wherever possible. (C) 2000 Elsevier Science Inc.
标题: From experience: Harnessing tacit knowledge to achieve breakthrough innovation
标题翻译: 从经验出发：利用隐性知识实现突破性创新
摘要翻译: 创造一系列革命性新产品的能力可以为几乎任何行业的公司带来可持续的竞争优势。虽然渐进式产品改进往往遵循可预测的轨迹，但突破性的创新则涉及意想不到的创造力和洞察力的飞跃。尽管其战略重要性显而易见，但关于创新者如何实现这些宝贵突破的过程知之甚少。本文提出，突破性创新是通过利用个体和项目团队所拥有的隐性知识而产生的。隐性知识潜藏于意识思考之下，通过一生的经验、实验、感知和实践学习积累而成。能够挖掘这一巨大创造性能源的管理者，可以将其团队的创新能力提升至超越渐进和日常的层次。文章首先强调突破性创新对企业竞争力的重要性。接着简要讨论隐性知识在创新背景下的性质和影响。文章其余部分描述了三种相互增强的方法，以鼓励设计团队成员之间隐性知识的明示和分享。最终目标是建立一个产生突破性创新的氛围，在这个氛围中，发散性思维、即兴发挥和艺术创造力与产品开发过程的实际需求相融合。 harnessing 隐性知识的第一步是促进设计团队成员的情感承诺和深度个人参与。管理者可以通过发展鼓舞人心的创新故事、鼓励合理的冒险和实验、构建独特的团队身份以及展示对团队创造能力的无限信心来实现这一目标。一旦团队成员的情感承诺得到保证，提出两种技术作为从隐性知识中产生突破的催化剂。这些方法基于证据，表明在创造过程中个人与物体及个人与个人之间的亲密身体互动可能是隐性洞察的催化剂。第一种技术强调早期和频繁的原型制作作为从设计团队和潜在客户中显性化隐性知识的强大焦点。第二种技术则涉及鼓励创新者在产品开发过程中进行面对面的互动，从而实现创造性的即兴发挥和实时知识分享。对于管理者，本文强调了几个重要启示，包括更重视员工留任的重要性、为创新发展培育支持性环境的重要性以及亲密身体互动的价值，包括早期原型制作、与客户的亲密接触，以及在可能的情况下团队的共址。
摘要总结: Mascitelli（2000）通过探讨突破性创新中隐性知识的作用，提出管理者可以通过建立团队情感承诺、使用早期原型和促进团队面对面互动等方法，提升创新能力，以实现企业的可持续竞争优势。

作者: Coutu, DL
摘要: Why do some people bounce back from life's hardships while others despair? HBR senior editor Diane Coutu looks at the nature of individual and organizational resilience, issues that have gained special urgency in light of the recent terrorist attacks, war, and recession. in the business arena, resilience has found its way onto the list of qualities sought in employees. As one of Coutu's interviewees puts it, More than education, more than experience, more than training, a person's level of resilience will determine who succeeds and who fails.Theories abound about what produces resilience, but three fundamental characteristics seem to set resilient people and companies apart from others. One or two of these qualities make it possible to bounce back from hardship, but true resilience requires all three.The first characteristic is the capacity to accept and face down reality. In looking hard at reality, we prepare ourselves to act in ways that allow us to endure and survive hardships: We train ourselves how to survive before we ever have to do so.Second, resilient people and organizations possess an ability to find meaning in some aspects of life. And values are just as important as meaning; value systems at resilient companies change very little over the long haul and are used as scaffolding in times of trouble.The third building block of resilience is the ability to improvise. Within an arena of personal capabilities or company rules, the ability to solve problems without the usual or obvious tools is a great strength.
标题: How resilience works
标题翻译: 韧性的运作机制
摘要翻译: 为什么有些人能够从生活的困境中反弹，而其他人却感到绝望？哈佛商业评论高级编辑黛安·库托探讨了个体和组织韧性的本质，这一议题在近期恐怖袭击、战争和经济衰退的背景下显得尤为紧迫。在商业领域，韧性已成为企业在员工中所寻求的品质之一。库托的一位采访对象表示：“比起教育、经验和培训，一个人的韧性水平将决定谁成功，谁失败。”关于韧性产生的理论层出不穷，但有三种基本特征似乎将韧性较强的人和企业与其他人区分开来。其中一两种特征使人能够从困境中反弹，但真正的韧性需要这三种特征的结合。第一种特征是接受和面对现实的能力。通过认真观察现实，我们为以能忍受和生存下去的方式采取行动做准备：我们在真正需要生存之前就进行生存训练。第二，韧性强的人和组织能够在生活的某些方面找到意义。而价值观的重要性与意义同样不可忽视；韧性企业的价值体系在长期内变化很小，并在困境中作为支撑。韧性的第三个基石是即兴发挥的能力。在个人能力或企业规则的范围内，能够在没有通常或明显工具的情况下解决问题是一种巨大优势。
摘要总结: Coutu（2002）基于对个人和组织韧性的研究，提出韧性在逆境中的重要性，认为成功的关键在于三大特征：接受现实、寻找意义及即兴应变。这些特征有助于个人和企业应对挑战，提高适应能力。

作者: Aaen, I
摘要: Over the past decade or so, organizations have spent vast resources on software process improvement. Based on the software capability maturity model (CMM) and similar norms, SPI aims to build an infrastructure and culture that support effective methods, practices, and procedures and integrate into the ongoing way of doing business. This goal has proven difficult to reach, however, because SPI involves organizational change on a scale and of a complexity that requires commitment, resources, and skills at all organizational levels, and it carries a large risk of failure.This article analyzes the roots of these difficulties and challenges the traditional SPI approach, here labeled Blueprint SPI. Plan-oriented and mainly concerned with the static, this method creates a blueprint of a future software process. Its three primary aspects-externalizing process knowledge, separating process design from use, and structuration by melding process parts into organized wholes-focus on structure and the objects building it. Charts, functional elements, and the entities such elements produce or exchange typically describe a process.A blueprint view provides concepts and patterns for recognizing and communicating how we understand software processes. Process designers are expected to provide process knowledge to software developers, and software developers are expected to provide experiences and problems to process designers. A blueprint view does not, however, reveal how such structures emerge. Looking at SPI in light of knowledge management and organizational design concepts helps us see that a recipe can better elucidate structural dynamics. Recipes for software practices describe actions that generate the objects-such as established software practices-that blueprints specify. Recipes model emergence and form a basis for improvisation to suit a given situation. Recipes are open-ended in that the resulting blueprint-the new software process-emerges only after the fact. Where blueprints define preplanned actions, recipes express values, principles, and goals for such actions. Understanding these gives us a better view of an organization's software development culture and thus a better chance of understanding how it may change.
标题: Software process improvement: Blueprints versus recipes
标题翻译: 软件过程改进：蓝图与配方
摘要翻译: 在过去的十年中，组织在软件过程改进上投入了巨大的资源。基于软件能力成熟度模型（CMM）及类似标准，软件过程改进旨在构建一个支持有效方法、实践和程序的基础设施和文化，并将其融入到持续的业务运作中。然而，这一目标的实现证明是困难的，因为软件过程改进涉及到大规模和复杂的组织变革，需要在所有组织级别上投入承诺、资源和技能，并且面临较大的失败风险。本文分析了这些困难的根源，并挑战了传统的软件过程改进方法，这种方法被称为蓝图软件过程改进。该方法以计划为导向，主要关注静态的方面，创建未来软件过程的蓝图。其三个主要方面——外部化过程知识、将过程设计与使用分开以及通过将过程部分融为有机整体进行结构化——侧重于结构及构建其的对象。通常情况下，过程通过图表、功能元素和这些元素产生或交换的实体进行描述。蓝图视角提供了识别和传达我们如何理解软件过程的概念和模式。过程设计者被期望为软件开发者提供过程知识，而软件开发者则被期望为过程设计者提供经验与问题。然而，蓝图视角并未揭示这些结构是如何出现的。从知识管理和组织设计概念的角度看待软件过程改进，帮助我们认识到，食谱可以更好地阐明结构动态。软件实践的食谱描述了产生蓝图所指定的对象，如既定软件实践的行动。食谱模型化了涌现，并为适应特定情况的即兴创作奠定了基础。食谱是开放式的，结果蓝图——新软件过程——仅在事后出现。蓝图定义了预先计划的行动，而食谱则表达了这些行动的价值观、原则和目标。理解这些将使我们更好地洞察一个组织的软件开发文化，从而更好地理解其可能如何变化。
摘要总结: Aaen（2003）通过分析软件过程改进（SPI）的传统方法，探讨了其在组织变革中的复杂性和挑战。作者强调，将知识管理与组织设计结合，可以更有效地理解软件过程的动态，提出“食谱”方法优于蓝图方法，助于应对变化和改进软件开发文化。

作者: van der Bij, H; Song, M; Weggeman, M
摘要: Knowledge dissemination is of crucial importance for the strategic planning in new product development. Many new ideas stem from recombination of previously successful, disseminated actions, and knowledge dissemination offers a clear overview of market needs' technology developments, and competitors' actions. Moreover, in dynamic environments, where strategic planning has to be added by some kind of improvisation, knowledge dissemination leads to a high quality of improvisation. It leads to a quick awareness of external or internal surprises, gives an opportunity to learn quickly from the past, and compensates for a coordination mechanism instead of planning.The dissemination of knowledge does not always happen spontaneously. Especially, people with a technical background often are highly individualistic and do not disseminate knowledge naturally. So, this must be fostered by the organization. In management research, particularly on technology and innovation management, many facilitating factors have been identified that enhance communication. Intuitively, they also would seem useful in enhancing knowledge dissemination; however, these factors have not been tested empirically for this specific use. Research on knowledge and its management has not given much attention to the way knowledge in an organization is disseminated and the factors that can facilitate it. If such factors are mentioned, they are not tested empirically and their relative impact is not addressed.In this study we identified 17 important factors in enhancing knowledge dissemination and validated 10 of these factors empirically and determined their relative impact. We focused on technological knowledge in new product development-not on the project level but on the level of the strategic business unit.The field research comprised three parts. In the first step, we conducted in-depth interviews with research and development (R&D) managers and their supervisors to select the most important potential facilitating factors. In the second step, indepth interviews with senior executives, information technology (IT) officers, and R&D experts were conducted to determine whether the constructs regarding knowledge dissemination and the potential facilitating factors had face validity. Finally, the potential factors were tested empirically in 277 U.S. high-technology firms at the strategic business unit (SBU) level. It was our intention to examine potential factors beyond the level of the particular project, so we looked for antecedents in an SBU environment with a longer-term impact.Our results indicate that individual commitment to the firm is very important to facilitate knowledge dissemination as well as organizational crises and risk-taking behavior. Individual commitment was found to have the greatest impact on the level of knowledge dissemination, followed by organizational crisis and risk-taking behavior. It is thus up to management to find new ways to control individual commitment. More research, however, is required to better understand the ways by which managerial interventions stimulates knowledge dissemination.
标题: An empirical investigation into the antecedents of knowledge dissemination at the strategic business unit level
标题翻译: 战略业务单位层面知识传播先行因素的实证研究
摘要翻译: 知识传播对于新产品开发中的战略规划至关重要。许多新思路源于之前成功传播的行动的重组，而知识传播提供了市场需求、技术发展和竞争对手行动的清晰概述。此外，在动态环境中，战略规划需要某种形式的即兴发挥，知识传播能够提高即兴发挥的质量。它能快速意识到内外部的意外情况，提供从过去快速学习的机会，并补偿规划所缺乏的协调机制。知识传播并不总是自发发生。特别是在技术背景的人员中，很多人较为个人主义，不会自然而然地传播知识。因此，组织必须促进这种传播。在管理研究中，尤其是在技术与创新管理领域，已经确定了许多促进沟通的因素。直观上，这些因素似乎也有助于增强知识传播；然而，这些因素在特定用途上并未经过实证检验。关于知识及其管理的研究并未给予知识在组织中的传播及其促进因素足够的关注。如果提到此类因素，它们通常没有经过实证检验，并且其相对影响也没有得到讨论。在本研究中，我们确定了17个促进知识传播的重要因素，并实证验证其中10个因素及其相对影响。我们关注新产品开发中的技术知识——不是在项目层面，而是在战略业务单元（SBU）层面。该实地研究分为三个部分。第一步，我们与研发（R&D）经理及其上级进行了深入访谈，以选择最重要的潜在促进因素。在第二步中，我们与高级管理人员、信息技术（IT）官员和研发专家进行了深入访谈，以确定关于知识传播及潜在促进因素的构念是否具有表面真实性。最后，潜在因素在277家美国高科技企业的战略业务单元水平上进行了实证测试。我们旨在考察超出特定项目层面的潜在因素，因此我们在SBU环境中寻找具有长期影响的前因。我们的研究结果表明，员工对公司的个人承诺对促进知识传播非常重要，同时组织危机和冒险行为也起到了很大作用。个人承诺对知识传播水平的影响最大，其次是组织危机和冒险行为。因此，管理层应找到控制个人承诺的新方法。然而，仍需更多研究以更好地理解管理干预如何促进知识传播。
摘要总结: van der Bij等(2003)通过对277家美国高科技公司的调研，识别并验证了17个促进知识传播的重要因素，发现个体对公司的承诺在知识传播中影响最大，其次是组织危机和冒险行为，强调管理层需找到新方法以促进个体承诺。

作者: Thieme, RJ; Song, M; Shin, GC
摘要: We develop a conceptual model of new product development (NPD) based on seminal and review articles in order to answer the question, What project management characteristics will foster the development of new products that are more likely to survive in the marketplace? Our model adopts Ruckert and Walker's theoretical framework of situational dimensions, structural/process dimensions, and outcome dimensions as an underlying structure. We conceptualize their situational dimensions more narrowly as project management dimensions, allowing us to examine more specifically how project management practices affect the NPD process. In our model, project management dimensions include project manager style, project manager skills, and senior management support. Structural/process dimensions include cross-functional integration and planning proficiency. Outcome dimensions include process proficiency and new product survival.Our empirical analysis finds support for 20 hypotheses, a reversal of one hypothesis, and nonsignificant results for one hypothesis. These results show that projects are best led by managers with strong technical, marketing, and management skills, using a participative style and enjoying early and continuous support from senior management. These project management dimensions promote cross-functional integration and planning, which are important to process proficiency and new product survival.Our study suggests two broad conclusions. First, it confirms the links in the extant literature between situational (project management) dimensions, structural/process dimensions, and outcome dimensions in NPD. Second, firms can improve cross-functional integration and planning through various project management practices. Generally, we find that firms interested in improving both proficiency in their development process and the survival rate of new products should take steps to promote cross-functional integration and to improve their planning processes. While the linkage between cross-functional integration and NPD outcomes is well established in the literature, the impact of the planning process on NPD outcomes is a research area ripe with opportunity. Our study highlights three aspects of planning that contribute to NPD outcomes. Plans should be detailed, team members should participate actively in the planning process, and teams should be given flexibility and autonomy to respond to unanticipated issues as they appear.
标题: Project management characteristics and new product survival
标题翻译: 项目管理特征与新产品生存
摘要翻译: 我们基于重要和综述文章，开发了一个新产品开发（NPD）的概念模型，以回答以下问题：哪些项目管理特征将促进新产品的开发，使其更有可能在市场上生存？我们的模型采用了Ruckert和Walker的理论框架，包括情境维度、结构/过程维度和结果维度。我们将其情境维度更狭义地概念化为项目管理维度，使我们能够更具体地研究项目管理实践如何影响NPD过程。在我们的模型中，项目管理维度包括项目经理风格、项目经理技能和高层管理支持。结构/过程维度包括跨职能整合和规划能力。结果维度包括过程能力和新产品生存率。我们的实证分析支持20个假设，对一个假设进行了反转，并对一个假设的结果不显著。这些结果表明，项目最好由具备强大技术、营销和管理技能的经理领导，使用参与式风格，并获得高层管理的早期和持续支持。这些项目管理维度促进了跨职能的整合和规划，对过程能力和新产品生存率至关重要。我们的研究得出了两个广泛的结论。首先，它确认了现有文献中情境（项目管理）维度、结构/过程维度和NPD结果维度之间的联系。第二，公司可以通过各种项目管理实践来改善跨职能整合和规划。总体而言，我们发现希望提高开发过程的能力和新产品生存率的公司应采取措施促进跨职能整合并改善其规划过程。尽管跨职能整合与NPD结果之间的联系在文献中已得到充分建立，但规划过程对NPD结果的影响仍然是一个充满机遇的研究领域。我们的研究突出了规划对NPD结果贡献的三个方面。规划应该详细，团队成员应积极参与规划过程，团队应获得灵活性和自主权以应对出现的意外问题。
摘要总结: Thieme等(2003)基于文献综述，构建新产品开发的概念模型，分析项目管理特征如何促进产品市场存活。通过实证分析，验证了20个假设，发现管理能力、参与式风格和高管支持对跨职能整合及规划的重要性，进而提升开发效率和产品存活率。

作者: Kamoche, K; Cunha, MPE; da Cunha, JV
摘要: This paper calls for research on organizational improvisation to go beyond the currently dominant jazz metaphor in theory development. We recognize the important contribution that Jazz improvisation has made and will no doubt continue to make in understanding the nature and complexity of organizational improvisation. This article therefore presents some key lessons from the jazz metaphor and then proceeds to identify the possible dangers of building scientific inquiry upon a single metaphor. We then present three alternative models - Indian music, music therapy and role theory. We explore their nature and seek to identify ways in which the insights they generate complement those from jazz. This leads us to a better understanding of the challenges of building a theory of organizational improvisation.
标题: Towards a theory of organizational improvisation: Looking beyond the jazz metaphor
标题翻译: 朝向组织即兴创作理论：超越爵士乐隐喻
摘要翻译: 本文呼吁组织即兴创作的研究超越当前在理论发展中占主导地位的爵士乐隐喻。我们认可爵士即兴创作在理解组织即兴创作的性质和复杂性方面所做出的重要贡献，并将在未来继续发挥这一作用。因此，本文提出了爵士乐隐喻的一些关键教训，然后识别基于单一隐喻进行科学探究的潜在危险。接着，我们提出了三种替代模型——印度音乐、音乐疗法和角色理论。我们探讨它们的本质，并寻求识别这些模型所生成的见解与爵士乐中的见解相辅相成的方式。这使我们更好地理解构建组织即兴创作理论的挑战。
摘要总结: Kamoche、Cunha和da Cunha（2003）提出需要超越传统的爵士乐隐喻，探讨组织即兴创作，提出了三种替代模型（印度音乐、音乐疗法和角色理论），旨在丰富对组织即兴创作的理解，并警示单一隐喻带来的科学探究风险。

作者: Dougherty, D; Takacs, CH
摘要: A central function of organizational boundaries is to help people know what they are to do with whom and how, which enables them to work together. Sustained product innovation in very large organizations requires that perhaps thousands of people across the organization know how to join up, participate in, and move in and out of many new product teams, so a boundary that can keep all these roles and relationships sensible is especially important for innovation. Using grounded theory building, we find that a boundary of team play enabled heedful interrelating and thus the easy formation of multiple teams over time in the large organizations we studied, while a boundary of detachment thwarted organization-wide innovation. Play embodies open, improvised, fluid and energized relations, while team play reflects the emergent yet dynamic space of heedful interrelating. Our study details how team play vs. detachment enable or disable innovation teams, and suggests how managers can implement or maintain the heedful social relations that are necessary for sustained innovation. (C) 2004 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
标题: Team play: Heedful interrelating as the boundary for innovation
标题翻译: 团队合作：注意力相互关联作为创新的边界
摘要翻译: 组织边界的一个核心功能是帮助人们知道他们与谁、如何合作，这使他们能够共同工作。在非常大型的组织中，持续的产品创新要求组织中可能有成千上万的人知道如何参与、加入，以及如何在众多新产品团队中进出，因此，能够使所有这些角色和关系保持合理的边界对于创新尤其重要。通过扎根理论构建，我们发现团队合作的边界促进了谨慎的相互关系，从而使我们研究的这些大型组织能够轻松形成多个团队，而疏离的边界则阻碍了整个组织的创新。团队合作体现了开放、即兴、自如和充满活力的关系，而团队合作则反映了谨慎相互关系的动态新兴空间。我们的研究详述了团队合作与疏离如何促进或阻碍创新团队，并建议管理者如何实施或维护持续创新所必需的谨慎社会关系。(C) 2004 Elsevier Ltd. 保留所有权利。
摘要总结: Dougherty和Takacs（2004）通过扎根理论构建，研究了大型组织中团队互动边界的作用。他们发现，团队合作的边界促进了团队之间的有效互动，支持了持续的产品创新，而隔离的边界则阻碍了创新。研究建议管理者应维护有效的社会关系以推动创新。

期刊: Joint Commission journal on quality and safety
作者: Perry, Shawna J
摘要: BACKGROUND: Although human factors engineering (HFE) is considered only in relationship to the design of medical devices or information systems technology, human factors issues arise in many aspects of work in health care organizations.HFE ANALYSIS: In one scenario, the resuscitation stretcher would not pass through the ED door closest to radiology. Many clinical work spaces were never formally designed for the work currently being performed in them; instead, they were adapted from existing space originally designed for a different use. In a second scenario, infusion pump malfunction was not apparent. The patient experienced a near miss secondary to poor design; users thought that the infusion pump had been turned off when it was not.RECOMMENDATIONS: Health care can significantly benefit from the incorporation of HFE into the workplace. Introductory classes in medical and nursing schools on HFE will assist students in detecting HFE-related issues, making them less likely to suffer with them or overlook them once in clinical practice. More extensive training for patient safety and risk managers, that is, at a minimum, a certificate-level course from an HFE program, would enhance case and root cause analyses since these issues are rarely factored in.CONCLUSION: Collaboration with HFE experts and use of HFE principles may not make health care fool-proof, but it will make it less dependent on improvisation and ingenuity to protect patients from the system's vulnerabilities.
标题: An overlooked alliance: using human factors engineering to reduce patient harm.
标题翻译: 被忽视的联盟：应用人因工程减少患者伤害
摘要翻译: 背景：尽管人因工程（HFE）通常仅与医疗设备或信息系统技术的设计相关，但人因问题在医疗组织的多个工作方面都会出现。人因工程分析：在一个场景中，复苏担架无法通过紧急部门（ED）最靠近放射科的门。许多临床工作空间从未正式设计为目前正在其中进行的工作；相反，这些空间是从最初为其他用途设计的现有空间中改建而来。在第二个场景中，输液泵故障并不明显。患者因设计不良而遭遇了近乎失误；用户认为输液泵已关闭，但实际上并未关闭。建议：医疗保健可以从将人因工程融入工作场所中显著受益。医学院和护理学院的入门课程关于HFE将帮助学生发现与HFE相关的问题，这样他们在临床实践中遭遇这些问题的可能性就会降低。此外，为患者安全和风险管理人员提供更为广泛的培训，至少应包括HFE项目的证书课程，这将增强案例和根本原因分析，因为这些问题很少被考虑在内。结论：与HFE专家的合作和运用HFE原则或许无法使医疗保健做到万无一失，但它将使医疗保健在保护患者免受系统漏洞影响时，减少对即兴发挥和创造力的依赖。
摘要总结: 佩瑞（2004）通过分析医疗工作场所中人因工程（HFE）问题，揭示了应急设备设计的不当影响及其对患者安全的影响，建议在医疗教育中引入HFE课程，以提升医护人员对人因问题的识别能力，从而减少医疗系统的脆弱性。

作者: Lasala, H; Gjertson, WG
摘要: Accelerated Fabrication is an ongoing project in the Building Institute, a design-build program at the University of Louisiana at Lafayette, in which team members designed a master plan for a homeless shelter, then immediately fast-tracked the deployment of several modest but instrumental fabrications on site. As a deliberate tactic, acceleration generated project momentum and stimulated an improvisational design process.
标题: Accelerated fabrication: A catalytic agent within a community of caring
标题翻译: 加速制造：关怀社区中的催化剂
摘要翻译: 加速制造是路易斯安那州拉法叶大学建筑研究所的一项正在进行的项目，该设计-建造项目的团队成员为一座无家可归者收容所设计了总体规划，然后立即加速了现场几项朴素但重要的制造物的部署。作为一种有意的策略，加速产生了项目动能，并刺激了即兴设计过程。
摘要总结: Lasala和Gjertson（2005）在路易斯安那州立大学的建筑研究所进行了一项名为“加速制造”的项目，通过为无家可归者收容所设计总体规划并快速部署多项关键设施，实现了项目的加速，促进了设计过程的即兴创作。

作者: Baker, T; Nelson, RE
摘要: A field study of 29 resource-constrained firms that varied dramatically in their responses to similar objective environments is used to examine the process by which entrepreneurs in resource-poor environments were able to render unique services by recombining elements at hand for new purposes that challenged institutional definitions and limits. We found that Levi-Strauss's concept of bricolage-making do with what is at hand-explained many of the behaviors we observed in small firms that were able to create something from nothing by exploiting physical, social, or institutional inputs that other firms rejected or ignored. We demonstrate the socially constructed nature of resource environments and the role of bricolage in this construction. Using our field data and the existing literature on bricolage, we advance a formal definition of entrepreneurial bricolage and induce the beginnings of a process model of bricolage and firm growth. Central to our contribution is the notion that companies engaging in bricolage refuse to enact the limitations imposed by dominant definitions of resource environments, suggesting that, for understanding entrepreneurial behavior, a constructivist approach to resource environments is more fruitful than objectivist views.
标题: Creating something from nothing: Resource construction through entrepreneurial bricolage
标题翻译: 从无到有的创造：通过企业家拼凑构建资源
摘要翻译: 本研究对29家资源受限企业的实地研究，探讨了这些企业在面对类似客观环境时表现出的显著不同反应的过程。研究发现，在资源匮乏的环境中企业家能够通过重新组合现有元素、为新目的服务，从而挑战制度的定义和限制。我们发现列维-斯特劳斯的“拼凑”（bricolage）概念——利用手头拥有的资源——解释了许多小企业的行为，这些企业通过利用其他企业拒绝或忽视的物质、社会或制度输入，从无到有地创造了新事物。我们展示了资源环境的社会构建特性以及拼凑在这一构建中的作用。基于我们的实地数据和现有拼凑文献，我们提出了创业拼凑的正式定义，并引出拼凑与企业成长的过程模型的初步构思。我们研究的核心是，参与拼凑的公司拒绝实施主导性资源环境定义所施加的限制，这表明，在理解创业行为时，相较于客观主义观点，构建主义的资源环境视角更加富有成效。
摘要总结: 贝克和纳尔逊（2005）通过对29家资源受限公司的实地研究，探索这些企业如何通过重新组合现有资源，创造独特服务，颠覆制度界限，并提出了企业创意拼凑的新定义及其在企业成长中的作用。

作者: Klein, Katherine J.; Ziegert, Jonathan C.; Knight, Andrew P.; Xiao, Yan
摘要: This paper examines the leadership of extreme action teams-teams whose highly skilled members cooperate, to perform urgent, unpredictable, interdependent, and highly consequential tasks while simultaneously coping with frequent changes in team composition and training their teams' novice members. Our qualitative investigation of the leadership of extreme action medical teams in an emergency trauma center revealed a hierarchical, deindividualized system of shared leadership. At the heart of this system is dynamic delegation: senior lead. rapid and repeated delegation of the active leaderers ship role to and withdrawal of the active leadership role from more junior leaders of the team. Our findings suggest that dynamic delegation enhances extreme action teams' ability to perform reliably while also building their teams members' skills. We highlight the contingencies that guide senior leaders' delegation and withdrawal of the active leadership role, as well as the values and structures that motivate and enable the shared, ongoing practice of dynamic delegation. Further, we suggest that extreme action teams and other improvisational organizational units may achieve swift coordination and reliable performance by melding hierarchical and bureaucratic role-based structures with flexibility-enhancing processes. The insights emerging from our findings at once extend and challenge prior leadership theory and research, paving the way for further theory development and research on team leadership in dynamic settings.
标题: Dynamic delegation: Hierarchical, shared and deindividualized leadership in extreme action teams
标题翻译: 动态委托：极限行动团队中的层级、共享和去个性化领导
摘要翻译: 本文探讨了极端行动团队的领导力——这些团队的成员具有高技能，能够协作执行紧急、不可预测、相互依赖且影响重大的任务，同时应对团队组成的频繁变化并培训团队的新成员。我们对急救创伤中心极端行动医疗团队领导力的定性研究揭示了一种分层的去个体化共享领导系统。在这个系统中，动态委派是其核心：高级领导迅速且反复地将活跃领导角色委派给团队中较为初级的领导者，并从他们那里撤回活跃领导角色。我们的研究结果表明，动态委派增强了极端行动团队可靠执行的能力，同时也提升了团队成员的技能。我们强调了指导高级领导者委派和撤回活跃领导角色的应变因素，以及促使和支持动态委派这一共享、持续实践的价值观和结构。此外，我们建议，极端行动团队和其他即兴组织单元可以通过将分层和官僚角色基础结构与增强灵活性的流程结合，实现快速协调和可靠表现。我们的研究结果在延伸和挑战现有领导理论和研究的同时，为动态环境中团队领导力的进一步理论发展和研究铺平了道路。
摘要总结: Klein等（2006）通过对急救创伤中心极端行动医疗团队的定性研究，发现动态委派的领导系统可提升团队可靠性和成员技能，强调了领导角色的快速调整及其对团队表现的影响，为动态环境下的团队领导理论发展提供了新视角。

作者: Eisenberg, Eric M.
摘要: In this essay, I reflect on Karl Weick's best-known texts as a means of tracing his influence on the field of organizational communication. From this perspective, his main contributions are: (1) recognizing the centrality of language and interaction in the social construction of organizational realities; and (2) focusing squarely on communicative praxis as a site for improving our understanding of cognition and culture. Beyond these substantive contributions, an 'aesthetics of contingency' pervades Weick's writings. I maintain that this perspective presents a much needed alternative to seeking meaning and stability through the pursuit of various fundamentalisms.
标题: Karl Weick and the aesthetics of contingency
标题翻译: 卡尔·维克与偶然性的美学
摘要翻译: 在本文中，我反思卡尔·韦克（Karl Weick）最著名的文本，以追踪他对组织沟通领域的影响。从这个角度来看，他的主要贡献有两个：（1）认知语言和互动在组织现实的社会构建中的中心性；（2）明确将沟通实践作为改善我们对认知和文化理解的场所。除了这些实质性贡献之外，韦克的著作中弥漫着一种“偶然性的美学”。我认为，这一视角为通过追求各种根本主义而寻找意义和稳定性提供了一种急需的替代方案。
摘要总结: 艾森伯格（2006）通过回顾韦克的主要文本，探讨了其对组织沟通领域的影响，指出韦克的贡献在于强调语言和互动在社会构建中的核心地位，并注重沟通实践对认知和文化理解的提升，提出“偶然性的美学”作为寻找意义和稳定性的替代方案。

作者: Cornelissen, Joep P.
摘要: This article draws upon Karl Weick's insights into the nature of theorizing, and extends and refines his conception of theory construction as 'disciplined imagination'. An essential ingredient in Weick's 'disciplined imagination' involves his assertion that thought trials and theoretical representations typically involve a transfer from one epistemic sphere to another through the creative use of metaphor. The article follows up on this point and draws out how metaphor works, how processes of metaphorical imagination partake in theory construction, and how insightful metaphors and the theoretical representations that result from them can be selected. The paper also includes a discussion of metaphors-in-use (organizational improvisation as jazz and organizational behaviour as collective mind) which Weick proposed in his own writings. The whole purpose of this exercise is to theoretically augment and ground the concept of 'disciplined imagination', and in particular to refine the nature of thought trials and selection within it. In doing so, I also aim to provide pointers for the use of metaphorical imagination in the process of theory construction.
标题: Making sense of theory construction: Metaphor and disciplined imagination
标题翻译: 理论构建的理解：隐喻与规范化想象
摘要翻译: 本文借鉴了卡尔·韦克对理论性质的见解，并扩展和细化了他所提出的“有序想象”理论构建概念。韦克的“有序想象”中一个重要成分是他主张思想试验和理论表述通常通过创造性使用隐喻，从一个认识领域转移到另一个认识领域。本文进一步探讨了隐喻如何运作，隐喻想象过程如何参与理论构建，以及如何选择有见地的隐喻及其所产生的理论表述。论文还讨论了韦克在其著作中提出的“隐喻在使用中”（将组织即兴创作比作爵士乐，将组织行为比作集体思维）。这项研究的总体目的在于理论上增强和奠定“有序想象”概念，特别是细化其内部思想试验和选择的性质。在此过程中，我还旨在为理论构建过程中的隐喻想象提供一些指引。
摘要总结: Cornelissen（2006）基于卡尔·维克关于理论构建的洞见，探讨隐喻在理论构建中的作用，分析思维实验和隐喻想象如何促进理论发展，并讨论了组织即兴创作和集体思维等隐喻应用，以增强和细化“有序想象”的概念。

作者: Hilliard, Russell E.
摘要: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the effects of music therapy on compassion fatigue and team building of professional hospice workers. Participants were nurses, social workers, and chaplains and were employed for at least one year in hospice care. Seventeen participants engaged in one of two experimental music therapy groups. Experimental group I utilized an ecological music therapy approach with an open, free form without structure and encouraged participation in the live music experiences of instrumental improvisation as well as toning and chanting. Experimental group 2 utilized a didactic music therapy approach with a structured format wherein interventions were planned and facilitated by the music therapist a priori. Such interventions included guided meditation with live music, lyric analyses, and music and movement. To measure compassion fatigue, the Compassion Fatigue Scale (CFS) was used as a pre- and post-test measure in each group. To measure team building, the Team Building Questionnaire (TBQ) was used as a pre-and post-test measure in each group. Statistical analyses indicated a significant improvement in team building in both groups but no significant differences with regard to compassion fatigue. Further research studying the effects of music therapy on compassion fatigue and team building of professional hospice caregivers is recommended. (c) 2006 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
标题: The effect of music therapy sessions on comparison fatigue and team building of professional hospice caregivers
标题翻译: 音乐治疗对专业临终关怀护理人员比较疲劳和团队建设的影响
摘要翻译: 本研究的目的是评估音乐疗法对专业临终关怀工作者同情疲惫感和团队建设的影响。参与者为护士、社会工作者和牧师，且在临终关怀工作岗位上工作至少一年。有十七名参与者参与了两个实验音乐疗法小组之一。实验组I采用生态音乐疗法方法，形式开放、自由，没有固定结构，并鼓励参与者体验即兴音乐、声调和吟唱的现场音乐体验。实验组II采用教学音乐疗法方法，采用结构化格式，其中介入措施由音乐治疗师事先规划和引导。这些介入措施包括结合现场音乐的引导冥想、歌词分析以及音乐与运动。为测量同情疲惫感，使用同情疲惫量表（CFS）作为每组的前后测试测量。为测量团队建设，使用团队建设问卷（TBQ）作为每组的前后测试测量。统计分析表明，两个小组的团队建设均有显著改善，但在同情疲惫感方面没有显著差异。建议进一步研究音乐疗法对专业临终照护者同情疲惫感和团队建设的影响。
摘要总结: Hilliard (2006) 研究评估了音乐疗法对专业临终关怀工作者同情疲劳和团队建设的影响，参与者为在临终关怀工作至少一年的护理人员、社会工作者和牧师。结果显示两组在团队建设上显著改善，但同情疲劳无显著差异，建议进一步研究。

期刊: TRANSFER AND DIFFUSION OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY FOR ORGANIZATIONAL RESILIENCE
作者: Pham, Thi Lien; Jordan, Ernest
摘要: There is substantial literature on the use of information technology for competitive advantage and organizational transformation. In the main, this literature speaks to the world of IT-capable organizations, pursuing ever more challenging goals. This paper reports on a case study of an organization that had similar aims for its use of IT, but locked the capability. Senior management chose a strategy of improvisation with the goal of learning-by-doing so that the capability would be developed The paper assesses the achievements to date, suggests forward paths, and offers guidelines to organizations that find themselves in a similar state.
标题: Improvisation as strategy: Building an information technology capability
标题翻译: 即兴创作为战略：构建信息技术能力
摘要翻译: 关于信息技术用于竞争优势和组织转型的文献相当丰富。总体而言，这些文献主要关注具备IT能力的组织，不断追求更具挑战性的目标。本文报告了一项案例研究，聚焦于一家具备类似目标但缺乏能力的组织。高级管理层选择了一种即兴创造的策略，旨在通过实践学习来发展其能力。本文评估了迄今为止的成就，提出了前进的路径，并为处于类似状态的组织提供了指导。
摘要总结: Pham和Jordan（2006）通过对一家缺乏IT能力组织的案例研究，探讨了其通过即兴策略实现学习和能力发展的过程，评估了达到的成果，并为面临类似挑战的组织提供了建议和未来发展路径。

作者: Chambers, L. D.; Stokes, K. R.; Walsh, F. C.; Wood, R. J. K.
摘要: Marine structures such as platforms, jetties and ship hulls are subject to diverse and severe biofouling. Methods for inhibiting both organic and inorganic growth on wetted substrates are varied but most antifouling systems take the form of protective coatings. Biofouling can negatively affect the hydrodynamics of a bull by increasing the required propulsive power and the fuel consumption. This paper reviews the development of antifouling coatings for the prevention of marine biological fouling. As a result of the 2001 International Maritime Organization (IMO) ban on tributyltin (TBT), replacement antifouling coatings have to be environmentally acceptable as well as maintain a long life. Tin-free self-polishing copolymer (SPC) and foul release technologies are current applications but many alternatives have been suggested. Modem approaches to environmentally effective antifouling systems and their performance are highlighted. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
标题: Modern approaches to marine antifouling coatings
标题翻译: 现代海洋防污涂料的研究方法
摘要翻译: 海洋结构，如平台、码头和船体，面临着多样且严重的生物污损。抑制湿润基材上有机和无机生长的方法多种多样，但大多数防污系统采用保护涂层的形式。生物污损会通过增加所需的推进功率和燃料消耗，负面影响船体的流体动力学。本文回顾了防止海洋生物污损的防污涂层的发展。由于2001年国际海事组织（IMO）禁止使用三丁基锡（TBT），替代的防污涂层必须在环境上可接受，同时保持较长的使用寿命。无锡自抛光共聚物（SPC）和污损释放技术是当前的应用，但也提出了许多替代方案。强调了现代环境有效的防污系统及其性能。
摘要总结: Chambers等（2006）综述了海洋结构的抗污涂料发展，分析了对抗生物污损的环保替代品，如无锡自抛光共聚物和去污技术，以应对国际海事组织对有害物质的禁令，并强调了现代抗污系统的有效性。

作者: Roberto, Michael A.; Bohmer, Richard M. J.; Edmondson, Amy C.
摘要: On February 1, 2003, the world watched in horror as the Columbia space shuttle broke apart while reentering the earth's atmosphere, killing all seven astronauts. Some have argued that NASA's failure to respond with appropriate intensity to the so-called foam strike that led to the accident was evidence of irresponsible or incompetent management. The authors' research, however, suggests that NASA was exhibiting a natural, albeit unfortunate, pattern of behavior common in many organizations. The foam strike is a prime example of what the authors call an ambiguous threat-a signal that may or may not portend future harm.Ambiguous threats differ from threats with obvious causes-say, a fire in the building-for which the response is clear. They also differ from unmistakable threats that may lack straightforward response paths (such as the frightening oxygen-tank explosion aboard Apollo 73). However, when the warning sign is ambiguous and the threats potential effect is unclear, managers may choose to ignore or discount the risk. Such an approach can be catastrophic.Firms that do a good job of dealing with ambiguous threats do not improvise during a crisis; rather, they apply a rigorous set of detection and response capabilities that they have developed and practiced beforehand. in this article, the authors outline how to put such capabilities in place long before a crisis strikes. First, companies need to hone their teamwork and rapid problem-solving skills through practice. Second, they must learn to recognize weak signals, amplify the threat, and encourage employees to ask disconcerting what if questions in a safe environment. Finally, they should explore possible responses to threats through quick, low-cost experimentation.
标题: Facing ambiguous threats
标题翻译: 面对模糊威胁
摘要翻译: 2003年2月1日，世界在惊恐中目睹哥伦比亚号航天飞机在重新进入地球大气层时解体，导致七名宇航员全部遇难。一些人认为，NASA未能以适当的强度响应导致事故的所谓泡沫撞击，这表明其管理不负责任或无能。然而，作者的研究表明，NASA展现出一种自然的、尽管不幸的行为模式，这在许多组织中是普遍存在的。泡沫撞击是作者所称的模糊威胁的一个典型例子——一个可能预示未来危害的信号。模糊威胁与原因明显的威胁（例如建筑物内的火灾）不同，后者的应对方案是明确的。它们也不同于那些可能缺乏直接应对路径的明显威胁（例如阿波罗73号上令人恐惧的氧气罐爆炸）。然而，当警告信号模糊且威胁的潜在影响不明确时，管理者可能会选择忽视或低估风险。这种做法可能是灾难性的。应对模糊威胁做得好的公司在危机中不会临时抱佛脚；相反，他们会运用事先开发和练习的一套严格的检测和响应能力。本文中，作者概述了如何在危机发生之前很久就建立这样的能力。首先，公司需要通过实践磨练团队合作和快速解决问题的能力。其次，他们必须学会识别微弱信号，放大威胁，并鼓励员工在安全的环境中提出令人不安的“如果”问题。最后，他们应通过快速、低成本的实验探索对威胁的可能响应。
摘要总结: Roberto等（2006）通过分析2003年哥伦比亚号航天飞机事故，探讨了组织在面对模糊威胁时的管理行为。研究表明，妥善应对模糊威胁需要企业建立检测和响应能力，通过团队合作、识别微弱信号和低成本实验来加强危机应对能力，从而减少潜在灾难。

作者: Hansen, Hans; Barry, Daved; Boje, David M.; Hatch, Mary Jo
摘要: What follows is a collectively improvised story that emerged as four authors set out to explore their experiences and thoughts concerning organizational stories. The story is a reflection of their collective, creative, improvisational sense making via the construction of a narrative. The authors were selected because of their experience in the fields of organizational storytelling, narrative theory, and improvisation. They began by asking themselves What would happen if we engaged in improvisation to collectively create a story that makes sense of organizational research? After several rounds of reviews, they added reader voices, along with their own insights gained from their experience in constructing Truth or Consequences.
标题: Truth or consequences - An improvised collective story construction
标题翻译: 真相与后果 - 一种即兴的集体故事构建
摘要翻译: 以下是一个集体即兴创作的故事，四位作者共同探讨他们有关组织故事的经验和想法。这个故事反映了他们通过构建叙事进行集体、创造性和即兴的意义建构。作者们之所以被选中，是因为他们在组织讲故事、叙事理论和即兴创作领域的经验。他们开始时自问，如果我们参与即兴创作，共同创作一个能够使组织研究得到理解的故事，会发生什么？经过几轮审阅，他们加入了读者的声音，以及他们在构建《真相与后果》过程中获得的见解。
摘要总结: 汉森等（2007）通过集体即兴创作的方式，探索组织故事的经验与思考，研究者围绕组织讲故事、叙事理论和即兴创作展开，构建了一个反映集体智慧的叙事，旨在理解组织研究。

作者: Cunha, Miguel Pina E.; Chia, Robert
摘要: Managers and organisations often aim to stay focused and have clarity of purpose in dealing with key business issues, challenges and targets. Yet, this narrow concentration of focus risks overlooking issues, events and transformations occurring at the periphery of corporate awareness that may threaten the survival of the organisation or provide opportunities for expansion. Being able to take in peripheral vision may therefore be crucial to an organisation's wellbeing. In this paper, we discuss how teams may play a crucial role in improving peripheral vision and awareness through their function and orientation. We identify a number of different functions of teams and develop a typology that shows how different types of teams orientate themselves in dealing with focal and peripheral issues. In particular we examine the cases of teams that are most orientated toward the periphery: minimally-structured and immersion teams, and show how each employs specific practices - namely zooming, improvisation, bricolage, scenario thinking, wild cards and weak signals - to sharpen peripheral vision and awareness. (c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
标题: Using teams to avoid peripheral blindness
标题翻译: 利用团队避免周边盲点
摘要翻译: 管理者和组织通常旨在在处理关键业务问题、挑战和目标时保持专注和明确的目的。然而，这种狭窄的专注可能会忽视企业意识边缘发生的问题、事件和转变，这些可能威胁组织的生存或提供扩张的机会。因此，具备周边视野的能力对组织的健康至关重要。在本文中，我们讨论了团队如何通过其功能和导向在提升周边视野和意识方面发挥重要作用。我们识别出团队的多种不同功能，并发展了一种类型学，展示不同类型的团队在处理焦点和周边问题时的导向方式。特别是我们考察了最倾向于周边的团队案例：最小结构团队和沉浸团队，并展示了每种团队如何运用特定的实践——即放大、即兴创作、拼凑、情景思维、意外事件和微弱信号——来提高周边视野和意识。(c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. 保留所有权利。
摘要总结: Cunha和Chia（2007）通过对团队功能的分析，探讨了如何提升组织的边缘视野和意识。研究基于团队功能类型，提出了最能关注外部事务的团队（如最小结构和沉浸团队），并揭示它们通过特定实践（如即兴创作、情景思维等）增强组织的适应能力和扩展机会。

作者: Fægri, Tor Erlend; Hanssen, Geir Kjetil
摘要: This descriptive, longitudinal case study reports on the experiences from a medium-sized packaged software product supplier in their improvisation-like transition from a plan-based process to Evo-an agile, evolutionary process. The study focuses on the organizational implications for the supplier, including customer collaboration, process control; and psychological comfort. Evolutionary product development improves stakeholder engagement and developer responsiveness over plan-based processes but requires cross-organizational discipline and involved management.
标题: Collaboration, process control, and fragility in evolutionary product development
标题翻译: 合作、过程控制与进化产品开发中的脆弱性
摘要翻译: 该描述性纵向案例研究报告了一个中型软件产品供应商在从基于计划的流程过渡到Evo——一种灵活的、进化性的流程中的即兴体验。研究重点关注供应商的组织影响，包括客户协作、流程控制和心理舒适度。进化性产品开发在利益相关者参与和开发者响应能力方面相较于基于计划的流程有所改善，但要求跨组织的规范和管理的参与。
摘要总结: Fægri和Hanssen（2007）通过描述性纵向案例研究，探讨一家中型软件供应商从计划型流程向敏捷的Evo流程过渡的经验，发现这种演化性产品开发改善了利益相关者参与和开发者响应，但需跨组织的纪律和管理参与。

期刊: 2007 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON SYSTEMS ENGINEERING AND MODELING, PROCEEDINGS
作者: de Haan, Uzi; Cohen, Shalom
摘要: Improvisation has been discussed to some extent in Innovation and Entrepreneurship literature with regard to processes and tasks performed by entrepreneurs when faced with uncertainly such as in organizational learning in uncertain technology environments [9], in the decision. making process [7], and in the founding, process [2].The role of improvisation has also been discussed with regard to software organizations and software development and the various tasks performed by the development heads and teams [3].Hence, to make this connection between the software development process, improvisation and entrepreneurs, this research reports the observations made in a multiple case study scene of an entrepreneural vendor of Off-the-Shelf software. Through these observations, a now form of software development emerged This form, Lead-Driven Development, is based upon improvisation of the software development processes by entrepreneurial vendors who improvise new product features and bug-fixes based on leads they pick up from one marketing meeting or demonstration to the next one. This type of development, although not very beneficial in the long run for the product's commercial development tailors demo features specifically to potential customers' needs. Thus, the chances to satisfy potential customers' needs through the product's associated benefits and features, improve. We discuss in length how the improvisation is employed and recommend a software development task path based upon it. We bring figures to demonstrate how Lead Driven Development has been found to be beneficial to vendors.Following the suggested model for software development for entrepreneurial vendors, we introduce a theoretical framework from the Innovation literature [11] and by the use of knowledge gathered from the case studies conducted, we explain how vendors may achieve an improved level of software development improvisational skills.
标题: The role of improvisation in Off-the-Shelf software development of entrepreneurial vendors
标题翻译: 创业供应商的现成软件开发中的即兴创作角色
摘要翻译: 即兴创作在创新与创业文献中已经在一定程度上被讨论，涉及创业者在面临不确定性时所执行的过程和任务，例如在不确定技术环境中的组织学习[9]、决策过程[7]以及创办过程[2]。即兴创作的角色也已在软件组织及软件开发、以及开发负责人和团队所执行的各种任务中得到讨论[3]。因此，为了建立软件开发过程、即兴创作与创业者之间的联系，本研究报告了对一家现成软件创业供应商的多案例研究观察。通过这些观察，一种新的软件开发形式浮现。这种形式是以引导驱动开发（Lead-Driven Development）为基础，由创业供应商在营销会议或演示之间即兴创造新的产品特性和bug修复。虽然这种开发方式从长远来看对产品的商业发展并不非常有利，但却能够特别针对潜在客户的需求来定制演示功能。因此，通过产品相关的利益和特性来满足潜在客户需求的机会也得以提高。我们详细讨论了即兴创作的使用，并推荐了一条基于此的软件下载任务路径。我们提供数据以展示引导驱动开发对供应商的益处。根据为创业供应商建议的软件开发模型，我们引入了来自创新文献的理论框架[11]，并借助从所开展案例研究中获取的知识，说明供应商如何提高软件开发的即兴创作技能。
摘要总结: de Haan和Cohen（2007）通过对软件开发领域的多案例研究，探讨了创业者在不确定环境中如何通过即兴创作来改善软件开发过程，提出了“引导驱动开发”模式，建议创业供应商通过根据市场反馈即兴调整产品特性，从而提升满足客户需求的能力。

作者: Gosain, Sanjay
摘要: Organizations considering the adoption of the web services framework for their Information Technology (IT) applications are confronted with a period of technological ferment, as standards for supporting non-trivial business process functionality are not yet in place. Evolving standardization poses challenges in the form of inter-temporal dependencies as organizations' conformance to the standards that emerge in the future is contingent on their current design choices that need to be made ex-ante without complete information of how standards will evolve. At the same time, there are significant early-mover benefits to be gained by executing an IT strategy using web services as a cornerstone. This paper draws upon coordination theory to develop a conceptual framework outlining three approaches for organizations to deal with changing standardization regimes: (a) The dependencies across components, conforming to different standardization regimes, are continually bridged through intermediary services (e.g., using a protocol adapter that translates to an unanticipated emergent standard), (b) The dependencies across components are minimized through loose coupling so that standardization regime changes for any component have a minimal impact on other components (e.g., encapsulating the functionality susceptible to design change into a module with abstract interfaces), and (c) The impacted components are rapidly reconfigurable as and when standardization regime changes (e.g., by building in extension features into applications). The risk for organizations investing in web services can be further managed by mechanisms such as organization's attention to signals from the periphery, undertaking low-risk experiments to learn in different areas, and bricolage-like improvisations of their legacy components at hand.
标题: Realizing the vision for web services: Strategies for dealing with imperfect standards
标题翻译: 实现网络服务的愿景：应对不完善标准的策略
摘要翻译: 组织在考虑采用网络服务框架用于其信息技术（IT）应用时，面临着技术变革的时期，因为支持非琐碎业务流程功能的标准尚未建立。标准化的演变带来了跨时间依赖性的挑战，因为组织对未来出现的标准的符合程度取决于其当前的设计选择，而这些选择必须在缺乏完整信息的情况下预先做出。同时，通过以网络服务为基石执行IT战略，组织可以获得显著的早期采用者利益。本文借鉴协调理论，开发了一个概念框架，概述了组织应对变化的标准化制度的三种方法：(a) 跨组件的依赖关系通过中介服务持续连接（例如，使用协议适配器将其转换为未预见的新兴标准），(b) 通过松耦合最小化跨组件的依赖关系，以便任何组件的标准化制度变更对其他组件的影响最小（例如，将易受设计变更影响的功能封装为具有抽象接口的模块），以及(c) 影响到的组件可以在标准化制度变更时快速重新配置（例如，通过在应用程序中构建扩展功能）。组织在投资网络服务的风险还可以通过机制加以管理，例如组织关注来自边缘的信号、在不同领域进行低风险实验以学习，以及对现有遗留组件的 bricolage式即兴改造。
摘要总结: Gosain（2007）基于协调理论，提出三种应对变动标准化机制的框架，以帮助组织在技术变革中合理采用Web服务架构，提高早期收益，并管理风险。方法包括通过中介服务桥接依赖、松散耦合最小化影响，以及快速重构受影响组件。

作者: MacLennan, Diane; Clausen, Shawna; Pagel, Nina; Avery, Jack D.; Sigford, Barbara; MacLennan, Donald; Mahowald, Rita
摘要: The military operations in Iraq and Afghanistan have resulted in patterns of injury not commonly seen in previous conflicts. Improvised explosive devices are the primary weapon, and exposure to blast is the most common mechanism of injury. Blasts can result in polytrauma injury, in which multiple body systems, including the head and brain, are injured. Nursing and rehabilitation care can be further challenged by other blast sequelae such as pain, amputation, blindness or low vision, hearing impairment, and aphasia. This article describes the process by which one Veterans Affairs Medical Center developed its inpatient rehabilitation service into a polytrauma rehabilitation center to meet the medical and rehabilitation needs of these patients. Special attention is given to the education and training program developed to solidify the membership of the center's nursing staf in the interdisciplinary treatment team.
标题: Developing a polytrauma rehabilitation center: A pioneer experience in building, staffing, and training
标题翻译: 建立多发伤康复中心：建设、人员配置和培训的先锋经验
摘要翻译: 在伊拉克和阿富汗的军事行动中，导致了以前冲突中不常见的伤害模式。自制炸药是主要武器，而爆炸接触是最常见的伤害机制。爆炸可能导致多发性创伤，涉及多个身体系统，包括头部和大脑。护理和康复护理还可能面临其他爆炸后遗症的挑战，如疼痛、截肢、失明或低视力、听力损伤和失语症。本文描述了一个退伍军人事务医疗中心如何将其住院康复服务发展为多发性创伤康复中心，以满足这些患者的医疗和康复需求。特别关注所开发的教育和培训项目，以巩固中心护理团队在多学科治疗团队中的成员资格。
摘要总结: MacLennan等（2008）基于军队在伊拉克和阿富汗的作战经验，分析了由爆炸装置引起的多创伤模式，指出护理和康复面临挑战，并描述了一家退伍军人事务医疗中心如何发展其住院康复服务，满足多创伤患者的需求，以及所实施的教育和培训项目。

作者: Carlsson, Sven A.; El Sawy, Omar A.
摘要: This chapter examines issues concerned with supporting managers and organizations with information and communication technologies as they decide and act in turbulent and high-velocity environments. In particular, the chapter identifies five key tensions in this context: (1) the tension between the need for quick decisions and the need for analytical decision processes; (2) the tension involving managerial need for action and the need for the safest execution of decisions that may be bold and risky; (3) the tension around empowering middle managers and management teams at various organizational levels in the midst of powerful and impatient top executives; (4) the tension between programmed, quick-action learning loops and the increased requirement for emergence and improvisation; and (5) the tension between expending effort to eliminate the digital divide with other organizations versus finding expedient ways to communicate through heterogeneous digital infrastructures. Each of the tensions, and how it can be managed, is illustrated through a case example. The chapter ends by suggesting that the management of these critical tensions needs to be fused into the day-to-day fabric of management practices for decision support processes.
标题: Managing the five tensions of IT-enabled decision support in turbulent and high-velocity environments
标题翻译: 在动荡和高速环境中管理IT支持决策的五个紧张关系
摘要翻译: 本章探讨了在动荡和高速环境中，支持管理者和组织利用信息和通信技术进行决策和行动所面临的问题。特别地，本章识别了五个关键张力：(1) 对于快速决策的需求与对分析决策过程的需求之间的张力；(2) 管理者对行动的需求与对可能大胆且具有风险的决策安全执行的需求之间的张力；(3) 在强大且急躁的高管领导下，赋权于中层管理者和各级管理团队之间的张力；(4) 规定性的快速行动学习循环与对新兴和即兴发挥的日益需求之间的张力；以及(5) 为消除与其他组织之间数字鸿沟而投入的努力与通过异构数字基础设施寻找便捷沟通方式之间的张力。每个张力以及如何管理它们都通过案例示例进行了说明。本章最后提出，这些关键张力的管理需要融入日常管理实践的决策支持过程中。
摘要总结: Carlsson和El Sawy（2008）探讨了在动荡环境中支持管理者的决策与行动的五个关键紧张关系，包括快速决策与分析过程的平衡、行动需求与安全执行的矛盾等，并通过案例分析提出了管理这些紧张关系的建议。

作者: Gabriel, Yiannis
摘要: Over the past five years, PowerPoint has emerged as a powerful piece of communication technology, having profound consequences on presentations (business and educational), classroom communication and, possibly, on the nature of lecturing itself. An analysis of the ways in which PowerPoint is used offers considerable insights into, first, the nature of educational technologies and their organizational implementations; second, the effect of these technologies on the construction and dissemination of organizational knowledge; and, third, the qualities and skills of a society of spectacle, where a great deal of organizational knowledge assumes the form of visual representations. Using illustrations from my personal experience, I examine some uses to which the software is put and some of its potential shortcomings. These include the parcelling of knowledge into bullet points, reliance on visual aids to support weak analysis, and the forced linearity of argumentation that limits improvisation, digression and inventiveness. I argue, however, that PowerPoint can be used more creatively, to build on our culture's emphasis on spectacle and image and related multi-tasking skills that lecturers and students develop. In this manner, PowerPoint can redefine the nature of a lecture, from the authoritative presentation of a text into a multimedia performance that elicits a critical, creative and active response from its audience.
标题: Against the tyranny of PowerPoint: Technology-in-use and technology abuse
标题翻译: 反对PowerPoint的专制：使用中的技术与技术滥用
摘要翻译: 在过去五年中，PowerPoint作为一种强大的沟通技术应运而生，深刻影响了商业和教育领域的演示、课堂交流，甚至可能改变讲授本身的性质。对PowerPoint使用方式的分析提供了重要的见解：首先，教育技术的本质及其组织实施；其次，这些技术对组织知识的构建和传播的影响；第三，一个以视觉表现为主的展现社会的特质和技能，其中大量的组织知识以视觉形式呈现。通过个人经验中的实例，我考察了该软件的一些使用方式及其潜在的不足之处。这些不足包括将知识简化为要点、依赖视觉辅助材料以支持薄弱的分析，以及强迫论证的线性结构，这限制了即兴发挥、离题和创造力。然而，我认为PowerPoint可以更具创造性地使用，以建立我们文化中对展现和形象以及相关多任务技能的重视，让讲师和学生共同发展。通过这种方式，PowerPoint可以重新定义讲座的性质，将其从权威的文本呈现转变为激发观众批判性、创造性和积极反应的多媒体表演。
摘要总结: Gabriel（2008）通过个人经验分析PowerPoint在商业和教育中的应用，指出其在知识构建和传播中的影响，并讨论了其短板，如知识压缩和论证线性化。同时，他认为PowerPoint可作为多媒体表现形式，促进创意和批判性思维，重塑讲座的性质。

期刊: ISI 2008: 2008 IEEE INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON INTELLIGENCE AND SECURITY INFORMATICS
作者: Chen, Hsinchun
摘要: Improvised explosive device web pages represent a significant source of knowledge for security organizations. These web pages exist in distinctive genres of communication, providing different types and levels of information for the intelligence community. This paper presents a framework for the classification of improvised explosive device web pages by genre. The approach uses a complex feature extractor, extended feature representation, and support vector machine learning algorithms. Improvised explosive device web pages were collected from the Dark Web and two classification models were examined, one using feature selection. Classification accuracy exceeded 88%.
标题: IEDs in the dark web: Genre classification of improvised explosive device web pages
标题翻译: 黑暗网络中的简易爆炸装置：简易爆炸装置网页的类型分类
摘要翻译: 即兴爆炸装置网页代表了安全组织的重要知识来源。这些网页存在于不同的交流类型中，为情报界提供了不同类型和层次的信息。本文提出了一种按类型对即兴爆炸装置网页进行分类的框架。该方法使用复杂的特征提取器、扩展特征表示和支持向量机学习算法。从暗网收集了即兴爆炸装置网页，并检验了两种分类模型，其中一种使用了特征选择。分类准确率超过88%。
摘要总结: 陈欣春（2008）基于从暗网收集的自制炸药设备网页，使用复杂特征提取器、扩展特征表示和支持向量机算法，构建了网页分类框架，研究发现分类准确率超过88%，为安全组织提供了重要知识来源。

作者: Cornelissen, Joep P.; Kafouros, Mario
摘要: A long-standing stream of organizational research suggests that our ability to theorize and reason about organizations is significantly influenced by metaphorical representations of organizations. This study contributes to this research stream by examining how different metaphors influence theory development and academic thinking about organizations. We asked scholars from UK business schools to rate different metaphors in terms of their impact on theory building. We then examined whether, and to what extent, these metaphors (after they had been selected) had helped in clarifying and advancing their understanding of organizations. The results indicate that the ability of a metaphor to advance and clarify theoretical understandings of organizations is based upon (1) the degree to which that metaphor is seen to capture multiple salient features of organizations and (2) the ease with which the metaphor is understood. We discuss the implications of these results for theorizing and research on organizations.
标题: Metaphors and Theory Building in Organization Theory: What Determines the Impact of a Metaphor on Theory?
标题翻译: 组织理论中的隐喻与理论构建：隐喻影响理论的因素是什么？
摘要翻译: 一项长期的组织研究表明，我们对组织进行理论化和推理的能力受到组织隐喻表征的显著影响。本研究通过考察不同隐喻如何影响理论发展和学术思维，为这一研究领域做出了贡献。我们询问了来自英国商学院的学者，让他们评估不同隐喻对理论构建的影响。随后，我们调查了这些隐喻（经过选择后）在多大程度上有助于澄清和推进他们对组织的理解。结果表明，一个隐喻促进和澄清对组织的理论理解的能力基于（1）该隐喻在多大程度上被认为捕捉了组织的多种显著特征，以及（2）该隐喻被理解的容易程度。我们讨论了这些结果对组织理论化和研究的影响。
摘要总结: Cornelissen和Kafouros（2008）通过对英国商学院学者的调查，研究了隐喻如何影响组织理论的发展。结果表明，隐喻的有效性取决于其体现的组织特征的多样性和理解的便捷性，为组织研究提供了启示。

作者: Siebra Bochio, Ieda Maria; de Carvalho Fortes, Paulo Antonio
摘要: AIDS has been a unique event due not only to its devastating effects, but also to the ways in which it has stimulated solidarity and mobilization of society in the defense of the rights of persons living with HIV/AIDS and their families, friends, and contacts. Beginning as initiatives to ensure dignity in death, AIDS NGOs have undergone structural changes to respond to the demands raised by the epidemic. The current study describes the history of the Brazilian AIDS NGO Casa de Assistencia Filadelfia in relation to the evolution of the AIDS epidemic, highlighting the issue of organizational development. A qualitative case study methodology was used, and the data were collected from document analysis and semi-structured interviews with key informants identified by the organization. Data analysis was based on the theoretical premises of organizational development and shows how the organization made the transition from the pioneering phase marked by improvisation and expanded to a phase of regulation until reaching flexibility and innovation by diversifying its projects. The study highlights the importance of organizational development as an essential element in building healthy, agile organizations in the response to their demands.
标题: The impact of AIDS on the organizational development of nongovernmental organizations: a case study on Casa de Assistencia Filadelfia
标题翻译: 艾滋病对非政府组织组织发展的影响：以菲拉德尔菲亚援助之家为案例研究
摘要翻译: 艾滋病因其毁灭性影响以及对社会团结和动员的促进作用，成为一个独特的事件，捍卫着生活在 HIV/AIDS 之中的人及其家庭、朋友和联系人的权利。最初以确保临终尊严为目标的艾滋病非政府组织（NGO），经历了结构性的变化，以响应疫情带来的各种需求。本研究描述了巴西艾滋病非政府组织菲利德尔菲亚援助之家（Casa de Assistencia Filadelfia）与艾滋病疫情演变的历史，强调了组织发展的问题。研究采用了定性案例研究方法，数据通过文件分析和对组织识别的关键信息提供者进行半结构化访谈收集而来。数据分析基于组织发展的理论前提，展示了该组织如何从以即兴创作为特色的先锋阶段过渡到规范阶段，最终通过项目多样化达到了灵活性和创新性。该研究强调了组织发展作为回应其需求时建立健康、灵活组织的重要元素。
摘要总结: Siebra Bochio和de Carvalho Fortes（2008）采用定性案例研究法，通过文献分析和对关键知情人的半结构访谈，探讨了巴西艾滋病毒/艾滋病非政府组织Casa de Assistencia Filadelfia的历史与组织发展，揭示其如何从临时应急转向灵活创新，以应对艾滋病疫情的挑战。

作者: Engestrom, Yrjo
摘要: Contrarily to most workplace studies which focus on temporally and spatially compact and stable centers of coordination, this paper attempts to direct attention to an almost opposite type of work organization. It refers to work which requires active construction of constantly changing combinations of people and artifacts over lengthy trajectories of time and widely distributed in space. These forms of work organization can be described with the notion of knotworking. The notion of knot refers to distributed, rapidly pulsating and partially improvised orchestration of collaborative performance between otherwise loosely connected actors and activity systems. To examine the phenomenon more closely, the paper first analyzes a sequence of knotworking focused on a mental patient in primary health care. It then moves to an analysis of an attempt at institutionalizing knotworking among providers of children's medical care in the Helsinki area in Finland. It discusses the challenges knotworking presents to activity-theoretical studies of work. Finally, it develops a vision in which the future foundation of knotworking is seen to reside in Internet-mediated social production and highly distributed patterns of organizing work. (C) 2008 Elsevier Masson SAS. Tous droits reserves.
标题: When the center does not hold:: The concept and prospects of knotworking
标题翻译: 当中心无法维持：结工作概念及前景
摘要翻译: 与大多数专注于时间和空间上紧凑且稳定的协调中心的工作场所研究相反，本文试图将注意力引向一种几乎相反的工作组织类型。该类型工作需要在漫长的时间轨迹和广泛的空间分布中，积极构建不断变化的人与物的组合。这些工作组织形式可以用“结作”（knotworking）这一概念来描述。“结”指的是在松散连接的参与者和活动系统之间进行的分布式、快速脉动和部分即兴的协作表现的编排。为了更深入地研究这一现象，本文首先分析了一个聚焦于初级卫生保健中的精神病患者的结作序列。接着，本文分析了在芬兰赫尔辛基地区儿童医疗服务提供者之间推进结作的尝试。讨论了结作对工作活动理论研究所提出的挑战。最后，本文发展了一个愿景，在这一愿景中，结作的未来基础被视为依赖于互联网媒介的社会生产和高度分散的工作组织模式。
摘要总结: Engestrom（2008）通过分析芬兰赫尔辛基儿童医疗服务和初级卫生保健中的案例，探讨了“结网络”形式的工作组织，强调在分散和动态环境中协作的挑战，提出未来工作组织的基础在于互联网中介的社会生产。

作者: Paparone, Christopher R.; Anderson, Ruth A.; McDaniel, Reuben R., Jr.
摘要: The authors challenge the old school of hierarchical strategic leadership that dominates the military professional culture and, in contrast, emphasize complex adaptive systems (CASs) as a compelling alternative mental model to view the military profession. The authors suggest eight leadership tasks that come to the fore when the mental model of the military as a professional CAS is used to examine the circumstances that engulf military activities: relationship building, loose coupling, complicating, diversifying, sensemaking, learning, improvising, and emergent thinking. These are distinguished from the traditional tasks of role defining, standardization, simplifying, socializing, decision making, knowing, commanding and controlling, and planning based on estimates.
标题: Where military professionalism meets complexity science
标题翻译: 军事职业化与复杂性科学的交汇点
摘要翻译: 作者挑战了主导军事专业文化的传统层级战略领导观，并强调复杂适应系统（CAS）作为一种引人注目的替代理念模型，以看待军事职业。作者提出了八项领导任务，当将军事视为一个专业的CAS时，这些任务在审视包围军事活动的环境中显得尤为重要：建立关系、松散耦合、复杂化、多样化、意义构建、学习、即兴发挥和新兴思维。这些任务与传统的角色定义、标准化、简化、社交、决策、认知、指挥与控制以及基于估计的计划任务不同。
摘要总结: Paparone等（2008）挑战传统的军事层级战略领导，提出复杂适应系统作为替代模型，强调关系建设、学习和即兴创新等八项领导任务，旨在提升军事专业的灵活性和适应性。

作者: Werry, Margaret
摘要: The ethno-historical study of tourism can lend a new focus to the theorization of governmentality, demonstrating the ways in which it rests on the systemic, performative, and affective interpenetration of human and environmental bios ('nature'), built form, economy, and the technologies of the state. This paper examines Rotorua, a tourism centre in New Zealand at the turn of the twentieth century, suggesting that it operated as a laboratory for the forms of political rationality associated with the emerging liberal state, in particular those concerned with race. It analyzes town planning and environmental engineering initiatives, the medical discourses relating to the spa complex constructed by the government, and tourists' accounts of the geo-thermal attractions of the area. In each of these cases, tourism was oriented towards the production of white subjects, and the 'liberalization' of Maori populations, through reflexive work on what Foucault called the 'conduct of conduct.' In each of these cases, bio-political imperatives relied on a repertoire of bio-poetical performances, investing the subject imaginatively in forms of conduct that are viscerally embodied, expressive, creative, improvisatory, and even eroticized. Where the literature of governmentality focuses predominantly on the rationalities, technologies, and generalized institutional loci of bio-politics, attending ethno-historically to tourism attunes us to its affective registers, performative repertoires, its intimate relationship with locality and spatiality, and the symbolic (a) logics through which it achieves its purchase on the immanently political territory of natural life.
标题: Tourism, race and the state of nature - On the bio-poetics of government
标题翻译: 旅游、种族与自然状态 - 政府的生物诗学
摘要翻译: 旅游的民族历史研究可以为治理理论提供新的视角，展示其基于人类与环境生物（“自然”）、建筑形式、经济及国家技术之间的系统性、表演性和情感的相互渗透。本文考察了20世纪初新西兰的旅游中心罗托鲁瓦，认为其作为与新兴自由国家相关的政治理性形式的实验场，特别是与种族有关的内容。同时分析了城镇规划和环境工程的倡议、政府建造的温泉综合体相关的医学话语，以及游客对该地区地热景点的描述。在这些案例中，旅游的方向是为了培养白人主体，并通过对福柯所称的“行为的行为”的反思性工作来“自由化”毛利人群体。在每个案例中，生物政治的命令依赖于一系列生物诗意的表演，使主体在行为形式上充满想象，这些形式生动地体现出、富有表现力、创造性、即兴以及甚至是性别化的特征。当治理的文献主要关注生物政治的理性、技术和普遍的制度场所时，关注旅游的民族历史则使我们能更好地感知其情感层面、表现性曲目、与地方和空间的亲密关系，以及通过其在自然生命政治领域的影响力所达到的象征性（a）逻辑。
摘要总结: Werry（2008）通过对20世纪初新西兰Rotorua旅游中心的历史研究，分析了该地区如何作为新兴自由国家政治理性实验室，探讨旅游与种族及政府技术的关系，揭示了生物政治命令及其对社会的影响。

期刊: UNIFYING THEMES IN COMPLEX SYSTEMS IV
作者: Hagendoorn, Ivar
摘要: In a traditional choreography a choreographer determines the motions of a dancer or a group of dancers. Information theory shows that there is a limit to the complexity that can be created in any given amount of time. This is true even when building on previous work, since movements and their interactions have to be communicated to the dancers. When creating a group work, choreographers circumvent this problem by focusing either on the movements of individual dancers (giving rise to intricate movements but within a simple spatiotemporal organization) or on the overall structure (intricate patterns but simple movements) or by creating room for the dancers to fill in part of the movements. Complexity theory offers a different paradigm towards the generation of enticing patterns. Flocks of birds or schools of fish for instance are considered 'beautiful' but lack a central governing agent. Computer simulations show that a few simple rules can give rise to the emergence of the kind of patterns seen in flocks or swarms. In these models individual agents are represented by dots or equivalent shapes. To be of use to choreography and to be implemented on or rather with dancers, some additional rules will therefore have to be introduced. A number of possible rules are presented, which were extracted from 'real life' experiments with dancers. The current framework for modeling flocking behavior, based on local interactions between single agents, will be extended to include more general forms of interaction. Dancers may for instance perceive the global structure they form, e.g. a line or a cluster, and then put that knowledge to creative use according to some pre-established rules, e.g. if there is a line, form a circle or if there is a cluster spread out in all directions. Some of these rules may be applied back to other complex systems. The present paper is also an invitation to complexity theorists working in different fields to contribute additional rules and ideas.
标题: Emergent patterns in dance improvisation and choreography
标题翻译: 舞蹈即兴表演与编舞中的新兴模式
摘要翻译: 在传统的编舞中，编舞者决定舞者或舞者群体的动作。信息理论表明，在任何特定时间内，能够创造的复杂性是有限的。即使在基于先前作品的基础上，这一点也成立，因为动作及其相互作用必须传达给舞者。在创作集体作品时，编舞者通过专注于单个舞者的动作（产生复杂的动作，但在简单的时空组织内）或整体结构（复杂的图案但简单的动作）来规避这个问题，或创造空间让舞者填补部分动作。复杂性理论提供了生成诱人模式的不同范式。例如，鸟群或鱼群被视为“美丽”，但缺乏中心的管理者。计算机模拟表明，几个简单的规则可以使鸟群或虫群中出现相似的模式。在这些模型中，个体代理被表示为点或等效形状。因此，为了对编舞有所帮助，并在舞者身上或与舞者一起实施，必须引入一些额外的规则。提出了若干可能的规则，这些规则是从与舞者的“现实生活”实验中提取的。当前基于单一代理之间局部互动的编队行为建模框架将扩展，以包括更一般的互动形式。例如，舞者可能感知他们所形成的整体结构，例如一条线或一个簇，然后根据一些既定规则将这一知识创造性地使用，例如，如果有一条线，就形成一个圆；如果有一个簇，就向四面八方扩展。其中一些规则可能会应用到其他复杂系统上。本文也是对来自不同领域的复杂性理论家的邀请，欢迎他们贡献额外的规则和想法。
摘要总结: 哈根多恩（2008）通过信息理论探讨传统编舞中的复杂性限制，提出基于复杂性理论的全新编舞范式，强调利用简单规则和局部互动生成优雅的舞蹈模式，并鼓励不同领域的复杂性理论研究者共同贡献规则与创意。

作者: Knichel, David G.; Bruemmer, David J.
摘要: The Army Future Combat System (FCS) Operational Requirement Document has identified a number of advanced robot tactical behavior requirements to enable the Future Brigade Combat Team (FBCT). The FBCT advanced tactical behaviors include Sentinel Behavior, Obstacle Avoidance Behavior, and Scaled Levels of Human-Machine control Behavior. The U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command, (TRADOC) Maneuver Support Center (MANSCEN) has also documented a number of robotic behavior requirements for the Army non FCS forces such as the Infantry Brigade Combat Team (IBCT), Stryker Brigade Combat Team (SBCT), and Heavy Brigade Combat Team (HBCT). The general categories of useful robot tactical behaviors include Ground/Air Mobility behaviors, Tactical Mission behaviors, Manned-Umnanned Teaming behaviors, and Soldier-Robot Interface behaviors. Many DoD research and development centers are achieving the necessary components necessary for artificial tactical behaviors for ground and air robots to include the Army Research Laboratory (ARL), U.S. Army Research, Development and Engineering Command (RDECOM), Space and Naval Warfare (SPAWAR) Systems Center, US Army Tank-Automotive Research, Development and Engineering Center (TARDEC) and non DoD labs such as Department of Energy (DOL).With the support of the Joint Ground Robotics Enterprise (JGRE) through DoD and non DoD labs the Army Maneuver Support Center has recently concluded successful field trails of ground and air robots with specialized tactical behaviors and sensors to enable semi autonomous detection, reporting, and marking of explosive hazards to include Improvised Explosive Devices (IED) and landmines. A specific goal of this effort was to assess how collaborative behaviors for multiple unmanned air and ground vehicles can reduce risks to Soldiers and increase efficiency for on and off route explosive hazard detection, reporting, and marking.This paper discusses experimental results achieved with a robotic countermine system that utilizes autonomous behaviors and a mixed-initiative control scheme to address the challenges of detecting and marking buried landmines. Emerging requirements for robotic countermine operations are outlined as are the technologies developed under this effort to address them. A first experiment shows that the resulting system was able to find and mark landmines with a very low level of human involvement. In addition, the data indicates that the robotic system is able to decrease the time to find mines and increase the detection accuracy and reliability. Finally, the paper presents current efforts to incorporate new countermine sensors and port the resulting behaviors to two fielded military systems for rigorous assessing.
标题: From the laboratory to the soldier providing tactical behaviors for Army robots
标题翻译: 从实验室到士兵：为军用机器人提供战术行为
摘要翻译: 陆军未来作战系统（FCS）操作需求文件已确定了一系列先进的机器人战术行为需求，以支持未来旅战斗队（FBCT）。FBCT的先进战术行为包括哨兵行为、障碍物规避行为和人机控制行为的多级尺度。美国陆军训练与教义司令部（TRADOC）机动支持中心（MANSCEN）也记录了陆军非FCS部队的一些机器人行为需求，例如步兵旅战斗队（IBCT）、斯特赖克旅战斗队（SBCT）和重型旅战斗队（HBCT）。有用的机器人战术行为一般包括地面/空中机动行为、战术任务行为、人机协作行为和士兵-机器人接口行为。许多国防部（DoD）研发中心正在实现所需的组件，以支持地面和空中机器人的人工战术行为，包括陆军研究实验室（ARL）、美国陆军研发工程司令部（RDECOM）、太空和海军作战（SPAWAR）系统中心、美国陆军坦克汽车研究、开发和工程中心（TARDEC），以及像能源部（DOL）这样的非DoD实验室。在国防部和非DoD实验室的联合地面机器人企业（JGRE）的支持下，陆军机动支持中心最近成功完成了具有专门战术行为和传感器的地面和空中机器人现场试验，以实现对爆炸危险（包括简易爆炸装置（IED）和地雷）的半自动检测、报告和标记。此次工作的一个具体目标是评估多无人机和无人地面车辆的协作行为如何降低士兵风险并提高爆炸危险的沿途和离路线检测、报告和标记的效率。本文讨论了一种利用自主行为和混合主动控制方案的机器人反地雷系统所取得的实验结果，以应对检测和标记埋地雷的挑战。本文概述了反地雷操作的出现需求及为应对这些需求而开发的技术。第一次实验显示，产生的系统能够以极低的人为参与度找到并标记地雷。此外，数据表明，该机器人系统能够减少寻找地雷的时间，并提高检测的准确性和可靠性。最后，本文介绍了当前将新反地雷传感器整合并将结果行为移植到两个已部署军事系统中进行严格评估的努力。
摘要总结: Knichel和Bruemmer（2008）基于美国陆军未来战斗系统需求，运用实验方法研究了多种机器人战术行为及其在探测和标记地雷中的应用。研究发现，半自主机器人系统能有效降低人类介入，提高地雷检测的速度和准确性，推动了相关技术的发展。

期刊: IEEE REGION 10 COLLOQUIUM AND THIRD INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON INDUSTRIAL AND INFORMATION SYSTEMS, VOLS 1 AND 2
作者: Mohan, K. Krishna; Verma, A. K.; Srividya, A.; Rao, G. Varaprasada; Gedela, Ravi Kumar
