In this study, the actions leading to the creation of the Ushahidi software platform and its subsequent adaptations are identified using longitudinal case study methodology and content analysis methods applied to newspaper, magazine, website, journal and social networking publications. Based on a socio-technical theoretical framework, the Ushahidi system is framed as a dynamic, ad hoc virtual organization in the context of emergency response. The actions leading to the instantiation of the Ushahidi system are examined as examples of human cognitive stigmergic response to critical incidents and naturalistic development of complex adaptive systems. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
标题: Stigmergic self-organization and the improvisation of Ushahidi
标题翻译: stigmergic自组织与Ushahidi的即兴创作
摘要翻译: 在信息与通信技术（ICT）的支持下，关于虚拟组织、虚拟团队和虚拟协作的性质、有效性和表现已有不少研究（Cogburn, Santuzzi, & Espinoza, 2011）。最近，基于位置的社交网络技术的出现导致了新的临时虚拟组织模式。开发人员似乎通过将现有应用程序和技术拼凑在一起，几乎在一夜之间即兴开发系统，采用的是未协调的贡献，而不是传统的设计或项目计划。Heylighen理论认为，刺激自组织可以解释这种系统开发（Heylighen, 2007a, 2007b）。生物学家Grasse定义的刺激自组织是指一种间接刺激和响应行为的序列，这些行为通过环境促进昆虫之间的行动协调，例如白蚁协同构建巢穴（Theraulaz & Bonabeau, 1999）。Heylighen将人类的认知自组织与刺激自组织进行了类比。近年来，全球互联网计算和普遍存在的网络等分布式ICT的出现，使传统自上而下的系统开发技术在软件应用开发中变得越来越不相关。相反，模块化、可适应和自我管理的终端用户组件在混搭中结合在一起（Merrill, 2009）。同样，软件开发团队是自发的和临时的，作为虚拟组织运作。在本研究中，通过对报纸、杂志、网站、期刊和社交网络出版物应用纵向案例研究方法和内容分析方法，识别了导致Ushahidi软件平台创建及其后续适应的行动。基于社会技术理论框架，Ushahidi系统被框定为在紧急响应背景下的动态临时虚拟组织。对Ushahidi系统实例化的行动进行检验，以作为人类认知刺激自组织对关键事件的响应和复杂适应系统自然发展案例的例证。（C）2012 Elsevier B.V. 版权所有。
摘要总结: Marsden（2013）基于对Ushahidi软件平台的纵向案例研究和内容分析，以社会技术理论框架探讨应急响应中的动态自组织，发现人类认知的stigmergic反应促进了复杂自适应系统的自然发展。

作者: Rankin, Amy; Dahlback, Nils; Lundberg, Jonas
摘要: Common characteristics of crisis situations are ambiguous and unplanned for events. The need for improvised roles can therefore be an imperative factor for the success of an operation. The aim of this study is to deepen the understanding of the processes taking place during improvised work as it happens. A case study of a crisis management team at work is presented and provides an in-depth analysis of the information and communication flow of persons acting in improvised roles, including contextual factors influencing the task at hand. The analysis suggests that three main factors lay behind decreased performance by the team when some of its members were forced to take on roles for which they lacked professional training; lack of language skills, lack of domain knowledge and insufficient organizational structure of the tasks. Based on the observations from this case study, we suggest three ways of improving a team's performance and hence resilience when forced to improvise due to lack of personnel in one or more required competence areas. These are training to take on the responsibility for tasks or roles outside ones professional area of specialization, developing formal routines for changes in roles and tasks and developing and using tools and routines for information sharing.
标题: A case study of factor influencing role improvisation in crisis response teams
标题翻译: 危机响应团队角色即兴发挥影响因素的案例研究
摘要翻译: 危机情况的共同特征是事件模糊且未计划。即兴角色的需求因此可能成为成功实施的关键因素。本研究旨在加深对即兴工作过程中发生的过程的理解。通过对一个危机管理团队工作的案例研究，我们提供了对处于即兴角色的人们信息和沟通流程的深入分析，包括影响当前任务的背景因素。分析表明，当团队的部分成员被迫承担其缺乏专业训练的角色时，导致团队绩效下降的三个主要因素是：语言技能缺乏、领域知识不足和任务的组织结构不够完善。基于这一案例研究的观察，我们建议三种改善团队绩效，从而增强其在因缺乏一个或多个必要能力领域的人手时被迫即兴应对的韧性的方法。这三种方法是：针对超出专业领域的任务或角色接受培训、制定角色和任务变化的正式例程，以及开发和使用信息共享的工具和例程。
摘要总结: Rankin等（2013）通过对危机管理团队的案例研究，分析了在应急情况下即兴角色的沟通和信息流，发现缺乏语言技能、专业知识和组织结构会降低团队表现，并提出提升团队韧性的三种改进建议。

作者: Bunniss, Suzanne; Kelly, Diane R.
摘要: ContextHealth care organisations are increasingly conceptualised as complex, indivisible entities made up of web-like networks of staff that connect to each other in changeable ways. This study draws on the theoretical framework of activity theory and the concept of knotworking to illustrate how health professionals improvise collaboratively to negotiate everyday challenges and contribute positively to patients' health priorities.ObjectivesThe aim of this paper is to contribute to evolving ideas about collective learning, change and improvement in secondary care by exploring how health professionals work and learn together and how this compares with earlier findings from primary care.MethodsThis study applied a constructionist methodology within the research paradigm of interpretivism. Qualitative data were gathered through 26hours of observations and 17 field interviews within the natural environment of a working hospital over a 3-month period. The research site encompassed a medical receiving ward, a chronic ward, an out-patient clinic and the connecting corridors. Staff participants included a range of clinical, nursing, ancillary and clerical staff.ResultsThe study found a recurring pattern of spontaneous team forming and interprofessional shared learning to respond to care needs within the hospital as they arise. These are presented in four analytical themes: motion, flux and the unpredictability of team spirit'; adaptive, responsive learning through seeing, doing and asking questions; the collective learning gap between doctors and other staff; and frustration, compassion and the desire for improvement.ConclusionsHealth care professionals in the hospital setting both create and experience complex inclusion and exclusion behaviours that define who is empowered to act with professional authority in any given moment of care. This paper discusses issues of power, the particular exclusion of doctors from interprofessional knotworking, and the greater emphasis on questions as the pivotal aspect of shared collective learning when compared with primary care.
标题: Flux, questions, exclusion and compassion: collective learning in secondary care
标题翻译: 流动、问题、排斥与同情：二级护理中的集体学习
摘要翻译:
背景：医疗保健组织越来越被概念化为复杂的、不可分割的实体，由网络状的员工连接组成，以变化多端的方式相互联系。本研究借鉴活动理论的理论框架和“结工作”的概念，阐明医疗专业人员如何在协作中即兴应对日常挑战，并积极促进患者的健康优先事项。

目标：本文旨在通过探索医疗专业人员如何共同工作和学习以及这种情况与以往初级保健研究结果的比较，来为关于集体学习、变革和二级护理中的改进的不断发展的理念作出贡献。

方法：本研究在解释学研究范式内应用了建构主义的方法论。研究者在为期3个月的时间内，通过在医院的自然环境中进行26小时的观察和17次实地访谈收集定性数据。研究地点包括一个医疗接收病房、一个慢性病房、一个门诊诊所及其连接走廊。参与的工作人员包括各种临床、护理、辅助和文职人员。

结果：研究发现，在医院内，自发的团队形成和跨专业共享学习的模式反复出现，以应对所出现的护理需求。这些结果被呈现为四个分析主题：运动、变化和团队精神的不可预测性；通过观察、实践和提问进行的适应性响应学习；医生与其他工作人员之间的集体学习差距；以及挫折、同情和渴望改进。

结论：在医院环境中，医疗保健专业人员既创造又经历复杂的包容和排斥行为，这些行为定义了在任何护理时刻谁被赋予以专业权威进行行动的权力。本文讨论了权力问题，特别是医生在跨专业结工作中被排斥的情况，以及在与初级保健相比时，提问作为共享集体学习关键方面的更大重视。
摘要总结: Bunniss和Kelly（2013）在医院环境中，通过观察和访谈收集了定性数据，采用理解主义范式的建构主义方法，研究健康专业人员如何协作应对挑战，发现其在应对护理需求时形成自发团队并进行共享学习，揭示了权力动态及跨专业协作的重要性。

作者: Boettcher, Axel; Worch, Nina; Kaemper, Andreas; Trescher, Roland
摘要: In this paper we describe experiences using improvisational theater (improv) techniques in teaching acitivities. The educational setting where we aim to profit from these experiences are software engineering courses. The usefulness of improvisational theater in different contexts was discussed in the literature during the last few years. We conducted two sessions of improvisational theater with two objectives: (a) enhancing creativity and (b) enabling the process of team building. This paper describes our motivation, the goals, the educational setting and the different improv exercises performed. Results of our evaluation indicate that the majority of students enjoyed the improv sessions. Exercises focused on team building gained better results than those focusing on creativity. Our overall impression was that the success of using improv depends on careful planning and performance on the one hand and on the students' individual comfort zone on the other hand.
标题: Using Improvisational Theater in Team-Based Teaching Activities
标题翻译: 在团队教学活动中使用即兴戏剧
摘要翻译: 在本文中，我们描述了在教学活动中使用即兴剧（improv）技巧的经验。我们希望从这些经验中获益的教育环境是软件工程课程。近年来，文献中讨论了即兴剧在不同背景下的实用性。我们进行了两次即兴剧课程，目标有两个：（a）增强创造力，（b）促进团队建设。本文描述了我们的动机、目标、教育环境以及所进行的不同即兴练习。评估结果表明，大多数学生享受即兴剧课程。专注于团队建设的练习获得了比专注于创造力的练习更好的结果。我们的总体印象是，使用即兴剧的成功依赖于一方面的周密规划和表演，以及另一方面学生个人的舒适区。
摘要总结: Boettcher等（2013）在软件工程课程中运用即兴戏剧技术，进行了两次课程，以增强创造力和团队建设。评估结果表明，学生普遍喜欢即兴课程，团队建设的效果优于创造力。成功依赖于细致的计划和学生的舒适度。

作者: Dumoulin, Laurence; Licoppe, Christian
摘要: This article deals with judicial preliminary hearings involving remote participants connected through a video link. The defendant appears before the court (the examining chamber) from the prison where he or she is in detention. Studying this case, the paper explores the way videoconferencing challenges justice in many ways: as an organization, as a range of institutions and as a legal construction. The authors analyze how judges, the public prosecutor and lawyers try to manage this situation by imagining new ways of organizing and practicing remote hearings. They produce local rules and settings along the way. As a consequence, it can be said that video conferencing in court hearings is now becoming a routine. However, this routine is fragile because of the vulnerability and risks of technology. An unexpected breakdown occurring during a court prehearing enables us to point out what judicial actors can collectively do to manage and fix out the activity they were accomplishing.At the crossroads between sociology of law and sociology of work, this article is mostly based on a video recorded corpus of French court hearings.
标题: Innovation, routinisation and improvisation in the context of a judicial enquiry done by videoconference. How a screen and a camera on castors work in the judicial process in France
标题翻译: 创新、例行化与即兴创作：法国司法调查中视频会议的背景下，移动屏幕和摄像头如何运作司法程序。
摘要翻译: 本文探讨了涉及通过视频链接连接的远程参与者的司法初步听证会。被告在其被拘留的监狱中出庭（审查庭）。通过研究这一案例，本文探讨了视频会议在多方面对司法的挑战：作为一个组织、作为一系列机构以及作为一种法律构建。作者分析了法官、检察官和律师如何试图通过构想新的组织和实施远程听证的方式来管理这种情况。随着这一过程，他们制定了地方规则和设置。因此，可以说，法庭听证会中的视频会议正在成为一种常规。然而，这种常规是脆弱的，因为技术的脆弱性和风险。在法庭预审期间发生的意外故障使我们能够指出司法参与者可以集体采取什么措施来管理和修复他们所进行的活动。本文位于法社会学与工作社会学的交叉点，主要基于法国法庭听证会的视频录制语料。
摘要总结: Dumoulin和Licoppe（2013）基于视频记录的法国庭审数据，研究了远程参与的预审如何挑战司法组织与实践，发现法官和律师为应对视频会议的脆弱性，创造了新的相应规则和方式，表明视频会议在庭审中日益成为常态，但仍面临技术风险。

作者: Lundberg, Jonas; Rankin, Amy
摘要: Following the Asian Tsunami of 2004 and during the Israel-Lebanon Crisis of 2006, Sweden sent small crisis response teams to support civilians. The small size of the teams, combined with situations that did not always play out according to expectations and plans, presented a challenge to their resilience-their ability to adapt to circumstances outside of plans made in advance. In this paper, we analyze the experiences of 14 members of Swedish field teams involved in the crises response, based on focus group discussions. We describe a cycle of preparing for role improvisation, of taking improvised roles, of working in them, and of getting out of them when they are no longer a benefit. The discussions revealed that although role improvisation was seen as necessary to get the work done, they also saw a need to manage negative side effects and vulnerabilities of role improvisation in various ways. We discuss training goals based on their experiences, to address perceived strengths and vulnerabilities of role improvisation. We also discuss factors affecting role improvisation, such as a resilience climate of shared attitudes. Our results can be useful for organizations that have or that plan to adopt flexible crisis response teams. Our results can also be of interests to a more general audience with an interest in how practices necessary for resilience can bring negative side effects, for instance, resilience loss in the organization after an initial adaptive stage.
标题: Resilience and vulnerability of small flexible crisis response teams: implications for training and preparation
标题翻译: 小型灵活危机应对团队的韧性与脆弱性：对培训和准备的启示
摘要翻译: 在2004年亚洲海啸和2006年以色列-黎巴嫩危机期间，瑞典派遣了小型危机响应团队支持平民。团队的规模小，加上情况并不总是按照预期和计划发展，这对他们的适应能力构成了挑战——即在预先计划之外适应环境的能力。本文基于焦点小组讨论，分析了参与危机响应的14名瑞典现场团队成员的经历。我们描述了一种准备角色即兴发挥的循环，包括扮演即兴角色、在这些角色中工作以及在角色不再有益时退出。讨论揭示，尽管角色即兴发挥被视为完成工作的必要手段，但他们也意识到需要以各种方式管理即兴角色的负面副作用和脆弱性。我们讨论了基于他们经验的培训目标，以应对角色即兴发挥的感知优势和脆弱性。我们还讨论了影响角色即兴发挥的因素，例如共享态度的韧性气候。我们的研究结果对已经或计划采用灵活危机响应团队的组织具有实用价值，也可能引起更广泛受众的兴趣，尤其是那些关注韧性所需实践可能带来的负面副作用的人，例如在初步适应阶段之后组织的韧性损失。
摘要总结: Lundberg和Rankin（2014）通过对14名瑞典救援队成员的焦点小组讨论，分析了他们在2004年亚洲海啸和2006年以色列-黎巴嫩危机中的角色即兴表演。研究发现，尽管即兴表演对工作至关重要，但也需管理其负面影响，并提出了相应的培训目标以增强应对能力。

作者: Arrotéia, Aline Valverde; Amaral, Tatiana Gondim do; Melhado, Silvio Burranttino
摘要: During the past twenty years, the construction industry in Brazil has evolved significantly in response to the market's growing competitiveness. However, in this evolution, there have been several cultural and organizational barriers, and difficulties in the effort to improve quality in construction sites. Besides, the lack of integration between design andconstruction processesresults in waste, pathologies, rework and improvised changes originated fromclashes indesign, either due to lack of design detailing or to decisions being taken by unskilled staff at inappropriate moments. The aim of this study is to discuss the implementation of the Building Pre-Construction Management (PCM) method, in order to improve the management of the design process in its interface with the construction site. The research method adoptedin this study can be classified as qualitative and it was conducted through action-research. The results indicated that the effectiveness and feasibility of using PCM to improve the management of the design-construction interface, in real estate and building companies.
标题: Gestão de projetos e sua interface com o canteiro de obras sob a ótica da Preparação da Execução de Obras (PEO)
标题翻译: 项目管理及其与施工现场的接口：以工程执行准备（PEO）为视角
摘要翻译: 在过去的二十年中，巴西建筑行业在市场竞争日益激烈的背景下发生了显著变化。然而，在这一演变过程中，存在着多个文化和组织障碍，以及在提高施工现场质量方面的困难。此外，设计与施工过程之间缺乏整合导致了浪费、病理现象、返工和因设计冲突而产生的临时性变更，这些问题要么源于设计细节的缺失，要么是由于在不恰当的时刻由不熟练的人员做出的决策。本研究旨在讨论建筑预施工管理（PCM）方法的实施，以改善设计过程与施工现场的接口管理。本研究采用的研究方法可归类为定性研究，通过行动研究进行。结果表明，使用PCM改善设计与施工接口管理在房地产和建筑公司中的有效性和可行性。
摘要总结: Arrotéia等（2014）通过行动研究法，探讨了在巴西建筑行业实施建筑前期管理（PCM）方法，以改善设计与施工接口的管理。研究表明，PCM的有效性和可行性有助于提升施工现场的管理质量。

期刊: I INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ARCHITECTURAL DESIGN & CRITICISM (CRITIC-ALL)
作者: Fernandez Villalobos, Nieves
摘要: During the British post-war, the architects Alison and Peter Smithson were part of the Independent Group: a team of disparate personalities who met informally at the Institute of Contemporary Arts in London, with the aim of creating a fully integrated aesthetic in contemporary life, which were recognized as Parents of the British Pop. Within this group, the architects held some exhibitions with the sculptor Eduardo Paolozzi and the photographer Nigel Henderson. The latter had a great influence on Smithson and his way of looking at reality, associated with the post-war context and the need to rescue the beauty of the everyday, something that the couple subsequently recognized by the expression As Found, showing the Dadaist origin of the concept.Henderson's photographs of the bombed remains at the East End, and active street life, caused the Smithsons strongly positioned themselves against functionalism and intervened in the construction of a new architectural and urban culture, within the International Congresses of Modern Architecture (CIAM), which were participating actively in parallel. In 1953, at CIAM IX, held in Aix -en- Provence, the Smithsons presented several photographs made by Nigel Henderson of street life in Bethnal Green, and defended the need to create modern equivalents of certain fundamental features in the creation of life Community, which images showed. They argued that the real urban solution lay in the association, so that under the title Urban Reidentification were raised functional interconnections between four scales of Inhabitation (housing, street, district and city), compared to the four zones of single-use (housing, transport, industry and recreation). For a rearrangement of the principles of rational planning, proposed in 1956, at the CIAM X in Dubrovnik, five urban concepts: association, identity, pattern of growth, mobility and cluster.The opposition of the young architects to the functions advocated by the Athens Charter meant the end of CIAM and the birth of Team X. Nigel Henderson's photographs, through Alison and Peter Smithson, had a leading role in that process of change, although anonymous. His work clearly expresses the values that the new team of architects began to defend at that moment-improvisation, flexibility territorial, urban choreography, neighbourhood and adaptive design-, and that today continue motivating reflections and debates.
标题: Nigel Henderson's influence in the critical position of Alison and Peter Smithson
标题翻译: 奈杰尔·亨德森在阿利森和彼得·史密森的关键位置上的影响
摘要翻译: 在英国战后，建筑师阿利森和彼得·史密森是独立小组的一部分：这个由不同个性组成的团队在伦敦当代艺术学院非正式聚会，旨在创造一种与当代生活充分融合的美学，被认为是英国流行艺术的父母。在这个小组中，建筑师们与雕塑家爱德华多·保罗齐和摄影师奈杰尔·亨德森共同举办了一些展览。后者对史密森及其看待现实的方式产生了重大影响，这种视角与战后背景和拯救日常之美的需求息息相关，这也是这对夫妇随后通过“如所发现”（As Found）的表述所承认的，展现了这一概念的达达主义起源。亨德森拍摄的东区被轰炸后的残骸和活跃的街道生活，使史密森夫妇坚决反对功能主义，并参与构建新的建筑与城市文化，在现代建筑国际大会（CIAM）中积极参与。1953年，在艾克斯－昂－普罗旺斯举行的CIAM IX会议上，史密森夫妇展示了奈杰尔·亨德森拍摄的贝斯纳尔格林街头生活的多张照片，并主张需要创造现代等同于某些社区生活创造的基本特征的事物，正是这些图像所展示的。他们认为，真正的城市解决方案在于关联，因此以“城市再认同”（Urban Reidentification）为题，提出了四个居住尺度（住宅、街道、地区和城市）之间的功能性联系，这与四个单一用途区域（住宅、交通、工业和休闲）进行了比较。为了重新调整1956年在杜布罗夫尼克举行的CIAM X上提出的理性规划原则，提出了五个城市理念：关联、身份、增长模式、流动性和集群。年轻建筑师们对雅典宪章所倡导的功能的反对标志着CIAM的结束和X团队的诞生。奈杰尔·亨德森的照片，通过阿利森和彼得·史密森，在这一变革过程中扮演了重要角色，尽管这一过程是匿名的。他的作品清晰地表达了新一组建筑师在那个时刻开始倡导的价值观——即兴创作、灵活的地域、城市编排、邻里和适应性设计——并且这些观点至今仍在激励反思和讨论。
摘要总结: Fernandez Villalobos（2014）研究了英国战后独立小组的建筑师阿利森和彼得·史密森，利用与尼格尔·亨德森的合作展示了日常生活的美。研究表明，史密森夫妇对功能主义的反对，推动了以社区为核心的新建筑文化的形成，并促成了团队X的诞生。

作者: Senyard, Julienne; Baker, Ted; Steffens, Paul; Davidsson, Per
摘要: Evidence suggests that both nascent and young firms (henceforth: new firms)despite typically being small and resource-constrainedare sometimes able to innovate effectively. Such firms are seldom able to invest in lengthy and expensive development processes, which suggests that they may frequently rely instead on other pathways to generate innovativeness within the firm. In this paper, we develop and test arguments that bricolage, defined as making do by applying combinations of the resources at hand to new problems and opportunities, provides an important pathway to achieve innovation for new resource-constrained firms. Through bricolage, resource-constrained firms engage in the processes of recombination that are core to creating innovative outcomes. Based on a large longitudinal dataset, our results suggest that variations in the degree to which firms engage in bricolage behaviors can provide a broadly applicable explanation of innovativeness under resource constraints by new firms. We find no general support for our competing hypothesis that the positive effects may level off or even turn negative at high levels of bricolage.
标题: Bricolage as a Path to Innovativeness for Resource-Constrained New Firms
标题翻译: 资源有限新企业创新性的路径：拼凑法
摘要翻译: 证据表明，尽管初创公司和年轻公司（以下简称：新公司）通常规模较小且资源有限，但有时能够有效地进行创新。这类公司很少能投资于漫长而昂贵的发展过程，这意味着它们可能更频繁地依赖其他途径来在公司内部产生创新性。在本文中，我们提出并测试了这样一种论点：拼凑（bricolage），即通过将现有资源以新方式组合应用于新问题和机会，提供了一条重要的途径，使新兴的资源有限公司能够实现创新。通过拼凑，资源有限的公司参与了核心的重组过程，从而创造创新成果。基于一个大型的纵向数据集，我们的结果表明，公司参与拼凑行为的程度差异可以为新公司在资源约束下的创新性提供广泛适用的解释。我们未能找到支持竞争假设的普遍证据，即在高水平拼凑下，正面影响可能会趋于平稳甚至转为负面。
摘要总结: Senyard等(2014)基于大型纵向数据集，探讨了资源受限的新兴企业如何通过“拼凑”方法实现创新，发现拼凑行为的程度影响了企业的创新能力，且未发现拼凑过度会导致负面效应，为新企业的创新路径提供了理论支持。

作者: van Mierlo, Barbara; Totin, Edmond
摘要: In Benin, a combination of governmental programmes effectively stimulated rice intensification by providing relevant institutional arrangements such as subsidized seed, credit and a market outlet. In this paper, the authors investigate the institutional character of these programmes by unpacking the rules embedded in them and by showing how farmers mould, reject and change these rules or combine them with local rules - their practices of institutional bricolage. The authors show that the services provided by the programmes had great advantages for rice farmers, but they also had an exclusive character. Because of local bricolage practices, the programmes both affected rice production and helped the rice farmers to deal with conflicts over inequitable land allocation and discriminatory participation in canal cleaning. These findings contribute to discussion of the role of innovation platforms in the stimulation of institutional change and the provision of enabling conditions.
标题: Between script and improvisation: institutional conditions and their local operation
标题翻译: 在剧本与即兴之间：制度条件及其地方运作
摘要翻译: 在贝宁，一系列政府项目通过提供相关的制度安排（如补贴种子、信贷和市场出口）有效地促进了稻米的集约化生产。本文作者探讨了这些项目的制度特征，通过分析其中嵌入的规则，并展示农民如何塑造、拒绝和改变这些规则，或将其与地方规则结合——他们的制度拼贴实践。作者指出，项目提供的服务为稻米农民带来了巨大的优势，但它们也具有排他性。由于地方拼贴实践，这些项目不仅影响了稻米生产，还帮助稻米农民应对土地分配不公和在清理运河中的歧视性参与等冲突。这些发现有助于讨论创新平台在促进制度变革和提供有利条件方面的作用。
摘要总结: van Mierlo和Totin（2014）通过对贝宁政府项目的分析，研究了政策规则及农民如何进行制度拼接，发现这些项目在促进水稻增产和应对土地分配冲突方面取得了卓越成效，同时也表现出排他性，对于制度变革和创新平台的作用提供了重要见解。

期刊: 4TH INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON BUILDING RESILIENCE, INCORPORATING THE 3RD ANNUAL CONFERENCE OF THE ANDROID DISASTER RESILIENCE NETWORK
作者: Barbosa, Lara Leite
摘要: One of the top priorities of the Hyogo Framework for Action 2005-2015 is to use knowledge, innovation and education to build a culture of safety and resilience at all levels. This paper focuses on how we could motivate the affected population to develop new capacities for emergency preparedness, response and recovery. It is based on ongoing research on temporary shelters in the cities affected by floods in Ribeira Valley, Brazil; the research is conducted under an agreement between Architecture for Humanity and the Faculty of Architecture and Urbanism of the University of Sao Paulo, FAUUSP. It proposes a participatory experience including residents of former quilombos - Brazilian maroon communities - and the population affected by the disasters, as well as researchers, local authorities and non-governmental organizations. It presents the results of the third NOAH workshop: Participatory Activities for the Experimentation with Vegetable Fibres, in which the group developed constructive components made from vegetable fibres. This paper aims to produce partitions for improvised shelters using local techniques, combined with waterproofing additives. The benefits go beyond the disaster relief phase since empowering those affected by the floods to engage in a new trade improves their financial condition, aiding in their post-disaster recovery. This initiative promotes participant awareness and engagement, encouraging a culture of resilience to disasters. (C) 2014 The Authors. Published by Elsevier B. V.
标题: Capacity Building through Design Innovation with Vegetable Fibres for Temporary Shelters
标题翻译: 通过植物纤维的设计创新进行能力建设以应对临时庇护所
摘要翻译: 兵库行动框架2005-2015的首要任务之一是利用知识、创新和教育在各个层面上建立安全和韧性的文化。本文重点讨论如何激励受影响人群发展应急准备、响应和恢复的新能力。研究基于在巴西里贝拉谷受洪水影响城市的临时避难所的 ongoing 研究，该研究在“为人类建筑”组织与圣保罗大学建筑与城市规划学院（FAUUSP）之间的协议下进行。本文提出一种包含曾经的基隆博居民（巴西逃奴社区）、受灾人群、研究人员、地方当局和非政府组织的参与性经验。报告了第三届NOAH研讨会的结果：以植物纤维为实验的参与活动，参与小组开发了以植物纤维制成的构筑组件。本文旨在利用当地技术和防水添加剂为临时避难所生产隔断。其益处超越了灾后救助阶段，因为使受洪水影响的人群参与新行业提高了他们的经济状况，有助于他们的灾后恢复。此举促进了参与者的意识和参与，鼓励了抵御灾难的文化。
摘要总结: Barbosa（2014）基于巴西里贝拉谷受灾城市的临时避难所研究，通过参与性实践激励社区居民发展应急能力，提出使用当地技艺和植物纤维制作临时隔断，促进灾后恢复和经济提升，增强灾害韧性。

作者: Lobman, Carrie
摘要: The intense focus on standardized tests has created a culture of anxiety in many inner-city schools. This article presents the findings of a case study of a test anxiety program that helped inner-city students and staffs deal more productively with anxiety through play, performance, and team building. According to the findings, the program created an environment where children and teachers talked about, addressed, and even played with their fears around testing. The program did this by destigmatizing anxiety, using improvisation to transform children's relationship to fear, and by creating new tools for dealing with anxiety and test-taking.
标题: I Feel Nervous ... Very Nervous Addressing Test Anxiety in Inner City Schools Through Play and Performance
标题翻译: 我感到紧张……非常紧张：通过游戏和表演解决城市内学校的考试焦虑
摘要翻译: 对标准化考试的高度关注在许多城市内学校中造成了一种焦虑文化。本文呈现了一项案例研究的结果，该研究评估了一个旨在帮助城市学生和教职员工更有效地通过游戏、表演和团队建设来应对焦虑的考试焦虑项目。根据研究结果，该项目创造了一个环境，使孩子和教师能够谈论、解决甚至与他们对考试的恐惧进行游戏。该项目通过去污名化焦虑、运用即兴表演改变儿童对恐惧的关系，以及创造应对焦虑和考试的新工具来实现这些目标。
摘要总结: Lobman（2014）通过对某测试焦虑项目的案例研究，发现该项目在内城区学校通过游戏、表演和团队建设帮助学生和教职工有效应对测试焦虑，创造了一个开放的环境，使大家能够正视并转化对测试的恐惧。

期刊: JOURNAL OF CONTINGENCIES AND CRISIS MANAGEMENT
作者: Mendonca, David; Webb, Gary; Butts, Carter; Brooks, James
摘要: While emergency response actions are known to range from conventional to improvised, less is known about the thinking processes that underlie these actions. This paper presents a statistical analysis of cognition and behaviour reported by police personnel who responded to two significant US disasters: the 1995 bombing of the Murrah Building in Oklahoma City and the 2001 attack on the World Trade Center in New York City. The results suggest the prominence of conventional behaviour coupled with cognitive processes closely tied to recognition, and of improvised behaviours that are linked to more explicit reasoning processes. The results underscore the value of exploring cognitive foundations of both conventional and improvised behaviours to enrich understanding of human response to disaster.
标题: Cognitive Correlates of Improvised Behaviour in Disaster Response: the Cases of the Murrah Building and the World Trade Center
标题翻译: 灾难响应中即兴行为的认知相关性：穆拉大楼和世界贸易中心的案例
摘要翻译: 紧急响应行动被认为从常规到即兴不一而足，但关于支撑这些行动的思维过程知之甚少。本文对参与应对两起重大美国灾难的警务人员报告的认知和行为进行了统计分析：1995年俄克拉荷马城穆拉大厦的爆炸事件和2001年纽约市世界贸易中心的袭击。结果表明，常规行为的显著性与紧密关联的认知过程，主要集中在识别方面，而即兴行为则与更明确的推理过程相关。这些结果强调了探索常规和即兴行为的认知基础的重要性，以丰富对人类灾难响应的理解。
摘要总结: Mendonca等（2014）通过对1995年俄克拉荷马城爆炸案和2001年纽约世贸中心袭击的警察人员认知与行为进行统计分析，发现传统行为与识别相关的认知过程占主导，而即兴行为则与更明确的推理过程相关，强调探索这两者的认知基础对理解灾难响应的重要性。

作者: Jennings, Jennifer E.; Edwards, Tim; Jennings, P. Devereaux; Delbridge, Rick
摘要: This qualitative study of innovators in the superyacht industry blends longitudinal content analysis with narrative case vignettes to extend nascent theorizing about the antecedents and consequences associated with the arousal of entrepreneurial emotion. The empirically grounded framework induced through our research offers two key theoretical elaborations. First, it extends the existing set of theorized antecedents by highlighting the overlooked roles played by dramatic performances (staged or improvised) and ambient conditions (project, actor and venue considerations). Second, it calls attention to the consequences of emotional arousal for such entrepreneurial outcomes as generating novel solutions to specific problems encountered during the creation process, developing innovative end products, and fostering a general context for innovation. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
标题: Emotional arousal and entrepreneurial outcomes: Combining qualitative methods to elaborate theory
标题翻译: 情感唤起与创业成果：结合定性方法以丰富理论
摘要翻译: 本定性研究探讨了超级游艇行业中的创新者，结合了长期内容分析和叙述案例小品，以扩展对与创业情感的激发相关的前因和后果的初步理论。通过我们的研究所诱导的实证框架提供了两个关键的理论阐述。首先，它通过强调戏剧表演（排练或即兴）和环境条件（项目、参与者和场地的考量）所扮演的被忽视的角色，扩展了现有的理论前因集合。其次，它引起了对情感激发后果的关注，这些后果包括为在创作过程中遇到的特定问题生成新颖解决方案、开发创新的最终产品以及促进创新的一般环境。
摘要总结: Jennings等（2015）通过对超级游艇行业创新者的定性研究，结合纵向内容分析和叙事案例小品，提出了关于创业情感激发的前因和后果的理论框架，强调了戏剧表演和环境条件的重要性，展示了情感激发对创新成果的影响。

期刊: 7TH INDUSTRIAL PRODUCT-SERVICE SYSTEMS CONFERENCE - IPSS, INDUSTRY TRANSFORMATION FOR SUSTAINABILITY AND BUSINESS
作者: Suesse, Thomas
摘要: The concept of improvisation is discussed in management literature as a promising mechanism and design principle for an organization's capacity for learning, adaptability and innovation. However, a specific form of improvisation for coping with the duality of production and service has not yet been applied to the servitization of manufacturing or PSS. This paper introduces a specific form of semi-structured improvisational learning related to PSS-oriented organizations. It introduces an organizational design principle of desired and accepted improvisational actions for highly individualized customer solutions. This semi-structured form of improvisational learning separates PSS from manufacturing-oriented organizations, where improvisation is rather a phenomenon of resistive actions that trigger undesired deviations. By emphasizing the increasing importance of improvisation and improvisational learning as a desirable and acceptable principle of action, it is argued that this rather paradigmatic shift demands specific capabilities from individual actors in PSS. These individual capabilities are summarized in this paper as learning-oriented capabilities that unfold a dynamic balance of generative and adaptive learning activities in PSS. As this specific pattern of individual capabilities is less cultivated in pure manufacturing, a game-based training and learning approach is introduced which is designed to accompany individual actors during the servitization process. The game-based learning scenario focuses on the development of individual improvisational capabilities as a mediating force in the dynamic triangle of customer, production and service. In conclusion, the literature review of this paper contributes to the scientific community by framing the servitization of manufacturing with the concept of improvisation as a coping strategy for the dynamics and ambiguity in PSS. Furthermore, a training and development approach is specified that aims at equipping individual actors with capabilities of improvisation and improvisational learning as prerequisites for the operation of highly individualized PSS. This training approach is also intended to be applicable for practitioners. (C) 2015 The Authors. Published by Elsevier B.V.
标题: Improvisation as a prerequisite for the dynamic interplay of Production and Service in PSS: Insights of an organizational design principle and a game-based learning approach
标题翻译: 即兴创作为生产与服务在产品服务系统中动态互动的前提：组织设计原则和基于游戏的学习方法的洞察
摘要翻译: 即兴创作的概念在管理文献中被讨论为组织学习、适应性和创新能力的一种有前途的机制和设计原则。然而，应对生产与服务双重性的一种特定形式的即兴创作尚未应用于制造业的服务化或产品服务系统（PSS）。本文介绍了一种与PSS导向组织相关的半结构化即兴学习的特定形式。它提出了一种针对高度个性化客户解决方案的期望和可接受的即兴行为的组织设计原则。这种半结构化的即兴学习将PSS与制造导向组织区分开来，因为在后者中，即兴创作更多是一种反抗性行为的现象，会引发不希望的偏差。通过强调即兴创作和即兴学习作为期望的、可接受的行动原则越来越重要，认为这种颇具范式转变的过程要求PSS中的个体行动者具备特定能力。本文将这些个体能力总结为学习导向的能力，以展现PSS中生成性与适应性学习活动之间的动态平衡。由于这种特定的个体能力模式在纯制造业中较少被培养，本文提出了一种基于游戏的培训与学习方法，旨在伴随个体行动者在服务化过程中的发展。该基于游戏的学习场景重点发展个体即兴能力，作为客户、生产和服务之间动态三角关系中的一种中介力量。最后，本文的文献综述通过将制造业的服务化与即兴创作的概念作为应对PSS中动态性和模糊性的策略联系起来，为科学界做出了贡献。此外，提出了一种培训与发展方法，旨在使个体行动者具备即兴创作和即兴学习的能力，以便能够运营高度个性化的PSS。这种培训方法也旨在适用于实践者。
摘要总结: Suesse（2015）探讨了即兴学习在以产品服务系统（PSS）为导向的组织中的应用，提出了一种半结构化的即兴学习形式，以支持个性化客户解决方案，强调即兴能力在动态平衡中的重要性，并提出了一种基于游戏的培训方法，旨在提升个体的即兴能力以应对制造业的服务化转型。

作者: Yeo, Roland K.; Gold, Jeff
摘要: Purpose - The purpose of this paper is to explore how organizational actors interpret and enact technology in cross-boundary work contexts during e-government implementation in a public organization in East Malaysia.Design/methodology/approach - Case study methodology involving semi-structured interviews, unobtrusive observations, and archival records was utilized in the study. Interview subjects include management staff, general employees, and information technology (IT) specialists to provide rich descriptions of their work practice.Findings - Three distinct contexts contribute to cross-boundary work practice in relation to IT use and non-use, namely, standardization (complete IT use), hybridization (partial IT use), and conventionalization (zero IT use). Technology enactment strategies such as acceptance, avoidance, adaptation, and configuration are employed depending on actors' interpretation of technology complexity and task interdependency.Practical implications - Early interventions could involve examining how and why employees accept or avoid technology as part of their work practice and how they switch between enactment strategies. Organizations could ensure better team support to capitalize on the robust social interaction in cross-boundary work contexts to develop greater synergy in technology improvisations.Originality/value - The study extends the technology enactment perspective as it offers new meanings to structures of action by understanding the temporal agentic orientations and how these are constructed by cross-boundary work contexts. It also offers insight into how enactment strategies are developed according to the productive tensions that arise from the interplay of cognitive orientations.
标题: More than meets the eye: working around technology in cross-boundary work contexts
标题翻译: 不仅仅是表面现象：跨界工作环境中与技术的互动
摘要翻译:
目的 - 本文旨在探讨在东马某公共组织实施电子政务过程中，组织参与者如何解读和实施技术，特别是在跨界工作环境中的表现。

设计/方法论/方法 - 本研究采用案例研究方法，使用半结构化访谈、隐蔽观察和档案记录。访谈对象包括管理人员、普通员工和信息技术（IT）专家，以提供对其工作实践的丰富描述。

发现 - 在IT使用和不使用的跨界工作实践中，有三个不同的背景，即标准化（完全IT使用）、混合化（部分IT使用）和常规化（零IT使用）。根据参与者对技术复杂性和任务互赖性的解读，采用接受、回避、适应和配置等技术实施策略。

实践意义 - 早期干预可以涉及审视员工如何以及为何在其工作实践中接受或回避技术，以及他们如何在实施策略之间切换。组织可以确保更好的团队支持，以利用跨界工作环境中强大的社交互动，从而提升技术即兴创作的协同效应。

原创性/价值 - 该研究扩展了技术实施视角，通过理解时间性的能动取向及其如何在跨界工作环境中构建，提供了对行动结构的新理解。同时，它还提供了关于实施策略如何根据认知取向间的互动产生的生产性紧张而发展的一些见解。
摘要总结: Yeo和Gold（2015）通过案例研究方法，结合半结构式访谈和观察，探讨东马公共组织在电子政务实施中，组织角色如何解读和实施技术。研究发现技术使用的三种情境及相应的执行策略，为提高跨界工作中的技术协作提供实用建议。

作者: Siewert, Bettina; Hochman, Mary G.
摘要: Human factors engineering (HFE) focuses on the design and analysis of interactive systems that involve people, technical equipment, and work environment. HFE is informed by knowledge of human characteristics. It complements existing patient safety efforts by specifically taking into consideration that, as humans, frontline staff will inevitably make mistakes. Therefore, the systems with which they interact should be designed for the anticipation and mitigation of human errors. The goal of HFE is to optimize the interaction of humans with their work environment and technical equipment to maximize safety and efficiency. Special safeguards include usability testing, standardization of processes, and use of checklists and forcing functions. However, the effectiveness of the safety program and resiliency of the organization depend on timely reporting of all safety events independent of patient harm, including perceived potential risks, bad outcomes that occur even when proper protocols have been followed, and episodes of improvisation when formal guidelines are found not to exist. Therefore, an institution must adopt a robust culture of safety, where the focus is shifted from blaming individuals for errors to preventing future errors, and where barriers to speaking up-including barriers introduced by steep authority gradients-are minimized. This requires creation of formal guidelines to address safety concerns, establishment of unified teams with open communication and shared responsibility for patient safety, and education of managers and senior physicians to perceive the reporting of safety concerns as a benefit rather than a threat. (C) RSNA, 2015.
标题: Improving Safety through Human Factors Engineering
标题翻译: 通过人因工程提高安全性
摘要翻译: 人因工程（HFE）关注涉及人员、技术设备和工作环境的互动系统的设计与分析。HFE 以人类特征的知识为基础，专门考虑到一线工作人员作为人类不可避免地会犯错误，因此，它补充了现有的病人安全努力。因此，与他们互动的系统应设计为能够预见和减轻人为错误。HFE 的目标是优化人类与其工作环境及技术设备的互动，以最大限度地提高安全性和效率。特殊的安全措施包括可用性测试、流程标准化，以及使用检查表和强制功能。然而，安全计划的有效性和组织的韧性取决于对所有安全事件的及时报告，无论是否导致患者伤害，包括感知的潜在风险、即使在遵循适当协议时发生的不良结果，以及在缺乏正式指导方针时的即兴处理情况。因此，机构必须建立一种强有力的安全文化，将重点从指责个人错误转移到防止未来错误，并尽量减少发声的障碍，包括由陡峭的权威梯度引入的障碍。这需要制定正式的指导方针以解决安全问题，建立统一的团队以促进开放沟通和共同担负患者安全责任，以及教育管理者和高级医师将报告安全问题视为一种利益而非威胁。
摘要总结: Siewert和Hochman（2015）通过分析人机交互系统的设计，提出人因工程（HFE）优化工作环境与设备互动，以增加安全性和效率，强调建立安全文化、及时报告事件及减少个体指责，以防止错误并改进患者安全。

作者: Siltaloppi, Jaakko; Toivonen, Marja
摘要: The purpose of this article is to elaborate two activities included in innovation: planning and execution. We use four dimensions - decision making, organization, process, and external interaction - as the analytical framework. Building on five empirical case studies in the Finnish residential sector, the article identifies various approaches to integrating planning and execution during the development process. Furthermore, the article identifies four integrative mechanisms that relate to each of the four analytical dimensions. The key proposition is that the integration between planning and execution is the driving force for innovation, and that the locus of this integration is the practical engagement of actors with specific aims, problems, and means at hand related to the emerging solution. Finally, the article identifies the availability of, or access to, service-provision resources and the customer interface as a key enabler of this integration.
标题: Integration of planning and execution in service innovation
标题翻译: 服务创新中的规划与执行整合
摘要翻译: 本文的目的是阐述创新中的两个活动：规划和执行。我们采用决策、组织、过程和外部互动四个维度作为分析框架。基于芬兰住宅部门的五个实证案例研究，本文识别出在开发过程中整合规划和执行的各种方法。此外，文章还确定了与四个分析维度相关的四种整合机制。关键命题是，规划与执行之间的整合是创新的驱动力，而这种整合的焦点在于参与者在与新兴解决方案相关的特定目标、问题和手段上的实际参与。最后，文章指出，服务提供资源的可用性或可及性以及客户接口是这种整合的关键推动力。
摘要总结: Siltaloppi和Toivonen(2015)基于芬兰住宅部门的五个案例研究，分析了创新中的规划与执行整合，提出决策、组织、过程和外部互动等四个维度，发现这种整合是推动创新的关键，并强调服务资源和客户接口的重要性。

期刊: JASSS-THE JOURNAL OF ARTIFICIAL SOCIETIES AND SOCIAL SIMULATION
作者: Gao, Dehua; Deng, Xiuquan; Zhao, Qiuhong; Zhou, Hong; Bai, Bing
摘要: Organizational routines are collective phenomena involving multiple individual actors. They are crucial in helping to understand how organizations behave and change in a certain period. In this paper, by regarding the individual habits of multiple actors involved as fundamental building blocks, we consider organizational routines from an 'emergence-based' perspective. We emphasise the impacts of connections or network topologies among individual actors in the formation of organizational routines, and carry out a multi-agent based simulation analysis of organizational routines on complex networks. We consider some important factors such as inertia resulted from individual memories, component complexity of organizational tasks, turnover of individual actors, the impacts of both heterogeneity and improvisation of individual actors involved, and the dynamical properties of the network topologies within which individual actors are located. The results of our research show that network topologies among individual actors do determine the dynamic characteristics of organizational routines. Although the fact is that the mechanisms beneath this are also influenced by some main factors like the memory capacity of individual actors and the component complexity of organizational tasks that these individual actors should deal with repetitively, and that the total costs for the organization to bear during their implementation of organizational tasks are variant, the routine system on scale-free networks can always have a better performance, and obtain a much higher coherency and routinization level of collective behaviours, even in the case of turnover of individual actors. In addition, when individual actors involved are heterogeneous, the routine system on scale-free networks would also exhibit a strong anti-disturbance ability, no matter whether there are minor improvisations from these individual actors or not. Nevertheless, a large number of improvisations enable individual actors to act in some more individualistic manners, and destroy the routine system as a result.
标题: Multi-Agent Based Simulation of Organizational Routines on Complex Networks
标题翻译: 基于多智能体的组织常规在复杂网络上的模拟
摘要翻译: 组织惯例是涉及多个个体参与者的集体现象。它们在帮助理解组织在特定时期的行为和变化方面至关重要。在本文中，我们将多个参与者的个体习惯视为基本构建块，从“基于生成”的视角考虑组织惯例。我们强调个体参与者之间的连接或网络拓扑在组织惯例形成中的影响，并对复杂网络上的组织惯例进行多智能体模拟分析。我们考虑了一些重要因素，例如个体记忆导致的惯性、组织任务的组件复杂性、个体参与者的更替、参与者之间的异质性和即兴创作的影响，以及个体参与者所在网络拓扑的动态特性。我们的研究结果表明，个体参与者之间的网络拓扑确实决定了组织惯例的动态特征。尽管这一机制同样受到个体参与者的记忆容量以及这些个体参与者需反复处理的组织任务组件复杂性等主要因素的影响，而组织在实施组织任务时所承担的总成本也存在变异，但在无尺度网络上的惯例系统始终表现出更好的性能，并获得更高的一致性和集体行为的常规化水平，即使在个体参与者出现更替的情况下。此外，当参与者存在异质性时，无尺度网络上的惯例系统表现出强大的抗干扰能力，无论这些个体参与者是否存在小规模的即兴发挥。然而，大量的即兴发挥使个体参与者以更加个性化的方式行事，从而破坏了惯例系统。
摘要总结: 高德华等（2015）通过多代理仿真分析，研究了个体行为在组织惯例中的作用，强调了个体间网络拓扑对组织惯例动态特征的影响。研究发现，规模无关网络上的惯例系统具有更高的表现和一致性，且在个体异质性和小规模即兴创造时展现强抗干扰能力。

作者: Tawfik, Hissam; Anya, Obinna
摘要: Building systems to enable knowledge sharing and decision support among clinicians across organizational and geographical boundaries is a complex but important task that lies at the core of the idea of telehealth. Practice-centered awareness has the potential to enhance the usability of cross-boundary clinical decision support systems by providing a shared context of work for decision support across organizational and geographical boundaries based on awareness of a clinician's work contexts and practice-related work activities, including local workarounds, non-explicit rules, improvisation strategies, institutional agenda and patients' needs. We present a multi-method evaluation of the practice-centered awareness features of CaDHealth. CaDHealth is a clinical decision support system that enables clinicians to construct awareness of one another's work activities and contexts across geographical and organizational boundaries based on three categories of work practice - ontological, stereotyped and situated work practices. Evaluation results indicate that incorporating practice-centered awareness features in telehealth systems results in better work coordination across organizational and geographical boundaries, leads to more effective cross-boundary clinical decision support, and enhances the perceived usefulness and adoption of telehealth and e-health applications. (C) 2014 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
标题: Evaluating practice-centered awareness in cross-boundary telehealth decision support systems
标题翻译: 评估跨界远程医疗决策支持系统中的实践中心意识
摘要翻译: 建立能够在组织和地理边界之间促使临床医生知识共享和决策支持的系统是一项复杂但重要的任务，正是这一理念构成了远程医疗的核心。以实践为中心的意识能够通过提供共享的工作背景来增强跨界临床决策支持系统的可用性，这一背景基于对临床医生工作环境和与实践相关的工作活动（包括当地的应对措施、非明文规则、即兴策略、机构议程以及患者需求）的意识。我们对CaDHealth的以实践为中心的意识特征进行了多方法评估。CaDHealth是一个临床决策支持系统，能够使临床医生基于三类工作实践——本体论、刻板印象和情境工作实践——构建对彼此工作活动和背景的意识。评估结果表明，在远程医疗系统中加入以实践为中心的意识特征，有助于更好地协调跨组织和地理边界的工作，推动更有效的跨界临床决策支持，提高远程医疗和电子健康应用的感知有用性和采纳率。
摘要总结: Tawfik和Anya（2015）通过多方法评估CaDHealth临床决策支持系统中的实践中心意识功能，强调跨组织和地理边界的知识共享与决策支持。研究表明，增强的实践中心意识可以改进协作，提高决策支持的有效性，并促进远程医疗和电子健康应用的接受度。

作者: Daipha, Phaedra
摘要: This article elaborates the process of decision making in organizational environments characterized by disciplined improvisation. Building on an ethnography of forecasting operations at the National Weather Service, it introduces collage as a mediating concept between information bricolage and the forging of a decision. The concept of collage serves to (1) heuristically frame decision making as a process of assembling, appropriating, superimposing, juxtaposing, and blurring of information; and (2) externalize into digital practices of screenwork the cognitive labor of merging and distilling complex data into a provisionally coherent decision.
标题: From Bricolage to Collage: The Making of Decisions at a Weather Forecast Office
标题翻译: 从拼贴到拼合：气象预报办公室的决策制作
摘要翻译: 本文详细阐述了在以有序即兴创作为特征的组织环境中决策的过程。基于对国家气象局预测操作的民族志研究，文章提出了“拼贴”作为信息拼凑与决策形成之间的媒介概念。“拼贴”概念旨在 (1) 启发性地构建决策过程，将其视为信息的组装、占用、叠加、并置和模糊的过程；以及 (2) 将合并和提炼复杂数据为暂时一致决策的认知劳动外化为数字屏幕工作实践。
摘要总结: Daipha (2015) 通过对国家气象局预测操作的民族志研究，探讨了在有序即兴环境中的决策过程，引入“拼贴”概念作为信息拼装与决策形成之间的中介，说明决策过程为信息汇聚与整合的复杂劳动。

作者: Buddemeier, Brooke; Suski, Nancy
摘要: Preparedness activities for complex, technical hazards require a sound scientific basis integrated into appropriate guidelines and preparedness activities. The Federal Planning Guidance for Response to a Nuclear Detonation provides the strategy for response to an improvised nuclear device detonation and was built on an analytical framework of supporting science developed by national laboratories and other technical organizations. Recent advances in our understanding of the hazards posed by such an event includes detailed fallout predictions from the advanced suite of three-dimensional meteorology and plume/fallout models developed at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory, including extensive global geographical and real-time meteorological databases to support model calculations.This is an updated case study of the analytic framework for disaster management being applied to response preparedness. The methodology and results, including visualization aids developed for response organizations, have greatly enhanced the community planning process through first-person points of view and description of the dynamic nature of the event.
标题: Preparing for the Aftermath of a Nuclear Detonation; An Analytic Framework for Disaster Management
标题翻译: 核爆炸后果的准备：灾难管理的分析框架
摘要翻译: 复杂技术灾害的应对准备活动需要建立在坚实的科学基础之上，并融入适当的指导方针和准备活动中。《应对核爆炸的联邦规划指导》提供了对即兴核装置爆炸响应的策略，该策略建立在由国家实验室和其他技术组织开发的支持科学的分析框架之上。我们对此类事件所带来的危害的理解最近取得了进展，包括劳伦斯利弗莫尔国家实验室开发的先进三维气象和羽流/沉降模型提供的详细沉降预测，这些模型整合了广泛的全球地理和实时气象数据库以支持模型计算。这是一个关于灾害管理分析框架应用于响应准备的更新案例研究。该方法论及其结果，包括为响应组织开发的可视化辅助工具，极大地增强了社区规划过程，通过第一人称视角和对事件动态特性的描述提供了支持。
摘要总结: Buddemeier和Suski（2015）基于对核爆炸应急响应的分析框架，利用劳伦斯利弗莫尔国家实验室的三维气象和落尘模型，更新了灾害管理的案例研究，发现先进的模型和可视化工具显著提升了应急准备和社区规划的有效性。

作者: Mendonca, David; Wallace, William A.
摘要: The 2001 World Trade Center attack resulted in widespread and highly non-routine failures to critical infrastructure systems. An immediate priority following the attack was the restoration of electric power in lower Manhattan. A study of the organization responsible for conducting this restoration is here presented in order to provide a productive critique of factors theorized by Woods (2006) [1] to affect organizational resilience. Data sources include logs of the behavior of the electric power infrastructure and extensive interviews with personnel at various levels of the organization. The conclusions of the analysis are used to frame a refined set of factors that shape organizational resilience, and to provide observations on the processes that underlie how organizations achieve or fail to achieve the potential for resilience. (C) 2015 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
标题: Factors underlying organizational resilience: The case of electric power restoration in New York City after 11 September 2001
标题翻译: 影响组织韧性的因素：以2001年9月11日后纽约市电力恢复为例
摘要翻译: 2001年世贸中心袭击导致关键基础设施系统广泛且高度非例行的故障。袭击后，恢复下曼哈顿的电力成为一项迫切任务。本文展示了负责进行这项恢复工作的组织的研究，旨在对Woods（2006）理论中影响组织韧性的因素进行有建设性的批判。数据来源包括电力基础设施的行为日志以及对组织各级人员的广泛访谈。分析的结论用于构建一组精炼的因素，塑造组织韧性，并提供对组织如何实现或未能实现韧性潜力的过程的观察。（C）2015年爱思唯尔有限公司版权所有。
摘要总结: Mendonca和Wallace（2015）基于对2001年世贸中心袭击后电力恢复组织的研究，使用了电力基础设施的行为日志和人员访谈数据，得出结论，提出了影响组织韧性的因素，并观察了组织实现或未能实现韧性的过程。

作者: Alp, Orkun; Erdem Kilic, Ozden; Ayvalik, Ali; Savas, Zafer
摘要: ASELSAN Inc. has developed an automated test equipment (ATE) for its own design mobile and manpack RCIED (Remote Controlled Improvised Explosive Device) Jammer Systems exported in the scope of technology transfer. This ATE has an ability to test not only the jammer systems but also their line replaceable units (LRUs) and shop replaceable units (SRUs) for intermediate (I-level) maintenance and also ones manufactured in the production line by way of the technology transfer. It eliminates the additional necessity of organizational (O-level) maintenance. LRUs to be tested are the parts such as power amplifiers, couplers, diplexers, remote control units, batteries and antennas. There are also SRUs available such as power supply boards and channel sweeping signal generator boards.In this paper, the hardware and software architecture of the developed ATE and its project special implementation is evaluated. In particular new designed ATE units by ASELSAN, hardware independency of ATE, minimum level of test operator intervention, ease of usage, safety precautions are emphasized. Pros and cons of the designed ATE, and finally the maintainability, reliability and sustainability of such ATE are also discussed.
标题: ATE Design And Development For I-Level Maintenance And Production Line Of RCIED Jammer Systems
标题翻译: RCIED干扰系统的I级维护和生产线的ATE设计与开发
摘要翻译: ASELSAN公司开发了一种自动测试设备（ATE），用于其自行设计的移动和手持RCIED（遥控简易爆炸装置）干扰器系统，并在技术转让的范围内进行出口。该ATE不仅能测试干扰器系统，还能测试其线性可更换单元（LRUs）和商店可更换单元（SRUs），以满足中级（I级）维护的需求，以及通过技术转让方式在生产线上制造的设备。它消除了对组织级（O级）维护的额外需求。待测试的LRUs包括功率放大器、耦合器、双工器、遥控单元、电池和天线等部件。此外，还有电源板和通道扫描信号发生器板等SRUs可供使用。本文评估了所开发ATE的硬件和软件架构及其项目特别实施情况。特别强调了ASELSAN新设计的ATE单元、ATE的硬件独立性、测试操作员干预的最小化、使用的简便性和安全预防措施。还讨论了所设计ATE的优缺点，以及该ATE的可维护性、可靠性和可持续性。
摘要总结: Alp等人（2015）开发了一种自动测试设备（ATE）用于其移动和人包式RCIED干扰器系统的测试，该设备支持中级维护并能够替代部分组织维护。研究评估了ATE的硬件和软件架构，强调了其硬件独立性、易用性和安全性，并讨论了其可维护性和可靠性。

期刊: JOURNAL OF THE OPERATIONAL RESEARCH SOCIETY
作者: Jessop, Alan; Parker, David; Temple, John
摘要: Groups within organisations learn from experience. The learning experience may itself be enough to help a decision and may also be codified into a knowledge base for use at another time. A modular structure, called a Pattern Language, provides both a base for recording this knowledge and also a format for the debriefing of experience to gain that knowledge. The modularity means that the modules, or prototypes of them, may be imported from other applications so speeding the process and encouraging the transfer of good practices. Two applications, in process engineering in a chemical company and strategy formation in a small charity, are given, which demonstrate the use of donor patterns as means of importing knowledge and stimulating learning. Although the circumstances of the two cases are quite different the processes are similar in duration and structure, suggesting a model for future application.
标题: Donor patterns: a modular structure for sharing knowledge
标题翻译: 捐赠模式：知识共享的模块化结构
摘要翻译: 组织内部的群体通过经验学习。学习经验本身可能足以帮助做出决策，并且还可以被整理成知识库，以供未来使用。一种称为模式语言的模块化结构，既提供了记录这些知识的基础，也为经验的总结提供了一种格式，以获取这些知识。模块化的特点意味着这些模块，或其原型，可以从其他应用中导入，从而加快过程并促进良好实践的转移。文中给出了两个应用案例，分别是在一家化工公司的过程工程和一个小型慈善组织的战略形成，这些案例展示了捐赠者模式作为知识导入和促进学习的手段。尽管这两个案例的情况截然不同，但其过程在持续时间和结构上相似，这为未来的应用提出了一种模型。
摘要总结: Jessop、Parker和Temple（2016）通过案例研究分析了组织内群体如何通过经验学习，并提出了一种模块化的“模式语言”结构用于知识记录和经验总结，强调了促进知识转移与良好实践的必要性，展示了其在化工和慈善机构中的应用。

作者: Bass, Julian M.
摘要: Context: Large-scale offshore software development programmes are complex, with challenging deadlines and a high risk of failure. Agile methods are being adopted, despite the challenges of coordinating multiple development teams. Agile processes are tailored to support team coordination. Artefacts are tangible products of the software development process, intended to ensure consistency in the approach of teams on the same development programme.Objective: This study aims to increase understanding of how development processes are tailored to meet the needs of large-scale offshore software development programmes, by focusing on artefact inventories used in the development process.Method: A grounded theory approach using 46 practitioner interviews, supplemented with documentary sources and observations, in nine international companies was adopted. The grounded theory concepts of open coding, memoing, constant comparison and saturation were used in data analysis.Results: The study has identified 25 artefacts, organised into five categories: feature, sprint, release, product and corporate governance. It was discovered that conventional agile artefacts are enriched with artefacts associated with plan-based methods in order to provide governance. The empirical evidence collected in the study has been used to identify a primary owner of each artefact and map each artefact to specific activities within each of the agile roles.Conclusion: The development programmes in this study create agile and plan-based artefacts to improve compliance with enterprise quality standards and technology strategies, whilst also mitigating risk of failure. Management of these additional artefacts is currently improvised because agile development processes lack corresponding ceremonies. (C) 2016 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
标题: Artefacts and agile method tailoring in large-scale offshore software development programmes
标题翻译: 大规模离岸软件开发项目中的工件与敏捷方法调整
摘要翻译:
背景：大规模离岸软件开发项目复杂，面临严峻的截止日期和高失败风险。尽管协调多个开发团队存在挑战，敏捷方法仍在被采纳。敏捷流程旨在支持团队协调。工件是软件开发过程中的有形产物，旨在确保参与同一开发项目的团队在方法上的一致性。  
目的：本研究旨在加深对如何调整开发流程以满足大规模离岸软件开发项目需求的理解，重点关注开发过程中使用的工件清单。  
方法：采用扎根理论的方法，通过对九家国际公司的46位从业者进行访谈，辅以文献资料和观察。数据分析中运用了开放编码、备忘、持续比较和饱和的扎根理论概念。  
结果：研究识别了25种工件，分为五类：功能、冲刺、发布、产品和企业治理。发现传统敏捷工件与基于计划的方法相关的工件相结合，以提供治理支持。本研究收集的实证证据用于确定每个工件的主要负责人，并将每个工件映射到各个敏捷角色中的特定活动。  
结论：本研究中的开发项目创建了敏捷和基于计划的工件，以提高对企业质量标准和技术战略的遵从性，同时降低失败风险。由于敏捷开发流程缺乏相应的仪式，这些额外工件的管理目前仍在即兴进行。
摘要总结: Bass（2016）采用扎根理论方法，通过对九家国际公司的46名从业者的访谈及文献观察，研究了大型离岸软件开发中的工件清单，发现了25种工件并将其分为五类，揭示了传统敏捷工件如何与计划驱动方法结合，以提高企业质量标准的合规性并降低失败风险。

作者: Navarro, Maria; Manuel Corchado, Juan; Demazeau, Yves
摘要: Many music students today experience difficulties in composing melodies without a prior harmonical guide. While harmony can be helpful in creating a melody the generation of harmony is challenging due to the many factors that must be taken into account, such as style, harmonic functions, musical consonance or aesthetics. Although various solutions have been proposed in the past, our study employs a different expert solution based on virtual organizations to make musical harmonies, which can assist novice improvisers and/or composers. The virtual organizations are implemented with Multi-Agent System (MAS) using PANGEA (Platform for Automatic coNstruction of orGanizations of intElligent Agents), a platform to develop different multiagent systems. The main goal is to simulate an expert multiagent system that can compose harmony following specific rules. To do so, the Harmony Search Algorithm is implemented as the main behavior of the composer agent, and adapted to a Belief-Desire-Intention architecture. The application of a VO has not been previously used in the development of this kind of expert system in music. We measured the quality of the music obtained, by minimizing a mathematical function. Additionally, we developed an evaluation test that positively validates the musical results from the perspective of consonance and usefulness of the composers. (C) 2016 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
标题: MUSIC-MAS: Modeling a harmonic composition system with virtual organizations to assist novice composers
标题翻译: MUSIC-MAS：利用虚拟组织建模和谐音乐创作系统以协助新手作曲家
摘要翻译: 许多音乐学生在没有先前和声指导的情况下，创作旋律时面临困难。虽然和声对创作旋律有帮助，但由于需要考虑多种因素如风格、和声功能、音乐的协调性或美学，和声的生成却具有挑战性。尽管过去提出了各种解决方案，我们的研究采用了一种基于虚拟组织的不同专家解决方案来进行音乐和声创作，能够帮助初学者即兴演奏者和/或作曲家。虚拟组织通过多智能体系统（MAS）实现，采用PANGEA（智能体组织自动构建平台），这是一个开发不同多智能体系统的平台。主要目标是模拟一个专家多智能体系统，能够根据特定规则创作和声。为此，和声搜索算法被作为作曲者智能体的主要行为实现，并适应于信念-愿望-意图架构。在音乐领域，这种虚拟组织的应用在开发此类专家系统中尚属首次。我们通过最小化数学函数来测量所获得音乐的质量。此外，我们还开发了一项评估测试，从协调性和作曲者的实用性角度，积极验证了音乐结果。（C）2016 Elsevier Ltd. 保留所有权利。
摘要总结: Navarro等（2016）基于PANGEA平台，利用多智能体系统设计专家系统，应用和声搜索算法生成和声，以帮助音乐新手作曲，并通过数学函数评估音乐质量，验证其在音韵和实用性方面的效果。

作者: Talamo, Alessandra; Mellini, Barbara; Camilli, Marco; Ventura, Stefano; Di Lucchio, Loredana
摘要: The aim of the paper is to contribute to the definition and analysis of the access to the field (Feldman et al. 2003) through an inter-organizational perspective. The paper discusses a case study on the access of a researcher to a hospital department where both organizations and actors are shown as actively constructing the research site. Both researcher and participants are described in terms of work organizations originally engaged in parallel systems of activity. Dynamics of negotiation tied the different actors' activities in a new activity system where researcher and participants concur to the effectiveness of both organizations (i.e., the research and the hospital ward). An Activity Theory perspective (Leont'ev 1978) is used with the aim of focusing the analysis on the activities in charge to the different actors. The approach adopted introduces the idea that, from the outset, research is made possible by a process of co-construction that works through the development of a completely new and shared work space arising around the encounter between researchers and participants. It is the balance between improvised actions and the co-creation of boundary objects (Star and Griesemer 1989), which makes interlacement possible between the two activity systems. The concept of knotworking (Engestrom 2007a) is adopted to interpret specific actions by both organizations and actors intended to build a knot of activities whereby the new research system takes place.
标题: An Organizational Perspective to the Creation of the Research Field
标题翻译: 从组织的视角看研究领域的创造
摘要翻译: 本文旨在通过跨组织视角对领域准入的定义和分析作出贡献（Feldman等，2003）。论文讨论了一个关于研究者进入医院科室的案例研究，其中展示了组织和参与者如何积极构建研究场所。研究者和参与者在最初参与平行活动系统的工作组织中进行了描述。谈判的动态将不同参与者的活动联系在一个新的活动系统中，在该系统中，研究者和参与者共同促进了两个组织的有效性（即研究机构和医院病房）。本文采用活动理论视角（Leont'ev 1978），旨在将分析聚焦于不同参与者所承担的活动。所采用的方法引入了这样一种观点：从一开始，研究通过一种共建的过程而成为可能，该过程是在研究者与参与者之间的相遇中发展出一个全新且共享的工作空间。即兴行动与边界物的共同创造（Star和Griesemer 1989）之间的平衡，使得两个活动系统之间的相互交织成为可能。为了理解两个组织和参与者所进行的特定行动，采用了结工作（knotworking）的概念（Engestrom 2007a），旨在构建一个活动的结点，从而使新的研究系统得以形成。
摘要总结: Talamo等（2016）通过案例研究分析了研究者与医院部门的互动，采用活动理论视角探讨了在不同组织间共同构建研究空间的过程，揭示了研究和医院组织之间的动态协作及其对研究有效性的促进作用。

作者: Le Roux, Catherine; Pretorius, Marius
摘要: Sustainability is an essential theme for business. In order to compete, strategies need to be improvised and efficient and effective decisions need to be made for improved sustainability performance. Despite management's apparent knowledge of this, it appears that challenges persist with sustainability's embeddedness in decision-making and its implementation in practice. In this study we propose a metaphor applying an integrative view of sustainability as support for management. We offer six antecedents of sustainability embeddedness in decision-making that contribute to building and confirming theory, and also provide a better understanding of current practice around sustainability embeddedness so that strategies can be developed for improved sustainability performance. Employees on all management levels in a stock exchange listed company provided rich empirical data for the study. Through the analysis of data in a case study, antecedents were inductively identified, conceptualized, and presented as using descriptive labels, namely: A True North Destinationa vision of sustainability embeddedness; Mountainsthree obstacles; Fogconfusion and complexity; Myopiashortsightedness; Navigation Necessitiesrequirements for the journey; and finally, the Chosen Teamselected stakeholders. Sustainability embeddedness was found to be dependent on leadership, the strategy message and structures, performance measures, and policies that support a unified culture for sustainability embeddedness.
标题: Navigating Sustainability Embeddedness in Management Decision-Making
标题翻译: 在管理决策中导航可持续性嵌入
摘要翻译: 可持续性是商业中的一个重要主题。为了竞争，需要即兴应变的策略，并做出高效且有效的决策，以改善可持续性绩效。尽管管理层显然对此有所了解，但在可持续性在决策中嵌入以及实施方面仍然面临挑战。在本研究中，我们提出了一个隐喻，将可持续性作为管理的支持，采用综合的视角。我们提供了六个可持续性嵌入决策中的前因，这有助于构建和确认理论，并更好地理解当前关于可持续性嵌入的实践，以便制定改善可持续性绩效的策略。上市公司的各级管理人员为本研究提供了丰富的实证数据。通过对案例研究中数据的分析，前因被归纳识别、概念化，并以描述性标签呈现，即：真实的北方目的地——可持续性嵌入的愿景；山——三个障碍；雾——困惑和复杂性；短视——目光短浅；导航必需品——旅程的要求；以及最终的选择团队——选定的利益相关者。研究发现，可持续性嵌入依赖于领导力、战略信息和结构、绩效指标以及支持可持续性嵌入统一文化的政策。
摘要总结: Le Roux和Pretorius（2016）通过对一家上市公司的员工进行案例研究，分析了可持续性在决策中的嵌入性及其实施面临的挑战，提出六个前因因素，强调领导力、战略信息和文化的统一对提升可持续性绩效的重要性。

作者: McNamara, Laura A.; Klein, Laura M.
摘要: The evolution of exquisitely sensitive Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) systems is positioning this technology for use in time-critical environments, such as search-and-rescue missions and improvised explosive device (IED) detection. SAR systems should be playing a keystone role in the United States' Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance activities. Yet many in the SAR community see missed opportunities for incorporating SAR into existing remote sensing data collection and analysis challenges. Drawing on several years' of field research with SAR engineering and operational teams, this paper examines the human and organizational factors that mitigate against the adoption and use of SAR for tactical ISR and operational support. We suggest that SAR has a design problem, and that context-sensitive, human and organizational design frameworks are required if the community is to realize SAR's tactical potential.
标题: Context-Sensitive Design and Human Interaction Principles for Usable, Useful, and Adoptable Radars
标题翻译: 情境敏感设计与人机交互原则：可用、实用且易于采纳的雷达
摘要翻译: 精密敏感的合成孔径雷达（SAR）系统的发展正使这一技术适用于时间紧迫的环境，例如搜救任务和简易爆炸装置（IED）探测。SAR 系统应在美国的情报、监视和侦察活动中发挥关键作用。然而，许多 SAR 社区成员认为未能充分利用 SAR 来应对现有遥感数据收集和分析挑战。基于多年与 SAR 工程和操作团队的实地研究，本文探讨了阻碍 SAR 在战术 ISR 和操作支持中采纳与使用的人为和组织因素。我们认为 SAR 存在设计问题，社区需要以情境敏感的、人性化和组织设计框架为基础，以实现 SAR 的战术潜力。
摘要总结: McNamara和Klein（2016）通过多年对SAR工程和操作团队的实地研究，探讨了在战术情报、监视和侦察（ISR）中未能有效采用合成孔径雷达（SAR）的原因，认为SAR存在设计问题，并提出需引入以人和组织为中心的设计框架以实现其战术潜力。

作者: Abd Hamid, Abu Baker; Embi, Mohamed Rashid
摘要: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is a flourishing device and approach for Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) which assist; the planning, design, constructions and operation with particular to commence the designing in several components of the building, a comprehensive understanding of the activities and needed in all aspects. An aspect of activities and needs is the first step to be analysed in the design and it is the responsibility of professionals' interior designers. To solve the problems, is required to attach with the certain factors such as space planning, specifications fixture, equipment and material, furniture and finishing, lighting fixing and service management. BIM application can provide interior designers such as simulation, analysis, design process and solution with team members. Furthermore, some of the interior designer also using BIM as to organize, documenting data and optimise detail information in solving the problem in the develop process. BIM technology and practices not only to improve the construction and design process development that only the project faster, cost effectively, and prolong but it also helps to increase the capacity of BIM professional by improvise the careers and fields. In the Malaysian context, BIM is still fresh in interior desogn industry.
标题: Review on Application of Building Information Modelling in Interior Design Industry
标题翻译: 建筑信息模型在室内设计行业应用的综述
摘要翻译: 建筑信息模型（BIM）是一种蓬勃发展的建筑、工程和施工（AEC）工具和方法，帮助规划、设计、施工和运营，特别是在建筑多个组件的设计初期，全面理解所有方面所需的活动。活动和需求的一个方面是设计中的首要分析步骤，这也是专业室内设计师的责任。解决问题需要考虑若干因素，如空间规划、设备和材料的规格、家具和装修、照明设备及服务管理。BIM 应用可以为室内设计师提供模拟、分析、设计过程及与团队成员的解决方案。此外，一些室内设计师还使用BIM来组织、记录数据并优化详细信息，以解决开发过程中的问题。BIM技术和实践不仅能提高施工和设计过程的发展，使项目更快速、成本更有效、延续时间更长，而且还通过改善职业和领域来增强BIM专业人员的能力。在马来西亚的背景下，BIM在室内设计行业仍然是一个新兴事物。
摘要总结: Abd Hamid和Abu Baker(2016)基于建筑、工程和施工（AEC）领域分析BIM在室内设计中的应用，强调了空间规划、设备、材料等因素的重要性，发现BIM能够通过模拟和分析优化设计流程，提高项目效率，并促进专业人员的发展。

期刊: 2017 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON CURRENT TRENDS IN COMPUTER, ELECTRICAL, ELECTRONICS AND COMMUNICATION (CTCEEC)
作者: Tommy, Robin; Sundeep, Gullapudi; Jose, Hima
摘要: Web Applications are the better way for an organization to share the resources through the internet, but they often contains bugs which results as the security threat to the organization. For an organization, Information security is a critical aspect. Vulnerability Scanners helps to find the vulnerabilities in the web applications in attacker's perspective. According the Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) there 23 subcategories of vulnerabilities W. This paper describes about the system which helps to automatically finds and fixes the vulnerabilities present in the web applications using the machine learning. Machine learning helps to improvise the performance of the system using the statistics of the previous results.
标题: Automatic Detection and Correction of Vulnerabilities using Machine Learning
标题翻译: 利用机器学习的自动漏洞检测与修复
摘要翻译: 网络应用程序是组织通过互联网共享资源的更好方式，但它们通常包含漏洞，这会对组织构成安全威胁。对于一个组织来说，信息安全是一个至关重要的方面。漏洞扫描工具有助于从攻击者的角度发现网络应用程序中的漏洞。根据开放互联网应用安全项目（OWASP），存在23个子类别的漏洞。本文描述了一种系统，该系统利用机器学习自动发现并修复网络应用程序中存在的漏洞。机器学习利用先前结果的统计数据来提高系统的性能。
摘要总结: Tommy等人（2017）提出了一种基于机器学习的系统，自动检测和修复网络应用中的安全漏洞。研究使用OWASP的23个漏洞子类别进行分析，旨在提高信息安全性，利用历史结果的统计数据提升系统性能。

作者: Formoso, Carlos Torres; Sommer, Lucila; Koskela, Lauri; Isatto, Eduardo Luís
摘要: Abstract Making-do has been pointed out as an important category of waste in the construction industry. It refers to a situation in which a task starts or continues without having available all the inputs required for its completion, such as materials, machinery, tools, personnel, external conditions, and information. By contrast, the literature points out that improvisation is a ubiquitous human practice even in highly structured business organizations, and plays an important role when rules and methods fail. The aim of this paper is to provide some insights on the nature of making-do as a type of waste, based on two exploratory case studies carried out on construction sites. The main contributions of this research work are concerned with the identification of different categories of making-do and its main causes. This paper also discusses some strategies for reducing making-do on construction sites.
标题: The identification and analysis of making-do waste: insights from two Brazilian construction sites
标题翻译: 制作废物的识别与分析：来自两处巴西建筑工地的洞察
摘要翻译: 摘要 在建筑行业，“凑合”被指出是一个重要的浪费类别。它指的是在没有所有完成任务所需的输入（如材料、机械、工具、人员、外部条件和信息）时，任务开始或继续进行的情况。相对而言，文献指出，即使在高度结构化的商业组织中，即兴发挥也是一种普遍的人类实践，并且在规则和方法失效时扮演着重要角色。本文的目的是基于在建筑工地上进行的两个探索性案例研究，提供关于凑合作为一种浪费类型的本质的一些见解。本研究的主要贡献在于识别出不同类别的凑合及其主要原因。本文还讨论了一些减少建筑工地上凑合现象的策略。
摘要总结: Formoso等（2017）通过对建筑工地进行两个探索性案例研究，探讨了“应付做”的废物性质，识别了不同类别及其主要成因，并讨论了减少建筑工地“应付做”的策略。

期刊: PSYCHOLOGY OF AESTHETICS CREATIVITY AND THE ARTS
作者: Wilson, Graeme B.; MacDonald, Raymond A. R.
摘要: Improvisation represents a unique process of social creativity in real time, practiced in widely varying musical contexts with different levels of experience. Yet psychologists have mostly studied the practices of individual jazz soloists with an expectation that shared understanding, knowledge, and technical abilities are a prerequisite for group improvising. A qualitative study interviewed 6 trios of free improvisers (n = 18) to illuminate the processes of shared musical improvisation across a range of contemporary artistic practice. Comparison of different members' accounts of events during recorded free improvisations indicated that their understandings of who did what and why converged at some points, notably during relative stasis, and diverged at others. Improvisers anticipated and interpreted musical behaviors of their collaborators with reference to previous shared social or musical experience, but considered that such expectations could, and should, be confounded. Familiarity between improvisers could be seen as helpful in building trust within dynamic and highly uncertain musical contexts, and in allowing a less conscious approach to interaction. Improvisers individually assumed that their group shared certain tastes and asserted that others recognized certain musical material as connected to previous practice together. These ideas of shared tastes and practices could best be understood as constructions within this particular social context, because they were not necessarily consistent across the ensemble. The findings emphasize the fundamentally social nature of improvising: Shared understanding is not a prerequisite for participation, but shared experience over time enriches the resources of meaning an individual can bring to their interaction in an improvising group.
标题: The Construction of Meaning Within Free Improvising Groups: A Qualitative Psychological Investigation
标题翻译: 自由即兴团体中意义的构建：一项定性心理学研究
摘要翻译: 即兴创作代表了一种独特的实时社会创造过程，在不同的音乐背景和经验水平中进行。然而，心理学家大多研究个别爵士乐独奏者的实践，认为共享理解、知识和技术能力是团体即兴创作的先决条件。一项定性研究采访了6个自由即兴三重奏（n = 18），以揭示当代艺术实践中共享音乐即兴创作的过程。不同成员对录音的自由即兴创作事件的回忆比较显示，他们对“谁做了什么”和“为什么做”在某些时刻（尤其是相对静止阶段）趋于一致，而在其他时刻则出现分歧。即兴演奏者根据以往共享的社会或音乐经验预测和解读合作者的音乐行为，但认为这种期望可以并且应该被混淆。即兴演奏者之间的熟悉感被视为在动态和高度不确定的音乐环境中建立信任的有利因素，并使互动变得不那么自觉。即兴演奏者各自认为他们的团体共享某种品味，并断言其他人识别出某些音乐材料与他们之前的共同实践有关。这些共享的品味和实践的观念最好被理解为特定社会背景下的构建，因为它们并不一定在整个乐团中一致。研究结果强调了即兴创作的根本社会性质：共享理解并不是参与的先决条件，但随着时间的推移，共享经验丰富了个人在即兴创作群体中所能带来的意义资源。
摘要总结: 威尔逊和麦克唐纳(2017)通过对18名即兴演奏者的访谈，探讨了共有即兴创作过程，结果表明，尽管共享理解不是参与的前提，但长期共同经验可以丰富即兴演奏的互动资源，信任关系有助于在动态不确定的音乐背景下进行合作。

作者: Seth, Manisha; Goyal, D. P.; Kiran, Ravi
摘要: Supply Chain Management Information System (SCMIS) has gained a lot of importance because of its ability to reduce costs and increase responsiveness in the supply chain. The implementation of SCMIS is a complicated process with significant risk. The studies have revealed that the success in implementing these systems is not very encouraging. Therefore, it is necessary to establish the impediments in SCMIS implementation and their severity. Studies on the failure factors of the ERP system have already been done by various researchers. The research on SCMIS, an inter-organizational system, is in its early stages and is still to receive that much attention as its predecessor whereas barriers for its implementation are more severe. Thus, there exists a gap in research in this important area. In this paper an attempt has been made to establish impediments, their severity and improvisation for the successful implementation of SCMIS in the Indian automobile industry.
标题: Diminution of Impediments in Implementation of Supply Chain Management Information System for Enhancing its Effectiveness in Indian Automobile Industry
标题翻译: 印度汽车工业供应链管理信息系统实施障碍的减少及其有效性的提升
摘要翻译: 供应链管理信息系统（SCMIS）因其在降低成本和提高供应链响应能力方面的能力而变得越来越重要。然而，SCMIS的实施过程复杂，并且风险显著。研究表明，实施这些系统的成功率并不令人鼓舞。因此，有必要明确SCMIS实施中的障碍及其严重性。关于ERP系统失败因素的研究已由多位研究人员进行。作为一个跨组织系统的SCMIS研究仍处于早期阶段，尚未像其前身那样获得足够的关注，而其实施障碍则更为严峻。因此，在这一重要领域的研究存在缺口。本文试图探讨SCMIS在印度汽车工业成功实施的障碍、障碍的严重性及其改进措施。
摘要总结: Seth、Goyal和Kiran（2017）在研究中分析了供应链管理信息系统（SCMIS）在印度汽车行业实施的障碍及其严重性，通过文献回顾揭示了现有研究的不足，并提出了成功实施SCMIS的改进建议。

作者: Watson, Cate; Drew, Valerie
摘要: Recent constructions view leadership as a process of social influence which coordinates processes of change. Moreover, such processes are not necessarily linked to role hierarchy but may be emergent and distributed within teams. However, the micro-processes through which this occurs are not well understood. The significance of the article lies in its contribution to an understanding of the emergence of leadership in teams, and in particular how humour and laughter are drawn on as a resource by which to exert social influence. Here, we use the construct of the play frame, non-serious' talk in which participants jointly construct extended humorous sequences as improvisations, to analyse how team members manoeuvre in order to accomplish influence, decision-making and leadership. In taking this approach, we are not concerned with considerations of how managers use jokes to exercise control, or workers use humour to subvert management. Rather, we examine how humour, and particularly the laughter it engenders, can contribute to an understanding of organisations as centred on communication and founded on the precept that organisations are talked into being'. We show how talk in a play frame institutes a context which can be utilised by participants to exert influence, and we demonstrate the highly contingent and contextual nature of the emergence of leadership within teams.
标题: Humour and laughter in meetings: Influence, decision-making and the emergence of leadership
标题翻译: 会议中的幽默与笑声：影响、决策与领导力的产生
摘要翻译: 最近的研究将领导视为一种社会影响的过程，协调变革的过程。此外，这些过程不一定与角色层级相关，而可能是团队内自发和分布的。然而，此过程中所涉及的微观过程尚不完全清楚。本文的重要性在于其对领导在团队中出现的理解方面的贡献，特别是幽默和笑声如何作为施加社会影响的一种资源。在这里，我们使用“游戏框架”的构念，即参与者共同构造延续的幽默序列作为即兴表演的“非严肃”对话，分析团队成员如何操控以实现影响、决策和领导。采取这种方法时，我们并不关心经理如何利用笑话来行使控制，或员工如何利用幽默来颠覆管理。相反，我们考察幽默，尤其是由此产生的笑声，如何有助于理解组织以沟通为中心，并建立在“组织是通过对话建立起来的”这一原则之上。我们展示了如何在游戏框架中的对话建立一个背景，参与者可以利用这个背景来施加影响，并证明了领导在团队中产生的高度依赖和情境性。
摘要总结: Watson和Drew（2017）基于对团队中的幽默和笑声的分析，探讨领导力的微观过程，发现幽默能够作为一种社会影响力的资源，促成团队成员的决策和影响力的形成，为理解团队中的领导力提供了新视角。

期刊: JOURNAL OF LOSS PREVENTION IN THE PROCESS INDUSTRIES
作者: Son, Changwon; Sasangohar, Farzan; Peres, S. Camille; Neville, Timothy J.; Moon, Jukrin; Mannan, M. Sam
摘要: Resilience is considered an essential capability of an Incident Management Team (IMT) in planning for and responding to disasters and catastrophes. While IMTs have been studied as a decision-making unit, few attempts were made to view them from a Joint Cognitive System (JCS) perspective that highlights the interplay among humans and technical agents and demands imposed by the incident. To that end, this paper presents a JCS model of the IMT grounded in findings from the existing literature and naturalistic observations of simulated IMTs incident action planning, which functions in a cyclic manner across multiple scales. Using this model, three measures for resilience of the IMT, recovery time, resource status, and interactions, are discussed. To effectively represent the resilient performance incorporating these measures, a novel adoption of the Interactive Episode Analysis method is utilized. By providing a few examples of the analysis method, this study provides proof-of concept for objective assessment of the resilience characteristics of the IMT. The proposed JCS-based IMT model can be used for descriptive modeling of similar systems to investigate resilient performance.
标题: Modeling an incident management team as a joint cognitive system
标题翻译: 将事故管理团队建模为联合认知系统
摘要翻译: 韧性被视为事件管理团队（IMT）在灾难和灾害规划与响应中的一项关键能力。尽管已经将IMT作为决策单位进行研究，但很少有尝试从联合认知系统（JCS）的角度来观察它们，该视角强调人类与技术代理之间的相互作用，以及事件所施加的需求。为此，本文提出了一个基于JCS的IMT模型，该模型基于现有文献的研究结果和对模拟IMT事件行动规划的自然观察，体现了在多个层面上的循环运作。利用该模型，讨论了IMT韧性的三个指标：恢复时间、资源状态和互动。为有效代表结合这些指标的韧性表现，采用了一种新颖的互动情节分析方法。通过提供分析方法的一些示例，本研究为IMT韧性特征的客观评估提供了概念验证。所提出的基于JCS的IMT模型可用于对类似系统进行描述性建模，以调查韧性表现。
摘要总结: Son等（2018）基于文献和自然观察构建了一个联合认知系统模型，研究了事故管理团队的韧性，提出了恢复时间、资源状况和互动等三项韧性指标，采用互动事件分析法进行客观评估，提供了对相似系统韧性特征的描述性建模。

期刊: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 2018 IEEE 6TH INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON MOOCS, INNOVATION AND TECHNOLOGY IN EDUCATION (MITE 2018)
作者: Alok, Govil; Pothupogu, Soumya; Reddy, M. Sampath; SaiPriya, Pillalamarri; Devi, Radhika, V
摘要: Uniqueness, innovation, and teamwork are critical to the success of every industry. Requirements of the industry vs theoretical knowledge of the students do not go well aligned in the conventional method of learning. Industry having requirements of interdisciplinary expertise, critical and innovative thinking, explicit research and understanding of the user, manufacturer and system needs are not being catered during the delivery of course. Students undergo a challenging task in their personal life as well as in professional life to meet their long- and short-term goals. Making them proactive and exhibiting these skills acquires a career, sustain and excel in the same to make their dream come true. To enhance the design attributes, out-of-box thinking, creativity, teamwork, innovation, decision making this sophomore course named Foundation to Product Design inspires and motivates students to work in teams, promote learning and thinking skills, understand the role of the user, build prototypes and also improvise their communication and presentation skills. These attributes form the base to develop their career and become a successful and effectual engineer and also gives them a scope of entrepreneurial independence.
标题: Trenchant Pathway to bring Innovation through Foundations to Product Design in Engineering Education
标题翻译: 通过基础推动创新以实现工程教育中的产品设计的尖锐路径
摘要翻译: 独特性、创新和团队合作对于每个行业的成功至关重要。行业的需求与学生的理论知识在传统学习方法中并不一致。由于行业对跨学科专业知识、批判性和创新性思维、明确的研究以及对用户、制造商和系统需求的理解的要求，在课程的传授过程中并未得到有效满足。学生在个人生活和职业生涯中都面临着实现短期和长期目标的挑战。培养他们的主动性并展示这些技能需要一个职业生涯，并在其中持续发展和卓越，以实现他们的梦想。为了增强设计属性、突破性思维、创造力、团队合作、创新和决策能力，这门名为“产品设计基础”的二年级课程激励和鼓舞学生进行团队合作，促进学习和思维技能，理解用户的角色，构建原型，并改善他们的沟通和演示技巧。这些属性为他们的发展职业打下基础，使他们成为成功和高效的工程师，同时也为他们提供了创业独立的机会。
摘要总结: Alok等（2018）通过开设“产品设计基础”课程，强调创新、团队合作和跨学科知识，以满足行业需求，提升学生的决策能力、沟通技能和创业独立性，帮助学生在职业发展中取得成功。

作者: Hatcher, G.; Ion, W.; Maclachlan, R.; Marlow, M.; Simpson, B.; Wilson, N.; Wodehouse, A.
摘要: This paper compares a new creative design method, based on the principles of drama improvisation, with brainstorming. The evolution and development of the Design Improv method is reviewed, and the results of an evaluation of both methods in controlled team ideation sessions are documented. The creative characteristics relevant to their quantitative and visual interpretation are analysed using linkography, identifying the most prominent variations in performance with respect to inter-connectedness, parallel thinking and idea diversity. We describe an adapted and expanded process for robust linkograph development and reflect on the value, challenges and limitations of both the linkograph creation and the perceptive insights they can provide. (C) 2018 The Author(s). Published by Elsevier Ltd.
标题: Using linkography to compare creative methods for group ideation
标题翻译: 使用链接图法比较团体创意的不同方法
摘要翻译: 本文比较了一种基于戏剧即兴原则的新型创意设计方法与头脑风暴。回顾了设计即兴方法的发展和演变，并记录了对这两种方法在受控团队创意会议中的评估结果。通过链接图分析了与定量和视觉解释相关的创意特征，识别了在互联性、平行思维和创意多样性方面表现出的最显著变化。我们描述了一种经改编和扩展的强大链接图开发过程，并反思了链接图创作及其所能提供的感知洞察的价值、挑战和局限性。 (C) 2018 作者。由Elsevier Ltd.出版。
摘要总结: Hatcher等（2018）比较了基于戏剧即兴原则的新设计方法与头脑风暴，评估了两种方法在受控团队创意会议中的表现，使用链接图分析创意特征，发现表现的显著差异，并探讨了链接图开发的过程、价值和挑战。

作者: Ladstaetter, Florian; Plank, Andreas; Hemetsberger, Andrea
摘要: Despite growing literature on social entrepreneurship there is scarce research on how potentially conflicting social and economic objectives manifest on a micro-level and affect everyday management of social enterprises. Applying a strategy as practice perspective we identify sources of, and responses to, temporary and complete breakdowns in Die Backerei, a social enterprise that epitomizes bricolage behaviour. We find that diverging interpretations of the organization's identity eventually result in diverging standards for evaluating performance and lead to breakdowns. We discuss why bricolage is both a source of and a solution to temporary breakdowns and show how practitioners mobilize the hybrid organizational identity as an additional and equally important practice to respond to temporary breakdowns. Furthermore, in the circumstance of complete breakdown the social enterprise has to engage in identity work finding a new situational balance between its social and economic objectives and competing logics. Finally, we show how breakdowns lead to an extension of the social enterprise's repertoire and discuss how the combination of the social mission and bricolage behaviour enables the organization to eschew path dependency, mobilize alternative resources, and build improvisational strategy.
标题: The merits and limits of making do: bricolage and breakdowns in a social enterprise
标题翻译: 做法的优缺点：社会企业中的拼凑与故障
摘要翻译: 尽管社会创业的相关文献日益增多，但关于潜在的社会与经济目标相冲突如何在微观层面上体现并影响社会企业日常管理的研究仍然稀缺。通过应用实践作为策略的视角，我们识别了Die Backerei这家典型体现临时性行为的社会企业中，暂时性和完全性崩溃的来源和应对方式。我们发现，组织身份的不同解读最终导致了评估绩效的标准相 diverge，从而引发崩溃。我们讨论了为什么临时性行为既是暂时崩溃的源头也是解决方案，并展示了从业者如何动员混合组织身份作为应对暂时崩溃的额外且同样重要的实践。此外，在完全崩溃的情况下，社会企业必须进行身份工作，寻找其社会与经济目标及竞争逻辑之间的新情境平衡。最后，我们表明崩溃会导致社会企业的技能库扩展，并讨论社会使命与临时性行为的结合如何使组织避免路径依赖，动员替代资源并建立即兴策略。
摘要总结: Ladstaetter等（2018）通过对社会企业Die Backerei的案例研究，运用实践策略视角探讨了社会与经济目标冲突如何在微观层面表现及影响管理，发现身份诠释的分歧导致绩效评估标准不一，引发管理危机，并讨论了如何通过灵活性和身份重塑应对这些崩溃。

期刊: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 30TH CHINESE CONTROL AND DECISION CONFERENCE (2018 CCDC)
作者: Zhang, Yining
摘要: This paper presents a harmony search algorithm with opposition-based teaming techniques (HS-OBL) to solve power system. To prevent the HS-OBL algorithm from being trapped into the local optimum effectively, an improved algorithm in this paper integrates the opposition-based learning operation with the improvisation process. After that, pitch adjusting rate (PAR) and harmony memory consideration rate (HMCR) are adjusted by a new adjusting strategy that is designed for dynamic adjustment to further improve the performance of algorithm. The HS-OBL is employed to solve 7units and 14units power system, the numerical results show that the HS-OBL has performed much better than harmony search (HS) algorithm and other improved algorithms that have been reported in recent literature. And the data has shown in table 4.
标题: Improved Harmony Search Algorithm Applied in Power System Economic Load Dispatch
标题翻译: 改进的和谐搜索算法在电力系统经济负荷调度中的应用
摘要翻译: 本文提出了一种基于对立学习技术的和谐搜索算法（HS-OBL）用于解决电力系统问题。为有效防止HS-OBL算法陷入局部最优，本文改进算法将对立学习操作与即兴过程相结合。随后，通过一种针对动态调整的新调整策略，调整了音调调整率（PAR）和和谐记忆考虑率（HMCR），进一步提高了算法性能。HS-OBL被用于解决7机和14机电力系统，数值结果表明，HS-OBL的性能明显优于和谐搜索（HS）算法和最近文献中报告的其他改进算法。数据见表4。
摘要总结: 张怡宁（2018）提出了一种结合对立学习技术的和谐搜索算法（HS-OBL）来解决电力系统问题，通过动态调整音高调整率和和谐记忆考虑率，研究结果表明HS-OBL在7单位和14单位电力系统上表现优于其他现有算法。

作者: Hatcher, Gillian; Ion, William; Maclachlan, Ross; Marlow, Marion; Simpson, Barbara; Wodehouse, Andrew
摘要: This paper reviews and applies key principles from improvised comedy (improv) to overcome common barriers in effective group ideation, resulting in the formulation and presentation of a new creative idea generation method.
