The emergence of an innovative product design can be compared to the telling of a funny joke: both combine seemingly unconnected ideas in a way that is both surprising and satisfying. Our research expands upon this link between humour and creativity, and operationalizes the improv principles best suited to the conceptual design process. A workshop-based methodology was used to select, develop, and refine the method protocol and facilitation technique. Participant feedback and observations have demonstrated how this approach can expand the solution space to support the generation of bold, innovative ideas. Finally, we present a step-by-step guide for the new design improv method and discuss its potential value in the generation of creative ideas in a group ideation context.
标题: Evolving improvised ideation from humour constructs: A new method for collaborative divergence
标题翻译: 从幽默构建演变的即兴构思：一种新的协作发散方法
摘要翻译: 本文回顾并应用了即兴喜剧（improv）的关键原则，以克服有效团队理念创作中的常见障碍，从而制定并呈现出一种新的创意生成方法。创新产品设计的出现可以与讲述一个有趣的笑话相提并论：两者都以一种既令人惊讶又令人满意的方式将看似不相关的想法结合在一起。我们的研究扩展了幽默与创造力之间的联系，并将最适合概念设计过程的即兴原则具体化。我们采用以工作坊为基础的方法，来选择、发展和完善方法协议和促进技术。参与者的反馈和观察表明，这种方法可以扩展解决方案空间，以支持大胆、创新理念的生成。最后，我们提供了新设计即兴方法的逐步指南，并讨论了其在团队创意生成背景中的潜在价值。
摘要总结: Hatcher等（2018）采用工作坊方法，基于即兴喜剧原理，研究了如何克服小组创意生成中的障碍，提出了一种新颖的创意生成方法。研究表明，利用幽默和即兴原则可以拓展解决方案空间，促进创新思维，并提供了一套系统的设计即兴方法指南。

作者: Bruno, Adriana; Lapsley, Irvine
摘要: Purpose The purpose of this paper is to add to our understanding of the nature of accrual accounting by examining the process involved in its construction, as a dynamic and controversial process. This paper reveals how it is built and constantly modified, reinforced or negated during the process of implementation.Design/methodology/approach This paper's focus on a government initiative with multiple actors present in the laboratory. Specifically, this study offers a close examination of the day-to-day activities of a laboratory case study; it focuses on participant observation in video conference calls. The discussions held by the project teams are analyzed to extend our inquiry into the most intimate aspects of fact construction (Latour and Woolgar, 1979). These excerpts illustrate the processes of accrual accounting construction and open up the possibility of studying the emergence of accrual accounting through the lens of an action net.Findings The evidence collected reveals the absence of a well-defined template for implementing accrual accounting in government. These results reveal an elaborate process of improvisation and fabrication in the design of this accounting system and a fragile network in action.Originality/value Prior research on accrual accounting in government focuses on the examination of existing accrual accounting systems with somewhat puzzling results on lack of use. In this study, the perspective has been shifted from focusing on accrual accounting as self-evident (Lapsley et al., 2009) to examine its construction. This paper examines this tension between the apparent certainties as espoused by practitioners and the problematic nature of accrual accounting in government. It extends our knowledge of black box accrual accounting, and shows that it is a fluid object with significant discretion in the determination of practice.
标题: The emergence of an accounting practice: The fabrication of a government accrual accounting system
标题翻译: 会计实践的出现：政府权责发生制会计系统的构建
摘要翻译: 目的 本文旨在通过考察应计会计构建过程中涉及的动态和有争议的过程，来增进我们对应计会计本质的理解。本文揭示了应计会计是如何在实施过程中构建、不断修改、加强或否定的。设计/方法论/方法 本文重点关注一个涉及多个参与者的政府倡议，具体而言，提供了对一个实验室案例研究的日常活动的仔细审视；重点关注视频会议通话中的参与观察。分析项目团队的讨论，以扩展我们对事实构建最亲密方面的探究（Latour和Woolgar，1979）。这些摘录展示了应计会计构建的过程，并为通过行动网络的视角研究应计会计的出现打开了可能性。发现 收集到的证据揭示了在政府实施应计会计时缺乏明确的模板。这些结果显示了这一会计系统设计中的复杂即兴创作与构建过程，以及正在运作的脆弱网络。原创性/价值 以往关于政府中应计会计的研究集中在对现有应计会计系统的审查上，其结果令人困惑，表明使用情况差。在本研究中，视角转变为从将应计会计视为不言自明（Lapsley等，2009）转向考察其构建。本文考察了实践者所宣扬的明显确定性与政府中应计会计的复杂性之间的张力。扩展了我们对黑箱应计会计的认识，并展示了它作为一个流动对象在实践决定中具有重要的自由裁量权。
摘要总结: 布鲁诺和拉普斯利（2018）通过对政府中多个参与者的动态观察，揭示了权责会计构建过程的复杂性，结果显示缺乏统一的实施模板，强调了这一制度设计中即兴与构建的脆弱网络，丰富了对权责会计流动性的理解。

期刊: INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY FOR INTELLIGENT SYSTEMS (ICTIS 2017) - VOL 2
作者: Thakar, Bhavik; Parekh, Chandresh
摘要: Grown internet usage by individual and industries have also increased the attack vector in cyberspace rapidly. Botnet is a digital weapon used by attackers to commit cybercrime in stealthiest way for all type of illegal online activity. Botnet is well articulated attack responsible for many malicious activities in large volume and mass effective against any targeted organization such as confidential data theft, financial loss, distribution of pirated products, e-business extortion and network or service disruption. Because of its global nature of infection and innovative covert techniques of malware development to evade detection, it is also known as advance persistent threat. An analysis of this APT revealed the advancement in sophistication of bot malware by encryption methods, concealed network connections and silent escape as an effective tool for profit-motivated e-crime. Reverse engineering is procedure to analyze malware to classify its type, hazard, impact on machine, information outflow and removal of signature technique. Botnet (APT) detection needs improvised process to identify the channel, architecture and encryption weakness. In bot examination; Programming style, network protocol and behavior analysis can mitigate the APT by creating signature, prototype of behavior based approach and elimination of C&C servers. Reverse engineering is excellent way for defense the modern botnets to immune valuable information by identifying the evidence behavior, log collection and digital forensics. The main aim of study is to determine the most adequate approach to recreate a botnet incident. Network security is prime concern to avoid state sponsored attacks like botnet so security of digital nation and e-governance can be assured.
标题: Reverse Engineering of Botnet (APT)
标题翻译: 僵尸网络（APT）的逆向工程
摘要翻译: 个人和行业的互联网使用增长也迅速增加了网络空间中的攻击向量。僵尸网络是一种数字武器，攻击者利用它以最隐蔽的方式进行网络犯罪，涉及所有类型的非法在线活动。僵尸网络是高度组织化的攻击，负责许多大规模的恶意活动，对任何目标组织造成影响，包括机密数据盗窃、财务损失、盗版产品传播、电子商务敲诈和网络或服务中断。由于其全球感染的特性和创新隐蔽的恶意软件开发技术以逃避检测，它也被称为高级持续性威胁（APT）。对这种APT的分析揭示了僵尸恶意软件在加密方法、隐蔽网络连接和静默逃逸等方面的复杂性提升，成为以利润为动机的电子犯罪的有效工具。逆向工程是一种分析恶意软件以分类其类型、危害、对机器的影响、信息外泄和去除特征技术的过程。僵尸网络（APT）检测需要改进的过程，以识别通道、架构和加密弱点。在对僵尸网络的检查中，程序风格、网络协议和行为分析可以通过创建特征、基于行为的原型方法以及消除指挥与控制服务器来减轻APT。逆向工程是防御现代僵尸网络的优秀方法，通过识别证据行为、日志收集和数字取证来保护有价值的信息。本研究的主要目的是确定重现僵尸网络事件的最适当方法。网络安全是首要关注点，以避免国家赞助的攻击如僵尸网络，从而确保数字国家和电子治理的安全。
摘要总结: Thakar和Parekh（2018）通过分析恶意软件和网络安全，强调反向工程在识别和对抗高级持续威胁中的重要性。研究发现，通过行为分析和网络协议评估，能够有效检测和防御复杂的僵尸网络攻击，确保数字国家的安全和电子治理。

作者: Ortmann, Guenther; Sydow, Joerg
摘要: According to Friedrich Nietzsche, artists impose restrictions on themselves to encourage creativity and even have a way of making things difficult - imposing new constraints on themselves within which they have to dance. At least in the arts, it is difficulty rather than ease which promotes creativity in accordance with this view. This goes beyond the well-known idea of rules and other structures not only restricting but also enabling creativity; it also goes beyond insight into the creativity-enhancing effects of constraints, as recently emphasized in organization studies. Nietzsche adds three dimensions to this dialectic: time and the process of dancing inspired and encouraged by constraints; the opposition of old and new constraints; and the quality of intended, stimulating self-binding. We see this as an opportunity to explore the inspiring potential of Nietzsche's piece about arts, Dancing in chains, when it comes to the different realm of creative practices and creativity in and of organizations. Such an exploration can obviously not aim to offer recipes of how to bring about valuable novelty, but simply intends to identify pertinent themes, issues and questions for organization studies - topics and aspects brought into a new or sharper light when looked at from Nietzsche's perspective and that of some other philosophers, including Jon Elster's analyses of constraints in general and of the complications of self-binding in order to promote creativity in particular. Also, we consider Michel de Certeau's silent production and Martha Feldman's improvisational routines as being cases of dancing in chains.
标题: Dancing in chains: Creative practices in/of organizations
标题翻译: 在桎梏中舞蹈：组织中的创造性实践
摘要翻译: 根据弗里德里希·尼采的观点，艺术家通过自我设限来激励创造力，甚至会故意设置困难——在这些新约束下进行创作。在艺术领域，根据这一观点，促进创造力的是困难而非容易。这超越了众所周知的观点，即规则和其他结构不仅限制还支持创造力；这也超越了对约束提升创造力效果的洞察，正如近期在组织研究中所强调的。尼采为这种辩证关系增加了三个维度：时间与受到约束激发和鼓励的舞蹈过程；旧约束与新约束的对立；以及有意刺激的自我约束的质量。我们视此为一个机会，去探索尼采关于艺术的作品《在锁链中舞蹈》的启发潜力，尤其是在创造性实践和组织内外的创造力的不同领域中。这种探索显然不能旨在提供实现有价值的新颖性的处方，而只是希望识别出适合组织研究的相关主题、问题和疑问——这些主题和方面在从尼采及其他一些哲学家，包括乔恩·埃尔斯特关于约束的一般分析以及特别促进创造力的自我约束复杂性的视角来看时，将以新的或更清晰的视角呈现。此外，我们认为米歇尔·德·塞尔托的无声生产和玛莎·费尔德曼的即兴演奏规律也可以视为“在锁链中舞蹈”的案例。
摘要总结: Ortmann和Sydow（2018）通过探讨尼采的艺术观，分析了约束在创意实践中的启发作用，结合组织研究，提出了时间、旧新约束及自我约束的三维关系，旨在识别相关主题和问题，丰富组织研究的视角。

期刊: IEEE 5TH INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM ON EMERGING TRENDS AND TECHNOLOGIES IN LIBRARIES AND INFORMATION SERVICES (ETTLIS 2018)
作者: Dwivedi, Alka
摘要: During this Information age we witness an ever increasing use of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) in education space. The present paper describes how a University attempted to digitize its teaching and learning processes. It improvised and strengthened its already available IT infrastructure in order to support e-learning. Dedicated teams were formed and trained to develop small learning modules in house for certain subjects. These modules were then made available to a few batches of undergraduate and post graduate students pursuing engineering and management courses. These online modules were delivered in addition to the face-to-face lectures by the faculty members teaching those seven subjects. This exercise was run for two semesters and continuous feedback was taken from the students and the instructors. This paper documents the important learnings from this experiment along with the challenges faced and critical success factors identified in the process.
标题: Digitizing Academic Delivery in Higher Education Issues and Challenges
标题翻译: 高等教育中的数字化学术传递：问题与挑战
摘要翻译: 在信息时代，我们见证了信息与通信技术（ICT）在教育领域的日益广泛应用。本文描述了一所大学如何尝试数字化其教学和学习过程。该大学对其已有的信息技术基础设施进行了改进和增强，以支持电子学习。特定的团队被组建并接受培训，以便为某些学科开发小型学习模块。这些模块随后向几批攻读工程和管理课程的本科生和研究生开放。这些在线模块是在教师授课的七门课程的面对面讲座基础上提供的。该项目运行了两个学期，并不断向学生和教师征求反馈。本文记录了该实验的重要经验教训，以及在此过程中面临的挑战和确定的关键成功因素。
摘要总结: Dwivedi (2018) 通过对一所大学两学期的数字化教学过程进行观察，结合学生和教师的反馈，探讨了ICT在教育中的应用，并总结了项目中的学习经验、面临的挑战及成功关键因素。

作者: Secchi, Enrico; Roth, Aleda; Verma, Rohit
摘要: This study formally develops and empirically tests a new construct, termed service improvisation competence (Serv-IC), that constitutes a novel way to improve customer experience in high-contact service contexts. Serv-IC is operationalized as the systemic ability of a service firm's employees to deviate from established service delivery processes and routines to respond in a timely manner to unforeseen events using available resources. Serv-IC is a realized operational competence resulting from a deliberate set of service design choices consistent with a firm's service concept. The construct embodies a multidisciplinary perspective that explains, in part, how some firms can systemically use employee improvisation to align service processes and employee behaviors in the presence of customer-induced uncertainty. As a first, theory-building step we follow a rigorous, two-stage approach to develop a reliable and valid multi-item measurement scale for Serv-IC, emphasizing discriminant validity with related concepts. We then introduce a set of experientially based service design choices that constitute a Serv-IC deployment strategy. Finally, we investigate its effect on customer satisfaction. Our empirical results show that Serv-IC can play an important role in satisfying customers within certain boundaries. Counter to conventional wisdom, Serv-IC increases customer satisfaction in lower-tier hotels more than in upscale ones.
标题: The Impact of Service Improvisation Competence on Customer Satisfaction: Evidence from the Hospitality Industry
标题翻译: 服务即兴能力对顾客满意度的影响：来自酒店行业的证据
摘要翻译: 本研究正式发展并实证检验了一种新的构念，称为服务即兴能力（Serv-IC），这是一种改善高接触服务环境中客户体验的新方式。Serv-IC被操作化为服务公司员工偏离既定服务交付流程和常规的系统能力，以便及时回应不可预见的事件，利用可用资源。Serv-IC是一种已实现的操作能力，来自于一系列与企业服务概念一致的有意服务设计选择。该构念体现了一种多学科视角，部分解释了为何有些公司能够系统性地利用员工的即兴表现，在客户引发的不确定性面前协调服务流程和员工行为。作为理论构建的第一步，我们采用严格的两阶段方法开发了一个可靠且有效的多项测量尺度用于Serv-IC，强调与相关概念的区分效度。随后，我们介绍了一系列基于经验的服务设计选择，这些选择构成了Serv-IC的部署策略。最后，我们研究了其对客户满意度的影响。我们的实证结果表明，Serv-IC在一定范围内可以在满足客户方面发挥重要作用。与传统观点相反，Serv-IC在低档酒店中对客户满意度的提升效果超过高档酒店。
摘要总结: Secchi等（2019）通过两阶段方法开发并验证了服务即兴能力（Serv-IC），强调其在高接触服务中提高客户体验的作用。研究表明，Serv-IC通过员工即兴反应提升了客户满意度，尤其是在低档酒店中，其效果超过高档酒店。这为服务设计提供了实践策略。

作者: Benic, Bozo; Zunic, Alen
摘要: The military resort in Kupari has never been thoroughly and systematically researched or analyzed. However, it was one of the first areas on a wider territory of Zupa Dubrovacka where tourism activity began in the early 20th century. The area encompasses two spatial entities - the Kupari valley with catering and tourist facilities severely damaged during the war and postwar period in the late 20th and the early 21st century and a separate residential zone with two villas and a hotel still administered by the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Croatia.The Kupari valley is well known for its brick and tile manufacturing tradition dating from the period of Dubrovnik Republic. In the early 20th century it was the site of a large production facility - the steam-powered ceramic tile factory later purchased by the Czech entrepreneurs who were willing to invest into this attractive tourist area around Dubrovnik. In 1920 works started. The old brick factory was reconstructed and repurposed and the first hotels were put up - the boarding house Kupari (Hotel Strand), the annex Granda and Grand Hotel. The former industrial zone was thus transformed into an elite seaside resort with the biggest number of tourist beds in the entire Dubrovnik region until the beginning of World War Two. In the post-war years, the Czech owners set out to renovate their hotels but they left after the nationalization process. In 1949 the site was transformed into a resort for military personnel and their families.The analysis of the preserved archive documents (spatial - planning and design) drawn up after nationalization, indicates that in the second half of the 20th century the newly-formed military resort was systematically planned, built up and modernized in accordance with the new tourist trends and market needs. Four phases of spatial development and construction have been identified: 1) 1958-1964 (first major modernization), 2) 1966-1968 (building up a separate residential zone), 3) 1972-1980 (second major modernization), 4) 1981-1991 (maintenance of the existing buildings).The first unrealized urban planning concept, that envisaged a thorough spatial reconstruction, was drawn up as early as 1949. However, the first major modernization started with David Finci, the architect from Sarajevo. Finci, an employee in the Civil service of the Sarajevo military district, worked out a Feasibility study for the construction of the Military resort Plavi Jadran in Kupari with the accompanying urban planning solution and architectural design as well as the preliminary designs for seven buildings. He provided a detailed elaboration of the site and set out guidelines for future construction. Although his study was adopted at first, it was later altered and considerably reduced. Following the final urban planning solution, Finci built two hotels in Kupari: Hotel Gorica (Goricina) in 1962 with a cafe and a lounge bar and Hotel Pelegrin in 1963 which was at the time the biggest hotel on the Adriatic coast in terms of size and capacity. In 1964, the construction of the third Finci's hotel started right near the entrance to the resort but the works were stopped and the hotel has never been built. With the Hotel Galeb designed by Milorad Petijevic and Katarina Divovic from Herceg Novi, a separate (enclosed) residential area began to form in 1966 on a small promontory southwest of the Kupari valley. Two years later, two villas were built near the hotel according to Finci's elaborate design. They were Finci's last realizations in Kupari. Tourism development throughout the following years entailed further intervention. Consequently, the second large-scale modernization was undertaken in 1972 with a series of planning attempts aimed at defining the overall layout of the resort. Until 1980 some old hotels were demolished while others were reconstructed and rehabilitated in accordance with the new tourist requirements.Service provision was changed partly due to the construction of two new hotels with social facilities. In 1976 the Hotel Kupari was built according to the design of Vladimir Zaharovic, Nikola Neskovic and Sulejman Midzic. Finci's cafe and the lounge bar were demolished and replaced in 1980 by the Hotel Goricina II designed by Ante Rozic. Together with a reconstructed Gorica hotel, it forms a unique functional and organizational entity.No further hotel construction took place in the following decades. The existing buildings were regularly maintained. The change of the social and political system in 1991 brought about the change of the ownership model. As a result, the catering and tourist complex was taken over by the Croatian Armed Forces. In the same year the war in Dubrovnik region broke out. The military resort in Kupari, the Kupari valley, and the separate residential zone suffered severe damage due to heavy bombardments. In the first post-war years the Support Command of the Military Armed Forces undertook partial adaptation and rehabilitation of the hotels Grand, Gorica and Pelegrin to meet the accommodation needs of their officers as well as some other military needs.However, soon after the army left in the early 2000, the hotels remained unprotected and exposed to further uncontrolled devastation and robbery. Only the separate residential zone has remained under military control and is still functioning. However, occasional repairs and constant minor changes and improvised interventions in the Hotel Galeb and two residential villas threaten to further degrade the architectural integrity of the complex. The former military resort in Kupari is an exceptional integrated spatial entity because no other area as small as this one can boast such a great number of valuable Modernist realizations.This paper presents phased spatial development and construction of the military resort with an urban-planning evaluation of the accommodation facilities built between 1962 and 1980 which have greatly contributed to the spatial and functional transformation of the area called Zupa Dubrovacka as well as to its later transformation into a thriving tourist destination. Future studies may provide a useful basis for the protection and preservation of the built heritage as unique contribution to the development of architecture in Dubrovnik region.
标题: TOURIST COMPLEX OF THE FORMER MILITARY RESORT IN KUPARI SPATIAL DEVELOPMENT AND URBAN PLANNING FEATURES
标题翻译: 库帕里前军事度假区旅游综合体的空间发展与城市规划特征
摘要翻译:
库帕里军事度假区从未经过彻底和系统的研究或分析。然而，它是杜布罗夫尼克地区较大范围内，20世纪初旅游活动开始的最早区域之一。该地区包括两个空间实体——库帕里谷，拥有在20世纪末和21世纪初战争和战后时期遭严重损坏的餐饮和旅游设施，以及一个独立的住宅区域，内有两座别墅和一座仍由克罗地亚国防部管理的酒店。库帕里谷因其追溯至杜布罗尼克共和国时期的砖瓦制造传统而闻名。20世纪初，这里曾是一个大型生产设施的所在地——蒸汽驱动的陶瓷瓦工厂，后来被愿意投资于这个吸引人的杜布罗尼克旅游区的捷克企业家收购。1920年，工程开始进行。旧砖厂进行了重建和改造，并建起了第一批酒店——库帕里旅馆（斯特兰德酒店）、格兰达附楼和大酒店。昔日的工业区因此转变为一个精英海滨度假区，直到二战前，它在整个杜布罗尼克地区拥有最多的旅游床位。在战后 years，捷克业主着手翻新他们的酒店，但在国有化进程后离开。1949年，该地被改建为军人及其家属的度假区。

对战后国有化后保存的档案文件（空间规划和设计）的分析表明，20世纪下半叶，新成立的军事度假区是根据新的旅游趋势和市场需求系统地规划、建造和现代化的。空间发展和建设分为四个阶段：1）1958-1964年（第一次重大现代化），2）1966-1968年（建设独立住宅区），3）1972-1980年（第二次重大现代化），4）1981-1991年（现有建筑的维护）。第一个未实现的城市规划概念，设想进行彻底的空间重建，早在1949年就已经制定。然而，第一次重大现代化是在来自萨拉热窝的建筑师大卫·芬奇（David Finci）的领导下开始的。芬奇作为萨拉热窝军事区的公职员工，为库帕里军事度假区的建设制定了可行性研究，附带城市规划解决方案和建筑设计，以及七座建筑的初步设计。他提供了该地点的详细论述，并为未来的建设设定了指导方针。尽管他的研究最初得到了采用，但后来被修改并大幅度缩减。在最终的城市规划解决方案完成后，芬奇在库帕里建造了两家酒店：1962年的戈里察酒店（Goricina），配有咖啡馆和休息酒吧以及1963年的佩莱格林酒店，当时是亚得里亚海沿岸规模和容量最大的酒店。1964年，芬奇第三家酒店在度假区入口附近动工，但工程被停止，该酒店从未建成。1966年，米洛拉德·佩季耶维奇（Milorad Petijevic）和卡塔里娜·狄沃维奇（Katarina Divovic）设计的盖尔酒店（Hotel Galeb）使得在库帕里谷西南的小海岬上开始形成一个独立（封闭）的住宅区。两年后，根据芬奇的详细设计，酒店附近建造了两座别墅。这是芬奇在库帕里的最后实现。接下来的几年中，旅游业的发展还需要进一步的干预。因此，在1972年进行了第二次大规模现代化，进行了一系列旨在界定度假区总体布局的规划尝试。到1980年，一些旧酒店被拆除，另一些则根据新的旅游要求进行了改造和修复。

服务提供部分发生了变化，部分原因是新建了两家社会设施型酒店。1976年，库帕里酒店根据弗拉基米尔·扎哈罗维奇（Vladimir Zaharovic）、尼古拉·内斯科维奇（Nikola Neskovic）和苏莱曼·米季奇（Sulejman Midzic）的设计建成。芬奇的咖啡馆和休息酒吧于1980年被安特·罗兹奇（Ante Rozic）设计的戈里奇纳二世酒店（Hotel Goricina II）取代。再加上重建的戈里察酒店，形成了一个独特的功能和组织实体。在随后的几十年中未再进行酒店建设。现有建筑得到了定期维护。1991年社会政治体系的变革带来了所有权模式的变化。因此，餐饮和旅游综合体被克罗地亚武装部队接管。同年，杜布罗尼克地区爆发了战争。库帕里军事度假区、库帕里谷以及独立住宅区遭受了严重损坏，原因是猛烈的轰炸。在战后的头几年中，武装部队支持指挥部进行了部分适应和修复，以满足他们的军官住宿需求及其他一些军事需求。然而，在2000年初军队撤离后，这些酒店就未得到保护，遭受了进一步无法控制的破坏和抢劫。只有独立的住宅区仍然处于军事控制之下，并且仍在运作。然而，偶尔的修理以及在盖尔酒店和两座住宅别墅中不断的小改动和临时干预，不断威胁着该综合体的建筑完整性。前库帕里军事度假区是一个独特的综合空间实体，因为没有其他如此小的区域能拥有如此数量的有价值的现代主义实现。

本文呈现了军事度假区的分阶段空间发展与建设，以及1962年至1980年期间建立的住宿设施的城市规划评估，这些设施极大促进了称为杜布罗尼克地区的空间和功能转型，以及其后转变为一个繁荣的旅游目的地。未来的研究可能为保护和保存这一建筑遗产提供有用的基础，作为对杜布罗尼克地区建筑发展的独特贡献。
摘要总结: Benic和Zunic（2019）通过分析战后以及国家化后的档案文件，研究了Kupari军事度假区的空间发展与建筑历程，发现其经历了四个主要现代化阶段，形成了独特的现代主义建筑群，并对未来文物保护提出了建议。

作者: Andersson, Thomas; Caker, Mikael; Tengblad, Stefan; Wickelgren, Mikael
摘要: This paper describes and explains how balancing organizational structures can build traits for organizational resilience. Organizational resilience is a holistic and complex concept. In this paper, we move beyond focusing on sudden and disruptive events in favour of anticipating the unexpected in daily organizing. Organizational resilience is understood here as building traits of risk awareness, preference for cooperation, agility and improvisation and is analysed by means of a longitudinal qualitative case study. The paper contributes to the field by showing how balancing organizational structures can foster organizational resilience traits. We show that power distribution and normative control can create preparedness for unexpected events and foster action orientation at the same time as supporting organizational alignment.
标题: Building traits for organizational resilience through balancing organizational structures
标题翻译: 通过平衡组织结构构建组织韧性特征
摘要翻译: 本文描述并解释了平衡组织结构如何培养组织韧性的特征。组织韧性是一个整体且复杂的概念。在本文中，我们超越了对突发和破坏性事件的关注，转而anticipate日常组织中的意外情况。组织韧性在这里被理解为培养风险意识、合作偏好、敏捷性和即兴应变的特征，并通过纵向定性案例研究进行分析。本文通过展示如何平衡组织结构可以促进组织韧性特征，为该领域做出了贡献。我们表明，权力分配和规范控制可以同时为意外事件的应对创造准备，并促进行动导向，同时支持组织的一致性。
摘要总结: 安德森等（2019）通过纵向定性案例研究探讨了平衡组织结构如何培养组织韧性特征，发现风险意识、合作偏好、敏捷性和即兴能力的增强可以提高对不可预见事件的准备，同时促进组织的一致性和行动导向。

作者: Pandey, Manish; Kumari, Nikita; Nagamatsu, Shuichi; Pandey, Shyam S.
摘要: Solution processable conjugated polymers (CPs) possess unique molecular structures in terms of extended pi-conjugation in combination with quasi 1-dimensionality, imparting them with an inherent tendency for molecular self-assembly and ultimately determining their optoelectronic properties. Short-range molecular ordering and long-range macroscopic orientation are two different but interdependent phenomena, which should be optimized depending on the nature of electronic devices (planar versus vertical). Judicious control of the macromolecular orientations and conformation-assisted morphologies of CPs are key for determining and controlling the anisotropic charge transport in organic field effect transistors (OFETs). The present review focuses on different solution-based approaches for thin film fabrication developed in the last two decades aimed towards controlling the film morphologies and macroscopic orientations of CPs. It summarizes the information for understanding the various techniques utilized for controlling the molecular ordering and macroscopic orientation in CP thin films in order to correlate device performance and anisotropic charge transport in OFETs. Systematic organization of topics and critical analysis of progress and improvisations are included, along with current state-of-the-art approaches for each technique being discussed in detail. Apart from commentary on the pros and cons of various techniques, this review summarizes the future directions necessary for further development in the area of next-generation flexible electronics.
标题: Recent advances in the orientation of conjugated polymers for organic field-effect transistors
标题翻译: 共轭聚合物在有机场效应晶体管中的取向最近进展
摘要翻译: 可溶性共轭聚合物（CPs）具有独特的分子结构，结合了扩展的π-共轭和准一维特性，使其具备分子自组装的内在倾向，并最终决定其光电性能。短程分子有序性和长程宏观取向是两种不同但相互依赖的现象，应根据电子器件的特性（平面与垂直）进行优化。对高分子取向和构象辅助形态的合理控制是决定和控制有机场效应晶体管（OFETs）中各向异性电荷输运的关键。本文综述了过去二十年中为控制CP薄膜形态和宏观取向而发展的不同基于溶液的方法。总结了各种用于控制CP薄膜中的分子有序性和宏观取向的技术信息，以关联器件性能和OFETs中的各向异性电荷输运。文中系统整理了主题并对进展和改进进行了批判性分析，同时详细讨论了各技术的当前最先进方法。除了对各种技术的优缺点进行评述外，本文还总结了下一代柔性电子领域进一步发展的必要未来方向。
摘要总结: Pandey et al. (2019) 回顾了过去二十年间基于溶液的薄膜制备方法，探讨了控制聚合物的分子序列和宏观取向对有机场效应晶体管（OFETs）中的各向异性电荷迁移的重要性，提供了不同技术的优缺点及未来发展的建议。

期刊: JOURNAL OF CONSTRUCTION ENGINEERING AND MANAGEMENT
作者: Hacker, Miriam E.; Kaminsky, Jessica; Faust, Kasey M.
摘要: In 2015, 28 European countries cumulatively received over two million applications for asylum, almost three times more than in the previous year. This resulted in pre-existing accommodation facilities reaching capacity and requiring the provision of urban emergency accommodations in unconventional buildings. To meet this housing need, ad hoc task forces across multiple disciplines formed to mitigate the extreme uncertainty of providing infrastructure services in a short period of time. The involvement of water and wastewater utilities in this technical project was explored through employee perspectives from two German water and wastewater utilities using qualitative analysis techniques. Ethnographic interviews were iteratively coded for excerpts legitimizing the interviewee's involvement in providing water or wastewater services for emergency accommodations. Results show three emergent themes from utility employees: the necessity of improvisation during the design process, confidence in the situational response by individuals and the utility, and the necessity for improved coordination with other actors in the synthetic organization. In addition, this work provides a theoretical framework for the technical application of organizational legitimacy theory in the circumstances of extreme contextual uncertainty. Practical implications of this work suggest utility monitoring of emergency accommodations for improved design and better protocols for coordinating with other actors. (C) 2019 American Society of Civil Engineers.
标题: Legitimizing Involvement in Emergency Accommodations: Water and Wastewater Utility Perspectives
标题翻译: 合法化参与应急住宿：水务和废水公用事业的观点
摘要翻译: 在2015年，28个欧洲国家累计接收了超过两百万份庇护申请，几乎是前一年的三倍。这导致现有的住宿设施达到承载能力，迫切需要在非常规建筑中提供城市应急住宿。为满足这一住房需求，跨多个学科的特设工作组应运而生，旨在缓解在短时间内提供基础设施服务的极端不确定性。通过对两家德国水务和污水处理公司的员工视角进行定性分析，探索了水务和污水公用事业在这一技术项目中的参与。通过对民族志访谈进行迭代编码，提取出为应急住宿提供水或污水服务的受访者参与合法性的片段。结果显示，公用事业员工提出了三个新兴主题：设计过程中的即兴发挥的必要性、个体和公用事业在情境响应中的信心，以及与合成组织中其他参与者改善协调的必要性。此外，本研究为在极端情境不确定性下组织合法性理论的技术应用提供了理论框架。此项工作的实际意义在于建议公用事业对应急住宿的监控，以改善设计并优化与其他参与者协调的协议。
摘要总结: Hacker等（2019）通过对两家德国水务和废水公用事业员工的质性分析，探讨了应急安置中的基础设施服务提供。研究发现员工在设计过程中需要即兴发挥、对应对能力有信心，并强调与其他参与者协调的重要性，提出了改进设计和协调协议的建议。

期刊: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF MANAGING PROJECTS IN BUSINESS
作者: Nachbagauer, Andreas G. M.; Schirl-Boeck, Iris
摘要: Purpose Risk management and uncertainty in megaprojects is a flourishing topic in project management, while the unexpected is still a neglected matter. The purpose of this paper is to offer conceptual clarifications of the unexpected based on second-order-cybernetics and systems theory. While transferring findings from organisation theory to project management, the article provides fresh insights into managing the unexpected in megaprojects. Design/methodology/approach Being grounded on constructionism and systems theory, the conceptual paper explores selected research approaches from organisation theory: research on high-reliability organising, organisational resilience and organisational improvising, on contributions to managing the unexpected in megaprojects. Using the framework of meaning i.e. the factual, social and temporal dimensions, challenges of handling the unexpected are analysed and (effects of) decision-making structures for such projects are defined. Findings This paper argues that classic project management, while neglecting the fundamental distinction between risk, uncertainty and the unexpected, sticks to a planning-and-controlling approach. But the unexpected cannot be planned; however, organisations and managers can prepare for the unexpected. This requests a balance between structure and self-organisation in planning, communication, hierarchy and organisational culture. Understanding the contradictions inherent in managing megaprojects allows for smart decision-making when riding the waves of resilience. Originality/value The study adds to the literature on complexity and uncertainty in project management by enhancing the view to include the unexpected. While rejecting the universal applicability of rationality-based risk and controlling conceptions, shifting to second-order cybernetics and integrating elements of resilient organising increases the understanding of handling the unexpected in megaprojects.
标题: Managing the unexpected in megaprojects: riding the waves of resilience
标题翻译: 在巨型项目中管理意外：驾驭韧性的浪潮
摘要翻译: 目的 风险管理和重大项目中的不确定性是项目管理中的一个蓬勃发展的话题，而意外事件仍然是一个被忽视的问题。本文的目的是基于二阶控制论和系统理论对意外事件提供概念上的澄清。在将组织理论的研究成果转移到项目管理的过程中，本文为管理重大项目中的意外事件提供了新的见解。 设计/方法论/途径 本文基于建构主义和系统理论，探讨了组织理论中的一些研究方法，包括高可靠性组织、组织韧性和组织即兴创作，探讨它们对管理重大项目中的意外事件的贡献。通过使用意义框架，即事实、社会和时间维度，分析了处理意外事件的挑战，并定义了相应项目的决策结构（及其效果）。 研究结果 本文认为，传统的项目管理虽然忽视了风险、不确定性和意外事件之间的基本区别，但仍然坚持计划和控制的方法。然而，意外事件无法被规划；但是，组织和管理者可以为意外事件做好准备。这要求在规划、沟通、层级和组织文化中实现结构与自我组织之间的平衡。理解管理重大项目中固有的矛盾，可以在应对韧性的浪潮时促成明智的决策。 原创性/价值 本研究通过拓宽视角以纳入意外事件，丰富了项目管理中关于复杂性和不确定性的文献。在拒绝基于理性的风险和控制观念的普适适用性的同时，转向二阶控制论并整合韧性组织的元素，增加了对处理重大项目中意外事件的理解。
摘要总结: Nachbagauer和Schirl-Boeck（2019）基于第二序网络理论和系统理论，探讨了在大型项目中应对意外事件的管理，强调了组织韧性与自我组织的平衡，指出传统项目管理在处理不确定性时存在不足，为应对意外提供了新视角。

期刊: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF MANAGING PROJECTS IN BUSINESS
作者: Sailer, Patrick
摘要: Purpose Ambidexterity has been shown to contribute to project performance. Recent studies of ambidexterity on the project level focus on multilevel knowledge resources, individual actions and structural ambidexterity. However, the role of project management methods remains unclear. This is surprising because project management methods are broadly disseminated as standards. The purpose of this paper is to theorize how project management methods affect ambidexterity on the project level. Design/methodology/approach It is demonstrated how routine theory adds to a better theoretical conceptualization and understanding of project management methods. The analysis of this paper contains, first, the reconstruction of the contribution of each action in Scrum to either exploitation or exploration and, second, the discussion of roles in Scrum. To conclude, a big picture of what ambidexterity in projects can look like is developed. Findings The main findings suggest that Scrum facilitates sequential and contextual ambidexterity by producing a pattern of alternating exploitation and exploration actions and by assigning specific roles. Originality/value First, the present paper contributes an analysis of the underlying micro-mechanisms of sequential and contextual ambidexterity in projects. Second, it informs practitioners on what aspects of project management methods they should pay attention to.
标题: Project management methods as a way to ambidexterity
标题翻译: 项目管理方法作为双手灵活性的途径
摘要翻译: 目的：双能性已被证明有助于项目绩效。近期关于项目层面双能性的研究集中在多层次知识资源、个人行为和结构性双能性。然而，项目管理方法的作用仍然不明确。这令人惊讶，因为项目管理方法作为标准被广泛传播。本文的目的是理论化项目管理方法如何影响项目层面的双能性。设计/方法论/方法：展示了常规理论如何增强对项目管理方法的更好理论概念化和理解。本文的分析包括：首先，重建Scrum中每个行动对开发或探索的贡献；其次，讨论Scrum中的角色。最后，形成关于项目中双能性可能呈现的整体概念。发现：主要发现表明，Scrum通过产生交替的开发和探索行动模式以及分配特定角色，促进了顺序和情境双能性。原创性/价值：首先，本文贡献了对项目中顺序和情境双能性基础微观机制的分析。其次，它向从业者提供了关于项目管理方法应关注哪些方面的信息。
摘要总结: Sailer（2019）通过对Scrum方法的研究，探讨项目管理方法如何影响项目层面的双面性，分析了Scrum中的行动如何促进顺序和情境性双面性，提出了对项目管理实践的建议，丰富了双面性微观机制的理解。

作者: Zhang Yazhen; Xiong Wenfei; Pei Yaqiong; Li Yan; Li Bin; Wang Ling
摘要: In this experiment,peanut protein isolate (PPI) nanoparticles were prepared and used to stabilize Pickering emulsion.The effects of salt ions on the transmittance (solubility),surface zeta potential of PPI nanoparticles solution and on the properties of Pickering emulsion stabilized with PPI nanoparticles were investigated.The results manifested that when salt ions were added to the solution of PPI nanoparticles,the surface zeta potential decreased,while the solubility lowered firstly and then heightened with the increase of salt concentration.The properties of the Pickering emulsion stabilized with the PPI nanoparticles exhibited that the emulsion had more uniform distribution of particle size and better storage stability with different salt ions.The emulsion particle size increased slightly at different concentrations of NaCl,but it rose significantly at different concentrations of CaCl_2.As a consequence,PPI nanoparticles stabilized-Pickering emulsion has better resistance to NaCl.
标题: Effects of Salt Ions on the Properties of Peanut Protein Isolate Nanoparticles and Pickering Emulsion Stabilized with the Nanoparticles
标题翻译: 盐离子对花生蛋白分离物纳米粒子及其稳定的皮克林乳液性质的影响
摘要翻译: 在本实验中，制备了花生蛋白质分离物（PPI）纳米颗粒，并用于稳定Pickering乳液。研究了盐离子对PPI纳米颗粒溶液的透过率（溶解度）、表面ζ电位以及由PPI纳米颗粒稳定的Pickering乳液性质的影响。结果表明，当盐离子加入PPI纳米颗粒溶液时，表面ζ电位降低，而溶解度在盐浓度增加时先降低后升高。由PPI纳米颗粒稳定的Pickering乳液的性质显示，在不同盐离子的情况下，乳液的粒径分布更均匀，且存储稳定性更好。在不同浓度的NaCl下，乳液粒径略有增加，但在不同浓度的CaCl₂下则显著上升。因此，PPI纳米颗粒稳定的Pickering乳液对NaCl具有更好的抵抗能力。
摘要总结: 张雅真等（2019）通过实验制备花生蛋白分离物纳米粒子，并研究盐离子对其溶液的透光率和表面电位的影响。结果表明，盐离子改善了花生蛋白纳米粒子的稳定性，增强了皮克林乳液的均匀性及储存稳定性，尤其在不同氯化钠和氯化钙浓度下表现出不同的粒径变化。

作者: Wang Jian; Huang Qunhui
摘要: In the current  super-competitive environment, how to build an improvisational organization to gain competitive advantage has become a difficult problem for the development of enterprises, but the academic circles is far from enough attention to this problem. Based on this, this paper first constructs an improvisational organization from the perspective of network capacity, and then discusses how improvisational organization gains competitive advantage from the perspectives of absorptive capacity and organizational emotional ability. Using SPSS19.0 software to conduct an empirical analysis of 185 high-tech enterprises in the eastern coastal areas of China, and some valuable conclusions have been found. Firstly, network capability has a positive effect on organizational improvisation. Specifically, network planning capability, network configuration capability and network occupancy capability have a positive effect on organizational improvisation, but network operation capability has a negative effect on organizational improvisation. Secondly, organizational improvisation has no significant impact on innovation performance, and improvisational organization may not be able to gain competitive advantage. Finally, under the conditions of absorptive capacity and organizational emotional capacity, organizational improvisation can significantly improve the innovation performance of enterprises.
标题: The construction paths of improvisational organization's competitive advantage
标题翻译: 即兴组织竞争优势的构建路径
摘要翻译: 在当前的超级竞争环境中，如何构建一个即兴组织以获得竞争优势已成为企业发展的一个难题，但学术界对此问题的关注仍显不足。基于此，本文首先从网络能力的角度构建了即兴组织，并讨论了即兴组织如何从吸收能力和组织情感能力的角度获得竞争优势。利用SPSS19.0软件对中国东部沿海地区185家高科技企业进行实证分析，得出了一些有价值的结论。首先，网络能力对组织即兴的积极影响是显著的。具体而言，网络规划能力、网络配置能力和网络占用能力对组织即兴有正向影响，而网络运营能力对组织即兴有负向影响。其次，组织即兴对创新绩效没有显著影响，即兴组织可能无法获得竞争优势。最后，在吸收能力和组织情感能力的条件下，组织即兴能够显著提高企业的创新绩效。
摘要总结: 王建和黄群辉（2019）基于对185家中国东部沿海高科技企业的实证分析，探讨了网络能力对即兴组织的影响，发现网络规划能力、配置能力和占用能力均对即兴组织有正向影响，而操作能力则有负向影响。同时，组织即兴能力对创新绩效无显著影响，但在吸收能力和情感能力的条件下能显著提升创新绩效。

期刊: 2019 IEEE/RSJ INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON INTELLIGENT ROBOTS AND SYSTEMS (IROS)
作者: Fallatah, Abrar; Urann, Jeremy; Knight, Heather
摘要: This paper consists of a failure analysis of two robot performance productions. Both productions included three-week rehearsal periods, and culminated in live performances including both robots and humans. To develop these productions, a theater artist collaborated with a robotics lab to develop, (1) a narrative dance performed live on stage and (2) an improvisational performance in a public space. While the interdisciplinary team did not set out to explore robot failures, failures played an ever-present role during the eighteen rehearsals and two live performances. This paper details strategies for addressing, planning for, and rehearsing responses to robot failures on stage, both technical and choreographic. In addition to scaffolding future robot theater performances, we discuss how these strategies apply to other customer- and audience-facing robots, including sponsor demos. The on-stage exploration of robot chairs and human performers also suggests that humans can conceptualize minimal robots as both characters and props, moving fluidly from one to the other. We hope these strategies ensure that future audiences will want the robot shows to go on, as well as expand ideas about the types of robots that can be cast in future human-robot productions.
标题: The Robot Show Must Go On: Effective Responses to Robot Failures
标题翻译: 机器人秀不能停：对机器人故障的有效应对
摘要翻译: 本文对两项机器人表演的失败进行了分析。这两项表演均包括三周的排练期，并 culminated in live performances，涉及机器人和人类。为了开发这些表演，一位戏剧艺术家与一家机器人实验室合作，开发了（1）在舞台上现场演出的叙事舞蹈和（2）在公共空间进行的即兴表演。虽然跨学科团队的初衷并不是探索机器人故障，但在十八次排练和两场现场表演中，故障始终扮演着重要的角色。本文详细说明了应对、规划和排练机器人故障的策略，包括技术故障和编舞方面的应对。此外，我们讨论了这些策略如何适用于其他面向客户和观众的机器人，包括赞助商演示。舞台上对机器人椅子和人类表演者的探索还表明，人类可以将最简化的机器人概念化为角色和道具，灵活地在两者之间转换。我们希望这些策略能确保未来的观众希望机器人表演继续进行，并扩展对于可以在未来人机互动表演中出演的机器人类型的想法。
摘要总结: Fallatah等（2019）通过对两场机器人表演的失败分析，探讨了在现场演出中如何应对技术和编排上的机器人失败，提出相应策略以促进未来机器人剧场表演，并讨论这些策略对其他与观众互动的机器人应用的启示。

期刊: ADVANCES IN HUMAN ERROR, RELIABILITY, RESILIENCE, AND PERFORMANCE
作者: Damacharla, Praveen; Javaid, Ahmad Y.; Devabhaktuni, Vijay K.
摘要: The rapid increase in integration of intelligent systems in every corner of technology created an emerging field called Human-Machine Teaming (HMT). In HMT, human and machine collaborate with one another to accomplish a common goal or task. To achieve the best performance of a team, it is necessary to build trust and cohesion among all teammates (machines and humans). Furthermore, in a team, it is an established fact that a team member ability to predict fellow member's future course of action and have an accurate picture is a valuable asset and will result in better team dynamics and team performance. To realize such an ability we are proposing a human error predicting methodology that could give an intelligent system a better understanding of human actions in advance. In the proposed method, we used eye-tracking metrics such as gaze density and cognitive state to predict human errors. The results obtained with the proposed and developed methods are found to be efficient in predicting human error probability.
标题: Human Error Prediction Using Eye Tracking to Improvise Team Cohesion in Human-Machine Teams
标题翻译: 利用眼动追踪预测人类错误以提升人机团队的团队凝聚力
摘要翻译: 智能系统在各个技术领域的快速集成催生了一个新兴领域，称为人机协作（HMT）。在HMT中，人类与机器相互合作，以实现共同的目标或任务。为了实现团队的最佳表现，建立所有团队成员（包括机器和人类）之间的信任和凝聚力是必要的。此外，在一个团队中，团队成员预测其他成员未来行为的能力以及对情况的准确把握被认为是一项宝贵的资产，能够促进更好的团队动态和团队表现。为了实现这种能力，我们提出了一种人类错误预测的方法，旨在使智能系统能够更好地提前理解人类的行动。在所提方法中，我们利用眼动追踪指标，如注视密度和认知状态，来预测人类错误。我们所提出和开发的方法在预测人类错误概率方面取得的结果被发现是有效的。
摘要总结: Damacharla等（2019）通过使用眼动追踪指标（如注视密度和认知状态）提出了一种人类错误预测方法，以增强智能系统对人类行为的理解。研究结果表明，该方法在预测人类错误概率方面具有良好的效率，为提高人机协作提供了支持。

期刊: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH AND PUBLIC HEALTH
作者: Binet, Andrew; Gavin, Vedette; Carroll, Leigh; Arcaya, Mariana
摘要: One impediment to expanding the prevalence and quality of community-engaged research is a shortage of instructive resources for collaboratively designing research instruments and analyzing data with community members. This article describes how a consortium of community residents, grassroots community organizations, and academic and public institutions implemented collaborative research design and data analysis processes as part of a participatory action research (PAR) study investigating the relationship between neighborhoods and health in the greater Boston area. We report how nine different groups of community residents were engaged in developing a multi-dimensional survey instrument, generating and testing hypotheses, and interpreting descriptive statistics and preliminary findings. We conclude by reflecting on the importance of balancing planned strategies for building and sustaining resident engagement with improvisational facilitation that is responsive to residents' characteristics, interests and needs in the design and execution of collaborative research design and data analysis processes.
标题: Designing and Facilitating Collaborative Research Design and Data Analysis Workshops: Lessons Learned in the Healthy Neighborhoods Study
标题翻译: 设计和促进协作研究设计与数据分析研讨会：健康社区研究中的经验教训
摘要翻译: 扩大社区参与研究的普及性和质量面临的一个障碍是缺乏指导性资源，以便与社区成员共同设计研究工具和分析数据。本文描述了一个由社区居民、基层社区组织、学术机构和公共机构组成的联盟，如何在波士顿大区域进行参与式行动研究（PAR）项目中实施协作研究设计和数据分析过程，以探讨社区与健康之间的关系。我们报告了九个不同社区居民群体参与开发多维度调查工具、生成和检验假设以及解释描述性统计和初步发现的过程。最后，我们反思了在设计和执行协作研究设计与数据分析过程中，平衡计划策略与对居民特征、兴趣和需求具有响应性的即兴引导的重要性。
摘要总结: 比内等（2019）通过在波士顿地区的一个参与式行动研究中，结合社区居民和机构，实施了协作研究设计和数据分析，发现平衡居民参与的计划策略与即兴引导的重要性，为社区参与式研究提供了借鉴。

作者: Henshaw, J. L.
摘要: A common use of systems thinking (ST) is for guiding our practices of systems making (SM). One style of ST for SM centers on making designs with deterministic rules, as in the hard sciences, for guiding engineered applications. Another style mimics natural development, with a process by stepwise learning and improvisation to produce evolving designs; examples including architectural design, scientific research, and the practice of action research (AR). All these use exploratory pathfinding to search for better ways to work with reality, and this is the main subject of the paper. Both deterministic and adaptive ST for SM are widely found in differing roles, each having capabilities the other lacks. I start with simple models, such as step-wise improvisation for adapting recipes when making dinner. Another example is Robert Rosen's model for how scientific and other cultures learn to work with nature, by turning attention back and forth between nature and theory for creating their cultural language. A review of the modern history of the systems sciences, as practices of ST for SM, then further broadens the view and context. That leads to introducing a new paradigm of natural systems thinking (NST), using commitments to critical awareness, emancipation, and methodological pluralism for working with natural systems.
标题: Systems Thinking for Systems Making: Joining Systems of Thought and Action
标题翻译: 系统思维与系统构建：思想与行动的结合
摘要翻译: 系统思维（ST）的一个常见用途是指导我们在系统创建（SM）中的实践。用于SM的一种ST风格侧重于使用确定性规则进行设计，如同在硬科学中，引导工程应用。另一种风格则模仿自然发展，采用逐步学习和即兴发挥的过程来产生不断演变的设计；例子包括建筑设计、科学研究以及行动研究（AR）的实践。这些方法都涉及探索性路径探索，以寻找与现实更好合作的方式，这是本文的主要主题。确定性和适应性ST在SM中的应用广泛，各自扮演着不同的角色，拥有对方所缺乏的能力。我从简单模型入手，例如在做晚餐时逐步即兴调整食谱。另一个例子是罗伯特·罗森关于科学和其他文化如何学习与自然合作的模型，通过在自然与理论之间反复转换注意力来创建他们的文化语言。然后，对系统科学现代历史的回顾，作为SM的ST实践，进一步拓宽了视野和背景。这进一步引出了自然系统思维（NST）的新范式，强调对批判意识、解放与方法论多元化的承诺，以便与自然系统进行合作。
摘要总结: 亨肖（2019）基于系统思维指导系统制造的实践，探讨确定性规则与自然发展两种风格。通过回顾系统科学的发展，提出了自然系统思维的新范式，以提高对自然系统的批判性意识和方法多样性的承诺。

作者: Wiggins, Laura L.; Sarasnick, Janice; Siemens, Nathan G.
摘要: IntroductionRecent downsizing and budgeting issues have led to challenges when attempting to train military health care reserve forces. A specific military unit collaborated with a university simulation center in order to provide more meaningful training experiences that mirrored the deployment operational experience.MethodsThe article discusses the processes used to initiate and build a simulation-based military health care training curriculum. The team consisted of an educator specializing in the use of simulation and military content experts. Rubrics for all skills were developed or found in nursing or emergency medical technician/Paramedic textbooks. Skills station training was completed using deliberate practice, where students practiced until they reached mastery level. Simulation scenarios were completed that included a primary and secondary survey improvised explosive device event. Simulation curriculum has expanded to include psychiatric scenarios using standardized patients (actors).ResultsDocumentation of the training yielded greater insight into the unit's abilities, strengths and weaknesses. After the initial 1-year time period, 87% of medical technicians and 92% of registered nurses completed training. In total, 12 out of 38 participants needed additional support. The participants reported through the Debriefing Assessment for Simulation in Healthcare tool that they enjoyed and valued the meaningful training.ConclusionTraining using simulation has been invaluable to improving team cohesiveness. Building a training curriculum has generated a new perspective on ways in which military units may train and assess the strengths and opportunities of the unit. The ability to see participants in action allowed for a clearer understanding of the knowledge and skill each participant actually possessed versus what was assumed. The information obtained was invaluable to leadership in determining the true readiness of the unit for deployment. The authors offer the scenarios, lesson plans, and curriculum that they developed to other units that are interested in the training.
标题: Using Simulation to Train Medical Units for Deployment
标题翻译: 利用模拟训练医疗单位进行部署
摘要翻译:
引言  
近期的缩编和预算问题在训练军队医疗后备力量时带来了挑战。一个特定的军事单位与大学模拟中心合作，以提供更加有意义的训练体验，从而反映出部署作战的实际经历。  

方法  
本文讨论了启动和建立基于模拟的军队医疗培训课程所使用的过程。该团队由一位专注于模拟使用的教育者和军事内容专家组成。所有技能的评分标准均在护理或急救医疗技术员/护理人员教材中开发或找到。技能站培训采用刻意练习，学生练习直至达到熟练水平。包括主要和次要调查的模拟场景也完成了一个即兴爆炸装置事件。模拟课程已经扩展，涵盖使用标准化病人（演员）的精神病场景。  

结果  
培训的文档记录提供了对该单位能力、优势和劣势的更深入认识。在初始的一年时间内，87%的医疗技术人员和92%的注册护士完成了培训。总共38名参与者中有12名需要额外支持。参与者通过医疗保健模拟评估工具（Debriefing Assessment for Simulation in Healthcare）报告，他们享受并重视这次有意义的培训。  

结论  
使用模拟进行培训对提高团队的凝聚力具有重要价值。建立培训课程为军事单位训练和评估自身优势及机会提供了新的视角。能够观察参与者的实际表现，清晰地理解每个参与者实际掌握的知识和技能与假设之间的差距。获得的信息对领导层在确定单位的真正部署准备情况方面极为重要。作者将他们开发的场景、课程计划和课程内容提供给其他有兴趣进行培训的单位。
摘要总结: Wiggins等（2020）通过与大学模拟中心合作，开发了基于模拟的军事医疗培训课程，采用系统性的训练流程和标准化评估，验证了该方法有效性，并显示出88%的参训者报告训练体验有意义，提升了团队凝聚力，为军事单位的训练和评估提供了新视角。

期刊: The Journal of the Association of Physicians of India
作者: N, Midhun Mohan; Radhakrishnan, Chandni; P, Indira
摘要: BACKGROUND: The COVID-19 pandemic has taken its toll on the health care systems all over the world. The global shortage of resources has adversely affected the safety of healthcare personnel as well patients. This has forced the health care facilities to adopt various measures and improvisation in infection control practices, in addition to those in personnel protective equipments (PPEs) adapting to their need and their resources.OBJECTIVES: To review the literature on the infection control practices in health care facilities against COVID-19 and put forward practical solutions, in addition to personnel protective equipments that may be adopted for health care personnel and patient safety in the Indian setting.CONCLUSIONS: We are now amidst of COVID-19 pandemic and we need to focus on 'Risk reduction as much as possible'. The facilities and resources should transform to meet the challenges within the shortest time frame. The concept of patient care needs to balance with the safety of the healthcare, patient and society. This is achievable only by a combination of engineering controls, administrative controls and PPEs. It involves a lot of committed team work while managing an outbreak like COVID - 19 attached with a lot of social stigma.
标题: COVID-19: Striking a Balance between Health Care Provider Safety and Patient Care in the Indian Hospital Settings.
标题翻译: COVID-19：在印度医院环境中平衡医疗提供者安全与患者护理
摘要翻译: 背景：新冠疫情对全球的医疗系统造成了严重影响。资源的全球短缺对医疗人员及患者的安全产生了负面影响。这迫使医疗机构在感染控制措施方面采取各种应对措施和即兴创作，除了在个人防护装备（PPE）方面根据其需要和资源进行调整。 目的：回顾针对新冠病毒的医疗机构感染控制实践的文献，并提出切实可行的解决方案，除了个人防护装备之外，以提高印度环境中医疗人员和患者的安全。 结论：我们目前正处于新冠疫情之中，需要关注“尽可能降低风险”。医疗设施和资源应在最短的时间内转型，以应对挑战。患者护理的概念需要与医疗、患者和社会的安全相平衡。这只能通过工程控制、管理控制和个人防护装备的结合来实现。在管理像新冠这样的疫情时，这需要大量的团队合作，同时伴随着很大的社会污名。
摘要总结: Midhun Mohan等（2020）综述了印度医疗机构在COVID-19疫情中采用的感染控制措施，分析了资源短缺对医护人员和患者安全的影响，提出在有限资源下应通过工程控制、管理控制及个人防护装备的结合来提高安全性。

期刊: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 2020 ACM DESIGNING INTERACTIVE SYSTEMS CONFERENCE (DIS 2020)
作者: Merrill, Nick
摘要: This paper begins with an observation: that threat identification is an intrinsically speculative practice. It requires imagining possible futures. Drawing on methods from speculative design, this paper presents an improvisational role-playing game designed to help software developers identify security threats. It deploys this game with seven software developers, who used the game to successfully identify diverse threats in their software. The insights from this deployment motivate future work on both the game itself and on organizational accounts of security. I call on the design research community to continue to apply its methods and perspectives to computer security, locating threat identification itself, like all speculation, as a site of social and political power.
标题: Security Fictions: Bridging Speculative Design and Computer Security
标题翻译: 安全虚构：架构预测设计与计算机安全
摘要翻译: 本文以一个观察为起点：威胁识别是一种内在的推测性实践，要求想象可能的未来。借鉴推测设计的方法，本文提出了一种旨在帮助软件开发人员识别安全威胁的即兴角色扮演游戏。我们在七名软件开发人员中部署了这款游戏，他们成功地借助这款游戏识别了其软件中的多种威胁。此次部署所获得的见解为未来关于游戏本身和组织安全的研究提供了动机。我呼吁设计研究社区继续将其方法和视角应用于计算机安全，认为威胁识别本身，像所有推测一样，是社会和政治权力的一个场所。
摘要总结: 梅里尔(2020)基于威胁识别的投机性实践，设计了一个即兴角色扮演游戏，旨在帮助软件开发人员识别安全威胁。通过与七名软件开发者的互动，成功发现了多样化的威胁，为游戏及组织安全研究提供了未来工作的动力。

期刊: COMPUTER SUPPORTED COOPERATIVE WORK-THE JOURNAL OF COLLABORATIVE COMPUTING AND WORK PRACTICES
作者: Almklov, Petter Grytten; Halvorsen, Kristin; Johansen, Jens Petter
摘要: The International Space Station (ISS) is research infrastructure enabling experiments in a microgravity environment. Building on a study of one of the ground control rooms in the ISS network, this paper concentrates on low-level operators and their efforts to display accountability in situations of trouble and problem solving. While the research infrastructure around the ISS is permeated by structural (bureaucratic) approaches to accountability (routines, procedures, audits and verifications), we discuss how real-time operations require a more dynamic form of continuously (re-)established accountability in the network of operators. In time-critical situations, operators need to establish accountability 'on the fly' in order to achieve the necessary agency to operate and troubleshoot their system. One key resource for this is the established voice loop system for synchronous communication. With significant constraints on the form and content of speaking turns, operators need to provide appropriate and recognizable accounts that align with the needs and expectations of the network. Based on an extensive multi-method study, with a focus here on recordings of voice loop interactions, we show how accounts of trouble are designed to manage uncertainty in the larger network, while also positioning the operators as competent and reliable members of the network. Conversely, inadequate accounts create uncertainty and delayed resolution of the issue. The design of accounts on the voice loop is crucial for time-critical articulation work in a distributed collaborative setting. The interactional details on the voice loop provide insights into the production and display of accountability, particularly relevant in networked organizations in which personal relations and trust can only play a marginal role and in which temporal constraints are critical. While the research literature has explored a wide variety of dimensions related to coordination and improvisation in distributed, mediated work environments, this study contributes with insights into the functions of verbal accounts in such contexts and how they may serve to supplement formal systems of accountability.
标题: Accountability on the Fly-Accounting for Trouble in Space Operations
标题翻译: 飞行中的问责——太空操作中的问题会计
摘要翻译: 国际空间站（ISS）是一个能够在微重力环境中进行实验的研究基础设施。基于对ISS网络中一个地面控制室的研究，本文集中讨论低级操作员及其在遇到问题和解决问题时展示责任感的努力。尽管围绕ISS的研究基础设施渗透着结构性（官僚）责任感的方式（例行程序、流程、审计和验证），我们讨论了实时操作如何需要一种更动态的形式，以持续（重新）建立网络操作员之间的责任感。在时间紧迫的情况下，操作员需要“即时”建立责任感，以获得必要的操作和故障排除的权限。一个关键资源是建立的语音循环系统，以便进行同步通信。由于发言回合在形式和内容上受到显著限制，操作员需要提供适当且易于识别的解释，这些解释要与网络的需求和期望相一致。基于广泛的多方法研究，这里重点分析语音循环互动的记录，展示了故障解释如何设计以管理更大网络中的不确定性，同时将操作员定位为能够胜任且可靠的网络成员。相反，不充分的解释会造成不确定性并延迟问题的解决。语音循环中解释的设计对于分布式协作环境中的时间关键表达工作至关重要。语音循环中的互动细节提供了对责任感生产和展示的深入见解，特别是在个人关系和信任只能发挥边际作用、时间约束至关重要的网络组织中。虽然研究文献已经探讨了分布式媒体工作环境中与协调和即兴发挥相关的多种维度，但本研究为这种情境下语言解释的功能提供了新见解，并探讨了它们如何补充正式的责任体系。
摘要总结: Almklov等人（2020）基于国际空间站的多方法研究，分析了低层操作员在危机时的实时沟通与责任展示，发现语音循环系统对于在时间紧迫的情况下维持有效的责任管理至关重要。这为理解网络组织中的责任与协调提供了新的见解。

期刊: APNOMS 2020: 2020 21ST ASIA-PACIFIC NETWORK OPERATIONS AND MANAGEMENT SYMPOSIUM (APNOMS)
作者: Majeed, Umer; Khan, Latif U.; Hong, Choong Seon
摘要: Traffic classification (TC) has a principal function in autonomous network management. Recently, deep learning and machine learning-based TC have become popular than the traditional port-based and protocol-based TC due to practices such as port disguise and payload encryption. The flow-based TC is reliable as it relies on time related statistical features. Federated learning is a distributed machine learning technique to train improvised deep/machine learning models with less privacy distress. The organizations or enterprises having similar business models may take participation in building a federated model for their network traffic characterization. In this study, we build a cross silo horizontal federated model for TC using flow-based time-related features. The federated model shows comparable performance to the centralized model.
标题: Cross-Silo Horizontal Federated Learning for Flow-based Time-related-Features Oriented Traffic Classification
标题翻译: 跨矸水平联邦学习用于基于流量的时间相关特征导向的交通分类
摘要翻译: 交通分类（TC）在自主网络管理中具有重要作用。近年来，基于深度学习和机器学习的TC由于端口伪装和有效负载加密等实践，变得比传统的基于端口和协议的TC更受欢迎。基于流的TC可靠，因为它依赖于时间相关的统计特征。联邦学习是一种分布式机器学习技术，旨在以较少的隐私困扰来训练改进的深度/机器学习模型。具有相似商业模型的组织或企业可以参与构建一个用于网络流量特征描述的联邦模型。在本研究中，我们使用基于流的时间相关特征构建了一个跨孤岛的水平联邦模型用于交通分类。该联邦模型的性能与集中模型相当。
摘要总结: Majeed等（2020）基于流量的时间相关特征构建了一个横向联邦模型用于流量分类，采用分布式学习技术，研究发现此联邦模型在性能上与集中模型相当，有助于隐私保护和网络流量特征挖掘。

作者: Hunger, Jonathan; Schumann, Heiko
摘要: Objective: Against the background of the current pandemic crisis, this case report presents the experiences made from interprofessional teamwork with group members from different medical qualification levels. Our objectives were1. to identify areas of shared knowledge regarding efficient collaboration;2. to improve effective teamwork based on mutual respect;3. to develop innovative teaching methods tailored to the needs of COVID-19 interprofessional response teams.Methods: Field notes from numerous team discussions and improvised internal training sessions were compiled into a checklist. Each author edited and revised the checklist and a consensus has been reached after an in-person discussion. Feedback from an academic expert in emergency services has been incorporated into the final version of the checklist.Results: Three main topics were identified: the need for quality-assured professional training, the clarification of role expectations including assigned responsibilities, opportunities to contribute and participate in the team building process, and the development of area-related ethical competence in the sense of shared moral public health literacy. Hence, we developed the following ad - hoc teaching methods: use of online teaching videos, practical exercises on intubation models and the collective development of an annotated, detailed checklist for all relevant work processes of the mobile corona unit based on everyday debriefings.Summary: The need for interprofessional team building in the context of the current health crisis provides a beneficial learning environment for all participants. We propose to conceptually refine this approach into a cross-professional, innovative method of teaching.
标题: How to achieve quality assurance, shared ethics and efficient teambuilding? Lessons learned from interprofessional collaboration during the COVID-19 pandemic
标题翻译: 如何实现质量保证、共享伦理和高效团队建设？从COVID-19疫情期间的跨专业合作中获得的经验教训
摘要翻译: 目标：在当前疫情危机的背景下，本案例报告展示了来自不同医学资格水平的团队成员之间的跨专业团队合作经验。我们的目标是：1. 识别有效合作的共享知识领域；2. 在相互尊重的基础上提高有效团队合作；3. 制定针对COVID-19跨专业应对团队需求的创新教学方法。方法：将多次团队讨论和临时内部培训会议的现场笔记整理成检查清单。每位作者对检查清单进行了编辑和修订，并经过面对面的讨论达成共识。来自应急服务的学术专家的反馈已被纳入检查清单的最终版本。结果：确定了三个主要主题：对质量保证的专业培训的需求、角色期望的明确（包括分配的责任）、参与团队建设过程的机会，以及在共享道德公共卫生素养方面发展相关领域的伦理能力。因此，我们开发了以下临时教学方法：使用在线教学视频、对插管模型的实际演练，以及根据日常总结共同开发移动新冠单元所有相关工作流程的详细注释检查清单。总结：在当前卫生危机背景下，跨专业团队建设的需求为所有参与者提供了有益的学习环境。我们提议将这种方法概念上细化为一种跨专业的创新教学方法。
摘要总结: Hunger和Schumann（2020）通过对不同医疗资格水平团队成员的讨论和培训记录，识别出有效协作的共同知识领域，并提出了改善团队合作的创新教学方法，以应对COVID-19危机，提高团队建设质量和伦理素养。

作者: Son, Changwon; Sasangohar, Farzan; Neville, Timothy; Peres, S. Camille; Moon, Jukrin
摘要: There is a growing need for resilience in dealing with unexpected events during disasters. The purpose of this review was to summarize and synthesize the literature that examined resilience in the context of emergency management (EM). Four groups of findings were synthesized: definitions, key dimensions, technical tools, and research settings employed in the research. First, definitions of resilience, improvisation, and adaptation were summarized and critically evaluated. Second, four key dimensions of EM resilience were identified: collective sensemaking, team decision making, harmonizing work-as-imagined and work-as-done, and interaction and coordination. Third, this review identified five prevalent technical tools used to enhance resilience in EM: mapmaking, event history logging, mobile communication applications, integrated information management system, and decision support tools. Fourth, two major design features of emergency simulations, incident scenarios and participant roles, are evaluated. For each finding, directions for future research efforts to improve resilience in EM are proposed.
标题: Investigating resilience in emergency management: An integrative review of literature
标题翻译: 应急管理中的韧性研究：文献的综合评审
摘要翻译: 在应对灾难期间意外事件时，需要增强韧性。本文综述的目的是总结和综合在应急管理（EM）背景下考察韧性相关的文献。研究结果分为四个组：定义、关键维度、技术工具和研究设置。首先，总结并批判性评估了韧性、即兴创作和适应性的定义。其次，确定了EM韧性的四个关键维度：集体意义形成、团队决策、理想工作与实际工作的协调，以及互动与协作。第三，本文识别出了五种常用的技术工具，以提升EM的韧性：制图、事件历史记录、移动通信应用、综合信息管理系统和决策支持工具。第四，评估了应急模拟的两个主要设计特征，即事件场景和参与者角色。针对每个发现，提出了未来研究以提高EM韧性的方向。
摘要总结: Son等（2020）通过文献综述总结了应急管理中韧性的定义、关键维度、技术工具及研究设置，识别出集体意义建构、团队决策等四个维度及五种增强韧性的工具，为未来研究提供了方向。

作者: Son, Changwon; Sasangohar, Farzan; Neville, Timothy J.; Peres, S. Camille; Moon, Jukrin
摘要: Multidisciplinary incident management teams (IMTs) are required to operate in resilient ways as emergency situations unfold unexpectedly. Although resilience in emergency management has been widely studied in many emergency contexts, the development of a new method to investigate actual resilient performance of the IMTs under realistic settings has been limited. To address such gap, this paper first introduces Interaction Episode Analysis (IEA), a novel approach to capture and describe emergent team performance. As an exploratory observation study, we apply the IEA to an information management aspect of the IMTs in two emergency exercises carried out in a high-fidelity environment. As a result, the IEA provides comparable sets of episodes as instances of work-as-done, rendering opportunities to further analyze essential elements of interactions between team members as well as information management activities. Moreover, the IEA enables comparisons between the observations and identification of challenges faced by the team in managing incident information and adaptive behaviors used to address the challenges. By gathering more evidences as well as addressing limitations identified in this study, the IEA is expected to serve as a method that facilitates the analysis of work-as-done of complex team work and the reconciliation between work-as-done and work-as-imagined to promote resilience in emergency management.
标题: Evaluation of work-as-done in information management of multidisciplinary incident management teams via Interaction Episode Analysis
标题翻译: 多学科事件管理团队信息管理中的实际工作评估：交互情景分析
摘要翻译: 多学科事件管理团队（IMTs）在应急情况意外发生时需要以韧性方式运作。尽管应急管理中的韧性已在许多应急情境中广泛研究，但在现实环境下调查IMTs实际韧性表现的新方法的发展尚有限。为了解决这一空白，本文首先介绍了互动情节分析（IEA），这是一种捕捉和描述新兴团队表现的新颖方法。作为一项探索性观察研究，我们将IEA应用于IMTs在两个高保真环境中的应急演练的信息管理方面。结果表明，IEA提供了可比的情节集，作为实际工作的实例，使进一步分析团队成员之间的互动及其信息管理活动的关键要素成为可能。此外，IEA还使观察结果之间的比较和识别团队在管理事件信息中面临的挑战以及为应对这些挑战所采取的适应性行为成为可能。通过收集更多证据以及解决本研究中识别的局限性，IEA预计将作为一种促进复杂团队实际工作分析的方法，并促进实际工作与设想工作之间的调和，以提升应急管理的韧性。
摘要总结: Son等人（2020）通过对两次高保真环境中的应急演练应用互动事件分析（IEA），探索性地观察了多学科事件管理团队的表现，发现IEA能够揭示团队成员间的互动及信息管理活动，为应急管理中的韧性分析提供新方法。

作者: Gudova, Elena
摘要: This article discusses some of the theoretical foundation of the sensemaking approach introduced by Karl Weick within the fields of organizational psychology and organizational theory. Weick, Sutcliffe, and Obstfeld wrote that Sensemaking involves the ongoing retrospective development of plausible images that rationalize what people are doing (2005: 409), or, in more general terms, making sense out of what is happening in order to reduce uncertainty and to act upon it. For this purpose, according to Weick, an individual deals with two questions: What is going on? and, what should I do about it? Answers to these questions and their following implications in the individual's actions depend on the seven characteristics of the sensemaking: the individual's identity, retrospective, enactment, social activity, ongoing [events and flux of experience], cues, and plausibility. Weick offers a navigation of social space [of organization] with cultural maps in hand, and draws inspiration from the analysis of jazz improvisation. His works, still lacking attention in Russia, offer an instrument for both crisis situations with dramatic loss of sense and quite common everyday events. Weick's ideas were broadly developed within research on communication, identity, language, narratives, power, and other aspects of organizational activity. At the same time, sensemaking is believed to be one of the main theoretical inspirations for the processual approach in organization studies, which is focused on organizational becoming, or organizing.
标题: Finding Sense in Organization Studies: Assumptions and Features of K. Weick's Sensemaking Approach
标题翻译: 在组织研究中寻找意义：K. Weick的意义建构方法的假设与特征
摘要翻译: 本文讨论了卡尔·韦克在组织心理学和组织理论领域引入的意义构成方法的一些理论基础。韦克、苏特克利夫和奥布斯特费尔德曾写道，意义构成涉及对人们所做事情的合理化的持续回溯性发展（2005: 409），或者更一般地说，就是从发生的事情中理解，以减少不确定性并采取行动。为此，根据韦克的观点，个体需要处理两个问题：发生了什么？我该怎么做？这些问题的答案及其对个体行动的后续影响依赖于意义构成的七个特征：个体身份、回溯性、实施、社会活动、持续的[事件与经验的变化]、线索和合理性。韦克在提供社会空间[组织]的导航时，手握文化地图，并从爵士即兴演奏的分析中汲取灵感。他的作品在俄罗斯仍然缺乏关注，提供了一种应对剧烈失去意义的危机情境和相当常见日常事件的工具。韦克的思想在沟通、身份、语言、叙事、权力及其他组织活动方面的研究中得到了广泛发展。同时，意义构成被认为是组织研究中过程方法的主要理论灵感之一，该方法专注于组织的生成或组织化。
摘要总结: Gudova（2020）基于Weick的意义建构理论探讨了组织心理学和组织理论中的关键特征，分析了如何通过回应“发生了什么”和“我该如何做”来减少不确定性。研究强调了个人身份、回顾性和社会活动等七个特征在意义建构中的作用，指出这些概念在危机情况和日常事件中的应用潜力。

作者: Leone, Ludovica
摘要: Organization literature has extensively explored the crucial role of creativity in enabling organizations to survive in fast-paced environments. However, there are still substantial misunderstandings about the way in which creative processes unfold. In most studies, creativity has been analyzed using a compositional sequential model. Building on interpretive inductive research, conducted in the empirical field of Italian haute cuisine, this study develops a framework for the following creative processes, emerging within the field: improvisation, experimentation, trial-and-error, and imagination. The main difference between these processes is the relationship between four aggregate dimensions: process triggers, planning, the unfolding of creative phases, and trialing. This new framework offers a more comprehensive understanding of creativity as it is enacted, shedding light on its real potential in contemporary organizations.C: In every dish, Chef Gusteau always has something unexpected. I will show you. I memorized all his recipes.L: Always do something unexpected.C: No. Follow the recipe.L: But you just said that.C: No, no, no. It was his job to be unexpected. It is our job to... Follow the recipe. (Ratatouille, min. 43, Pixar, 2007)C: What are you doing? You are supposed to be preparing the Gusteau recipe.L: This is the recipe.C: The recipe does not call for white truffle oil! What else have you...? You are improvising? This is no time to experiment. The customers are waiting! (Ratatouille, min. 48, Pixar, 2007).
标题: The Ratatouille paradox. An inductive study of creativity in haute cuisine
标题翻译: 拉塔图伊悖论：高档料理创意的归纳研究
摘要翻译: 组织文献广泛探讨了创造力在快速变化环境中使组织得以生存的关键作用。然而，对于创造过程如何展开仍然存在相当大的误解。在大多数研究中，创造力是通过复合序列模型进行分析的。基于在意大利高级烹饪领域进行的解释性归纳研究，本研究发展了一种框架，用以描述该领域中出现的创造过程：即兴创作、实验、反复尝试和想象。这些过程之间的主要区别在于四个聚合维度之间的关系：过程触发、规划、创造阶段的展开和试验。这个新框架提供了对创造力实施的更全面理解，揭示了其在当代组织中的真实潜力。
摘要总结: Leone（2020）通过对意大利高档烹饪领域进行解释性归纳研究，提出了一个创造性过程的新框架，涵盖即兴创作、实验、试错和想象，探讨了四个维度之间的关系，提供了对现代组织中创造力更全面的理解。

作者: Schildt, Henri; Mantere, Saku; Cornelissen, Joep
摘要: This article examines the effects of power on sensemaking processes, bridging two major, yet traditionally separate, literatures in organization studies. Dividing power into its systemic and episodic forms, we elaborate how power shapes not only the content of sensemaking, but also the form of sensemaking processes. We explicate the distinct ways in which power works in four archetypal sensemaking processes: automatic (preconscious and committed), improvisational (preconscious and provisional), algorithmic (conscious and committed) and reflective (conscious and provisional). These ideal-type processes help us theorize how influences related to systemic and episodic power induce more or less conscious and provisional forms of sensemaking. This refined understanding of sensemaking processes enables further explication of episodic power into distinctive kinds of sensegiving and sensebreaking activities.
标题: Power in Sensemaking Processes
标题翻译: 感知过程中的权力
摘要翻译: 本文探讨了权力对意义建构过程的影响，桥接了组织研究中两个主要但传统上分离的文献。我们将权力划分为系统性和偶发性两种形式，阐述权力如何不仅塑造意义建构的内容，还塑造意义建构过程的形式。我们明确了权力在四种原型意义建构过程中的不同作用方式：自动的（潜意识和承诺的）、即兴的（潜意识和临时的）、算法的（意识和承诺的）以及反思的（意识和临时的）。这些理想类型的过程帮助我们理论化与系统性和偶发性权力相关的影响如何引发更或较少意识和临时性的意义建构形式。这种对意义建构过程的深入理解使我们能够进一步阐明偶发性权力在不同类型的意义给予和意义破坏活动中的作用。
摘要总结: Schildt等（2020）通过对组织研究文献的整合，探讨了权力的系统性和偶发性对意义构建过程的影响，提出了四种理想型的意义建构过程，进而理论化了权力如何影响有意识与无意识的意义构建，为理解权力在意义给予与意义破坏中的作用提供了新的视角。

期刊: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 2020 CHI CONFERENCE ON HUMAN FACTORS IN COMPUTING SYSTEMS (CHI'20)
作者: Mim, Nusrat Jahan; Ahmed, Syed Ishtiaque
摘要: This paper joins the growing body of work in postcolonial computing in HCI, and critically examines the impacts of online social media on the urban architecture in the Global South. Based on our nine-month long ethnography at eight residential areas in Dhaka, Bangladesh, this paper reports how online fame drives local users to produce digital images of their houses mimicking various Western standards, which in turn, brings changes to the organization, aesthetics, and functions of domestic spaces. This paper also describes how such digital image mediated transformations to local architecture are diminishing traditional spaces, altering their usual functions, and limiting the movement of many women inside their home. Drawing from a rich body of literature in postcolonialism, critical image theory, architecture, and Islamic feminism, we explain how these practices demonstrate a subaltern experience of using social media in the Global South. We further discuss design implications to both HCI and architecture to address these issues, and connect our findings to the broader agendas of HCI around social justice and global development.
标题: Others' Images: Online Social Media, Architectural Improvisations, and Spatial Marginalization in Bangladesh
标题翻译: 他人的形象：孟加拉国的在线社交媒体、建筑即兴创作与空间边缘化
摘要翻译: 本论文参与了人机交互（HCI）领域中日益增长的后殖民计算研究，批判性地考察了在线社交媒体对全球南方城市建筑的影响。基于我们在孟加拉国达卡八个居住区为期九个月的民族志研究，本文报告了在线名声如何驱动当地用户制作模仿各种西方标准的房屋数字图像，这反过来改变了家庭空间的组织、审美和功能。本文还描述了这种数字图像介导的对当地建筑的转变是如何削弱传统空间，改变其通常功能，并限制许多女性在家中的活动。基于丰富的后殖民主义、批判图像理论、建筑学和伊斯兰女性主义文献，我们解释了这些实践如何体现全球南方社交媒体使用中的下层经验。我们进一步讨论了对人机交互和建筑设计的启示，以应对这些问题，并将我们的发现与人机交互领域围绕社会正义和全球发展的更广泛议程联系起来。
摘要总结: Mim和Ahmed（2020）通过在孟加拉国达卡八个居民区进行九个月的民族志研究，发现在线社交媒体影响当地居民按照西方标准塑造住宅图像，这改变了家庭空间的组织和功能，削弱了传统空间，限制了女性活动。该研究为人机交互和建筑设计提供了社会正义与全球发展的设计启示。

作者: Sun Yongbo; Ding Yixin; Wang Nan
摘要: The focus of entrepreneurship research is to answer  why,when and how opportunities for the creation of goods and services can be discovered,evaluated,and exploited by entrepreneurship.In recent years,with the increasing growth of China entrepreneurial activity index,the research on resource bricolage has increased sharply.How resource bricolage affects the entrepreneurial opportunity cognition has become a hot research topic.Resource bricolage explains how entrepreneurs could combine seemingly unrelated resources into valuable resources in the context of resource constraints,and further drive the opportunities cognition of entrepreneurs.However,there is a lack of attention to the path mechanism between the resource bricolage and entrepreneurial opportunity cognition.From the perspective of organizational learning,our study advances the research on the relationship between bricolage and entrepreneurial opportunity cognition through different organizational learning methods.The key constructs of resource bricolage.Bricolage focuses on solving the existing underestimated,idle or discarded resources,and developing the potential value of these resources by effective combination.Resource bricolage includes resources at hand,combination of resources for new purposes,and making do.The key constructs of organizational learning.Organizational learning is an issue of continuous concern for all types of enterprises,especially for new enterprises.They must constantly learn new knowledge from external and combine with their own knowledge to deal with opportunities and threats in the dynamic environment.Organizational learning includes cognitive learning,behavioral learning,experiential learning and action learning.The process of entrepreneurial opportunities cognition.The core process of opportunity cognition is to establish a dichotomy view on the structure of opportunity cognition.We believe that Alvarez and Barney's research is very constructive,because they distinguish between opportunity discovery and opportunity construction.This classification represents the two theoretical points of the entrepreneurial opportunity.Through the organizational learning research on the process of the opportunity discovery and construction,this paper found three main research conclusions:First,in the opportunity discovery stage,entrepreneurs need to understand the potential value of the resources available at hand,and rely on previous experience,opportunity prototypes and opportunities alertness,and cultivate cognitive learning ability to discover and identify entrepreneurial opportunities.Second,in the opportunity construction stage,entrepreneurs recombine resources to achieve new goals,and rely on creative thinking and practices,and cultivate behavioral learning capabilities to evaluate and develop entrepreneurial opportunities.Third,from opportunity discovery to opportunity construction,entrepreneurs must get artistic improvisation,that is,applying the resources at hand to resource reconstruction.At the same time,it is also necessary to cultivate the action learning ability,to develop opportunities for discovering and identifying opportunities,and to cultivate the experience learning ability to discover and identify new opportunities after opportunity evaluation.This paper has three contributions.First,it focuses on analyzing the key structural dimensions of organizational learning.Second,a two-stage path of entrepreneurial opportunity cognition is constructed,that is,the opportunity discovery phase covering opportunity discovery and identification,and the opportunity construction phase of opportunity evaluation and development.Third,it analyzes the linking mechanism of the resource bricolage and entrepreneurial opportunity cognition.
标题: The path for linking of resource bricolage and entrepreneurial opportunity recognition
标题翻译: 资源拼凑与创业机会识别的链接路径
摘要翻译: 创业研究的重点在于探讨为什么、何时以及如何才能发现、评估和利用创造商品和服务的机会。近年来，随着中国创业活动指数的迅速增长，关于资源拼凑的研究急剧增加。资源拼凑如何影响创业机会的认知已成为热门研究话题。资源拼凑解释了在资源受限的背景下，创业者如何将看似无关的资源组合成有价值的资源，从而进一步推动创业者的机会认知。然而，关于资源拼凑与创业机会认知之间路径机制的研究尚显不足。本研究从组织学习的角度出发，通过不同的组织学习方法推进了拼凑与创业机会认知之间关系的研究。资源拼凑的关键构念专注于解决现有的被低估、闲置或废弃的资源，并通过有效组合发展这些资源的潜在价值。资源拼凑包括现有资源、为新目的组合资源和变通使用。组织学习的关键构念是，组织学习是所有类型企业的持续关注问题，尤其是对新企业而言。它们必须不断从外部学习新知识，并与自身知识相结合，以应对动态环境中的机会和威胁。组织学习包括认知学习、行为学习、经验学习和行动学习。创业机会认知的过程是，机会认知的核心过程是建立关于机会认知结构的二元化视角。我们认为阿尔瓦雷斯和巴尼的研究非常具有建设性，因为他们区分了机会发现与机会构建。这一分类代表了创业机会的两个理论点。通过对机会发现和构建过程的组织学习研究，本文得出了三个主要研究结论：第一，在机会发现阶段，创业者需要理解手头资源的潜在价值，并依赖于以往经验、机会原型和机会警觉性，培养认知学习能力以发现和识别创业机会。第二，在机会构建阶段，创业者重新组合资源以实现新目标，并依赖创意思维和实践，培养行为学习能力来评估和发展创业机会。第三，从机会发现到机会构建，创业者必须得到艺术即兴发挥，即将手头资源应用于资源重构。同时，还需培养行动学习能力，以开发发现和识别机会的能力，并培养经验学习能力在机会评估后发现和识别新机会。本文有三方面贡献：第一，重点分析组织学习的关键结构维度；第二，构建创业机会认知的两阶段路径，即涵盖机会发现和识别的机会发现阶段，以及评估和发展的机会构建阶段；第三，分析资源拼凑与创业机会认知之间的联结机制。
摘要总结: 孙永博、丁怡欣和王楠（2021）通过对创业机会认知的研究，采用组织学习的视角，探讨资源 bricolage 如何影响创业者在资源约束下的机会发现和构建，得出在机会发现和构建阶段，创业者需结合资源并培养相应的学习能力，以推动机会认知。

作者: Burgin, Mariko S.; Hawkinson, Karla; Kataria, Tiffany; Matousek, Steven; Park, Katherine; Scott, Valerie; Shah, Rashmi; Tran, Austin; Wessen, Randii; Zusack, Steven
摘要: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory's (JPL's) Architecture Team (A-Team) has nearly a decade of experience in maturing early formulation mission and technology concepts by combining innovative collaborative engineering methods with cutting-edge subject matter expertise and advanced analysis tools in an in-person environment. When COVID-19 forced JPL's workforce to work remotely in March 2020, ATeam had to quickly pivot from an in-person collaborative environment to a remote working environment.Through introspection, careful planning, and considerable practice, A-Team was able to develop new operating procedures to effectively continue early formulation studies in a virtual environment. A-Team has held over 57 remote studies in the 10 months since the start of mandatory telework at JPL in March 2020. In the remote setting, A-Team conducts studies in half-day sessions with clients and subject matter experts (SMEs) via videoconferencing, shared computer screens, and digital collaborative tools.The key lesson is that increased staffing and planning is needed to prepare and successfully run remote A-Team studies. Remote A-Team studies require careful selection of the appropriate tools for security, accessibility, and usability within the NASA/JPL environment. Knowledge capture methods and templates need to be thought out and agreed upon in advance as there is less room for improvising in a remote format. Various communication channels have to be monitored to allow for team coordination while maintaining fruitful participant engagement during a session. In addition, technical backup for all roles within the A-Team have to be identified to allow the study to continue even if a team member's connectivity is temporarily interrupted. Finally, careful thought has to be put into methods and processes to create a collaborative environment in a virtual space such that a group of experts who are only connected via the internet can experience the creative spark and flow of a great collaborative and innovative study.
标题: Remote Concurrent Engineering: A-Team Studies in the Virtual World
标题翻译: 远程协同工程：虚拟世界中的团队研究
摘要翻译: NASA喷气推进实验室（JPL）的架构团队（A-Team）在利用创新的协作工程方法、尖端的主题专业知识以及先进的分析工具，在面对面的环境中推进早期任务和技术概念的发展方面，拥有近十年的经验。当COVID-19于2020年3月迫使JPL的员工远程工作时，A-Team不得不迅速从面对面的协作环境转变为远程工作环境。通过反思、仔细规划和大量实践，A-Team能够制定新的操作程序，以有效地在线继续进行早期任务研究。自2020年3月JPL开始强制远程工作以来，A-Team在10个月内举行了超过57次远程研究。在远程环境中，A-Team通过视频会议、共享计算机屏幕和数字协作工具，以半天的时间段与客户和主题专家（SMEs）进行研究。关键的经验教训是，需要增加人员配备和计划，以准备和成功进行远程A-Team研究。远程A-Team研究需要在NASA/JPL环境中仔细选择适当的安全性、可访问性和可用性工具。知识捕获方法和模板需要提前设计和达成一致，因为在远程格式中即兴发挥的空间较小。必须监控各种沟通渠道，以便在会议期间保持团队协调和参与者的有效参与。此外，还需要识别A-Team中所有角色的技术备份，以确保研究即使在某个团队成员的连接暂时中断时仍能继续。最后，必须仔细考虑方法和流程，以在虚拟空间中创造一个协作环境，使得仅通过互联网连接的一组专家能够体验到伟大的协作和创新研究中的创意火花和流畅性。
摘要总结: Burgin等（2021）针对NASA喷气推进实验室的A-Team在COVID-19疫情期间，采用远程协作方法进行了57次在线研究，提出了有效实施虚拟环境工作的新操作程序。研究表明，成功的远程研究需要增加人员配备、精心规划和适当的工具选择，以确保协作环境的有效性。

作者: KIM, DONGWAN
摘要: This study examines problems and solutions in process of building a character. Some actors tend to act with he/she is overwhelmed by his/her character mask or conversely, some actors tend to ignore or avoid the characterization and act as only him/herself. Both problems comes from the concept in which they consider the character as one of type, the concept that they start with a model for characterization and the psychological intention to hide inside of the character mask. To go through the mask, we can apply the “active analysis” designed by Stanislavski and “paraphrasing” exercise designed by Stella Adler. To use character’s physical mask effectively, we can consider “higher ego” of Michael Chekhov and Bertolt Brecht’s “gestus”. And to use vocal mask of character, we need to think body and voice separately. When we embody character’s imagery and attitude as actor’s imagery and attitude, our vocal organizations can stay in relaxation and utilize our vocal mask effectively. we need to avoid to change vocal quality aggressively but we can change vocal range for characterization. we need to avoid to create certain accent for characterizing but it is efficient to change vocal mask according to the objectives(active verbs) and attitudes of character for characterization. This study is worthy that it concretize uncertain concept of the relationship between actor and character. In the future, it would be worthier to study these exercises more specifically and deeply. In addition, this study examines various ways that actors can consider to create characters more effectively. Research various approaches to make the actor's sense of improvisation alive. The second is the possibility of building characters mainly through body masks, and the third is the methodology of building characters through voice masks.
标题: A Study on Problems and Solutions in Process of Building a Character
标题翻译: 角色建设过程中的问题与解决方案研究
摘要翻译: 本研究探讨了角色塑造过程中的问题与解决方案。一些演员倾向于被自己角色的面具压倒而表演，反之亦然，部分演员则倾向于忽视或回避角色化，仅以自我身份表演。这两种问题源于他们将角色视为某种类型的概念，认为角色化是基于某种模型，并且有心理倾向隐藏在角色面具之内。为了突破这一面具，我们可以借助斯坦尼斯拉夫斯基设计的“主动分析”和斯特拉·阿德勒设计的“释义”练习。有效使用角色的身体面具时，我们可以考虑迈克尔·切赫霍夫的“更高自我”和贝托尔特·布雷希特的“姿态”。而在使用角色的声音面具时，我们需要分别考虑身体和声音。当我们将角色的意象和态度具象化为演员的意象和态度时，我们的声带组织可以保持放松，从而有效使用我们的声音面具。我们需要避免激烈地改变声音质量，但可以为角色化改变音域。我们需要避免为角色创造特定口音，但根据角色的目标（主动动词）和态度改变声音面具是有效的。本研究的价值在于具体化演员与角色之间关系的不确定概念。未来，深入研究这些练习将更有价值。此外，本研究还探讨了演员可以考虑的多种方法，以更有效地创造角色，研究各种方法让演员的即兴感更为活跃。其次，主要通过身体面具构建角色的可能性，第三是通过声音面具构建角色的方法论。
摘要总结: 金东焕（2021）探讨了演员在角色塑造过程中面临的问题与解决方案，指出过度依赖角色面具或忽视角色化的心理因素。研究结合斯坦尼斯拉夫斯基的“主动分析”和斯特拉·阿德勒的“释义练习”，提出利用身体和声音面具的有效方法，旨在增强角色表现力，并为角色创造提供新视角。

作者: Zhang, Xin; Mendonca, David
摘要: This study examines the performance of cognitive work-as constrained by physical, policy and resource-related factors-in the near-simultaneous design and execution of disaster response operations. The demands of the situation described here-the removal of debris from a high-value barrier island in the US state of New York after Hurricane Sandy (2012)-lay at the far boundaries of the responding organizations' experience, making this case an excellent candidate for study. Data are analyzed on the deliberative processes of the responding organization in order to characterize the interaction between the design and operation of the debris removal network over time. Statistical data modeling of these processes reveals a number of temporal dependencies between ideation and decision-making processes, as well as between components of the system.
