The illumination and quantification of these processes using data produced through normal operations contributes significantly to theories of the cognitive and behavioral phenomena that underlie organizational response to highly non-routine events, thus building upon broader theories of organizational improvisation and performance.
标题: Co-evolution of work structure and process in organizations: improvisation in post-disaster debris removal operations
标题翻译: 组织中工作结构与过程的共演化：灾后废物清除作业中的即兴发挥
摘要翻译: 本研究考察了在灾害响应行动的近乎同步设计和执行中，认知工作受到物理、政策和资源相关因素限制的表现。这里描述的情况—在2012年桑迪飓风后，美国纽约州一座高价值的防护岛上清除 debris—处于响应组织经验的最边界，使得该案例成为极佳的研究对象。通过分析响应组织的审议过程，旨在描绘 debris 清除网络的设计与操作之间随时间的互动。对这些过程的统计数据建模揭示了创意产生与决策过程之间，以及系统各组成部分之间的一些时间依赖性。利用正常操作产生的数据揭示和量化这些过程，对理论的发展具有重要意义，这些理论涉及组织对高度非常规事件的反应背后的认知和行为现象，从而进一步丰富了组织即兴创作和绩效的更广泛理论。
摘要总结: 张欣和大卫·门东卡（2021）通过分析纽约州飓风桑迪后高价值岛屿的灾后清理操作，探讨了在物理、政策和资源因素限制下认知工作的表现，发现决策和操作过程之间存在时间依赖性，有助于丰富组织应对非常规事件的理论。

期刊: JOURNAL OF CONSTRUCTION ENGINEERING AND MANAGEMENT
作者: Liang, Ci-Jyun; Wang, Xi; Kamat, Vineet R.; Menassa, Carol C.
摘要: Construction robots continue to be increasingly deployed on construction sites to assist human workers in various tasks to improve safety, efficiency, and productivity. Due to the recent and ongoing growth in robot capabilities and functionalities, humans and robots are now able to work side-by-side and to share workspaces. The emerging field of human-robot collaboration has significant potential applications in construction and continues to advance the state of the art in defining the responsibilities of both humans and robots during collaborative work. This paper proposes a new taxonomy for collaborative human-robot work in construction teams. The evolution of construction robots during the last two decades is first reviewed, and relevant bodies of work are categorized into one of five levels of human-robot collaboration: Preprogramming, Adaptive Manipulation, Imitation Learning, Improvisatory Control, and Full Autonomy. The categories of the proposed taxonomy are defined based on the level of robot autonomy and the corresponding human effort in collaborative teamwork. Second, this paper uses the categories of the proposed taxonomy as a contextual framework to identify current challenges and knowledge gaps in collaborative human-robot construction work and recommends directions for future research.
标题: Human-Robot Collaboration in Construction: Classification and Research Trends
标题翻译: 人机协作在建筑中的应用：分类与研究趋势
摘要翻译: 建筑机器人在施工现场的应用越来越广泛，旨在协助人类工人完成各种任务，以提高安全性、效率和生产力。由于机器人能力和功能的持续增长，人类和机器人现在能够并肩工作并共享工作空间。人机合作这一新兴领域在建筑行业具有重要的潜在应用，并持续推动在定义人类和机器人在协作工作中责任的技术进步。本文提出了一种用于建筑团队中协作人机工作的新的分类法。首先回顾了过去二十年建筑机器人的演变，并将相关工作分类为五个层次的人机协作：预编程、适应性操作、模仿学习、即兴控制和完全自主。拟议分类法的类别是根据机器人自主水平和相应的人类协作工作的努力程度来定义的。其次，本文利用拟议分类法的类别作为背景框架，识别当前人机协作建筑工作中的挑战和知识空白，并建议未来研究的方向。
摘要总结: 梁次君等（2021）对过去二十年建筑机器人演变进行了回顾，提出了一种新的人机协作分类法，将合作水平分为五个层次，并识别了当前在人机合作建筑工作中的挑战和知识空白，为未来研究提供了建议。

作者: Gauthier, Francois; Chinniah, Yuvin; Abdul-Nour, Georges; Jocelyn, Sabrina; Aucourt, Barthelemy; Bordeleau, Guy; Ben Mosbah, Abdallah
摘要: This paper presents an exploratory study on the integration of safety during the design and manufacturing phases of machinery in the province of Quebec, Canada. The objective was to better understand the practices and needs of machinery manufacturers for safeguarding their products. Data was collected during interviews and observations with 17 machinery manufacturers. Given the purpose of this study, these companies specialize in the design and manufacturing of machinery used for production in other manufacturing companies. The machines designed and built by these manufacturers are intended for several sectors and are sold in Canada and in various parts of the word. These machines are mainly built and assembled in the workshops. The manufacturers who were interviewed rely on design teams generally made up of mechanical, electrical and mechatronic engineers; technicians in these same fields; designers; machinists and electricians to design their machinery. These teams use on average between five and six normative and regulatory documents depending on their clients' requirements. Most respondents are aware of the need to properly identify the risks related to the use of their machinery and to avoid improvising approaches that may prevent a comprehensive analysis. Their risk-analysis approaches are generally documented, depending on the scope of the project. All the manufacturers interviewed install guards and protective devices on their machines. They favour guards made up of rigid frames and polycarbonate panels and are less likely to use light curtains and laser scanners, because these devices are more expensive. Bypassing these safeguards remains a concern for most manufacturers. The causes cited for bypassing safeguards are summarized as problems related to the performance and adaptability of human-machinery interfaces; the lack of integrated safety measures; safeguards that make machine set-up phase complex, reconfiguration or maintenance operations; and the acceptance of safeguards by machine users. Costs, productivity and operating time are some of the constraints that require very particular attention from design teams. For operational reasons and in order to respect their specific procedures, sometimes clients ask manufacturers for safeguarding solutions that are appropriate for them or, refuse the safeguarding solutions that are proposed. In addition to safeguards bypass and constraints imposed by the client, this study identifies other problems and needs, namely: 1) inherently safe design measures; 2) managing risks during the building phases of the machinery's life cycle besides production and maintenance; 3) ensuring the applicable standards are used and updated; 4) designing and validating safety-related control systems and; 5) making clients more conscious of the importance of safety of machinery.
标题: Practices and needs of machinery designers and manufacturers in safety of machinery: An exploratory study in the province of Quebec, Canada
标题翻译: 机械设计师和制造商在机械安全方面的实践与需求：加拿大魁北克省的探索性研究
摘要翻译: 本论文对加拿大魁北克省机械设计和制造阶段的安全整合进行了探索性研究。研究的目的是更好地了解机械制造商在保障其产品安全方面的实践和需求。数据通过对17家机械制造商的访谈和观察收集。鉴于本研究的目的，这些公司专注于用于其他制造企业生产的机械的设计和制造。这些制造商设计和建造的机器面向多个行业，并在加拿大及其他地区销售。这些机器主要在车间组装和建造。受访制造商依赖于由机械、电气和机电工程师、相关领域的技术人员、设计师、机械师及电工组成的设计团队来设计其机械。这些团队平均使用五到六份规范和法规文件，具体取决于客户的要求。大多数受访者意识到正确识别与其机械使用相关的风险的重要性，并避免即兴处理可能妨碍全面分析的方法。他们的风险分析方法通常有文档记录，具体视项目范围而定。所有受访制造商在其机器上安装防护装置和保护设备。他们倾向于使用由刚性框架和聚碳酸酯面板组成的防护装置，而不太可能使用光幕和激光扫描仪，因为这些设备成本更高。绕过这些防护装置仍然是大多数制造商关心的问题。被引用的绕过防护装置的原因总结为与人机界面的性能和适应性相关的问题；缺乏综合安全措施；使机器设置、重新配置或维护操作复杂的防护装置；以及机器用户对防护措施的接受度。成本、生产力和运行时间是需要设计团队特别关注的一些限制。出于操作原因，并为了遵循特定程序，客户有时会要求制造商提供适合他们的安全解决方案，或者拒绝提出的安全解决方案。除了防护装置的绕过和客户施加的限制外，本研究还识别了其他问题和需求，具体包括：1) 内在安全设计措施；2) 在机械生命周期的建造阶段管理风险，除了生产和维护之外；3) 确保适用标准的使用和更新；4) 设计和验证与安全相关的控制系统；5) 提高客户对机械安全重要性的认识。
摘要总结: Gauthier等（2021）通过对Québec省17家机械制造商的访谈和观察，探讨了在机械设计和制造阶段集成安全的实践与需求。研究发现，制造商普遍关注风险识别，并在设计中安装保护装置，但仍面临客户要求和成本限制等挑战，建议加强安全意识与设计措施。

作者: Chen, Yang; Liu, Dong; Tang, Guiyao; Hogan, Toschia M.
摘要: A burgeoning body of research has examined the influence of stable attributes of individuals, teams, and organizations on employee creativity. Events, however, permeate the increasingly dynamic and uncertain business context. To extend the creativity literature, we draw on event system theory to examine whether, when, and how workplace events impact employee creativity. Our findings based on two time-lagged field studies reveal that workplace event novelty and criticality interact to fuel employee improvisation and in turn, employee creativity. The positive relationship between workplace event novelty and employee improvisation is stronger when workplace events are more critical. Our research highlights the value of an event-oriented theory-building approach to investigate dynamic organizational phenomena.
标题: Workplace events and employee creativity: A multistudy field investigation
标题翻译: 工作场所事件与员工创造力：一项多研究现场调查
摘要翻译: 一系列新兴研究探讨了个人、团队和组织的稳定属性对员工创造力的影响。然而，事件却渗透于日益动态和不确定的商业环境中。为了扩展创造力文献，我们借助事件系统理论来检验工作场所事件是否、何时以及如何影响员工创造力。基于两项时间滞后实地研究的发现表明，工作场所事件的新颖性和关键性相互作用，推动员工的即兴发挥，进而提升员工创造力。当工作场所事件更具关键性时，工作场所事件的新颖性与员工即兴发挥之间的正相关关系更为显著。我们的研究突显了事件导向的理论构建方法在研究动态组织现象中的价值。
摘要总结: 陈杨等（2021）基于两个时间滞后实证研究，探讨了工作场所事件的创新性和关键性如何影响员工创造力，发现两者交互作用促进员工的即兴创作，从而提升创造力，为动态组织研究提供了事件导向理论框架。

作者: Lepisto, Tanja; Hytti, Ulla
摘要: The preoccupation within executive education with addressing relevance and resource constraints, with developing the capacity of participants to become reflexive practitioners, and with sustaining long-lasting change in organizations calls for new innovations and formats for executive education. Building on theories of the collective creation of value and learning communities, and employing a methodology based on narrative ethnography, we empirically investigate how collective creation is facilitated to develop a learning community in executive education with a longitudinal study of learning camps. The study and its findings demonstrate how improvisational theater activities can strengthen collective creation to foster the development of a learning community, and how the sense of community supports collective creation. The study develops a framework for developing executive learning communities.
标题: DEVELOPING AN EXECUTIVE LEARNING COMMUNITY: FOCUS ON COLLECTIVE CREATION
标题翻译: 发展高管学习社区：关注集体创造
摘要翻译: 高管教育关注解决相关性和资源限制、培养参与者成为反思实践者的能力，以及在组织中实现持久变革的需求，呼唤高管教育的新创新和新形式。基于集体价值创造理论和学习共同体理论，并采用叙事民族志的研究方法，我们通过对学习营的纵向研究，实证探讨如何促进集体创造以发展高管教育中的学习共同体。研究及其发现表明，即兴剧活动如何增强集体创造以促进学习共同体的发展，以及社区意识如何支持集体创造。研究提出了一个发展高管学习共同体的框架。
摘要总结: Lepisto和Hytti（2021）基于叙事民族志的方法，进行了关于高管教育中的学习社区发展及其集体创生的纵向研究，发现即兴戏剧活动能增强集体创生，促进学习社区发展，并提出了相应的框架。

作者: Bates, R. M.
摘要: Over the last thirty years, historians and historically minded political scientists have effectively overturned the long-held perception of the nineteenth-century United States as a polity defined by its lack of an effective state. By highlighting the myriad interventions of its energetic and enterprising federal government and by incorporating subnational governments and private actors and organizations as evidence of its impressive infrastructural power, a generation of scholars have, collectively, described a nineteenth-century state that was both more assertive and more robust than was previously thought. Yet other scholars have begun to ask whether this interpretation has concocted a state stronger and more coherent in prospect than it was in practice. By highlighting the piecemeal and often partial nature of the nation's institutional development and the contradictions and incoherence that accompanied its infrastructural power, these scholars have laid the foundations for a new improvisational synthesis that stresses the equivocal nature of American state-building and considers its enduring vulnerabilities.
标题: Government by Improvisation? Towards a New History of the Nineteenth-Century American State
标题翻译: 即兴治理？通向十九世纪美国国家新历史
摘要翻译: 在过去的三十年里，历史学家和具历史意识的政治科学家有效地推翻了长久以来对十九世纪美国这一政体的看法，即它是一个因缺乏有效国家而定义的政体。通过强调其充满活力和进取心的联邦政府的种种干预，以及将地方政府和私人行为者及组织纳入作为其令人印象深刻的基础设施权力的证据，一代学者共同描绘出一个在原先认为的基础上更加坚定和强大的十九世纪国家。然而，其他学者开始质疑这种解读是否构建了一个在前景上比实际更强大和更为一致的国家。通过突显国家制度发展的零散性和常常是部分性的特征，以及伴随其基础设施权力的矛盾与不一致，这些学者为一种新的即兴综合奠定了基础，强调了美国国家建设的模棱两可性质，并考虑其持久的脆弱性。
摘要总结: 贝茨（2021）通过对19世纪美国国家有效性的重新审视，论证了联邦政府的多重干预及地方政府和私人组织的作用，发现国家更加稳健和积极，但也指出这一观点可能忽略了国家建设的矛盾与不一致，提出了新的修辞合成，强调美国国家建设的复杂性及其持续脆弱性。

作者: Barnes, Mat
摘要: Mat Barnes is a director of London-based architectural practice CAN. He believes ill-conceived, expedient parts of cities - the bits that are unplanned and left to their own devices - are fecund breeding grounds for formal and material innovation. These are places of happy collisions of architectural elements that are ripe for further architectural insertions and experiments. Here he presents some of his practice's work in such contexts.
标题: #Architecturez: Rackz, Shackz and the Opportunities In Between
标题翻译: #建筑结构：架子、棚子与其中的机遇
摘要翻译: 马特·巴恩斯是位于伦敦的建筑事务所CAN的主任。他认为，城市中那些设计不当、急就章的部分——未经过规划、任其发展的小片区——是形式和材料创新的丰富温床。这些地方是建筑元素之间愉快碰撞的场所，非常适合进行进一步的建筑插入和实验。在这里，他展示了他所在事务所的作品在这些背景下的应用。
摘要总结: Barnes（2021）探讨了伦敦城市中未规划区域的创新潜力，认为这些地方是建筑元素碰撞的温床，有助于设计实践的进一步探索与实验，并展示了其建筑事务所的相关作品。

作者: Gojny-Zbierowska, Milena; Zbierowski, Przemyslaw
摘要: Improvisation might be seen as a method of responsible innovation in organizations, due to its potential to be more responsive and enable bottom-up initiative. Considering that improvising involves the ability to pivot we argue that enhancing entrepreneurial orientation of existing firms means that their entrepreneurial behaviors can be also displayed in more responsible manner. The paper aims at investigating the influence of improvisation on entrepreneurial orientation (EO). While intuitively improvisation is closely connected to EO, surprisingly, there is very little theoretical and empirical evidence on that relation. The paper closes that gap by empirically investigating the role that improvisation plays in enhancing EO. Building on empirical evidence on the role of improvising in individual entrepreneurship, we use Hmieleski and Corbett's framework of improvisation as a three-dimensional construct (creativity and bricolage, ability to function and excel under pressure and in stress-filled environments, and spontaneity and persistence) and entrepreneurial orientation as a three-dimensional construct (innovativeness, proactiveness, and risk taking) to investigate the impact of improvisation on individual components of EO. Using the data from 567 senior managers from medium and large organizations we find that improvisation has moderate effect on entrepreneurial orientation. Importantly, different dimensions of improvisation shape components of EO in different way: Creativity and bricolage have positive impact on innovativeness and proactiveness and ability to function and excel under stress has impact on propensity to take risk. The study has implications for the theory of responsible innovation by highlighting the potential of improvising to generate more responsive and stakeholder-involving and, in consequence, more responsible innovation.
标题: Improvisation as Responsible Innovation in Organizations
标题翻译: 作为负责任创新的组织即兴创作
摘要翻译: 即兴创作可以被视为组织中负责任创新的一种方法，因为它具有更高的响应性并能够促进自下而上的创新。考虑到即兴创作涉及转变的能力，我们认为增强现有公司的创业导向意味着它们的创业行为也可以以更负责任的方式展现。本文旨在探讨即兴创作对创业导向（EO）的影响。虽然直观上即兴创作与EO密切相关，但令人惊讶的是，关于这种关系的理论和实证证据却很少。本文通过实证研究即兴创作在增强EO中的作用来填补这一空白。基于关于个体创业中即兴创作作用的实证证据，我们使用Hmieleski和Corbett的即兴创作框架，将其视为一个三维构建（创造力与拼凑能力、在压力和紧张环境下的功能和表现能力、以及自发性和坚持性）和创业导向作为一个三维构建（创新性、主动性和风险承担），以探讨即兴创作对EO各个组成部分的影响。使用来自567名中大型组织高管的数据，我们发现即兴创作对创业导向有中等影响。重要的是，即兴创作的不同维度以不同方式影响EO的组成部分：创造力与拼凑能力对创新性和主动性有积极影响，而在压力下的功能和表现能力则影响冒险倾向。这项研究对负责任创新理论具有重要启示，强调即兴创作在产生更具响应性和参与利益相关者的创新，从而实现更负责任创新的潜力。
摘要总结: Gojny-Zbierowska和Zbierowski（2021）基于567名中大型企业的高管数据，探讨了即兴创作对企业家导向的影响。研究发现，即兴创作在不同维度上对创新性和风险承担等企业家行为有中等影响，进而为负责任创新提供了理论依据。

作者: Fernandes, Aline; Tarafdar, Monideepa; Spring, Martin
摘要: Temporary organizations (TOs) are organizational forms characterized by finite-life duration, novel tasks, heterogeneity of organizational members, and different phases of work. They have a greater proportion of emergent processes than more enduring organizations do. This poses particular challenges in the use of IT because it is difficult to foresee all IT applications that are required. This paper examines how IT is used to support the execution of processes in TOs. The empirical setting for our study is a particular and exemplar temporary organization: the 2016 Olympic Games Organizing Committee. Through immersive, in depth and qualitative fieldwork, based on participant observation, interviews, and internal documents, we find that TOs have a dynamic mix of operational processes in different phases of work. Accordingly, they have four patterns of IT use: (1) planned use of formal IT, (2) planned use of informal IT, (3) emergent use of informal IT as a substitute for formal IT, and (4) emergent use of informal IT combined with formal IT. We develop a theoretical explanation for how the patterns address the distinctive conditions facing TOs (i.e. a novel task done in a finite time, by multiple and heterogeneous people, across different phases of work) and its dynamic mix of processes through both planned and improvised use of IT. Practical implications include the impact of improvised IT use on aspects such as security, compliance, integration, and traceability.
标题: The nature of IT use in temporary organizations
标题翻译: 临时组织中信息技术使用的本质
摘要翻译: 临时组织（TOs）是一种以有限生命周期、创新任务、组织成员多样性和工作不同阶段为特征的组织形式。与更持久的组织相比，TOs具有更大比例的应急过程。这给信息技术（IT）的使用带来了特别挑战，因为很难预见所需的所有IT应用。本文考察了IT如何用于支持TOs中过程的执行。我们研究的实证背景是一个特定且典范的临时组织：2016年奥运会组委会。通过基于参与观察、访谈和内部文件的沉浸式、深入和定性田野研究，我们发现TOs在不同工作阶段中具有动态的操作过程混合。因此，它们有四种IT使用模式：（1）正式IT的计划使用，（2）非正式IT的计划使用，（3）非正式IT作为正式IT的替代品的应急使用，以及（4）非正式IT与正式IT结合的应急使用。我们发展了一个理论解释，阐明这些模式如何应对TOs所面临的独特条件（即在有限时间内由多个异质人员完成的创新任务，跨越不同工作阶段）及其通过计划和即兴使用IT的动态过程混合。实践意义包括即兴IT使用对安全性、合规性、集成和可追溯性等方面的影响。
摘要总结: Fernandes等（2021）通过对2016年奥运会组织委员会的深度质性研究，采用参与观察、访谈和内部文件分析，发现临时组织在不同工作阶段具有动态的运营流程和四种信息技术使用模式，强调了规划和即兴使用IT的效果及其对安全性和合规性的影响。

期刊: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND NETWORK SECURITY
作者: Tytarenko, Valentyna; Tsyna, Andriy; Tytarenko, Valerii; Blyzniuk, Mykola; Kudria, Oksana
摘要: Economic transformations have led to an increase in the role of creative assets and their central role in public life. Changes in creative activity have led to a change in the organization of the work of institutes engaged in the training of specialists, in particular teachers of labor education. Methods and approaches to training determine the development of creative industries, being the basis for models of professional training of future teachers of labor training. The purpose of an article was to develop a modern model of professional training of future teachers of labor training based on the concept of creative economy. The methodology is based on the concepts of holistic craft and creative economy. Based on the integration of pedagogical learning models Craft as design and problem-solving, Craft as skill and knowledge building, Craft as product-making and Craft as self-expression developed and experimentally confirmed the conceptual model of professional training of future teachers of labor training. The proposed model forms a practitioner with professional, technical, digital and creative skills who is able to transfer the experience to students. The training course Creativity and creative thinking has been developed. The model provided for the development of a course based on the strategy of developing professional creativity, flexibility, improvisation, openness, student activity, joint practice, student-oriented approach. The practical value implies the adaptation of the developed model of professional training of future teachers of labor education during the training of teachers in higher education, which is confirmed in the experiment.
标题: Model of Future Teacher's Professional Labor Training (Art & Craft Teacher)
标题翻译: 未来教师职业劳动培训模型（艺术与工艺教师）
摘要翻译: 经济转型导致创意资产的角色增加，并在公共生活中占据中心地位。创意活动的变化使从事专业人才培训的机构，特别是劳动教育教师的工作组织发生了变化。培训的方法和途径决定了创意产业的发展，成为未来劳动培训教师专业培训模型的基础。本文的目的是基于创意经济概念，开发一套现代的未来劳动培训教师专业培训模型。其方法论基于整体工艺和创意经济的概念。通过整合教育学习模型——将工艺视为设计与问题解决、工艺视为技能与知识构建、工艺视为产品制造和工艺视为自我表达，开发并实验验证了未来劳动培训教师专业培训的概念模型。所提出的模型培养具备专业、技术、数字和创意技能的实践者，能够将经验传授给学生。开发了课程《创造力与创意思维》。该模型提供了基于发展专业创造力、灵活性、即兴创作、开放性、学生主动性、联合实践和以学生为中心的方式的课程发展。其实践价值在于在高等教育教师培训过程中适应所开发的未来劳动教育教师专业培训模型，这在实验中得到了证实。
摘要总结: Tytarenko等（2021）基于整体工艺和创意经济的理念，整合多种教学模型，开发了一种现代职业培训模型，该模型旨在培养具备专业、技术、数字和创意技能的未来劳动教育教师，实验验证了该模型的有效性，强调了教师培训的灵活性与学生导向。

期刊: JOURNAL OF RESEARCH IN MARKETING AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP
作者: Tewary, Ashwini Kumar; Mchta, Ritu
摘要: PurposeThe purpose of this paper is to frame the guidelines for brand building for micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) and evaluate the role of the entrepreneur in the brand management process.Design/methodology/approachA qualitative study comprising in-depth interviews of 20 Indian MSME entrepreneurs who had experience with brand-building was conducted. The entrepreneurs were probed regarding the brand management process and their role in the brand-building efforts in their organization. The guidelines that emerged from the study were compared and contrasted with those proposed in Krake's model, and a new model for brand-building is proposed.FindingsThe improvised new model highlights the importance of name of the brand, managing finance simultaneously and exit strategy as important factors for the creation of a successful brand, amongst other factors revealed in extant literature. The interviews also reveal that an MSME headed by a passionate entrepreneur who accommodates professional expertise witnesses a greater chance of success.Originality/valueIn spite of the growing importance of SMEs, scant attention has been paid to the issue of branding in SMEs. This study contributes to the literature on branding and small business research by examining and advancing the brand-building guidelines developed by Krake. It further looks at the role of the entrepreneur in the entire process of brand building in the increasingly evolving Indian market.
标题: Brand development and entrepreneur's role in small businesses
标题翻译: 品牌发展与企业家在小型企业中的角色
摘要翻译: 目的：本文旨在为微型、小型和中型企业（MSMEs）建立品牌的指南框架，并评估企业家在品牌管理过程中的作用。设计/方法论/研究方法：本研究是一项定性研究，通过对20位曾有品牌建设经验的印度MSME企业家进行深入访谈。访谈中探讨了品牌管理过程以及企业家在组织品牌建设中的角色。研究中提出的指南与Krake模型中的指南进行了比较，并提出了一个新的品牌建设模型。发现：改进后的新模型强调了品牌名称、同时管理财务和退出战略作为成功品牌创建的重要因素，以及文献中揭示的其他因素。访谈还表明，由富有激情的企业家领导、能容纳专业专长的MSME企业更有成功的机会。原创性/价值：尽管中小企业日益重要，但对中小企业品牌问题的关注仍然较少。本研究通过考察和推进Krake制定的品牌建设指南，为品牌和小企业研究的文献做出了贡献。同时，它还探讨了企业家在迅速发展的印度市场中品牌建设全过程中的角色。
摘要总结: Tewary和Mchta（2021）通过对20位印度MSME企业家的深入访谈，进行质性研究，探讨了品牌管理过程及创业者在品牌建设中的角色，提出了基于Krake模型的新品牌建设模型，强调品牌名称、财务管理和退出策略的重要性。

期刊: Journal of Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management
作者: Sun Yongbo; Ding Yixin; Hu Xiaojuan
摘要: State-owned enterprise groups consisting of complex interdependence need to determine the extent to which each subsidiary has reached a consensus on the strategic objectives of enterprise groups. How to coordinate interdependence to promote strategic consensus has become an urgent problem for enterprise groups. Exploratory case studies are employed to explain the phenomena and problem that exists in interdependence. ①Due to the unique background conditions of state-owned enterprises in China, under the constraints of the Group′s internal norms, practices and systems, there are submission and commitment phenomena in the process of inter-activities. ②Because the parents and subsidiaries lack the rule guidance that includes the extent to which the resource and information flows among interdependent activities are subject to predefined rules and the timing with which interdependent activities are supposed to exchange resources and information, and there is a problem that is how to motivate the initiative of the subsidiary. The set theory advocated by Ragin can be a good illustration: how the independence and strength of the parent-subsidiary combine to form some advantages that cannot be explained by a single-level analysis. Based on the multi-case research method, this study constructs a research framework of parent-subsidiary interdependence and strategic consensus based on the interdependence perspective. This study adopts a variety of data collection methods, including the collection of second-hand data (2011-2017), and our study data is supplemented by semi-structured interviews, interview videos and literature. This study follows the principle of theoretical sampling, and employs 33 subsidiaries of the four state-owned enterprise groups as research samples, and adopts fuzzy set qualitative comparison analysis to analyze the QCA result and propose propositions. Qualitative comparative analysis is applicable to our study and has the following three advantages: first, fsQCA makes up for the insufficiency of the number of cases that cannot be handled in case studies. Second, fsQCA can show multiple paths with resulting equivalence. Finally, fsQCA allows for asymmetry in the antecedent conditions and results, allowing for more subtle analysis. This study explores the following three conclusions through the exploratory case study of four state-owned enterprise groups: ①The strategic consensus is the result of the interaction of multiple factors in interdependence, which is reflected in the multi-combination configuration of interdependence pattern, agency and management control. ②The strategic commitment includes two configurations of agency-dependence and locked-construction, which are applicable to the case of low modularity* low openness* high agency* centralized management control and high openness* low agency. This means that in the parent-subsidiary relationship of stateowned enterprises, the strategic planning model of the subsidiary chooses to implement the strategic arrangement of the group. The Group plays the role of strategic manager and strategic investor, and the subsidiary implements the strategy to achieve the scope economy and overall development of the group. ③Interdependence rules provide normative guidance for the flow of resources and information between interdependent activities of parent-subsidiary corporates. Using the interdependence rules of stringency and immediacy, the subsidiary can combine two strategies of the embedded-improvisation of low stringency and high immediacy and the triggered-exploration of high stringency and low immediacy to be proactive. This study provides theoretical contributions to the literature in three ways. First, this study employs systematic and holistic thinking to examine the issue, and responds to the suggestions of Chinese scholars that study the organization and strategy from the configuration perspective of the complex linkage.
标题: The path and realization mechanism of strategic consensus of parent-subsidiary: Based on independence perspective
标题翻译: 母子公司战略共识的路径与实现机制：基于独立性视角
摘要翻译: 国有企业集团涵盖复杂的相互依赖关系，需要确定每个子公司在企业集团战略目标上的共识程度。如何协调相互依赖以促进战略共识已成为企业集团亟待解决的问题。本研究采用探索性案例研究方法，解释了相互依赖中存在的现象和问题。 ①鉴于中国国有企业的独特背景条件，在集团内部规范、实践和体系的约束下，在相互活动的过程中存在服从和承诺的现象。 ②由于母公司与子公司缺乏包括资源和信息流动的相互依赖活动受预定义规则约束的程度，以及相互依赖活动应交换资源和信息的时机等规则指导，因而存在如何激励子公司主动性的问题。拉金倡导的集合理论可以很好地说明这一点：母子公司之间的独立性和强度如何结合形成一些无法通过单层次分析解释的优势。本研究基于多案例研究方法，从相互依赖的视角构建了母子公司相互依赖与战略共识的研究框架。本研究采用多种数据收集方法，包括对2011-2017年间的二手数据的收集，研究数据还通过半结构化访谈、访谈视频和文献补充。研究遵循理论抽样原则，选取四个国有企业集团的33家子公司作为研究样本，采用模糊集定性比较分析（fsQCA）分析结果并提出命题。质性比较分析适用于本研究，并具备以下三个优势：首先，fsQCA弥补了案例研究中无法处理的案例数量不足之缺陷。第二，fsQCA能够展示多条路径及其结果等价性。最后，fsQCA允许先行条件和结果之间的不对称性，使分析更为细致。通过对四个国有企业集团的探索性案例研究，本研究探索出以下三个结论：①战略共识是相互依赖中多种因素相互作用的结果，体现在相互依赖模式、代理和管理控制的多组合配置上。②战略承诺包括代理-依赖和锁定-构造两种配置，适用于低模块化*低开放性*高代理*集中管理控制及高开放性*低代理的情况。这意味着在国有企业的母子公司关系中，子公司的战略规划模式选择实施集团的战略安排。集团充当战略管理者和战略投资者的角色，而子公司实施战略以实现规模经济和集团的整体发展。③相互依赖规则为母子公司间的资源和信息流动提供规范性指导。通过严格性和时效性的相互依赖规则，子公司可以结合低严格性和高时效性的嵌入-即兴策略与高严格性和低时效性的触发-探索策略，积极主动。本研究为文献提供了三方面的理论贡献。首先，本研究采用系统和整体的思维方式研究该问题，回应了中国学者从复杂联结的配置视角研究组织和战略的建议。
摘要总结: 孙永波、丁逸欣和胡晓娟（2021）通过对四个国有企业集团的多案例研究，采用定性比较分析法，探讨了母子公司间的相互依赖与战略共识，发现多因素交互影响战略共识，并提出为资源流动提供规范性引导的必要性，以促进企业的整体发展。

作者: Uzo, Uchenna; Mair, Johanna
摘要: Research has often underestimated the pervasive and global occurrence of informality because studies largely define informality as illegal economic practices. This study adopts a multidimensional view of informality to explain how and why firms habitually improvise even when they do not experience unexpected or extreme eventualities. We addressed this concern through a comparative ethnographic study of three film production crews in the Nigerian movie industry. Our findings unravel the multiple dimensions of informality and define habitual improvization. We build a theoretical model that traces the organizing principles of informality and how they affect the modes of implementation and outcomes of habitual improvization. Finally, we offer an agenda for future theoretical and empirical research on informality and organizational improvization.
标题: How informality affects habitual improvisation in firms: insights from the Nigerian movie industry
标题翻译: 非正式性如何影响企业的习惯性即兴创作：来自尼日利亚电影行业的启示
摘要翻译: 研究往往低估了非正规经济的普遍性和全球性，因为相关研究通常将非正规经济定义为非法经济活动。本研究采取多维视角来解释企业是如何以及为何在没有经历意外或极端事件时仍然习惯性地进行即兴创作。我们通过对尼日利亚电影产业三支影片制作团队的比较人种志研究来解决这一问题。我们的研究结果揭示了非正规经济的多个维度，并定义了习惯性即兴创作。我们构建了一个理论模型，追踪非正规经济的组织原则及其如何影响习惯性即兴创作的实施方式和结果。最后，我们提供了一份关于未来非正规经济和组织即兴创作的理论与实证研究议程。
摘要总结: 乌佐和梅尔（2021）通过对尼日利亚电影行业三支制作团队的比较民族志研究，提出了关于非正式经济的多维度观点，揭示了习惯性即兴创作的影响因素，并构建了理论模型，为未来非正式性和组织即兴创作的研究提供了方向。

作者: Arora, Charvi; Kamat, Aditya; Shanker, Saket; Barve, Akhilesh
摘要: Purpose The main intention of this paper is to analyze various factors hindering the growth of the agricultural supply chain and several industry 4.0 technologies to eliminate the same. In addition to a detailed assessment on the implementation of these technologies in agriculture, this manuscript also presents a priority list providing a rank to them based on the relative efficiency of these advancements in addressing these obstacles. Design/methodology/approach This research proceeds with a two-step process. The particular barriers in the agriculture supply chain and industry 4.0 technologies are determined in the first step. Next, the proposed framework, a combination of data envelopment analysis (DEA) and analytic hierarchy process (AHP), i.e. DEA-AHP, is used to determine a hierarchical structure for the factors and the relative productive efficiencies of the alternatives. The DEA methodology gives a performance analysis of various decision-making units. At the same time, AHP helps in evaluating alternatives weights based on numerous criteria, allowing us to categorize their importance further. Findings This study reveals how the involvement of technological advancements in agriculture can help manage the supply chain more efficiently. It also justifies how the large quantities of data generated can handle these increasing challenges in the agricultural supply chain. Practical implications The results of this study provide a priority list of alternatives based on their final weights. This ranking system can help farmers and the government select the best-suited technology for bringing automation into the agricultural supply chain. Originality/value This research is unique as it analyes the general factors hindering the development of the agriculture supply chain while simultaneously providing a list of alternatives based on their relative efficiencies. The study enriches existing literature by providing an analytic approach to determine the weightage of various critical success factors that can help improvise and entrust the real and undeniable requirements of consumers, suppliers and producers.
标题: Integrating agriculture and industry 4.0 under agri-food 4.0 to analyze suitable technologies to overcome agronomical barriers
标题翻译: 在农业食品4.0框架下整合农业与工业4.0，以分析克服农业障碍的适宜技术
摘要翻译: 目的 本文的主要目的是分析阻碍农业供应链增长的各种因素以及一些工业4.0技术，以消除这些障碍。除了对这些技术在农业中实施的详细评估，本文还呈现了一份优先级清单，根据这些技术在解决障碍方面的相对效率对其进行排名。 设计/方法论/方法 本研究采取两步法进行。第一步确定农业供应链中的特定障碍及工业4.0技术。接下来，采用数据包络分析 (DEA) 和层次分析法 (AHP) 的组合，即 DEA-AHP，来确定因素的层级结构和替代方案的相对生产效率。DEA 方法为各种决策单位提供性能分析，同时，AHP 帮助根据多个标准评估替代方案的权重，从而进一步分类它们的重要性。 结果 本研究揭示了技术进步如何帮助更有效地管理农业供应链。它还证明了产生的大量数据如何应对农业供应链中不断增加的挑战。 实践意义 本研究的结果提供了一份根据最终权重排列的替代方案优先级清单。该排名体系可以帮助农民和政府选择最适合引入自动化的农业供应链技术。 originality/value 本研究独特之处在于它分析了阻碍农业供应链发展的普遍因素，同时提供了基于相对效率的替代方案清单。该研究通过提供一种分析方法来确定各种关键成功因素的权重，从而丰富了现有文献，帮助改善和满足消费者、供应商和生产者的真实且不可否认的需求。
摘要总结: Arora等（2022）采用两步方法，通过数据包络分析（DEA）和层次分析法（AHP），识别农业供应链障碍和工业4.0技术，提出优先级列表，结果表明技术进步能有效管理供应链，提升效率，指导农民和政府选择最佳技术。

作者: Chen, Rachel S. Y.
摘要: The human capacity for intersubjective engagement is present, even when one is limited in speaking, pointing, and coordinating gaze. This paper examines the everyday social interactions of two differently-disposed actors-a non-speaking autistic child and his speaking, neurotypical mother-who participate in shared attention through dialogic turn-taking. In the collaborative pursuit of activities, the participants coordinate across multiple turns, producing multi-turn constructions that accomplish specific goals. The paper asks two questions about these collaborative constructions: 1) What are their linguistic and discursive structures? 2) How do embodied actions contribute to these constructions? Findings show that the parent and child repeatedly co-produced multi-turn constructions that had consistent structures, implying a sophisticated ability to anticipate the completion of action trajectories. Examining the embodied actions of interactants revealed that the child often accommodated to the parent's demands for participation. Nonetheless, the child occasionally pursued his own goals by improvising with and within multi-turn constructions. He launched constructions to redirect parental attention, and otherwise produced surprising actions within the turn-taking structure of these constructions. The paper concludes that multi-turn constructions in the midst of activities are a primordial site in which to begin observing the competencies of non-speaking autistic children for intersubjective engagement.
标题: Improvisations in the embodied interactions of a non-speaking autistic child and his mother: practices for creating intersubjective understanding
标题翻译: 非言语自闭症儿童与其母亲的身体互动中的即兴创作：创造他者理解的实践
摘要翻译: 人类的主体间交往能力在无言的情况下依然存在，即使在说话、指向和协调目光方面受到限制。本文考察了两个不同特征的参与者之间的日常社会互动——一名不会言语的自闭症儿童和他能够言语的神经典型母亲——他们通过对话轮流制参与共享注意力。在合作进行活动的过程中，参与者在多个轮次中协调，产生实现特定目标的多轮构建。本文针对这些合作构建提出了两个问题：1）它们的语言和话语结构是什么？2）具体行动如何对这些构建产生贡献？研究结果表明，父母和孩子反复共同构建了具有一致结构的多轮构建，这表明他们具有预见行动轨迹完成的复杂能力。对互动者的具体行动的考察显示，孩子常常迎合父母参与的要求。然而，孩子偶尔会通过即兴发挥在多轮构建中追求自己的目标。他发起构建以重新引导父母的注意力，并在这些构建的轮流结构中产生意想不到的行动。论文总结认为，在活动中心进行的多轮构建是观察不会言语的自闭症儿童在主体间交往中能力的一个重要起点。
摘要总结: 陈瑞莎·Y（2022）通过观察一名不发声的自闭症儿童和其言语母亲的日常互动，研究他们在对话性轮流中如何协调参与。研究发现，二者在多轮构建中反复共创特定结构，展现了儿童在社交互动中的能力与自我目标的追求，为理解非言语自闭症儿童的交互能力提供了新视角。

期刊: JOURNAL OF CONTINGENCIES AND CRISIS MANAGEMENT
作者: Steen, Riana; Pollock, Kevin
摘要: Combining the conceptual tools and methods of resilience engineering (RE) with naturalistic decision-making (NDM), in the context of police critical incident command, this study explores the capacity of individual commanders to manage occupational stress during a critical incident or crisis. A case scenario and interviews, together with cognitive task analysis (CTA), are used to investigate how stress affects decision making and performance. The analysis shows: (1) As a social process, sensemaking goes beyond an individual's cognitive capacity. It depends on teams and involves collaboration, sharing and assessing risks and uncertainties. (2) In terms of improvisation, decision-making requires organisational support in training and authorisation. (3) The mechanisms that ensure the synchronisation of activities link to an operational communication strategy grounded on transparency and trust between the parties involved. (4) Individual adaptive capacity also has organisational characteristics. It improves by facilitating and stimulating proactive learning across the organisation. Bringing RE and NDM together, clarifies interdependencies. Thus, the gap between the organisational system and the individual's performance might be closed, which improves performances at the sharp end by a feedback loop that reconciles bottom-up and top-down views.
标题: Effect of stress on safety-critical behaviour: An examination of combined resilience engineering and naturalistic decision-making approaches
标题翻译: 压力对安全关键行为的影响：结合韧性工程和自然决策方法的研究
摘要翻译: 结合韧性工程（RE）和自然决策（NDM）的概念工具与方法，本研究在警察危机指挥的背景下探讨了个别指挥官在关键事件或危机期间管理职业压力的能力。通过案例情境和访谈，以及认知任务分析（CTA），研究调查了压力如何影响决策和表现。分析结果显示：（1）作为一种社会过程，意义建构超越了个体的认知能力。它依赖团队合作，涉及风险和不确定性的共享与评估。（2）在即兴发挥方面，决策需要组织的支持，包括培训和授权。（3）确保活动同步的机制与基于透明度和信任的运营沟通策略相关联。（4）个体适应能力也具有组织特征，通过促进和激励组织内的主动学习而得到提升。将RE和NDM结合，明确了相互依赖性。因此，组织系统与个体表现之间的差距可能会缩小，通过反馈循环调和自下而上和自上而下的视角，从而改善在关键时刻的表现。
摘要总结: Steen和Pollock（2022）结合了韧性工程和自然决策方法，采用案例场景和访谈等数据，通过认知任务分析研究警察关键事件指挥中的职业压力管理，发现团队协作、组织支持、沟通策略和主动学习是提高决策表现和适应能力的关键因素。

作者: Acikgoz, Atif; Latham, Gary P.
摘要: Drawing on goal-setting theory, the current research examines whether the indirect relationship between self-set, rather than assigned or participative, learning goals and an Uber driver's service performance is positive and significant in an emerging work context, namely, the gig economy. In this regard, we hypothesized that there is a positive, significant relationship between self-set learning goals and a driver's improvised ways to provide customer service. Building on metacognitive practice, we further hypothesized that a gig driver's mindful metacognition positively moderates the relationship between improvisation and service performance. The overall hypothesis tested is that the indirect relationship between self-set learning goals and a gig driver's service performance via improvisation is positive and significant, and this relationship is positively moderated by mindful metacognition. Data were collected from 149 gig drivers. Ordinary least squares regression-based path analyses revealed support for these hypotheses.
标题: Self-Set learning goals and service performance in a gig economy: A Moderated-Mediation role of improvisation and mindful metacognition
标题翻译: 自我设定学习目标与零工经济中的服务表现：即兴创作与正念元认知的调节-中介作用
摘要翻译: 本研究基于目标设定理论，探讨了自我设定学习目标（而非分配或参与性学习目标）与Uber司机服务表现之间的间接关系在新兴工作环境——零工经济中的正向显著性。在这方面，我们假设自我设定的学习目标与司机提供客户服务的即兴方式之间存在积极的显著关系。在元认知实践的基础上，我们进一步假设零工司机的有意识元认知在即兴和服务表现之间的关系中起到积极的调节作用。整体假设为，自我设定学习目标与零工司机通过即兴发挥的服务表现之间的间接关系是正向显著的，并且这一关系受到有意识元认知的积极调节。数据收集自149名零工司机。基于普通最小二乘法回归的路径分析支持了这些假设。
摘要总结: Acikgoz和Latham（2022）基于目标设定理论，收集149名网约车司机的数据，使用普通最小二乘回归分析，发现自设学习目标通过即兴服务方式显著正向影响服务表现，且有意识的元认知对该关系起到积极调节作用。

期刊: JOURNAL OF AGRICULTURE FOOD SYSTEMS AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
作者: Szanto, David
摘要: The pluralistic nature of food culture and food systems produces complex and blended realities for research, often prompting approaches that embrace mixed methods and cross-sector partnerships. In parallel, calls for the decolonization of research methods have brought attention to the importance of relationality when working with local communities and traditional knowledge holders. This article presents the process and outcomes of the Timor-Leste Food Innovators Exchange (TLFIX), a multifaceted initiative centered on the contemporary and historic foodways of Timor-Leste, including current challenges to individual health, cultural identity, and economic-ecological sustainability brought about by centuries of colonial and transnational influence. Conceived within an international development context, TLFIX aimed at building local empowerment, economic development, and social change. Methods included quantitative, qualitative, and material-based approaches, including surveys, storytelling, and culinary innovation. As a consulting academic on the project, I contributed to the research design, coached team members on storytelling-as-method, and participated in a portion of the work. For the current text, I use the notions of recombinance, responsiveness, and relationality to interpret our collective experience and to frame an example of carrying out mixed-method and mixed-participant work in complex food contexts. As a whole, this example illustrates ways in which to leave space for improvisation and emergence within food practice and scholarship.
标题: Food futuring in Timor-Leste: Recombinance, responsiveness, and relationality
标题翻译: 东帝汶的食品未来：重组合、响应性与关系性
摘要翻译: 食品文化和食品系统的多元化特性为研究产生了复杂且混合的现实，常常促使采用混合方法和跨部门合作的研究方式。与此同时，关于去殖民化研究方法的呼声引起了人们对与当地社区和传统知识持有者合作时关系性重要性的关注。本文呈现了东帝汶食品创新者交流（TLFIX）项目的过程和成果，这是一个以东帝汶当代和历史饮食文化为中心的多面向倡议，关注因数世纪的殖民和跨国影响而带来的对个人健康、文化身份和经济生态可持续性的当前挑战。TLFIX在国际发展背景下构思，旨在促进地方赋权、经济发展和社会变革。所采用的方法包括定量、定性和材料基础的方法，包括调查、故事讲述和烹饪创新。作为该项目的咨询学者，我参与了研究设计，指导团队成员使用故事讲述作为方法，并参与了部分工作。在当前文本中，我利用重组、响应性和关系性等概念来解读我们的集体经验，并框定在复杂食品背景中开展混合方法和混合参与者工作的一个例子。总体而言，这个例子展示了在食品实践和学术研究中留出即兴发挥和新兴空间的方法。
摘要总结: Szanto（2022）基于定量、定性和实物方法的混合研究，分析了东帝汶食品创新者交流项目，强调在地方社区中与传统知识持有者合作的重要性，指出经济、文化认同和生态可持续性面临的挑战，并提出了增强地方赋权和社会变革的策略。

作者: Eklund, Anna Rylander; Aguiar, Ulises Navarro; Amacker, Ariana
摘要: Design thinking is based on designers' creative ways of working and is defined as a formal method for creative problem solving aimed at fostering innovation by harnessing the designer's sensibility and methods. The basic premise is that design thinking can be extracted and separated from the situated practice of designing in the studio. This approach has given rise to a widely accepted nomenclature for describing design which has improved communication between designers and managers, leading to massive interest in adoption of design thinking in management settings. However, due to a widespread implicit cognitivism in the literature, scholars find it difficult to explain the cultural and experiential qualities of design thinking and it tends to be presented as a fundamentally cognitive, problem-solving activity. We argue that these cognitivist tendencies preclude proper attention to and theorization of designers' creative practice. We contend that the absence of a theory of practice prevents a deeper understanding of the contribution of design thinking to innovation, loses sight of the sensibility on which it relies, and hampers realization of the promise of design thinking. We develop an alternative theoretical perspective, grounded in a pragmatist theory of practice and the studio culture from which designers' creative practice developed. This theoretical perspective allows design thinking to be understood as sensemaking, foregrounds imagination and improvisation as its core activities, and explains how sensibility is developed and nurtured. We review the design thinking literature through this pragmatist lens and discuss the implications for theory and practice of conceptualizing design thinking as sensemaking.
标题: Design thinking as sensemaking-Developing a pragmatist theory of practice to (re)introduce sensibility
标题翻译: 设计思维作为意义建构 - 发展一种实用主义的实践理论以(重新)引入敏感性
摘要翻译: 设计思维基于设计师的创造性工作方式，定义为一种旨在通过利用设计师的敏感性和方法促进创新的正式创造性问题解决方法。其基本前提是设计思维可以从设计实践中提取和分离出来，这种实践通常发生在工作室内。这一方法引发了一种广泛接受的术语，用于描述设计，从而改善了设计师与管理者之间的沟通，导致了对在管理环境中采用设计思维的巨大兴趣。然而，由于文献中普遍存在的隐性认知主义，学者们发现很难解释设计思维的文化和体验特征，而其往往被呈现为一种根本上认知的、解决问题的活动。我们认为，这些认知倾向阻碍了对设计师创造性实践的适当关注和理论化。我们主张，缺乏实践理论阻碍了对设计思维对创新的贡献的深入理解，忽视了其依赖的敏感性，并妨碍了设计思维潜力的实现。我们提出了一种替代性理论视角，该视角基于实用主义的实践理论以及设计师创造性实践所发展的工作室文化。这一理论视角使得设计思维可以被理解为意义构建，以想象和即兴创作为核心活动，并解释了敏感性是如何被发展和培养的。我们通过这一实用主义的视角回顾了设计思维文献，并讨论了将设计思维概念化为意义构建的理论与实践的影响。
摘要总结: Eklund等（2022）基于对设计思维文献的回顾，从实用主义实践理论出发，探讨设计思维作为一种感知机制的核心活动，如想象与即兴创作，指出对其文化和体验特质的忽视阻碍了对创新贡献的理解，并提出理论与实践的应用建议。

作者: Husak, Michal; Kaczmarczyk, Vaclav; Bastan, Ondrej; Arm, Jakub
摘要: Outages in the supply of basic medical supplies and protective equipment have led to efforts to replace them. The team of BUT employees and students has developed a protective half mask that can also be printed on a standard 3D printer without the use of special materials. The original half mask is intended as an improvised protection that can be easily printed on standard 3D printers with FDM technology. Problematic possibilities of sealing the entire surface of the print due to its porosity were solved with the help of a nitrile examination glove. Commonly available equipment is enough to produce this half mask. Copyright (c) 2022 The Authors. This is an open access article under the CC BY-NC-ND license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/
标题: Disadvantage of the FDM method for printing protective masks against COVID-19 and solution
标题翻译: FDM方法在打印COVID-19防护口罩中的缺点及解决方案
摘要翻译: 基础医疗用品和防护装备供应中断促使了替代品的研发。BUT的员工和学生团队开发了一种保护性半面罩，该面罩可在标准3D打印机上打印，无需特殊材料。该原始半面罩旨在作为一种临时保护，可以通过FDM技术在标准3D打印机上轻松打印。由于打印件的多孔性，封闭整个表面的潜在问题通过使用医用氯丁橡胶手套得以解决。常见的设备足以制作这种半面罩。版权（c）2022 作者。这是一篇在CC BY-NC-ND许可下的开放获取文章（https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/）。
摘要总结: Husak等（2022）基于医疗物资短缺的背景，开发了一种可在标准3D打印机上打印的防护口罩。研究利用FDM技术和氮化手套解决了打印表面密封问题，展示了常规设备就能生产这一即兴防护品的可行性。

作者: Fowler, Justin
摘要: In domestic design projects ranging from carpet prototypes for the Metropolitan Museum in New York to bridge infrastructures for Robert Moses, architects Ralph Walker and Aymar Embury II drew from their experiences of trauma, play, and tectonic improvisation as camoufleurs during the First World War to work through logics of protective concealment. As with the operations of artillery and personnel camouflage, where makeshift flat tops of fabric and foliage provided portable spaces of relief within a brutal theater of reciprocal violence, the 'masterly confusion' of much interwar architectural work long deemed 'modernistic', middlebrow, or not fully modern was often animated by therapeutic desires for safety and comfort. Here, designs which sought to mask or avoid the aesthetic and physiological shocks of modernity also furthered the entrenchment of modern forms of mobilization, organization, and risk management. This essay traces how formal ambivalence born out of protective necessity on the battlefields of the First World War migrated across surfaces and mutated into surfaces back in the United States, advancing fluid forms of capital and corporatism via subtle tectonic and material means across a range of scales. It also argues that descriptive difficulty with respect to interwar style (and its relation to 'modernity') starts to dissolve when switching registers to look at the attitudes that pervade these architectural practices of conscious equivocation. This work marks a critical episode in modern architecture's construction of an expanded notion of environment, where engagement was produced through and experienced as relief.
标题: Masterly Confusion: Ported Protection in the American Interwar
标题翻译: 精湛的困惑：美国战间期的移植保护
摘要翻译: 在国内设计项目中，从纽约大都会博物馆的地毯原型到罗伯特·摩西斯的桥梁基础设施，建筑师拉尔夫·沃克和艾梅尔·恩布里二世借鉴了他们在第一次世界大战期间作为伪装者的创伤、游戏和构造即兴的经历，以研究保护性隐蔽的逻辑。正如炮兵和人员伪装的运作，简易的布料和树叶制成的平顶提供了在残酷的相互暴力剧场中可移动的缓解空间，许多被长期视为“现代主义”、中庸或不完全现代的战争间期建筑作品的“高超混乱”往往受到对安全和舒适的治疗渴望的驱动。在这里，寻求掩盖或避免现代性审美和生理震撼的设计也进一步巩固了现代动员、组织和风险管理的形式。本文追踪了在第一次世界大战战场上出于保护需要而产生的形式模棱两可如何跨越表面并在美国回归时变异，借助微妙的构造和材料手段推动流动的资本和企业主义形式，涵盖多个尺度。文章还探讨了对于战争间期风格（及其与“现代性”关系）的描述困难在转换到观察这些有意识模棱两可的建筑实践所弥漫的态度时开始溶解。这项工作标志着现代建筑构建扩展环境概念的一个关键时刻，在这里，参与是通过并被体验为一种缓解而产生的。
摘要总结: Fowler（2022）通过分析拉尔夫·沃克和艾马尔·恩布里的设计项目，探讨他们在第一次世界大战期间的经历如何影响其建筑实践，发现其设计中的保护性伪装反映了对安全与舒适的需求，并对现代环境的构建产生了重要影响。

作者: Doerfel, Marya L.; Kim, Minkyung; Kwestel, Melanie; Yoon, Hyunsook; Quow, Justine
摘要: This study advances communication-centered resilience theory by examining adaptive capacity of nonprofit networks impacted by Hurricane Harvey in 2017. Data show how formal structures set up conditions for adaptive/informal organizing. This highlights a quandary for disaster planning: improvising emerges from organizations having plans in place. Iterative processes between formal and informal structures expanded capacity, building a foundation for work processes to scaffold from individual to organizational to interorganizational networks. Yet some employees were personally vulnerable, revealing a multilevel dilemma: organizations were resilient even if employees were not. This study also theorizes time as an endogenous mechanism. As workers perceived less urgency, process experts broadened communication across levels, integrating more complex work processes. Resilience differed between organizations that lacked process experts, revealing their critical role across levels. Findings point to a policy-making dilemma: successful resilience processes undermine pressure on policy-makers to mitigate threats that necessitate improving resilience processes to begin with.
标题: Resilience organizing: a multilevel communication framework
标题翻译: 韧性组织：多层次沟通框架
摘要翻译: 本研究通过考察2017年受到哈维飓风影响的非营利网络的适应能力，推进了以沟通为中心的韧性理论。数据表明，正式结构为适应性/非正式组织创造了条件。这突显了灾难规划中的一个难题：即兴发挥源于组织的计划到位。正式和非正式结构之间的迭代过程扩展了能力，为工作流程从个人到组织再到跨组织网络的支撑奠定了基础。然而，一些员工在个人层面上存在脆弱性，揭示了一个多层次的困境：即使员工不具备韧性，组织仍然是韧性的。本研究还理论化了时间作为一种内生机制。当员工感受到的紧迫性降低时，过程专家扩展了各层级之间的沟通，整合了更复杂的工作流程。在缺乏过程专家的组织中，韧性存在差异，揭示了过程专家在各层级中的关键角色。研究结果指向一个政策制定的困境：成功的韧性过程削弱了对政策制定者的压力，以减轻需要改进韧性过程的威胁。
摘要总结: Doerfel等（2022）基于2017年哈维飓风影响下非营利网络的研究，探讨了适应能力与沟通中心的韧性理论。研究发现，正式结构促进了适应性组织，而在缺乏过程专家的组织中，韧性表现不均，揭示了政策制定的困境。

期刊: CONSTRUCTION RESEARCH CONGRESS 2022: PROJECT MANAGEMENT AND DELIVERY, CONTRACTS, AND DESIGN AND MATERIALS
作者: Jiang, Kaiwen; Le, Yun; Zheng, Xian; Zhang, Xinyue
摘要: Organizational improvisation (0I) is a spontaneous process deviated from plans and routine, which is carried out by actors to deal with emerging issues or unexpected events. Megaprojects are confronted with complex and dynamic uncertain circumstances, leading to the requirement of distinct OI conducted by multi-level stakeholders. However, current research primarily focused on OI at the individual level in ordinary projects neglecting the multi-level and degree characteristics of OI in megaprojects. To systematically understand OI in megaprojects (MOI), this study introduced classic OI theory to megaprojects by constructing a three-dimension MOI framework, involving improvisation degree, organizational level, and project stage. An inductive approach was utilized via expert interviews and 424-event collection to consolidate the framework. The result demonstrated that MOI most frequently occurs at the construction stage, during which minor improvisation at the team level is the most common, followed by minor improvisation at the individual level, and bounded improvisation at the team level. This research extended OI theory into the construction megaprojects field by providing stakeholders with a further understanding of MOI to deal with various uncertainties.
标题: Understanding Organizational Improvisation in Construction Megaprojects
标题翻译: 理解建筑大项目中的组织即兴创作
摘要翻译: 组织即兴演奏（OI）是一种自发的过程，偏离计划和常规，由行动者实施以应对突发问题或意外事件。 mega项目面临着复杂和动态的不确定环境，导致多层次利益相关者需要进行不同的OI。然而，目前的研究主要集中在普通项目的个体层面的 OI ，忽视了 megaprojects 中 OI 的多层次和程度特征。为了系统地理解 megaprojects 中的 OI （MOI），本研究通过构建一个三维 MOI 框架，将经典的 OI 理论引入到 mega项目中，涉及即兴程度、组织层次和项目阶段。通过专家访谈和 424 个事件收集采用归纳方法来巩固该框架。结果表明，MOI 最常发生在施工阶段，在此期间，团队层面的微小即兴演奏最为常见，其次是个体层面的微小即兴演奏，以及团队层面的有限即兴演奏。本研究通过为利益相关者提供进一步了解 MOI 以应对各种不确定性，将 OI 理论扩展到建设 mega项目领域。
摘要总结: 姜凯文、乐云、郑冼和张新跃（2022）基于专家访谈和424个事件收集，构建了多维度的组织即兴框架，研究发现：在建筑阶段，团队层面的微小即兴最为常见，拓展了即兴理论在建筑大型项目中的应用，帮助利益相关者应对不确定性。

作者: Rego, Armenio; Vitoria, Andreia; Pina e Cunha, Miguel; Owens, Bradley P.; Ventura, Ana; Leal, Susana; Valverde, Camilo; Lourenco-Gil, Rui
摘要: In spite of a growing interest for improvisation in organizations, the microfoundations of improvisation have not been theorized yet. Exploring these microfoundations, we study how employees' psychological capital (PsyCap) acts as a critical cluster of resources to face improvisational challenges and how leaders who convey grit (operationalized as perseverance of effort: Grit-PE), counterbalanced with humility, create conditions to develop those resources. By building upon the conservation of resources and the dual-systems model of self-regulation theories, our empirical studies suggest that the interaction between two leader-conveyed resources (Grit-PE and humility) creates a contextual resource that helps employees develop PsyCap, thus making them more likely to improvise. The positive effect of high Grit-PE in leaders on employees' improvisation materializes mainly when leaders also are humble.
标题: Employees' Improvisational Behavior: Exploring the Role of Leader Grit and Humility
标题翻译: 员工的即兴行为：探索领导者的毅力和谦逊的作用
摘要翻译: 尽管组织中的即兴创作兴趣日益增长，但即兴创作的微观基础尚未被理论化。通过探索这些微观基础，我们研究了员工的心理资本（PsyCap）如何作为应对即兴挑战的重要资源集，以及传达毅力（操作化为努力的坚持：Grit-PE）并与谦逊相平衡的领导者如何创造条件以发展这些资源。基于资源的保存理论和自我调节的双系统模型，我们的实证研究表明，两种领导传达资源（Grit-PE 和谦逊）之间的互动创造了一种情境资源，帮助员工发展 PsyCap，从而使他们更有可能进行即兴创作。当领导者同时具备谦逊特质时，领导者高度的 Grit-PE 对员工即兴创作的积极影响主要显现出来。
摘要总结: Rego等（2022）以心理资本和领导者的坚定与谦逊为研究对象，探索组织中的即兴行为微观基础，通过实证研究发现，领导者传递的坚定与谦逊结合，能够提升员工的心理资本，从而提高其即兴能力。

作者: Perrmann-Graham, Jaclyn; Liu, Jing; Cangioni, Carole; Spataro, Sandra E.
摘要: We present an in-class improvisation (improv) exercise as a method to help students translate concepts of psychological safety into behaviors they can implement. Psychological safety has been shown to be critical to effective team functioning and vital to creativity and innovation on teams, yet not enough Management education is aimed at helping students bring the concept to life. The exercise presented here is targeted at empowering students to experience and enact psychological safety using the rules of improv as structural support. Student team presentations demonstrated that students embraced the aspects of improv that helped their team be more creative and more agile. More specific results, culled from individual student reflections on the exercise, indicate internalization of the tenets of improv to build safety on their teams. They were able to assert clear links between improv behaviors, aspects of psychological safety, and team performance; further, they clearly articulated future practices on their teams that would maintain that safety going forward. This article closes with a call for more ways to bring improv into management classrooms to empower students to be better innovators and better collaborators.
标题: Fostering psychological safety: Using improvisation as a team building tool in management education
标题翻译: 培养心理安全感：将即兴表演作为管理教育中的团队建设工具
摘要翻译: 我们提出了一种课堂即兴创作（improv）练习作为帮助学生将心理安全概念转化为可以实施的行为的方法。研究表明，心理安全对有效的团队运作至关重要，并且对团队的创造力和创新至关重要，但目前管理教育在帮助学生实现这一概念方面仍有不足。这里提出的练习旨在使学生能够体验和表现心理安全，利用即兴创作的规则作为结构支持。学生团队演示表明，学生们接受了即兴创作的各个方面，这些方面帮助他们的团队变得更加创造性和灵活。来自学生对该练习的个人反思的更具体结果表明，他们内化了即兴创作的原则，以在团队中建立安全感。他们能够明确指出即兴行为、心理安全的各个方面与团队表现之间的清晰联系；此外，他们还清晰地表达了未来在团队中保持这种安全感的做法。本文最后呼吁更多的方法将即兴创作引入管理课堂，以使学生能够成为更好的创新者和更好的合作者。
摘要总结: Perrmann-Graham等（2022）提出了一种课堂即兴练习，以帮助学生将心理安全概念转化为可实施的行为。研究发现，学生通过即兴规则增强了团队创造力和敏捷性，并在反思中内化了即兴的基本原则，促进了团队表现和未来的安全维护。

作者: Bhatt, Chayan; Singhal, Sunita
摘要: With consistent advancement in virtualization techniques, organizations are building up enhanced datacenters that are capable of maintaining impactful resource management, high-performance benchmarks, and controlled power consumption for eco-friendly computing. Virtual machine placement problem has a significant part in designing the datacenters. Placing virtual machines in the cloud can be very profitable and beneficial but it can be the cause of many new problems, if not performed properly. It comprises multiple complex relations and designing factors that directly affect the operating cost of datacenters. It bridges up the customers with cloud administrators to obtain preferences and SLA of both, to bring out an optimal solution. As optimization has given a boost to many businesses, an efficiently optimized VM placement technique has got a lot of potentials and can bring a drastic rise for many organizations running toward the cloud. A comprehensive study has been performed to bring out the important traits of different VM placement solutions by surveying cloud literature. By assessing the capabilities and objectives of different approaches and techniques, this paper presents an in-depth comparison, unveiling the drawbacks, and suggestions to improvise the methods in this direction.
标题: Anatomy of Virtual Machine Placement Techniques in Cloud
标题翻译: 云计算中虚拟机部署技术的分析
摘要翻译: 随着虚拟化技术的持续进步，组织正在建立能够维持有效资源管理、高性能基准和控制电力消耗的增强型数据中心，以实现环保计算。虚拟机放置问题在数据中心的设计中占有重要地位。将虚拟机放置在云中可以带来可观的利润和好处，但如果操作不当，也可能导致许多新问题。这涉及多个复杂关系和设计因素，直接影响数据中心的运营成本。它将客户与云管理员连接起来，以获得双方的偏好和服务水平协议(SLA)，从而找到最佳解决方案。由于优化为许多企业带来了推动，效率优化的虚拟机放置技术具有很大的潜力，可以为许多向云计算迈进的组织带来显著的增长。本研究通过对云计算文献的调查，进行了全面研究，以揭示不同虚拟机放置解决方案的重要特征。通过评估不同方法和技术的能力和目标，本文提供了深入的比较，揭示了缺陷，并提出了改善该方向方法的建议。
摘要总结: Bhatt和Singhal（2022）通过对云计算文献的综合研究，分析了虚拟机布局问题及其对数据中心运营成本的影响，提出优化虚拟机 placement 技术的重要性，以提升资源管理和企业性能，并提供了改进现有方法的建议。

作者: Spagnoletti, Paolo; Kazemargi, Niloofar; Prencipe, Andrea
摘要: As software products increasingly become part of larger ecosystems, research and development (R&D) units of software producers organize themselves around projects to become more responsive to the environment. Organizations participating in software ecosystems must continuously adapt and adjust their software development and maintenance processes to drive both medium-term and long-term innovation. Agile methods and practices are widely adopted to guide the collaboration within and between project teams in software development. Moreover, when successfully attained, agility can drive innovation by enabling software development organizations to cope with technological changes and exploit emerging opportunities in software ecosystems. In this article, we focus on how organizations attain agility in the maintenance and development of software products. To answer this question, we conduct a longitudinal case study of Agile Scrum implementation in the R&D unit of a major supplier of telecommunication equipment. We investigate the emerging tensions and highlight practices used to balance these tensions in the Agile Scrum implementation. We identify four capabilities and ten practices that support effective collaboration and coordination in the development and maintenance of software products. The study offers practical guidance for R&D managers to attain agility in software ecosystems.
标题: Agile Practices and Organizational Agility in Software Ecosystems
标题翻译: 软件生态系统中的敏捷实践与组织敏捷性
摘要翻译: 随着软件产品越来越多地成为更大生态系统的一部分，软件生产者的研发单位围绕项目进行组织，以便更加灵活地响应环境。参与软件生态系统的组织必须不断调整其软件开发和维护流程，以推动中期和长期的创新。敏捷方法和实践被广泛采用，以指导软件开发中项目团队之间的合作。此外，当成功实现敏捷时，它可以通过使软件开发组织能够应对技术变革并利用软件生态系统中的新兴机会来驱动创新。在本文中，我们重点关注组织在软件产品的维护和开发中如何实现敏捷。为回答这个问题，我们对一家主要电信设备供应商的研发单位实施Agile Scrum进行了纵向案例研究。我们调查了出现的紧张关系，并强调了在Agile Scrum实施中用于平衡这些紧张关系的实践。我们确定了支持软件产品开发和维护中有效合作与协调的四种能力和十种实践。本研究为研发经理在软件生态系统中实现敏捷提供了实际指导。
摘要总结: Spagnoletti等(2022)通过对主要电信设备供应商的研发部门进行纵向案例研究，探讨了在Agile Scrum实施中组织如何实现敏捷性，识别出四种能力和十项实践，以支持软件产品开发与维护中的有效协作与协调，为研发经理在软件生态系统中的敏捷实现提供实际指导。

期刊: 2022 IEEE 13TH INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON MECHANICAL AND INTELLIGENT MANUFACTURING TECHNOLOGIES (ICMIMT 2022)
作者: Johan Giroth, Ezra; Ang, Edward B.
摘要: Exhaust gas emissions from marine diesel engines are expected to rise dramatically in future decades where hazardous compounds containing NO2, SO2, CO2, and complex particulate matter will affect the human respiratory system and the ecosystem of the environment. The United Nations have addressed through International Maritime Organization (IMO) for emission control areas (ECA) under Marpol Annex VI to impose mandatory limits of SOx and NOx emissions in designated areas of ECA and Non-ECA. The legislation mandated for ECA areas of 0.10 (99%) and 0.50 (95%) cleaned air by either utilizing high-cost compliant fuel or the alternative approach using SOx Scrubbers. The study aims to design an efficient SOx scrubber and system improvisation utilizing actual boiler engine inputs based on a successfully trialed scrubber from Serwah Ibrahim's study from Chalmers University, Sweden. As scrubber technology emerges, high-cost fabrication and poor material selection opted to be the problem. With the Researcher's experience and thorough investigation, the research was able to calculate the lower cost and efficient material thickness together with calculations of each component using the ASME VIII division 1 guidebook. The study calculated nozzle positioning on dish head, miter bend calculation, and reinforcement pad calculation. The research proved for potential power harnessing through the utilization of fluid emission of power calculation about 45 KW can be harnessed of 30 m/s as fluid velocity retrieved from ANSYS with 210,000 kg/hr of exhaust gas. Moreover, 900 cubic meters per hour at 60 meters supplied head for seawater distributions have proved that SOx gases were able to be removed completely during the chemical reaction between packing bed and demisters using ANSYS software. Packing bed software was also used with 79% for each capacity filtration of SOx components with seawater. Overall, the study has shown 4.4 times more economical compared with commercial scrubbers and 40% higher overall efficiency from the perspective of material cost and system efficiency on further energy utilization for power generation.
标题: The Design and Evaluation of Exhaust Gas Cleaning System Equipped with SOx Scrubber
标题翻译: 配备SOx洗涤器的 exhaust gas 清净系统的设计与评估
摘要翻译: 海洋柴油发动机的废气排放预计在未来几十年将急剧上升，含有NO2、SO2、CO2及复杂颗粒物的有害化合物将影响人类呼吸系统和环境生态系统。联合国通过国际海事组织(IMO)针对《国际防止船舶造成的污染公约》第六附则（MARPOL Annex VI）提出了排放控制区（ECA），要求在指定的ECA和非ECA区域内强制限制SOx和NOx的排放。这项立法要求ECA区域内使用高成本合规燃料或采用使用SOx洗涤器的替代方法，实现0.10（99%）和0.50（95%）的清洁空气。该研究旨在设计一种高效的SOx洗涤器，并基于瑞典查尔默斯大学Serwah Ibrahim的成功试验洗涤器，利用实际锅炉发动机输入进行系统改进。随着洗涤器技术的出现，高成本的制造和不良的材料选择成为了问题。在研究者的经验和深入调查下，本研究能够计算出较低成本和高效材料的厚度，并使用ASME VIII第1部分指南书对各个组件进行计算。研究计算了罐头上喷嘴的位置、斜弯头的计算以及加固垫的设计。研究证明，通过利用流体发电的排放计算，约可收集45KW的功率，该功率可由从ANSYS获取的每秒30米的流体速度和210,000千克/小时的废气所提供。此外，60米供给水头下每小时900立方米的海水分配证明在填料床与除雾器的化学反应中，SOx气体能够被完全去除。填料床软件在处理每种SOx成分的海水过滤能力方面也达到了79%。总体而言，该研究表明，与商业洗涤器相比，其经济性提高了4.4倍，并且在材料成本和系统效率方面提供了40%更高的整体效率，为后续发电的能源利用创造了机会。
摘要总结: Johan Giroth和Edward B. Ang（2022）基于实际锅炉发动机输入，设计了一种高效的SOx洗涤器，利用ANSYS软件计算其材料厚度和组件，研究表明该洗涤器在材料成本和系统效率上相较商用洗涤器更经济，具备更高的能量利用潜力。

作者: Arias-Perez, Jose; Cepeda-Cardona, Juan
摘要: Purpose This paper aims to analyze the moderating effect of technological turbulence caused by artificial intelligence on the relationship between the traditional knowledge management strategies of personalization (tacit knowledge) and codification (explicit knowledge), and organizational improvisation, which refers to the firm's ability to generate ideas and respond to changes in the technological environment in real time. Until now, individuals have played a key and indispensable role in organizational improvisation since they are the owners of tacit knowledge and users of explicit knowledge. Design/methodology/approach The research model was tested in a sample of firms from sectors in which the adoption of intelligent robots is growing. Findings Both personalization and codification have a positive and significant influence on improvisation, the former to a greater extent. Nevertheless, when technological turbulence caused by artificial intelligence occurs, the relationship between personalization and improvisation is weakened, whereas the link between codification and improvisation is strengthened. Originality/value Contrary to the pre-digital literature consensus, explicit knowledge is becoming the new major driver of organizational improvisation, while tacit knowledge sharing is losing strength and relevance. This finding may be a first indication that intelligent robots are the new exponents of improvisation for their ability to respond to changes in the environment in real time because of a combination of explicit knowledge, beyond being a mere support tool for humans.
标题: Knowledge management strategies and organizational improvisation: what changed after the emergence of technological turbulence caused by artificial intelligence?
标题翻译: 知识管理策略与组织即兴创作：人工智能引发的技术动荡后发生了什么变化？
摘要翻译: 目的 本文旨在分析由人工智能引发的技术动荡对个性化（隐性知识）和整编（显性知识）这两种传统知识管理策略与组织即兴创作之间关系的调节作用。组织即兴创作指的是企业在技术环境变化时实时生成创意和响应变化的能力。到目前为止，个人在组织即兴创作中发挥了关键且不可或缺的作用，因为他们是隐性知识的拥有者和显性知识的使用者。设计/方法论/方法 本研究模型在采用智能机器人增长的行业样本中进行了测试。发现 个性化和整编对即兴创作均有正向且显著的影响，前者的影响程度更大。然而，当人工智能引发的技术动荡发生时，个性化与即兴创作之间的关系减弱，而整编与即兴创作之间的联系则得到了加强。原创性/价值 与数字化前文献共识相反，显性知识正成为组织即兴创作的新主要驱动因素，而隐性知识分享的力量和相关性正在减弱。该发现可能首次表明，智能机器人是在实时响应环境变化方面的新即兴创作代表，因为它们通过显性知识的结合，超越了仅仅作为人类支持工具的角色。
摘要总结: Arias-Perez和Cepeda-Cardona(2022)研究了人工智能引起的技术动荡对个性化知识管理和编码知识管理与组织即兴创新之间关系的调节作用，发现个性化和编码对即兴创新均有积极影响，但在技术动荡下，个性化关系减弱，编码关系增强，这表明显性知识驱动即兴创新的作用日益增强。

作者: Wang Bingcheng; Zhao Jingyi; Jiang Liwen
摘要: With the constant development of market demands,business model innovation has become an important way for enterprises to create value and enhance competitiveness,which is conducive to the sustainable development of enterprises. However, enterprises are prone to form  inertia, which is manifested as  take things as they are or  path dependence. According to the path - dependence theory,once an enterprise chooses the development path of a certain business model,it will become dependent on it,and make limited relevant decisions. In reality,large traditional retail enterprises such as Carrefour and Metro have failed to innovate their business models in a timely manner as changes in the Chinese retail market occur but adhered to their original concepts and models,which leads to a gradual withdrawal from the Chinese market. Therefore,how to carry out business model innovation is an urgent problem to be solved when an organization is in a state of inertia. Based on this,this paper takes the traditional retail enterprises as samples and uses the grounded theory method to explore the process of business model innovation in the inert atmosphere. In this study,data is obtained from various channels,and primary data and secondary data is combined to increase the richness of data. Firstly,relevant data are labeled,conceptualized and categorized by open coding to identify the initial category. Then the main category is obtained by using spindle coding. Finally, through selective coding,the relationship structure between main categories is established and the core categories are further identified, so as to form a story line according to the connections among categories,and finally the business model innovation process model of the organization under the inert atmosphere is constructed. This paper draws the following conclusions: (1) Environmental pressure urges organizations to reflect on existing business models,and then take measures to carry out business model innovation. (2) The effective combination of initiative forgetting, learning and borrowing in knowledge construction is more conducive for organizations to carry out business model innovation in an inert atmosphere. Firstly,organizations can forget the old norms,systems and performance standards through initiative forgetting, so as to reduce their dependence on the original business model. Secondly,organizations should change the internal innovation atmosphere through learning and actively explore and optimize the new business model. Finally,developing new business models requires borrowing existing organizational resources to make appropriate connections between the old and new business models. (3) Organizations network embedding also has an important influence on the knowledge construction process of business model. Relationship embedding enables organizations to acquire explicit and implicit knowledge through information sharing,mutual trust and commitment. Structural embedding reflects the position of organizations in the network,and affects the heterogeneity of organizations' acquisition of business model innovation knowledge. (4) On the basis of knowledge construction,enhancing the improvisation ability of the organization is conducive to improving the immediacy and creativity of business model innovation,so as to better weaken organizational inertia and promote business model innovation.
标题: How do organizations carry out business model innovation in an inert atmosphere?
标题翻译: 组织如何在惰性氛围中进行商业模式创新？
摘要翻译: 随着市场需求的不断发展，商业模式创新已成为企业创造价值和增强竞争力的重要途径，有利于企业的可持续发展。然而，企业容易形成惯性，表现为对现状的接受或路径依赖。根据路径依赖理论，一旦企业选择了某一商业模式的发展路径，它就会变得依赖于此，并限制相关决策的制定。实际上，像家乐福和麦德龙这样的传统大型零售企业，在中国零售市场发生变化时未能及时创新其商业模式，仍然坚持原有的理念和模式，导致逐渐退出中国市场。因此，如何在组织处于惯性状态时进行商业模式创新是一个亟待解决的问题。在此基础上，本文以传统零售企业为样本，采用扎根理论方法探讨在惯性氛围下的商业模式创新过程。本研究通过多种渠道获得数据，将初级数据和次级数据结合起来，以增加数据的丰富性。首先，通过开放式编码对相关数据进行标记、概念化和分类，以识别初步类别。然后，使用主轴编码获得主要类别。最后，通过选择性编码建立主要类别之间的关系结构，进一步识别核心类别，形成类别间关系的故事线，最终构建组织在惯性氛围下的商业模式创新过程模型。本文得出以下结论：(1) 环境压力促使组织反思现有商业模式，并采取措施开展商业模式创新。(2) 知识构建中主动遗忘、学习和借鉴的有效结合，更有利于组织在惯性氛围中进行商业模式创新。首先，组织可以通过主动遗忘来忘却旧的规范、系统和绩效标准，从而减少对原有商业模式的依赖。其次，组织应通过学习改变内部创新氛围，积极探索和优化新商业模式。最后，开发新商业模式需要借用现有组织资源，以在旧和新商业模式之间建立适当的联系。(3) 组织的网络嵌入也对商业模式的知识构建过程有重要影响。关系嵌入使组织能够通过信息共享、相互信任和承诺获取显性和隐性知识。结构嵌入反映了组织在网络中的位置，并影响组织获取商业模式创新知识的异质性。(4) 在知识构建的基础上，提高组织的即兴能力有助于提升商业模式创新的及时性和创造性，从而更好地削弱组织惯性，推动商业模式创新。
摘要总结: 王炳成、赵京宜和江丽雯（2022）基于传统零售企业，采用扎根理论方法研究商业模式创新的过程，结合多渠道数据，发现环境压力和知识建设结合促进了组织在惯性状态下开展创新，为企业提供了应对市场转变的有效路径建议。

作者: Preis, Heidi; Bojsza, Elizabeth; Lindenfeld, Laura; Gan, Tong J.; Pati, Susmita
摘要: BackgroundMedical improvisation is an innovative approach to train healthcare professionals in effective communication. The success of this type of training depends on the active engagement of participants.MethodA total of 136 interprofessional healthcare workers completed surveys before and after a two-hour medical improvisation communication training session in October 2020. We investigated individual- and program-level contributors to participation outputs (e.g. engagement and experience).Results97% of healthcare professionals in the participating department took part in the training. 82% described the training in positive terms or as a learning experience. Younger participants, medical doctors, and those who had difficulty tolerating uncertainty were less excited than others about training. Their engagement was associated with their excitement and group size. Uncertainty tolerance predicted engagement via a full mediation of excitement.ConclusionsBuilding excitement, reducing uncertainty about training, and capping group size are likely to improve participant's engagement and experience and will inform dissemination and implementation efforts.
标题: Process evaluation of a medical improvisation program for healthcare communication training
标题翻译: 医疗沟通培训医疗即兴表演项目的过程评估
摘要翻译: 背景 医疗即兴表演是一种创新方法，用于培养医疗专业人员的有效沟通能力。这种培训的成功依赖于参与者的积极参与。方法 2020年10月，共有136名跨专业医疗工作者在两小时的医疗即兴表演沟通培训课程前后完成了问卷调查。我们调查了参与输出（例如，参与度和体验）的个体和项目层面因素。结果 参与部门的97%医疗专业人员参与了培训。82%的人以积极的方式描述了该培训，或将其视为学习体验。年轻参与者、医生以及那些对不确定性感到难以忍受的参与者对培训的兴奋度较低。他们的参与度与他们的兴奋感和小组规模相关。不确定性耐受性通过兴奋感的完全中介预测参与度。结论 提高兴奋感、减少对培训的不确定性以及限制小组规模可能会改善参与者的参与度和体验，并将为传播和实施工作提供依据。
摘要总结: Preis et al.（2022）通过对136名医疗工作者在2020年进行两小时医疗即兴沟通培训的前后调查，发现促进参与者积极性的因素包括年轻程度、医学背景和不确定性容忍度。研究显示，提升参与者兴奋度、减少不确定感和控制小组规模有助于提高参与度和培训体验。

作者: Love, Peter E. D.; Ika, Lavagnon; Luo, Hanbin; Zhou, Ying; Zhong, Botao; Fang, Weili
摘要: In this article, we aim to address the following research question: How can a construction organization reduce and contain errors in its projects and mitigate rework and failures? We adopt an organizing sense-making perspective to acquire a sense of order of quality (e.g., rework) and to understand its relationship with safety (e.g., unsafe behavior) in construction. We undertook semistructured interviews from a range of employees involved with delivering a construction organization's projects. Also, documentary sources were accessed to supplement the rework and safety incidents that were referenced during the interviewing process. We found that the construction organization's prevailing culture focused on error prevention, which stymied its ability to learn and reduce rework in projects. The organization consciously enacted a trade-off between quality and safety. The upshot of this either/or framing of competing values was the suppression by senior management of nonconformances, which then led to deviant behavior manifesting in projects. We also revealed that safety incidents tended to arise when people engaged in unsafe behaviors while performing rework. The empirical evidence supports our call for construction organizations to engage in error management so that they can cultivate mindfulness where individuals and project teams can improvise and better handle errors, so they are not repeated.
标题: Rework, Failures, and Unsafe Behavior: Moving Toward an Error Management Mindset in Construction
标题翻译: 返工、失败与不安全行为：向建筑行业的错误管理思维转变
摘要翻译: 在本文中，我们旨在探讨以下研究问题：施工组织如何减少和控制项目中的错误，减轻返工和失败的发生？我们采用了组织感知的视角，以获取质量（例如返工）的秩序感，并理解其与安全（例如不安全行为）之间的关系。我们对参与施工组织项目交付的一系列员工进行了半结构化访谈。此外，还访问了文件资料，以补充访谈过程中提到的返工和安全事件。我们发现，该施工组织的主流文化集中于错误预防，这阻碍了其学习和减少项目中返工的能力。该组织有意识地在质量和安全之间进行权衡。这种竞争价值的“非此即彼”的框架导致高层管理抑制不合规范的行为，从而在项目中表现出偏差行为。我们还揭示，当人们在进行返工时参与不安全行为时，安全事件往往会发生。实证证据支持我们的呼吁，要求施工组织参与错误管理，以便培养一种正念，使个人和项目团队能够即兴应对和更好地处理错误，从而避免错误重演。
摘要总结: Love等（2022）通过对建筑项目相关员工的半结构访谈和文献资料分析，探讨了如何减少建筑项目中的错误与返工，发现组织文化强调错误预防却抑制了学习能力，导致质量与安全之间的取舍，引发不合规行为，建议建筑组织进行错误管理以提升应对能力。

作者: Begun, Stephanie; Mayorga, Brigette; Bautista, Cam; Cooke, Krysta; Edwards, Travonne; King, Bryn; Olaosebikan, Hamzat; Whyte, Rae -Ann
摘要: This study qualitatively explored the potential of improv for strengthening youth-adult partnerships. Seven members of a youth-adult research collaborative participated in a 2-hour professionally facilitated improv workshop. Participants provided insights about their experiences through a follow-up qualitative interview questionnaire. Participants indicated that improv assisted in dismantling power differentials that often exist in youth-adult partnership contexts, also noting that improv helped them to express their true selves more readily, along with helping them to see new and more human sides to their team members. Participants were enthusiastic about accessing further improv opportunities, noting that improv should be embedded into other youth-adult partnership efforts, as such approaches were deemed particularly helpful in building relationships and trust. The further inclusion of improv activities in youth -serving intervention and prevention efforts would benefit from additional exploration as ways by which youth-adult collaborations might be innovated and strengthened.
标题: A Pilot Study Exploring the Potential of Improv in Strengthening Youth-Adult Partnerships
标题翻译: 探讨即兴表演在加强青少年与成人伙伴关系中的潜力的初步研究
摘要翻译: 本研究定性探讨了即兴表演在强化青年与成人伙伴关系中的潜力。七名青年-成人研究合作小组的成员参加了一个由专业主持的两小时即兴表演研讨会。参与者通过后续的定性访谈问卷提供了他们的经验见解。参与者指出，即兴表演有助于消除青年与成人伙伴关系中常存在的权力差异，并且还帮助他们更容易地表达真实自我，同时让他们看到了团队成员的新的人性化面貌。参与者对进一步获取即兴表演的机会表示热情，认为即兴表演应融入其他青年-成人伙伴关系的努力中，因为这种方法被认为在建立关系和信任方面特别有帮助。在服务青年的干预和预防努力中进一步纳入即兴表演活动，将有助于探索创新和强化青年-成人合作的新方式。
摘要总结: Begun等（2022）通过对七名参与者进行两小时即兴表演工作坊后进行的定性访谈，探讨即兴表演在增强青少年与成年人合作中的潜力。研究发现，即兴表演有助于打破权力差异，促进真诚表达，增强团队之间的信任与关系，建议在青少年服务项目中进一步融入此类活动。

作者: Velez-Ocampo, Juan; Gonzalez-Perez, Maria Alejandra
摘要: Existing literature on emerging-market multinational enterprises (EMNEs) often acknowledges their competitive weaknesses, latecomer disadvantages, poor governance structures, technological deficiencies, and dependence on local resources. Despite these structural disadvantages, some EMNEs have succeeded in becoming global and regional leaders in their respective industries. Many studies explore how EMNEs are internationalizing. However, the discussion of what to expect from a successful overseas expansion remains very limited, especially when considering fast-changing industries in unpredictable markets. The purpose of this paper is to analyze how and why an EMNE competing in a changing industry in turbulent geographies builds capabilities to remain competitive locally and internationally. Using a qualitative case study approach, we identify the company's responses to reconfiguration forces related to the entry of new competitors, difficulties in protecting knowledge, technological change, and sophistication. Our study highlights re-invention, re-pioneering, and re-signaling as new capabilities that emerge as a result of adapting to a fast-changing industry in unpredictable environments.
标题: Internationalization and capability building in emerging markets: What comes after success?
标题翻译: 新兴市场的国际化与能力建设：成功之后会发生什么？
摘要翻译: 现有文献对新兴市场跨国企业（EMNEs）往往承认它们在竞争方面的弱点、后期进入者劣势、治理结构不健全、技术缺陷以及对本地资源的依赖。尽管存在这些结构性劣势，部分EMNEs在各自行业中获得了全球和区域领导地位。许多研究探讨了EMNEs如何实现国际化。然而，关于成功海外扩张所需预期的讨论依然非常有限，尤其是在考虑到不稳定市场中快速变化的行业时。本文的目的是分析在动荡地带伴随行业变化的EMNE，如何构建能力以在当地和国际上保持竞争力。通过定性案例研究方法，我们识别出公司对新竞争者进入、知识保护困难、技术变化及其复杂性的重新调整所做出的响应。我们的研究强调了重新创造、重新开创和重新信号作为在不确定环境中适应快速变化行业所产生的新能力。
摘要总结: Velez-Ocampo和Gonzalez-Perez（2022）采用定性案例研究法，分析了处于动荡地理环境中、新兴市场跨国企业如何通过重新发明、重新开拓和重新信号化等新能力，成功应对竞争、技术变化与不确定性，保持国际竞争力。

作者: Rosales, Virginia; Gaim, Medhanie; Berti, Marco; Cunha, Miguel Pina e
摘要: Organizational routines embody the stability-change duality: for routines to be consistent, actors performing them must improvise to adjust to changing conditions. While these interdependent aspects are often intuitively navigated by organizational actors, sometimes they can manifest as contradictory, paradoxical requirements. Using a paradox lens, this paper explores how individuals deal with tensions as they oscillate between preserving and altering routines. Building on an ethnography of an emergency room, we unpack routine dynamics and identify three tensions with paradoxical attributes: learning vs. efficiency, flexibility vs. compliance, and au-tonomy vs. control. When triggers render tensions salient, organizational members rely on three responses (avoiding, shrinking, and stretching) to deal with tensions while performing routines. Based on these findings, we contribute to the routines and paradox literatures by discussing how routines are used as rubber bands in balancing tensions.
标题: The rubber band effect: Managing the stability-change paradox in routines
标题翻译: 橡皮筋效应：管理例行事务中的稳定-变化悖论
摘要翻译: 组织惯例体现了稳定性与变革的二元性：为了保持惯例的一致性，执行这些惯例的参与者必须即兴发挥，以适应不断变化的条件。尽管这些相互依存的方面通常由组织参与者直观地进行调节，但有时它们可能表现为矛盾、悖论的要求。本文利用悖论视角探讨了个人如何应对张力，在维持与改变惯例之间摇摆不定。基于对急诊室的民族志研究，我们解剖了惯例动态，并识别出具有悖论属性的三种张力：学习与效率、灵活性与合规性，以及自主性与控制。当触发因素使张力变得明显时，组织成员依赖于三种应对方式（回避、缩小和扩展）来处理在执行惯例时的张力。基于这些发现，我们通过讨论惯例如何作为橡皮筋来平衡张力，为惯例和悖论文献做出了贡献。
摘要总结: Rosales等（2022）通过对急救室的 ethnography 研究，探讨组织常规中稳定性与变革之间的张力，识别出学习与效率、灵活性与合规性、自主性与控制的三种矛盾张力，发现组织成员在应对这些张力时，采用规避、缩减和拉伸等策略。

期刊: JOURNAL OF CONTINGENCIES AND CRISIS MANAGEMENT
作者: Steen, Riana; Haakonsen, Geir; Patriarca, Riccardo
摘要: Standard emergency-management procedures offer guidance on how organizations can improve their handling of all types of emergencies. However, such a generalization undermines uncertainties and oversimplifies the complexity of real work practices during an emergency response operation (ERO). The handling of the COVID-19 pandemic highlights how uncertainty and escalating consequences reinforce the need for resilience in EROs. To illustrate the key elements of our suggested approach and its practical implications, we discuss the issues in light of a case study related to a COVID-19 outbreak on a floating oil rig in the North Sea. The analysis reveals several instances of creative problem solving, and individual and collective efforts beyond the scope of the standard procedures. It also underlines how the shortcomings of resource allocation and over-planning might lead to inflexibility, thus harming EROs' efficiency. Our analysis highlights that the key to resilient EROs lies in robust coordination, the ability to improvise, transparency, and trusting communication between the actors involved. Greater focus on network building-proactively maintained through regular training and exercise activities-strengthens resilience in emergency-management systems. All these traits link to the Norwegian term samhandling, a notion which is here proposed to summarize and connect these resilience capacities.
标题: Samhandling: On the nuances of resilience through case study research in emergency response operations
标题翻译: 协作：通过案例研究在应急响应操作中的韧性细微差别
摘要翻译: 标准的应急管理程序提供了指导，帮助组织改善对各种类型紧急情况的处理。然而，这种概括忽视了不确定性，简化了应急响应操作（ERO）中实际工作实践的复杂性。COVID-19疫情的处理突显出不确定性和不断升级的后果进一步加强了对ERO中韧性需求的重要性。为了说明我们建议的方法的关键要素及其实际影响，我们讨论了与北海一座浮动石油平台COVID-19疫情相关的案例研究。分析揭示了几个创造性问题解决的实例，以及超出标准程序范围的个人和集体努力。它还强调了资源分配和过度规划的不足可能导致不灵活，从而危害ERO的效率。我们的分析强调，韧性ERO的关键在于强有力的协调、即兴发挥的能力、透明度以及相关参与者之间的信任沟通。更加关注网络建设——通过定期的培训和演习活动主动维护——增强应急管理系统的韧性。这些特征都与挪威术语“samhandling”相关联，在此我们提议将其作为总结和连接这些韧性能力的概念。
摘要总结: Steen等（2022）通过分析北海一浮油平台的COVID-19疫情案例，探讨应急响应操作中的不确定性与复杂性，发现标准应急管理程序未能有效应对实际情况，强调弹性应对、协调、即兴发挥与透明沟通等关键因素，并提出通过定期培训强化网络建设以提升应急管理系统的韧性。

作者: Lai, Hsien-Che; Lee, Tai-Yu
摘要: PurposeThis study aims to investigate how bricolage and improvisation increase the opportunities for supply chain integration of contract manufacturers. Connecting bricolage/improvisation with resource dependence theory offers an appropriate theoretical lens with which to understand the increasing focus on the view that bricolage and improvisation are feasible ways to create desired resources for contract manufacturers.
