Such resources can then enhance the autonomy of contract manufacturers in supply chain by building contract manufacturer-supply chain partner relationship interdependencies.Design/methodology/approachGiven that the primary focus of the study was whether and how contract manufacturers respond to resource constraints, namely, bricolage and improvisation and environmental uncertainty as a moderating effect of fastener contract manufacturers' supplier/buyer integration, only firms that had contractual agreements involving manufacturing services for original equipment manufacturer and/or original design manufacture data were included in this population. This study selected a population from a list of 674 fastener firms provided by the Taiwan Industrial Fastener Institute in 2020 using a mailed survey to test the hypotheses. By the beginning of 2022, 165 completed questionnaires were returned, and the total useable sample was 158.FindingsHypotheses are tested using 158 contract manufacturers of the Taiwanese fastener industry. Results show that bricolage can lead contract manufacturers to initiate supplier and buyer integration. The moderating effect of environmental uncertainty further strengthens the above positive relationships. Without the moderating effect of the environmental uncertainty, improvisation leads contract manufacturers to initiate only supplier but not buyer integration. However, when the moderating effect of environmental uncertainty is included, improvisation leads contract manufacturers to initiate only buyer integration.Originality/valueThis finding highlights the importance of the environmental uncertainty when contract manufacturers adopt bricolage/improvisation to initiate supply chain integration.
标题: How Taiwanese contract manufacturers initiate supply chain integration: the effects of bricolage, improvisation and environmental uncertainty
标题翻译: 台湾代工厂如何启动供应链整合：即兴创作、即兴和环境不确定性的影响
摘要翻译:
目的 本研究旨在探讨 bricolage（拼凑）和即兴发挥如何增加合同制造商的供应链整合机会。将 bricolage 和即兴发挥与资源依赖理论相结合，为理解这一观点提供了适当的理论视角，即 bricolage 和即兴发挥是合同制造商创建所需资源的可行方法。这些资源随后可以通过建立合同制造商与供应链合作伙伴之间的关系依赖性来增强合同制造商在供应链中的自主性。

设计/方法论/方法 鉴于本研究的主要关注点是合同制造商如何应对资源限制，即 bricolage 和即兴发挥，以及环境不确定性作为紧固件合同制造商供应商/买方整合的调节作用，本文仅包括那些与原始设备制造商和/或原始设计制造商有关的制造服务的合同协议公司。本研究从2020年台湾工业紧固件协会提供的674家紧固件公司的名单中选择了一个样本，采用邮寄调查来检验假设。到2022年初，共有165份有效问卷返回，总可用样本为158。

发现 本研究通过158家台湾紧固件行业的合同制造商检验假设。结果表明，briocolage 促使合同制造商启动供应商和买方整合。环境不确定性的调节作用进一步强化了上述积极关系。在没有环境不确定性的调节作用的情况下，即兴发挥仅使合同制造商启动供应商整合，而不涉及买方整合。然而，当考虑环境不确定性的调节作用时，即兴发挥使合同制造商仅启动买方整合。

原创性/价值 本研究的发现突显了在合同制造商采用 bricolage 和即兴发挥以启动供应链整合时，环境不确定性的重要性。
摘要总结: 赖显哲和李泰宇（2023）基于2020年台湾工业紧固件协会提供的674家紧固件企业数据，通过问卷调查研究发现，资源依赖理论视角下， bricolage和即兴创作有助于提升合同制造商的供应链整合机会，环境不确定性在此过程中起到调节作用。

作者: Maekelberg, Sanne; Kristensen, Peter Thule
摘要: On 26 November 1740 the Danish royal family took up residence in the new Christiansborg Palace, located at the center of Copenhagen. As was the case for many other European court residences, construction, especially on the interiors, continued well after the inauguration of the palace. In this paper we look at examples of different notions of privacy and how the spatial organization of the first Christiansborg Palace contributed to the living experiences of the residents. While the surviving floor plans show a magnificent residence, the actual living situation must have differed considerably from the ideal evoked by these widespread drawings. The inventories depict a residence that is only partly used, with empty rooms and unfinished spatial sequences. The most ceremonial routes in particular, including the great hall or the king's staircase, were incomplete. The hierarchical structure established by the succession of rooms was hence nullified by shortcuts and the daily use of actual accesses and connections. Court instructions and reports of foreign visits give more insight into these accesses that were ad hoc or improvised.
标题: Unfinished Business? Informal Privacy and the Private at the Perpetual Construction Site of the First Christiansborg Palace (1740-1794)
标题翻译: 未完成的事务？第一座克里斯蒂安堡宫殿（1740-1794）的非正式隐私与私人生活于持续建设现场
摘要翻译: 1740年11月26日，丹麦王室迁入位于哥本哈根中心的新基督堡宫。与许多其他欧洲宫廷住宅一样，建筑施工，尤其是室内装修，在宫殿启用后仍然持续进行。本文探讨了不同隐私观念的例子，以及第一座基督堡宫的空间组织如何影响居民的生活体验。尽管现存的平面图展示了一个宏伟的住所，但实际的居住情况与这些广泛传播的图纸所唤起的理想状态可能存在很大差异。清单描绘了一个仅部分使用的住所，内有空房间和未完成的空间序列。尤其是最为典礼化的通道，包括大礼堂和国王楼梯，均不完整。因此，房间的继承所建立的等级结构被捷径和实际使用的出入口所抵消。宫廷指示和外宾访问报告为这些临时或即兴的出入口提供了更多的见解。
摘要总结: Maekelberg和Kristensen(2023)分析了1740年丹麦基督堡宫的空间组织及隐私观念，利用生存的平面图和库存，揭示居住实际情况与理想存在差异，指出仪式性通道的不完善和日常使用的灵活性。这为理解宫殿的居住体验提供了新的视角。

作者: Houran, Mohamad Abou; Bukhari, Syed M. Salman; Zafar, Muhammad Hamza; Mansoor, Majad; Chen, Wenjie
摘要: Power prediction is now a crucial part of contemporary energy management systems, which is important for the organization and administration of renewable resources. Solar and wind powers are highly dependent upon environmental factors, such as wind speed, temperature, and humidity, making the forecasting problem extremely difficult. The suggested composite model incorporates Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) and Swarm Intelligence (SI) optimization algorithms to produce a framework that can precisely estimate offshore wind output in the short term, addressing the discrepancies and limits of conventional estimation methods. The Coati optimization algorithm enhances the hyper parameters CNN-LSTM. Optimum hyper parameters improvise learning rate and performance. The day-ahead and hour-ahead short-term predictions RMSE can be decreased by 0.5% and 5.8%, respectively. Compared to GWO-CNN-LSTM, LSTM, CNN, and PSO-CNN-LSTM models, the proposed technique achieves an nMAE of 4.6%, RE 27% and nRMSE of 6.2%. COA-CNN-LSTM outperforms existing techniques in terms of the Granger causality test and Nash-Sutcliffe metric analysis for time series forecasting performance, scores are 0.0992 and 0.98, respectively. Experimental results show precise and definitive wind power-making predictions for the management of renewable energy conversion networks. The presented model contributes positively to the body of knowledge and development of clean energy.
标题: COA-CNN-LSTM: Coati optimization algorithm-based hybrid deep learning model for PV/wind power forecasting in smart grid applications
标题翻译: COA-CNN-LSTM：基于浣熊优化算法的混合深度学习模型在智能电网应用中的光伏/风电预测
摘要翻译: 功率预测现在是现代能源管理系统的关键组成部分，这对于可再生资源的组织和管理至关重要。太阳能和风能高度依赖于环境因素，如风速、温度和湿度，使得预测问题非常困难。所提出的复合模型结合了长短期记忆（LSTM）和群体智能（SI）优化算法，构建了一个框架，可以在短期内精准估计离岸风电输出，解决了传统估计方法的差异和局限性。Coati优化算法增强了超参数CNN-LSTM。最佳超参数提高了学习速率和性能。相比之下，前一天和提前一小时的短期预测均方根误差（RMSE）分别降低了0.5%和5.8%。与GWO-CNN-LSTM、LSTM、CNN和PSO-CNN-LSTM模型相比，所提出的技术实现了4.6%的归一化平均绝对误差（nMAE）、27%的相对误差（RE）和6.2%的归一化均方根误差（nRMSE）。COA-CNN-LSTM在格兰杰因果关系检验和纳什-萨特克利夫度量分析方面优于现有技术，时间序列预测性能的评分分别为0.0992和0.98。实验结果展示了对可再生能源转换网络的精准和明确的风电预测。所提出的模型对知识体系的更新和清洁能源的发展具有积极贡献。
摘要总结: Houran等（2023）提出了一种综合模型，结合长短期记忆网络（LSTM）和群体智能（SI）优化算法，旨在短期精准预测离岸风电输出，实验结果显示该模型在多项性能指标上超越传统方法，提出了对可再生能源管理的积极贡献。

作者: Chen, Lu; Yuan, Ming; Lin, Han; Han, Yilong; Yu, Youyou; Sun, Caihui
摘要: The march toward fusing business with sustainability is articulated with the hope of offering solutions to global environmental degradation. Green innovation is often regarded as an effective strategy to induce double externality with positive innovation and environmental spillovers. Despite numerous research works on determinants of green innovation, the key question, however, whether and how organizational improvisation exerts its influence on innovatively being green is still unsolved. On this basis, the current study seeks to demonstrate a connection between organizational improvisation and corporate green innovation. According to the presented theoretical framework, organizational improvisation, which serves as a catalyst for improving learning processes, promotes green innovation. Furthermore, dynamic capabilities mediate this relationship, and top management risk aversion could weaken the successful transformation of substantive innovation and being green. Empirical evidence is found based on a sample of Chinese manufacturing firms with a moderated mediation analysis. These results extend the understanding of the role of improvisation in green achievements towards the fusion of unplanned change and order.
标题: Organizational improvisation and corporate green innovation: A dynamic capability perspective
标题翻译: 组织即兴创作与企业绿色创新：动态能力视角
摘要翻译: 向将商业与可持续发展结合的进程中，我们希望提供应对全球环境退化的解决方案。绿色创新通常被视为引发正向创新和环境外部性双重效应的有效战略。然而，尽管关于绿色创新决定因素的研究层出不穷，一个关键问题依然未得到解决，即组织即兴发挥如何影响创新性地实现绿色。基于此，本研究旨在展示组织即兴发挥与企业绿色创新之间的联系。根据所呈现的理论框架，组织即兴发挥作为改善学习过程的催化剂，促进绿色创新。此外，动态能力在这一关系中起到中介作用，而高层管理的风险厌恶可能削弱实质性创新与实现绿色的成功转型。基于对中国制造企业的样本进行的调节中介分析找到了实证证据。这些结果扩展了对即兴发挥在绿色成就中作用的理解，揭示了非计划性变革与秩序的融合。
摘要总结: 陈璐等（2023）基于中国制造业企业样本，采用调节中介分析研究 organizational improvisation 的影响，结果表明，组织即兴发挥促进绿色创新，而动态能力在其中起中介作用，高管的风险规避可能削弱创新与绿色转型的成功性。

作者: Leslie, Myles; Hansen, Brian; Abboud, Rida; Claussen, Caroline; McBrien, Kerry; Hu, Jia; Ward, Rick; Aghajafari, Fariba
摘要: PURPOSE The effective integration of primary care into public health responses to the COVID-19 pandemic, particularly through data sharing, has received some attention in the literature. However, the specific policies and structures that facilitate this integration are understudied. This paper describes the experiences of clinicians and administrators in Alberta, Canada as they built a data bridge between primary care and public health to improve the province's community-based response to the pandemic.METHODS Fifty-seven semistructured qualitative interviews were conducted with a range of primary care and public health stakeholders working inside the Calgary Health Zone. Inter-pretive description was used to analyze the interviews.RESULTS SARS-CoV-2 test results produced by the local public laboratory were, initially, only available to central public health clinicians and not independent primary care physi-cians. This enabled centrally managed contact tracing but meant primary care physicians were unaware of their patients' COVID-19 status and unable to offer in-community follow-up care. Stakeholders from both central public health and independent primary care were able to leverage a policy commitment to the Patient Medical Home (PMH) care model, and a range of existing organizational structures, and governance arrangements to create a data bridge that would span the gap.CONCLUSIONS Primary care systems looking to draw lessons from the data bridge's con-struction may consider ways to: leverage care model commitments to integration and adjust or create organization and governance structures which actively draw together pri-mary care and non-primary care stakeholders to work on common projects. Such policies and structures develop trusting relationships, open the possibility for champions to emerge, and create the spaces in which integrative improvisation can take place.
标题: Building a Data Bridge: Policies, Structures, and Governance Integrating Primary Care Into the Public Health Response to COVID-19
标题翻译: 构建数据桥梁：将初级医疗纳入公共卫生响应COVID-19的政策、结构与治理
摘要翻译: 目的 本文旨在探讨初级卫生保健有效融入公共卫生应对COVID-19疫情的做法，尤其是通过数据共享的方式，虽然这一主题在文献中引起了一定关注，但促进这种整合的具体政策和结构尚未得到充分研究。本文描述了加拿大阿尔伯塔省临床医生和管理者在建立初级卫生保健与公共卫生之间的数据桥梁过程中所取得的经验，以改善省内社区对疫情的应对措施。方法 在卡尔加里健康区与多位初级卫生保健和公共卫生相关利益相关者进行了57次半结构化的定性访谈。采用解释性描述方法分析访谈内容。结果 SARS-CoV-2的检测结果最初仅向中央公共卫生临床医生提供，而不向独立的初级卫生保健医生开放。这使得中央管理的接触追踪得以实施，但也意味着初级卫生保健医生无法得知患者的COVID-19状态，从而无法提供社区内的后续护理。来自中央公共卫生和独立初级卫生保健的利益相关者能够利用对患者医疗之家（PMH）护理模式的政策承诺，以及现有的组织结构和治理安排，建立跨越这一鸿沟的数据桥梁。结论 希望借鉴数据桥梁建设经验的初级卫生保健系统，可以考虑以下方式：利用护理模型承诺来促进整合，调整或创造能够积极将初级卫生保健与非初级卫生保健利益相关者聚集在一起合作的组织和治理结构。这些政策和结构能够建立信任关系，创造出涌现出倡导者的可能性，并为整合性即兴创作提供空间。
摘要总结: Leslie等（2023）通过对阿尔伯塔省卡尔加里健康区57名初级护理和公共卫生利益相关者的半结构化访谈，运用解释性描述法，研究了数据桥的构建过程，发现通过政策承诺和现有组织结构促进了初级护理和公共卫生的整合，以改善对COVID-19的响应。

作者: Cluley, Robert
摘要: It is said that all the world is a stage. But how do organizations physically stage performances such as sales pitches and research presentations? Drawing on a 14-month-long ethnographic study at a Fortune 500 strategic research company, this article explains how. Emphasizing the active role of human and non-human actors, it uncovers three staging practices that organizations use to transform spaces into stages. Organizations theme stages by populating them with certain objects. They produce a style of performance by arranging relationships between performers and audiences. Finally, they order movements from one stage to others so that plots emerge. Theorizing these staging practices through a materialist dramaturgy, the article challenges existing organizational theory that tends to focus on the ways organizations control and script performances. The article shows that organizational performances in service and knowledge organizations can be improvisational. They are not preordained but they are organized.
标题: An ethnographic study of organizational performances in business services: Space, staging and materiality
标题翻译: 商业服务中组织表现的民族志研究：空间、场景与物质性
摘要翻译: 人们常说，整个世界如同一个舞台。但组织是如何物理性地呈现销售演示和研究报告等表演的呢？本文基于对一家财富500强战略研究公司的为期14个月的民族志研究，阐释了这一过程。强调人类和非人类参与者的积极作用，揭示了组织用来将空间转化为舞台的三种布置实践。组织通过在舞台上布置特定的物体来形成主题。他们通过安排表演者和观众之间的关系来创造表演风格。最后，他们通过有序地从一个舞台移动到另一个舞台来展现情节。通过物质主义戏剧理论对这些布置实践进行理论化，本文挑战了现有的组织理论，这些理论往往专注于组织如何控制和编排表演。文章表明，服务型和知识型组织的表演可以是即兴的，并不是预先注定的，而是经过组织的。
摘要总结: Cluley (2023) 通过对一家财富500强战略研究公司的14个月民族志研究，揭示了组织如何通过物质化的戏剧性方式进行演出，包括场景主题化、表演风格和动作排序，提出组织的演出是即兴的而非预设的，从而挑战了现有的组织理论。

作者: Buzzao, Giacomo; Rizzi, Francesco
摘要: The unprecedented systemic disruptions that occurred in the last years are highlighting a structural lack of resilience in most organisations. In this context, there is an increasing scholars' interest in understanding to what extent capabilities to anticipate, respond and thrive in unprecedented situations represent a strategic lever for business continuity management in most sectors of activity. To contribute to this debate, this research adopts a dynamic capabilities perspective to investigate the specific capabilities that organisations build in the pursuit of business continuity.Based on multi-sectoral primary data collected in 2021 from HR professionals of 419 organisations operating in Italy, the outcomes of our quantitative study show that the business continuity requirements expressed by ISO22301 are perceived as interrelated and indivisible. Furthermore, our results suggest that the ambition to fulfil the business continuity requirements depends on the organisational capabilities to improvise and coordinate the use of its assets (i.e. people, technologies, premises, information) in the face of disruptions.Besides the managerial implications concerning how to build favourable organisational conditions to reduce the vulnerability to external risks, the research contributes to the literature by building new measurement scales to assess business continuity and disentangling the rationale behind the related dynamic capabilities framework.
标题: The role of dynamic capabilities for resilience in pursuing business continuity: an empirical study
标题翻译: 动态能力在追求业务连续性中的韧性作用：一项实证研究
摘要翻译: 近年来发生的前所未有的系统性干扰突显了大多数组织在韧性方面的结构性不足。在这一背景下，学者们日益关注理解在前所未有的情况下，预见、应对和蓬勃发展能力在商业连续性管理中所代表的战略杠杆程度，以适用于大多数行业。为了为这一讨论作出贡献，本研究采用动态能力视角，探讨组织在追求业务连续性时所构建的具体能力。基于2021年在意大利对419个组织的人力资源专业人士收集的多行业初级数据，我们定量研究的结果显示，ISO22301所表达的业务连续性要求被认为是相互关联且不可分割的。此外，我们的结果表明，满足业务连续性要求的愿望取决于组织在破坏面前迅速调整和协调资源（即人员、技术、场所、信息）使用的能力。除了关于如何建立有利于减少外部风险脆弱性的组织条件的管理启示外，该研究通过构建新的测量尺度来评估业务连续性，并梳理相关动态能力框架背后的理论基础，为文献做出了贡献。
摘要总结: Buzzao和Rizzi（2023）基于2021年对意大利419家组织人力资源专业人士的多行业数据，采用动态能力视角探讨组织在业务连续性管理中的关键能力，研究结果显示ISO22301的业务连续性要求彼此关联，组织应具备即兴应变和协调资源的能力以应对外部风险。

作者: Werede, Ebuy; Jabasingh, S. Anuradha; Demsash, Hundessa D.; Jaya, N.; Gebrehiwot, Gebreyohannes
摘要: Gunda Gundo orange fruits are cultivated in abundance in the northern region of Ethiopia. Their peels are rich in carotenoid content and could seve as a potential feedstock for natural dye extraction. The aim of this study is to valorize Gunda Gundo orange (Citrus sinensis) peels (GGOP) for dye synthesis followed by its application on dyeing cotton fabric. The natural dye extracted from this renewable biomass feedstock, could reduce environmental contamination, contribute to energy saving and in addition, improvise the livelihood of the farmers cultivating this variety of oranges. The dye extraction was performed using the soxhlet extraction method, in which the effect of extraction temperature (65 degrees C, 72.5 degrees C, 80 degrees C), extraction time (1.5h, 3.25h, 5h) and GGOP to ethanol ratio (0.05g/mL, 0.075g/mL, 0.1g/mL) was studied and optimized by a three-variable, three-level Box-Behnken design using Response Surface Methodology (Design experiment software version 11). A maximum yield of natural dye (40.11%) was achieved at 0.066g/mL GGOP to ethanol ratio at 4.995 h and 79.97 degrees C with a high combined desirability. The high-performance liquid chromatography analysis showed a peak for Gunda Gundo orange peel powder based carotenoid (GGC) dye at R-t value of 2.005 with 3.423 mg/mL dye concentration. Further characterization using Fourier-transform infrared spectroscopy showed the presence of phenols, alkanes and amines. The GGC dye produced were applied onto cotton fabric, using Na2CO3 as fixative. Color dyeing and testing were carried out with data color tool analysis (L*, a*, b*) and fastness properties were investigated according to the American Association of Textile Chemists and Colorists (AATCC-61) and the International Organization for Standardization crocking ISO 105 X12 methods. The washing fastness and rubbing fastness for 4% GGC dyed fabric was higher than that of 1% and 2% GGC dyed fabric. The dyed cotton sample from 4% GGC concentration was red, as shown by the International Commission on Illumination CIELAB color space (CIE L*a* b*). The value of a* (redness) obtained in dyed cotton fabric was as well higher than 1% and 2% GGC. The dye exhibited a good color strength and this suffices the valorization of locally available Gunda Gundo orange peels for natural dye synthesis.
标题: Eco-friendly cotton fabric dyeing using a green, sustainable natural dye from Gunda Gundo (Citrus sinensis) orange peels
标题翻译: 使用来自甘达甘多（Citrus sinensis）橙皮的绿色可持续天然染料进行环保棉织物染色
摘要翻译: 甘达甘多橙果在埃塞俄比亚北部地区广泛种植。其果皮富含类胡萝卜素，可能成为天然染料提取的潜在原料。本研究的目的是对甘达甘多橙（Citrus sinensis）果皮（GGOP）进行增值处理，用于染料合成，并进一步应用于染色棉布。由这一可再生生物质原料提取的天然染料，能够减少环境污染，节约能源，并改善种植这种橙子品种的农民的生计。染料提取采用索氏萃取法，研究并优化了提取温度（65摄氏度、72.5摄氏度、80摄氏度）、提取时间（1.5小时、3.25小时、5小时）和GGOP与乙醇的比例（0.05g/mL、0.075g/mL、0.1g/mL），使用响应面法的三变量三水平Box-Behnken设计（实验设计软件版本11）。在0.066g/mL GGOP与乙醇比例、4.995小时和79.97摄氏度下，获得了最高的天然染料产率（40.11%），并具有良好的综合可取性。高效液相色谱分析显示，甘达甘多橙果皮粉末基类胡萝卜素（GGC）染料的峰值R-t值为2.005，染料浓度为3.423mg/mL。进一步的傅里叶变换红外光谱特征分析显示出酚类、烷烃和胺类的存在。所产生的GGC染料应用于棉布，使用Na2CO3作为固色剂。采用数据色彩分析工具（L*、a*、b*）进行了染色和测试，耐洗性和耐磨性根据美国纺织化学家及着色师协会（AATCC-61）和国际标准化组织的擦色ISO 105 X12方法进行了研究。4% GGC染色布料的耐洗性和耐磨性高于1%和2% GGC染色布料。4% GGC浓度的染色棉样品呈红色，展现了国际照明委员会CIELAB色度空间（CIE L*a*b*）。在染色棉布中获得的a*（红色度）值同样高于1%和2% GGC。染料表现出良好的染色强度，这证明了地方可获取的甘达甘多橙果皮在天然染料合成中的增值潜力。
摘要总结: Werede等人（2023）利用Box-Behnken设计优化Gunda Gundo橙子皮的天然染料提取，采用连续淋滤法，分析提取条件，得到最高染料产率40.11%。染料应用于棉织物，显示良好的色牢度和色彩强度，证明了橙子皮作为天然染料的潜力。

作者: Vershinina, Natalia; Rodgers, Peter
摘要: In this article, using regulatory focus theory (RFT), we adopt a micro-foundational approach to illuminate how migrant entrepreneurs develop forms of resilience within a small firm context. Conceptually we showcase how the fusing of individual and organizational interactions enables the enactment of generative resilience capacities. Our empirical study involves a qualitative, interpretative approach encompassing sixty-one interviews with migrant entrepreneurs across three urban centres in the UK. The enactment of resilience capacities is activated through legitimacy building, network building and resource and capability development. Theoretically we underscore the role of accumulated agency, which aids migrant entrepreneurs to overcome existing structural challenges and in doing so, build resilience capacities. Our findings also reveal the temporal nature of resilience capacity building, involving real-time, retrospective and prospective actions. We offer theoretical contributions, practical implications and signpost directions for future research.
标题: Self-regulation, micro-foundations and migrant entrepreneurs' capacities for resilience
标题翻译: 自我调节、微观基础与移民企业家的韧性能力
摘要翻译: 在本文章中，我们采用调节焦点理论（RFT），运用微观基础的方法来阐明移民企业家如何在小型企业环境中发展韧性。概念上，我们展示了个体与组织互动的融合如何促进生成性韧性能力的实现。我们的实证研究采用定性解释的方法，涵盖了在英国三个城市中心与61位移民企业家的访谈。韧性能力的实现通过合法性建设、网络建设以及资源和能力发展来激活。从理论上讲，我们强调了积累的能动性在帮助移民企业家克服现有结构性挑战、从而建立韧性能力中的作用。我们的研究结果还揭示了韧性能力建设的时间特性，包括实时、回顾性和前瞻性的行动。我们提供了理论贡献、实践意义，并指明了未来研究的方向。
摘要总结: Vershinina和Rodgers（2023）基于监管聚焦理论，采用定性研究方法，通过对英国三大城市的61位移民企业家进行访谈，探讨了他们在小型企业环境中如何塑造韧性能力，发现其通过合法性构建、网络搭建及资源能力发展来应对结构性挑战，并提供理论及实践启示。

作者: Razu, Mamudul Hasan; Monir, Bayzid Bin; Moniruzzaman, Md.; Sarkar, Sawgotom; Akhter, Sonia; Kamal, Sabiha; Hasan, Md. Abu; Afroze, Mirola; Imam, Khandaker Md. Sharif Uddin; Khan, Mala
摘要: A viral transport medium (VTM) was developed following the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, USA (US-CDC) standard operating procedure (SOP) DSR-052-05 with necessary improvisation and was used for storing coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) swab specimens. Considering Bangladesh's supply chain and storage conditions, improvisation was essential for extending sample storage time while retaining efficiency. In-house VTM was produced using Hank's balanced salt solution (HBSS) supplemented with 1% bovine serum albumin V (BSA), 0.5 mu g/mL of gentamicin sulfate, and 100 mu g/mL of fluconazole. The produced VTM composition, quality, sterility, specificity, and efficiency were verified in-house and through an independent contract research organization (CRO). An accelerated stability study projected that under the recommended temperature (4 degrees C), it would remain stable for four months and preserve samples for over a month. The real-time reverse transcriptase-polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) test detected the targeted N gene and ORF1ab gene from the VTM stored samples. Our VTM is equally as effective as the Sansure Biotech VTM in keeping SARS-CoV-2 RNA specimens detectable in rRT-PCR (100% sensitivity and specificity in random and blinded samples). In conclusion, the BRiCM VTM will make the battle against pandemics easier by effectively collecting and storing nasopharyngeal and oropharyngeal swabs for COVID-19 detection.
标题: Performance Evaluation of SARS-CoV-2 Viral Transport Medium Produced by Bangladesh Reference Institute for Chemical Measurements
标题翻译: 孟加拉国化学测量参考研究所生产的SARS-CoV-2病毒运输介质的性能评估
摘要翻译: 一种病毒运输介质（VTM）按照美国疾病控制与预防中心（US-CDC）标准操作程序DSR-052-05开发，并进行了必要的改进，用于存储2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）拭子标本。考虑到孟加拉国的供应链和储存条件，改进对于延长样本保存时间而保持效率至关重要。采用Hank's平衡盐溶液（HBSS）自制VTM，补充1%牛血清白蛋白V（BSA）、0.5微克/毫升的硫酸庆大霉素和100微克/毫升的氟康唑。经过内部和独立合同研究机构（CRO）的验证，确认了所生产的VTM的成分、质量、无菌性、特异性和效率。加速稳定性研究预测，在推荐的温度（4摄氏度）下，它将保持稳定四个月，并能保存样本超过一个月。实时反转录聚合酶链反应（rRT-PCR）检测到存储在VTM中的样本的目标N基因和ORF1ab基因。我们的VTM在保持SARS-CoV-2 RNA标本在rRT-PCR中可检测方面，与Sansure Biotech VTM同样有效（在随机和盲样中均表现出100%的灵敏度和特异性）。总之，BRiCM VTM将通过有效收集和保存鼻咽和口咽拭子以检测COVID-19，从而简化抗击大流行的工作。
摘要总结: Razu等（2023）基于美国疾病控制与预防中心标准，开发了一种新型病毒运输介质（VTM），以适应孟加拉国的储存条件，验证了其有效性和稳定性，结果显示该介质在储存样本时，能够有效保持SARS-CoV-2 RNA的可检测性，并具备100%的灵敏度和特异性。

期刊: JOURNAL OF COGNITIVE ENGINEERING AND DECISION MAKING
作者: Phillips, Ross Owen; Baharmand, Hossein; Vandaele, Nico; Decouttere, Catherine; Boey, Lise
摘要: Despite the increased importance attributed to distributed improvisation in major crises, few studies investigate how central authorities can promote a harmonic, coordinated national response while allowing for distributed autonomy and improvisation. One idea implicit in the literature is that central authorities could help track and tackle common decision bottlenecks as they emerge across improvising local authorities as a result of shared, dynamic external constraints. To explore this idea we map central functions needed to roll-out vaccines to local populations and identify and classify bottlenecks to decision-making by local authorities managing COVID-19 vaccine roll-out in Norway. We found five bottlenecks which emerged as vaccine roll-out progressed, three of which could feasibly have been addressed by changing the local authorities' external constraints as the crisis developed. While the national crisis response strategy clearly allowed for distributed improvisation, our overall findings suggest that there is potential for central authorities to address external constraints in order to ease common bottlenecks as they emerge across local authorities responding to the crisis. More research is to explore alternative centralized response strategies and assess how well they effectively balance centralized and distributed control. The study contributes to the growing literature examining the interaction between local and centralized response in crisis management.
标题: How Can Authorities Support Distributed Improvisation During Major Crises? A Study of Decision Bottlenecks Arising During Local COVID-19 Vaccine Roll-Out
标题翻译: 如何在重大危机期间支持分布式即兴创作？——地方COVID-19疫苗接种过程中出现的决策瓶颈研究
摘要翻译: 尽管在重大危机中分布式即兴创作的重要性有所增加，但很少有研究探讨中央当局如何在允许分布式自治和即兴发挥的同时，促进协调一致的国家响应。文献中隐含的一个观点是，中央当局可以帮助跟踪并解决因共享的动态外部约束而在即兴的地方当局中出现的共同决策瓶颈。为了探索这一观点，我们映射了将疫苗推广到地方人口所需的中央职能，并识别和分类了挪威地方当局在管理COVID-19疫苗推广过程中的决策瓶颈。我们发现随疫苗推广进展出现了五个瓶颈，其中三个在危机发展过程中可以通过改变地方当局的外部约束来切实解决。尽管国家危机响应策略显然允许分布式即兴创作，但我们的总体发现表明，中央当局在应对危机时有潜力处理外部约束，以缓解地方当局在应对危机过程中出现的共同瓶颈。未来的研究应探索替代的集中响应策略，并评估其在有效平衡集中与分布控制方面的表现。本研究为日益增长的研究文献作出了贡献，探讨了地方与集中响应在危机管理中的互动。
摘要总结: Phillips等（2023）探讨了如何在应对COVID-19疫苗接种中，中央当局促进协调与分散自主的应对。通过分析挪威数据，识别出五个决策瓶颈，发现中央当局可通过调整外部约束来缓解这些瓶颈，建议进一步研究其他中央响应策略的有效性。

作者: Vera, Dusya; Crossan, Mary M.
摘要: The COVID-19 pandemic has amplified and exacerbated organizational paradoxes felt by individuals largely because of the nostalgia individuals feel for the old normal while facing the need to let go in order to create a new normal. We position improvisation as a synthesis-type approach to working through the paradoxes of the pandemic. Furthermore, we look at individual differences that underpin the ability to improvise, and identify that it is the strength of character and character-based judgment of the individual that enables the enactment of a focal context, the choice to improvise, and the act of effectively improvising to work through paradoxes. Linking character to improvisation, and, vice versa, improvisation to the development of character, reveals the importance of dimensions such as courage, humility, temperance, transcendence, humanity, and collaboration in the practice of improvisation.
标题: Character-enabled improvisation and the new normal: A paradox perspective
标题翻译: 角色驱动的即兴创作与新常态：一个悖论视角
摘要翻译: COVID-19疫情加剧了个体所感受到的组织悖论，这在很大程度上是由于个体对旧常态的怀念，同时又面临着需要放手以创造新常态的现实。我们将即兴发挥定位为一种通过疫情悖论的综合性方法。此外，我们还关注支撑个体即兴能力的个体差异，并指出，正是个体的品格力量和基于品格的判断使得在特定情境中展现、选择即兴以及有效地即兴以应对悖论成为可能。将品格与即兴相联系，以及反过来将即兴与品格的发展相联系，揭示了勇气、谦卑、节制、超越、人性和合作等维度在即兴实践中的重要性。
摘要总结: Vera和Crossan（2023）探讨了COVID-19疫情加剧的组织悖论，提出即兴创作为应对策略。研究强调个体的品格与判断力在即兴能力中的作用，揭示了勇气、谦逊、节制等维度在即兴实践中的重要性。

作者: Wang, Juanru; Xue, Yajiong; Yang, Jin
摘要: Green innovation is critical for firms' sustainable development, and its antecedents have attracted extensive attention. However, how proactive boundary-spanning search enhances firms' green innovation remains unclear. Building on the resource-based view and dynamic capabilities theory, we explore the impact of proactive boundary-spanning search on firms' green innovation and investigate the mediating role of two types of organizational resilience. Survey data are collected from 218 manufacturing firms in China, and hierarchical regression and bootstrap analysis are used to test hypotheses. The results demonstrate that proactive boundary-spanning search not only has an inverted U-shaped relationship with radical green innovation and incremental green innovation, but also has an inverted U-shaped relationship with precursor resilience and improvisation resilience. Moreover, the results show that precursor resilience and improvisation resilience partially mediate the inverted U-shaped relationship between proactive boundary-spanning search and the two types of green innovation. This research reveals the nonlinear relationship between proactive boundary-spanning search and green innovation, which enriches the research of green innovation by considering organizational resilience.
标题: Can proactive boundary-spanning search enhance green innovation? The mediating role of organizational resilience
标题翻译: 主动边界跨越搜索能否增强绿色创新？组织韧性的中介作用
摘要翻译: 绿色创新对企业的可持续发展至关重要，其前因受到广泛关注。然而，积极的跨界搜索如何提升企业的绿色创新尚不清楚。本研究基于资源基础视角和动态能力理论，探讨积极的跨界搜索对企业绿色创新的影响，并研究两种类型组织韧性的中介作用。我们从中国的218家制造企业收集了调查数据，采用层级回归和自助法分析来检验假设。结果表明，积极的跨界搜索与激进的绿色创新和渐进的绿色创新之间呈现倒U型关系，同时也与前奏韧性和即兴韧性之间呈现倒U型关系。此外，结果显示，前奏韧性和即兴韧性在积极的跨界搜索与这两种绿色创新之间的倒U型关系中部分起到中介作用。本研究揭示了积极跨界搜索与绿色创新之间的非线性关系，通过考虑组织韧性丰富了绿色创新的研究。
摘要总结: 王娟如、薛雅琼和杨进（2023）基于对218家中国制造企业的调查数据，采用分层回归和引导分析，研究主动跨界探索对企业绿色创新的影响，发现其与激进和渐进绿色创新呈倒U型关系，并认为先行韧性和即兴韧性在其中部分中介。

作者: Banks, Amanda; Eaton, Casey E.; Bates, Meredith; Matsuyama, Lisa; Palma, Giulia; Guerin, Amy; Weger, Kristin; Mesmer, Bryan; Friedrich, Dan
摘要: The objective of this research is to develop a methodology for an arts-based intervention that can effectively promote employee voice. An arts-based intervention was developed to promote employee voice, supported by literature and expert knowledge. This intervention was applied at the 2019 NASA Cost and Schedule Symposium. Participants indicated that the intervention was effective in eliciting hidden truths. Several topics were revealed that participants felt uncomfortable discussing in the workplace. The intervention methodology is evaluated, considering limitations and future changes.
标题: Insights from developing improvisational theatre intervention at NASA
标题翻译: 在NASA开发即兴戏剧干预的洞察
摘要翻译: 本研究的目的是开发一种基于艺术的方法，以有效促进员工发声。基于艺术的干预措施经过文献支持和专家知识的支持而发展，旨在促进员工发声。该干预措施在2019年NASA成本与进度研讨会上应用。参与者表示，该干预措施在引发隐藏的真相方面是有效的。揭示了一些参与者在工作场所讨论时感到不适的话题。评估了该干预方法，考虑到局限性和未来的变化。
摘要总结: Banks等人（2023）基于文献和专家知识开发了一种艺术干预方法，于2019年NASA成本与进度研讨会应用，调查结果表明该方法有效促进员工表达隐藏观点，但发现参与者在讨论某些话题时感到不适，研究评估了干预方法及其局限性与未来改进方向。

作者: Panimalar, S. Arockia; Krishnakumar, A.
摘要: With progressing competitive market, different organizations were desperate to hold this churn rate as minimum value, hence to achieve this, building an effective (CCP) customer churn prediction model is essential. In order to address those issues in CCP, the study deliberated the churn prediction model using DFE-WUNB (Deep Feature Extraction with Weight Updated Tuned Naive Bayes classifier) in a cloud-computing environment. Due to the huge non-linear features of the Telco customer churn dataset, the pre-processed features are deeply learned by the subsequent two models of ANN. In ANN, the input feature gets multiplied by the weight value, and the resultant output feature passes to the next dense layer in ANN. The deep feature extraction in ANN models facilitates precise accuracy in determining relevant churn features. However, the higher matrix dimensions of features exhibit complexity in prediction, hence this Block Jacobi SVD algorithm is applied to decrease the dimensions of features, such as to create a sparse dataset projected to get fit to the training model for efficient classification. The dimension-reduced features pass through enhanced weighing Naive Bayes algorithm gets updated with ANN weights and tunes the parameters having greater and best weights to NB classifier, improvising the classification accuracy performance. The comparative assessment of the proposed DFE-WUNB churn prediction model delineated the efficiency of highly accurate churn prediction, outperforming other conventional churn prediction models.
标题: Customer churn prediction model in cloud environment using DFE-WUNB: ANN deep feature extraction with Weight Updated Tuned Naive Bayes classification with Block-Jacobi SVD dimensionality reduction
标题翻译: 基于DFE-WUNB的云环境客户流失预测模型：使用带权更新调优的朴素贝叶斯分类与Block-Jacobi SVD降维的ANN深度特征提取
摘要翻译: 随着竞争市场的不断发展，各组织迫切希望将客户流失率保持在最低水平，因此，建立有效的客户流失预测模型（CCP）至关重要。为了应对客户流失预测中的这些问题，本研究在云计算环境中使用了DFE-WUNB（深度特征提取与权重更新调优朴素贝叶斯分类器）来探讨流失预测模型。由于电信客户流失数据集中存在大量非线性特征，预处理后的特征通过随后的两个人工神经网络（ANN）模型进行深度学习。在ANN中，输入特征与权重值相乘，得到的输出特征传递到ANN的下一个密集层。ANN模型中的深度特征提取有助于在确定相关流失特征时实现精确的准确性。然而，特征的高维矩阵在预测中表现出复杂性，因此采用了块雅可比SVD算法以降低特征维度，从而创建期望适合训练模型的稀疏数据集，以实现高效分类。维度降低后的特征经过增强加权的朴素贝叶斯算法，结合ANN权重进行更新，并调优参数至最佳权重，从而提升分类准确性能。所提议的DFE-WUNB流失预测模型的比较评估显示出其在高精度流失预测方面的效率，优于其他传统的流失预测模型。
摘要总结: Panimalar和Krishnakumar（2023）在云计算环境中提出了一种基于深度特征提取与权重更新调优朴素贝叶斯分类器（DFE-WUNB）的客户流失预测模型，利用电信客户流失数据集，通过降维算法提高分类精度，结果显示该模型优于传统预测模型。

作者: Ghalwash, Seham; Ismail, Ayman
摘要: The process of resource mobilisation is fundamental in the creation of social value. However, the evidence that examines the approaches used by social entrepreneurs to mobilise critical resources in an environment with poor resources is limited. This study empirically explores social bricolage in the new research context of developing countries, building on the notion of 'social bricolage'). This abductive, multiple-case study adopts the qualitative methodological approach, using empirical data on five social enterprises in Egypt through in-depth interviews with industry experts, social entrepreneurs, and other management teams. Our study advances scholarly understanding of social bricolage by examining resource mobilisation processes over time in the resource-scarce context of developing countries. Our analysis traces the six social bricolage constructs: making do, refusal to be constrained by limitations, improvisation, the creation of social value, stakeholder participation, and persuasion and community involvement. Our empirical data identifies three more constructs associated with social bricolage: distributed leadership/teamwork, dynamic capabilities, and legitimacy (trust and reputation).
标题: Resource Orchestration Process in the Limited-Resource Environment: The social Bricolage Perspective
标题翻译: 有限资源环境中的资源编排过程：社会临时拼凑视角
摘要翻译: 资源动员的过程在创造社会价值中至关重要。然而，关于社会企业家如何在资源匮乏的环境中动员关键资源的途径的证据有限。本研究在发展中国家的新研究背景下，从“社会 bricolage” 的概念出发，实证探讨了社会 bricolage。这项采用归纳法的多案例研究采用了定性方法，利用来自埃及五家社会企业的实证数据，通过对行业专家、社会企业家及其他管理团队的深入访谈进行分析。我们的研究通过考察发展中国家资源匮乏背景下资源动员过程的时间变化，推动了对社会 bricolage 的学术理解。我们的分析追溯了六个社会 bricolage 构件：应变能力、不受限制的拒绝、即兴发挥、社会价值的创造、利益相关者参与和劝说及社区参与。我们的实证数据还识别了与社会 bricolage 相关的三个构件：分布式领导/团队合作、动态能力和合法性（信任与声誉）。
摘要总结: Ghalwash和Ismail（2024）通过对埃及五家社会企业的深入访谈，采用多案例研究的质性方法，探索发展中国家中社会创业者如何在资源匮乏环境下进行资源动员，提出了六个社会创意构造，并识别出三个额外构造，推动了对社会创意的学术理解。

作者: Shehab, Lynn; Hamzeh, Farook
摘要: In the dynamic construction industry, project performance crucially depends on the cognitive diversity of team members. The varied cognitive abilities across teams significantly influence their adaptability and efficiency, driving the success of construction projects in unpredictable and dynamics environments. This paper employs an Agent-Based Modelling approach to explore how variations in cognitive abilities, improvisation, collaboration, and physiology-related, affect project outcomes. By simulating real-world construction scenarios, the model examines the effects of cognitive trait diversity on decision-making and team dynamics. This study aims to uncover the complex relationship between cognitive diversity and project performance, highlighting its impact on the efficacy of solutions and collaborative efforts. The findings provide valuable insights into optimizing team composition and enhancing decision-making processes in construction projects. Ultimately, this research advances our understanding of how cognitive factors influence project success, offering strategies to foster more resilient and effective construction teams.
标题: HOW DO DIFFERENT MINDS SHAPE PERFORMANCE IN CONSTRUCTION? AN AGENT-BASED MODELLING APPROACH
标题翻译: 不同思维如何影响建筑领域的表现？基于代理的建模方法
摘要翻译: 在动态的建筑行业中，项目绩效在很大程度上依赖于团队成员的认知多样性。团队之间的认知能力差异显著影响其适应能力和效率，推动建筑项目在不可预测和动态环境中的成功。本文采用基于代理的建模方法探讨认知能力、即兴发挥、协作及生理相关因素的变化如何影响项目结果。通过模拟现实建筑场景，该模型考察了认知特征多样性对决策和团队动态的影响。该研究旨在揭示认知多样性与项目绩效之间的复杂关系，强调其对解决方案和协作努力有效性的影响。研究结果为优化团队构成和提升建筑项目中的决策过程提供了宝贵的见解。最终，本研究推进了我们对认知因素如何影响项目成功的理解，并提供了促进更具韧性和高效的建筑团队的策略。
摘要总结: Shehab和Hamzeh（2024）采用基于代理的建模方法，通过模拟建筑项目场景，研究团队成员的认知多样性如何影响项目绩效，发现认知特征多样性显著提升决策效果和团队动态，为提高建筑项目的成功率提供了策略建议。

作者: de Souza, Ivenio Teixeira; Patriarca, Riccardo; Haddad, Assed
摘要: Building maintenance encompasses multiple tightly inter-connected agents (e.g., technicians, occupants, supervisors, and equipment). Variable working conditions and limited resources may affect the safety and sustainability of the activities. Although recent studies have explored how complex systems can perform resilient behavior in facing the complexity of everyday activities, the factors that effectively contribute to resilient performance are still paired with limited empirical evidence. We studied the performance of the maintenance team during sudden breakdowns of air-conditioning devices in a large university campus, using the Functional Resonance Analysis Method (FRAM). A FRAM diagram containing 30 functions was organized including six macro-cognitive functions (expertise, sensemaking, communication, coordination, collaboration, and adaptation/improvisation), examining their role in anticipating, and responding to emergencies, and eight functional units that are directly impacted by disturbances were analyzed in more detail. Results indicate that macrocognitive functions can greatly impact the functionality of the maintenance team in pursuit of their goals. Moreover, we noted those macro-cognitive functions here analyzed depend on each other to produce resilient performance.
标题: Resilient performance in building maintenance: A macro-cognition perspective during sudden breakdowns
标题翻译: 建筑维护中的韧性表现：突发故障期间的宏观认知视角
摘要翻译: 建筑维护涉及多个紧密相连的参与者（例如，技术人员、居住者、监督人员和设备）。变化的工作条件和有限的资源可能影响活动的安全性和可持续性。尽管近期研究探讨了复杂系统在面对日常活动的复杂性时如何表现出韧性，但有效促成韧性表现的因素仍然缺乏实证证据。我们使用功能共鸣分析方法（FRAM）研究了一个大型大学校园内空调设备突然故障时维护团队的表现。我们组织了一个包含30个功能的FRAM图，包括六个宏观认知功能（专业知识、意义构建、沟通、协调、合作和适应/即兴发挥），考察它们在预判和应对突发事件中的作用，并对受到干扰直接影响的八个功能单元进行了更详细的分析。结果表明，宏观认知功能可以极大地影响维护团队实现目标的功能。此外，我们注意到，在此分析的宏观认知功能彼此依赖，以产生韧性表现。
摘要总结: de Souza等（2024）通过功能共鸣分析法研究了大学校园空调设备突发故障时维护团队的表现，分析了30个功能，包括六个宏认知功能。研究发现，宏认知功能相互依赖，显著影响维护团队在应急中的响应能力和韧性表现。

期刊: JOURNAL OF CONTINGENCIES AND CRISIS MANAGEMENT
作者: Milagres, Rosileia; Bernardes, Maria Elisa Brandao; de Carvalho, Rodrigo Baroni
摘要: The objective of the paper is to analyse the actors' perception regarding how organizational actors lead the reaction of their companies to crises, changing or not their routines accordingly. The paper contributes to enlarging the understanding of crisis management by an original perspective of phenomenon evaluation based on the junction of two literature fields: sensemaking and routines, considering the organizational context that impacts crisis management. A survey of 128 company executives from different industries in Brazil was developed to identify how their companies dealt with the COVID-19 crisis, considering sensemaking, routines and the organizational context. The results unveiled a significant and positive influence of sensemaking and organizational context on the crisis reaction, but not on the deliberated mobilization of the routines, emphasizing improvisation and trial-and-error. The results reinforce fast sensemaking attitudes yielding direct implementation to test the new routines, correcting course of action promptly.
标题: Sense and Action: Organizational Reactions in Extreme Crisis: A Survey With Brazilian Executives
标题翻译: 感知与行动：极端危机中的组织反应：对巴西高管的调查
摘要翻译: 本文的目的是分析组织参与者对企业如何应对危机的看法，以及他们是否相应地改变了各自的日常工作。本文通过基于两个文献领域的交点——意义构建与日常工作的现象评估，扩展了对危机管理的理解，同时考虑了影响危机管理的组织环境。我们对巴西不同行业的128位公司高管进行了调查，以识别他们的公司如何应对COVID-19危机，关注意义构建、日常工作和组织环境。结果显示，意义构建和组织环境对危机反应具有显著的积极影响，但对日常工作的有意识动员影响不大，强调了即兴发挥和试错的重要性。结果强化了快速意义构建态度的价值，促使迅速实施以测试新日常工作的措施，并及时纠正行动方向。
摘要总结: Milagres等（2024）通过对128名巴西公司高管的问卷调查，分析危机管理中的感知与组织例行程序的关系，发现感知和组织环境对危机反应有显著正向影响，强调了快速感知及试错的重要性，为组织改进提供了见解。

作者: Morland, Kate; Breslin, Dermot
摘要: The build quality of new UK homes is negatively affected by poor quality management practices during the construction process. By implementing stringent quality management (QM) standards, housebuilders can improve build quality but implementing these organization-wide changes relies on housebuilder staff, designers and sub-contractors learning new working practices. This paper explores the tensions which emerge within housebuilders, as they implement new QM procedures. A longitudinal qualitative case study was conducted, where time was spent with housebuilder staff in three regional offices, two years apart. Methods include participant observation, semi-structured interviews and a review of organizational documentation. The findings highlight several learning paradoxes which arise at different stages of the housebuilding process and show how actors manage (or cope with) these paradoxes through their daily practices. This includes processes of simplifying and applying, improvising and problem-solving and aggregating and analyzing. Whilst these either-or approaches enable staff to resolve the immediate tensions that arise from different organizational processes, they often fail to meet longer-term learning objectives, detrimentally affecting build quality over time. Without structural changes to the way volume housebuilders annually report to both the UK Government and their shareholders, organizations in the UK housebuilding sector face challenges in reconciling different learning processes.
标题: Resolving learning paradoxes within a UK new-build housebuilder
标题翻译: 解决英国新建房屋建筑商中的学习悖论
摘要翻译: 新英国住宅的建造质量受到施工过程中的低质量管理实践的负面影响。通过实施严格的质量管理（QM）标准，房屋建筑商可以改善建造质量，但在整个组织内实施这些变革依赖于建筑商员工、设计师和分包商学习新的工作实践。本文探讨了在建筑商实施新QM程序时出现的紧张关系。进行了一个纵向的定性案例研究，研究者与三家地区办公室的建筑商员工进行了两年间的接触。研究方法包括参与观察、半结构化访谈和组织文件审查。研究结果突显了在房屋建筑过程中不同阶段所产生的几个学习悖论，并展示了参与者如何通过日常实践管理（或应对）这些悖论。这包括简化和应用、即兴创作和解决问题以及聚合和分析的过程。尽管这些非此即彼的方法使员工能够解决因不同组织过程而产生的直接紧张，但它们往往未能满足长期学习目标，从而随着时间的推移对建造质量产生不利影响。如果没有对规模住宅建筑商年报给英国政府和股东的方式进行结构性改变，英国住宅建筑行业的组织在调和不同学习过程中将面临挑战。
摘要总结: Morland和Breslin（2024）通过纵向定性案例研究，考察了三家地区房屋建筑商在实施质量管理标准过程中面临的紧张关系。研究发现，尽管新工作实践能改善房屋建设质量，但现有的学习方法未能满足长期学习目标，从而影响了建筑质量。

作者: Hong, Jacky; Zhao, Xi; Snell, Robin
摘要: Until recently, studies of sensemaking typically focused on seasoned practitioners, and there is limited understanding about how sensemaking takes place in start-ups that are run by novice entrepreneurs. Drawing on a case study of a biotechnology firm in China, we investigate how three novice entrepreneurs were able to transcend liabilities of newness and smallness by drawing on guidance from internal and external stakeholders. We develop a grounded model of entrepreneurial sensemaking through three distinctive phases of collective improvisation, collaborative selection, and iterative refinements.
标题: Making sense out of almost nothing: entrepreneurial sensemaking and innovation in a Chinese biotechnology startup
标题翻译: 从几乎无物中寻找意义：一家中国生物技术初创企业的创业意义建构与创新
摘要翻译: 直到最近，关于意义构建的研究通常集中在经验丰富的从业者身上，而对新手企业家管理的初创企业中意义构建过程的理解有限。通过对中国一家生物技术公司的案例研究，我们调查了三位新手企业家如何通过依赖内部和外部利益相关者的指导，克服新颖性和规模小带来的劣势。我们通过三个独特阶段——集体即兴创作、协作选择和迭代完善——发展了一种以实践为基础的创业意义构建模型。
摘要总结: Hong等（2024）通过对中国一家生物技术公司的案例研究，探讨了三位新手创业者如何借助内部和外部利益相关者的指导，克服新兴和规模小的劣势，提出了一个包含集体即兴、协同选择和迭代完善三阶段的创业意义构建模型。

作者: Eni, Yuli; Ichsan, Mohammad; Syamil, Ahmad; Trigunarsyah, Bambang
摘要: Purpose: This paper aims to explore how project team members' resilience differs based on industry type, project budget, company type, and gender.Design/methodology/approach: Using the conservation of resources theory, this study focuses on exploring the insight of the gathered data from the perspective of descriptive statistics. To achieve this objective, a descriptive analysis was conducted using purposive sampling and snowball techniques, gathering data from 349 respondents. The collected data was analyzed using IBM SPSS software version 25.Findings: The study's results indicate that male respondents are dominant, primarily working in the construction industry, while female respondents tend to work in other industry sectors. Moreover, male respondents exhibited higher resilience scores, but no significant difference in resilience was observed based on gender. However, resil-ience levels varied according to the industry sector. Respondents from industries other than the construction sector tended to display higher resilience.Research limitations/implications: Considering that the study finds only minor variations, businesses in the same industrial sector might think about implementing a practice benchmark. Examining businesses outside of these im-portant industries, however, may provide difficulties. Subsequent data-gathering endeavors may be broadened to encompass more industry sectors and subsequently scrutinized via case studies utilizing smaller samples from certain sectors.Originality/value: This study reveals that it is important to further expand and investigate these insights. Resources for team resilience, such as team confidence, a roadmap for teamwork, the ability to improvise as a team, and psychological safety for the team, can be added to future research. Furthermore, it is crucial to do quantitative research to look at how these elements show up in various industry sectors.
标题: Team resilience in multiple project environments: What characteristics should be explored?
标题翻译: 多项目环境中的团队韧性：应探索哪些特征？
摘要翻译: 目的：本文旨在探讨项目团队成员的韧性如何根据行业类型、项目预算、公司类型和性别而异。设计/方法论：本研究基于资源保护理论，侧重于从描述性统计的角度探索收集数据的见解。为实现这一目标，采用目的性抽样和滚雪球技术进行描述性分析，共收集到349名受访者的数据。收集的数据使用IBM SPSS软件版本25进行分析。发现：研究结果表明，男性受访者占主导，主要在建筑行业工作，而女性受访者则倾向于在其他行业部门工作。此外，男性受访者展示了更高的韧性得分，但没有发现性别在韧性方面的显著差异。然而，韧性水平在行业部门之间存在差异。来自建筑行业以外的受访者倾向于表现出更高的韧性。研究局限性/意义：考虑到该研究仅发现微小的变异，同一行业部门的企业可能考虑实施实践基准。然而，研究重要行业以外的企业可能会面临挑战。后续数据收集工作可以扩大到更多行业部门，并通过对某些部门的小样本进行案例研究加以审查。原创性/价值：本研究表明，进一步扩展和调查这些见解是重要的。团队韧性的资源，例如团队信心、团队合作的路线图、团队即兴发挥的能力和团队的心理安全，可以加入未来的研究。此外，进行定量研究以了解这些元素在各行业部门中的表现也至关重要。
摘要总结: Eni等（2024）基于349名受访者的数据，运用资源保护理论，采用描述性统计分析方法研究项目团队成员在行业类型、项目预算、公司类型和性别上的韧性差异，发现男性受访者主导于建筑行业，并表现出更高的韧性，而其他行业的受访者韧性水平较高。

作者: Kuru, Kaya; Sujit, Aadithya; Ansell, Darren; Pinder, John Michael; Jones, David; Watkinson, Benjamin Jon; Hamila, Ridha; Tinker-Mill, Claire
摘要: Detecting and clearing legacy landmines, Improvised Explosive Devices (IED), and Unexploded Ordnances (UXO) using a force made up of humans or animals is extremely risky, labour- and time-intensive. It is crucial to quickly map millions of buried landmines/IDE/UXO, and remove them at a reasonable cost to minimise potential risks and make this labour-intensive task easier. Using unmanned vehicles and robots outfitted with various remote sensing modalities appears to be the ideal way to carry out this task in a non-invasive manner while employing a geophysical investigative method. In this study, a small-scale customised drone - the so-called Maggy - was developed to simplify and automate the procedures of cleaning explosive devices. It was instrumented with innovative intelligent automated techniques and magnetometer sensor technologies. Maggy's performance was assessed in field tests conducted in Latvia and the United Kingdom. The outcomes, obtained in the open-air minefields and the benchmark assessments, verify the viability of the technologies, methods, and approaches integrated into Maggy for the efficient and economical detection of legacy landmines and IDE/UXO. This research provides the related research community with fundamental design and implementation parameters (e.g. flight speed, flight altitude) in building and using magnetometer-integrated Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS). The improved versions of the developed easy-to-use compact technology are aimed to be deployed by humanitarian demining teams to expedite their clearing operations safely and efficiently.
标题: Intelligent, Automated, Rapid, and Safe Landmine, Improvised Explosive Device and Unexploded Ordnance Detection Using Maggy
标题翻译: 智能自动化快速安全的地雷、简易爆炸装置及未爆炸弹药检测系统Maggy
摘要翻译: 检测和清除遗留地雷、简易爆炸装置（IED）和未爆炸弹药（UXO）采用人力或动物力量进行的方式风险极高，劳动强度大且耗时。快速绘制埋藏的数百万个地雷/IED/UXO的地图，并以合理的成本将其移除，以最小化潜在风险并简化这一劳动密集型任务至关重要。使用无人驾驶车辆和配备各种遥感方式的机器人似乎是以非侵入的方式执行此任务的理想方法，同时采用地球物理调查方法。本研究开发了一种小型定制无人机——所谓的Maggy，以简化和自动化清理爆炸装置的程序。该无人机配备了创新的智能自动技术和磁力计传感器技术。Maggy的性能在拉脱维亚和英国进行的实地测试中进行了评估。在露天矿区和基准评估中获得的结果验证了集成在Maggy中的技术、方法和手段的可行性，能够高效且经济地检测遗留地雷和IED/UXO。本研究为相关研究社区提供了构建和使用磁力计集成的无人机系统（UAS）的基本设计和实施参数（例如，飞行速度、飞行高度）。改进版的易于使用的紧凑技术旨在被人道主义扫雷团队部署，以安全高效地加快其清除作业。
摘要总结: Kuru等（2024）开发了一种名为Maggy的小型无人机，通过集成智能自动化技术和磁力传感器，在拉脱维亚和英国的实地测试中验证了其高效经济地检测遗留地雷和未爆炸物的能力，为人道主义排雷团队提供了设计和实施参数，以加快清理操作。

期刊: CONSTRUCTION RESEARCH CONGRESS 2024: HEALTH AND SAFETY, WORKFORCE, AND EDUCATION
作者: Shehab, Lynn; Hamzeh, Farook
摘要: Cognitive and physiological abilities are essential in construction projects, which involve a complex and dynamic array of tasks and decisions. Cognitive abilities, such as problem-solving, decision-making, and critical thinking, are used to identify potential issues and develop innovative solutions, while physiological abilities, such as physical strength, endurance, and dexterity, are necessary for performing heavy and critical physical tasks. Both abilities are essential for communicating effectively within the team, adapting to unexpected changes, adjusting the plan as necessary, and implementing required changes. While several studies have explored cognitive and physiological abilities generally, this paper aims to conceptualize the relationship between cognition and physiology in construction to bridge construction workers' psychology and physiology through a conceptual approach. After defining cognitive and physiological abilities, links among them are drawn, and their value for different social and personal skills in construction, such as collaboration and improvisation, is explored.
标题: Bridging Construction Workers' Minds and Bodies: A Conceptual Approach
标题翻译: 架起建筑工人思想与身体的桥梁：一种概念方法
摘要翻译: 认知和生理能力在建筑项目中至关重要，这些项目涉及复杂多变的任务和决策。认知能力，如解决问题、决策和批判性思维，用于识别潜在问题并开发创新解决方案，而生理能力，如体力、耐力和灵巧性，则必不可少，用于执行重要的体力任务。这两种能力对于在团队内部有效沟通、适应意外变化、根据需要调整计划和实施必要的变更都是必需的。虽然已有多项研究探讨了认知和生理能力的一般性，但本文旨在概念化建筑领域中认知与生理之间的关系，以通过概念性方法架起建筑工人在心理和生理之间的桥梁。在定义认知和生理能力后，本文绘制了它们之间的联系，并探讨了它们在建筑领域中对合作和即兴发挥等不同社交和个人技能的价值。
摘要总结: Shehab和Hamzeh（2024）探讨了建筑项目中认知和生理能力的关系，通过概念化方法分析两者在解决问题、决策和团队沟通中的重要性，强调它们在提高合作和即兴应变技能方面的价值。

作者: Wang, Huijiang; Zhang, Xiaoping; Iida, Fumiya
摘要: Recent advances in machine learning have paved the way for the development of musical and entertainment robots. However, human-robot cooperative instrument playing remains a challenge, particularly due to the intricate motor coordination and temporal synchronization. In this article, we propose a theoretical framework for human-robot cooperative piano playing based on nonverbal cues. First, we present a music improvisation model that employs a recurrent neural network (RNN) to predict appropriate chord progressions based on the human's melodic input. Second, we propose a behavior-adaptive controller to facilitate seamless temporal synchronization, allowing the cobot to generate harmonious acoustics. The collaboration takes into account the bidirectional information flow between the human and robot. We have developed an entropy-based system to assess the quality of cooperation by analyzing the impact of different communication modalities during human-robot collaboration. Experiments demonstrate that our RNN-based improvisation can achieve a 93% accuracy rate. Meanwhile, with the MPC adaptive controller, the robot could respond to the human teammate in homophony performances with real-time accompaniment. Our designed framework has been validated to be effective in allowing humans and robots to work collaboratively in the artistic piano-playing task.
标题: Human-Robot Cooperative Piano Playing With Learning-Based Real-Time Music Accompaniment
标题翻译: 基于学习的实时音乐伴奏的人机合作钢琴演奏
摘要翻译: 最近，机器学习的进展为音乐和娱乐机器人开发铺平了道路。然而，人机协作演奏乐器仍然是一个挑战，特别是在复杂的运动协调和时间同步方面。本文提出了一种基于非语言线索的人机协作钢琴演奏的理论框架。首先，我们提出了一种音乐即兴创作模型，利用递归神经网络（RNN）根据人类的旋律输入预测适当的和弦进行。其次，我们提出了一种行为自适应控制器，以促进无缝的时间同步，使协作机器人能够产生和谐美妙的音响。该合作考虑了人类与机器人之间双向信息流的交互。我们开发了一种基于熵的系统，通过分析人机协作中不同通信方式的影响来评估合作质量。实验表明，我们基于RNN的即兴创作可以达到93%的准确率。同时，使用MPC自适应控制器，机器人能够在同声演奏中实时响应人类队友的伴奏。我们设计的框架已被验证在艺术钢琴演奏任务中有效支持人类与机器人协作。
摘要总结: 王辉江、张晓平和饭田文也（2024）提出了一种基于非语言线索的人机协作钢琴演奏理论框架。研究采用递归神经网络（RNN）进行音乐即兴创作，并通过行为自适应控制器实现时序同步，实验显示RNN模型达到93%准确率，有效促进人机艺术合作。

作者: Shafie, Imrul Kayes; Das, Ripon Chandra; Hamim, Omar Faruqe; Hoque, Shamsul; McIlroy, Rich C.; Plant, Katherine L.; Stanton, Neville A.
摘要: Road collision types repeat themselves, especially in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs), where countermeasures are often improvised and implemented with little planning. At the Shahbag intersection in Dhaka, Bangladesh, speed bumps were quickly constructed at the exit of the intersection as an improvised road safety measure following the occurrence of a fatal collision, which eventually contributed to another collision between a truck and a car. The events influencing the improvisation decision, and that action's consequences, have been analysed using the Impromap methodology, a variation of the Accimap approach that focusses specifically on improvisation. The applicability of the Impromap as a systems-based approach to the road safety domain is assessed using the predictions described in Rasmussen's risk management framework, and corresponding countermeasures are proposed. The analysis shows that improvisation in the road safety domain is undesirable irrespective of the economic setting as it is likely to eventually contribute to secondary collisions.Practitioner summary: In this paper, the events influencing the improvisation decision following a road crash, and that action's consequences, have been analysed using the Impromap methodology. The applicability of Impromap as a systems-based approach in road safety domain is assessed using the Rasmussen's risk management framework-based predictions, and corresponding countermeasures are proposed.
标题: Exploring improvisations in road safety in a low-income setting
标题翻译: 在低收入环境中探索道路安全的即兴措施
摘要翻译: 道路碰撞类型往往重现，尤其是在低中收入国家（LMICs），在这些国家中，对策常常是临时采取且实施规划不足。在孟加拉国达卡的Shahbag交叉口，为了应对一起致命碰撞的发生，快速修建了减速带作为临时的道路安全措施，但这最终导致了另一场卡车与轿车之间的碰撞。影响临时决策的事件及其后果使用Impromap方法进行了分析，这是一种专注于即兴处理的Accimap变体。使用Rasmussen的风险管理框架中的预测来评估Impromap作为基于系统的道路安全领域方法的适用性，并提出相应的对策。分析结果表明，在道路安全领域，即兴处理是不可取的，无论经济环境如何，因为这很可能最终导致次级碰撞。实践总结：本文使用Impromap方法分析了在道路碰撞发生后影响即兴决策的事件及该行为的后果。通过Rasmussen风险管理框架基于的预测评估Impromap作为道路安全领域的基于系统的方法的适用性，并提出相应的对策。
摘要总结: Shafie等（2024）在孟加拉国达卡的Shahbag交叉口，通过应用Impromap方法分析了道路安全即兴决策的事件和后果，结果显示这种即兴措施可能导致二次碰撞，并提出相应的应对措施，强调即兴在道路安全中是不理想的。

期刊: Science of Science and Management of S.& T.
作者: Li Xiaodi; Yuan Yuan; Liu Qiang
摘要: Hidden champion enterprises refer to small and medium-sized enterprises that occupy a high position in the market but are not well known in the society. They have played a pillar role in promoting China's industrial construction and achieved a strong growth momentum in economic construction. However, at present, hidden champion enterprises are faced with the volatility, uncertainty, complexity and ambiguity environment changes, such as 'neck' technical bottleneck and COVID-19, and so on. The uncertainty and complexity of enterprise survival are aggravated, which brings severe challenges to the development of enterprises. Therefore, how to lead the hidden champion enterprises to achieve sustainable growth has become a hot research topic in the academic circle. If under a stable environment, the planned behavior of an enterprise contributes to the realization of the enterprise's goals, but tends to lead to path dependence, the enterprise should seize the opportunity in the crisis, take improvisation to fill the time gap between planning and action, combine the original resources of the enterprise with the resources obtained in real time, and carry out spontaneous and creative actions to quickly respond to and actively respond to events in unexpected situations. Therefore, this research constructs the mechanism of organizational improvisation on the performance of hidden champion enterprises, and considers the mediating effect of organizational resilience, the moderating effect of dynamic of playfulness and absorptive capacity, which is helpful to provide practical guidance and development inspiration for promoting the development of hidden champion enterprises. On the basis of combing relevant literature and theoretical derivation, this research proposes the research hypothesis on the mechanism of organizational improvisation on the performance of hidden champion enterprises, constructs the theoretical research framework of organizational improvisation, organizational resilience, dynamic of playfulness, absorptive capacity, and the performance of the hidden champion enterprises, and uses the hierarchical regression analysis method and Bootstrap method to conduct empirical analysis on the collected effective questionnaire data. This research examines the relationship between organizational improvisation and the performance of hidden champion enterprises, and reveals the development path that affects the performance of hidden champion enterprises. The research results show that organizational improvisation has a significant positive impact on the performance of hidden champion enterprises. Organizational improvisation has a significant positive impact on organizational resilience. Organizational resilience has a significant positive impact on the performance of the hidden champion enterprises, and plays a partial mediating role in the relationship between organizational improvisation and the performance of the hidden champion enterprises. Dynamic of playfulness positively regulates the relationship between organizational improvisation and organizational resilience. Dynamic of playfulness has a positive moderating effect on the mediating effect of organizational resilience, that is, the higher the dynamic of playfulness, the stronger the mediating effect of organizational resilience between organizational improvisation and the performance of hidden champion enterprises, the moderated mediating model is formed. This research conducts a theoretical and empirical study on the mechanism of organizational improvisation on the performance of hidden champion enterprises. The research enlightenment is as follows.
标题: The Mechanism of Organizational Improvisation on the Performance of Hidden Champion Enterprises: The Mediating Effect of the organizational resilience and the Moderating Effect of Dynamic of Playfulness
标题翻译: 隐形冠军企业的组织即兴能力对绩效的影响机制：组织韧性的中介作用与动态玩乐性的调节作用
摘要翻译: 隐形冠军企业是指在市场上占据高位但在社会上鲜为人知的中小型企业。它们在推动中国工业建设中发挥了支柱作用，并在经济建设中实现了强劲的增长势头。然而，目前隐形冠军企业面临着动荡、不确定、复杂和模糊的环境变化，如“卡脖子”技术瓶颈和新冠疫情等。企业生存的不确定性和复杂性加剧，给企业发展带来了严峻挑战。因此，如何引导隐形冠军企业实现可持续增长已成为学术界的热门研究话题。在稳定环境下，企业的计划行为有助于实现企业目标，但往往会导致路径依赖。在危机中，企业应抓住机遇，通过即时发挥的方式填补计划与行动之间的时间空白，将企业原有资源与实时获取的资源结合起来，开展自发且富有创意的行动，以迅速应对突发事件。因此，本研究构建了组织即兴发挥在隐形冠军企业绩效上的机制，并考虑了组织韧性的中介作用、玩乐动态与吸收能力的调节作用，这对促进隐形冠军企业的发展提供了实际指导与发展启示。在梳理相关文献与理论推导的基础上，本研究提出了组织即兴发挥对隐形冠军企业绩效机制的研究假设，构建了组织即兴发挥、组织韧性、玩乐动态、吸收能力和隐形冠军企业绩效的理论研究框架，并利用分层回归分析方法和Bootstrap方法对收集的有效问卷数据进行了实证分析。本研究考察了组织即兴发挥与隐形冠军企业绩效之间的关系，揭示了影响隐形冠军企业绩效的发展路径。研究结果表明：组织即兴发挥对隐形冠军企业绩效有显著正向影响；组织即兴发挥对组织韧性有显著正向影响；组织韧性对隐形冠军企业绩效有显著正向影响，并在组织即兴发挥与隐形冠军企业绩效之间的关系中起到部分中介作用；玩乐动态正向调节组织即兴发挥与组织韧性之间的关系；玩乐动态对组织韧性的中介效应具有正向调节作用，即玩乐动态越高，组织韧性在组织即兴发挥与隐形冠军企业绩效之间的中介效应越强，从而形成了调节中介模型。本研究对组织即兴发挥在隐形冠军企业绩效上的机制进行了理论与实证研究，研究启示如下。
摘要总结: 李晓迪、袁媛和刘强（2024）通过问卷收集有效数据，采用分层回归分析和Bootstrap方法，研究了组织即兴发挥对隐形冠军企业绩效的影响。研究结果表明，组织即兴发挥显著促进了企业绩效，并通过组织韧性发挥部分中介作用，同时动态灵活性对二者间关系产生调节效应。

作者: Ding, Ying Yong; Mckinstry, Sam; Su, Peiran
摘要: This study provides a business history of the construction project to build a large Anglican church in colonial Shanghai in the 1860s. Employing three theoretical lenses, it focusses on the project's management, setting it in its social, political, economic and architectural contexts. As well as analysing the project's progress in detail, the paper discloses circumstances that were being faced more generally by resident British and international traders in Shanghai at this unsettled time. It also identifies forces which would in due course influence the long process of change leading to the eventual transformation both of Shanghai and of China itself, enhancing our understanding of the region's economic history.
标题: Organizational Improvisation, Architectural Piggybacking, and Masonic Networking in the International Settlement, Shanghai: Building an Anglican Cathedral, 1864-1869
标题翻译: 上海国际租界的组织即兴创作、建筑搭载与共济会网络：建立一座圣公会大教堂，1864-1869
摘要翻译: 本研究提供了关于1860年代上海殖民地大公教堂建设项目的商业历史。通过三种理论视角，本文聚焦于该项目的管理，并将其置于其社会、政治、经济和建筑背景中。除了详细分析项目的进展，本文还揭示了在这一动荡时期，居住在上海的英国和国际贸易商所面临的更普遍的情况。同时，本文还识别出了在未来将影响上海及中国自身最终转型的长期变化过程的各种力量，从而增强了我们对该地区经济历史的理解。
摘要总结: 丁颖勇、麦金斯特里和苏培然（2025）通过三种理论视角，研究1860年代殖民上海一家大型圣公会教堂建筑项目，分析该项目的管理及其社会、政治、经济和建筑背景，揭示了当时英国和国际商人的共同挑战，以及其对上海及中国未来变革的影响。

作者: Xie, Bin; Wang, Zhenyu; Xu, Yiling; Cui, Libing
摘要: PurposeEmergencies have become a growing concern for organizations, which require flexibility to respond to changes in emergencies based on their contingency, dynamic evolution rapidly and other characteristics. In order to enhance the ability of engineering project organizations to cope with emergencies, this study explores the mechanism of its influence on knowledge innovation under emergencies from the perspective of bricolage theory, and provides a new perspective for the traditional preplanning-based handling of emergencies by improvising to enhance the ability and results of improvisation.Design/methodology/approachFirstly, a structural equation model of the relationship between bricolage and knowledge innovation was constructed by introducing improvisational behavior and serendipity as mediating and moderating variables of the relationship between bricolage and knowledge innovation based on bricolage theory; secondly, drawing on previous well-established measurement scales about bricolage, improvisational behavior, knowledge innovation and serendipity, a questionnaire survey was conducted with different types of engineering project managers and technicians in Gansu Province as the research subjects, and 238 valid questionnaires were returned; finally, validation factor analysis and correlation analysis were performed, and the hypothesized relationships were verified using AMOS 24.0 software.FindingsThe results show that bricolage positively influences improvisational behavior; improvisational behavior positively influences knowledge innovation; bricolage positively influences knowledge innovation; bricolage influences knowledge innovation through the mediating role of improvisational behavior and serendipity positively moderates the impact of resource bricolage on knowledge innovation.Originality/valueIt reveals the mechanism of knowledge innovation of engineering project organizations in response to emergencies and the innovation mechanism of the episodic nature of emergency decision-making, extends the applicable context of bricolage theory and provides a new perspective for engineering project organizations in response to emergencies.
标题: How does bricolage drive knowledge innovation in engineering project organizations?
标题翻译: 拼凑如何推动工程项目组织中的知识创新？
摘要翻译: 目的：紧急情况已成为组织日益关注的问题，组织需要具备灵活性，以根据其应急情况、动态演变迅速及其他特征应对变化。为了增强工程项目组织应对紧急情况的能力，本研究从搭建理论的角度探讨了其对紧急情况下知识创新的影响机制，并为传统基于预先规划的应急处理提供了一种新的视角，通过即兴发挥来提高即兴能力和结果。设计/方法论/途径：首先，通过引入即兴行为和意外发现作为搭建与知识创新关系的中介和调节变量，基于搭建理论构建了搭建与知识创新之间关系的结构方程模型；其次，借鉴关于搭建、即兴行为、知识创新和意外发现的已有测量量表，对甘肃省不同类型的工程项目经理和技术人员进行了问卷调查，共回收有效问卷238份；最后，进行了验证性因子分析和相关分析，并使用AMOS 24.0软件验证假设关系。发现：结果表明，搭建对即兴行为有积极影响；即兴行为对知识创新有积极影响；搭建对知识创新有积极影响；搭建通过即兴行为的中介作用影响知识创新，而意外发现积极调节资源搭建对知识创新的影响。原创性/价值：揭示了工程项目组织在应对紧急情况时知识创新的机制及应急决策的片段性质的创新机制，扩展了搭建理论的适用背景，为工程项目组织在应对紧急情况时提供了新的视角。
摘要总结: 谢斌等（2025）基于甘肃省238名工程项目管理者的问卷调查，构建结构方程模型研究了“拼凑理论”对应急情况下知识创新的影响，发现拼凑行为通过即兴行为影响知识创新，而即兴行为和偶然性在其中起到中介和调节作用，提供了应急管理的新视角。

作者: Weishaar, Heide; Evans, Megan; Chemali, Souaad; Maray, Eloisa Montt; Boettcher, Rike; Umlauf, Rene; Abunijela, Susan; Muller, Nadine; Buchberger, Barbara; Geurts, Brogan; Fischer, Hanna-Tina; El Bcheraoui, Charbel
摘要: Health system resilience is defined as the ability of a system to prepare, manage, and learn from shocks. This study investigates the resilience of the German health system by analysing the system-related factors that supported health care workers, a key building block of the system, during the COVID-19 pandemic. We thematically analysed data from 18 semi-structured interviews with key informants from management, policy and academia, 17 in-depth interviews with health care workers, and 10 focus group discussions with health care workers. We identified six categories of factors which supported health care workers during the pandemic: (1) appreciation and encouragement; (2) team support and communication; (3) collaboration across professions and institutions; (4) informational, material and technical support; (5) leadership and participation; and (6) creativity and innovation. The analysis highlights the importance of systemic and organisational factors for maintaining health system resilience. The need to improvise and develop pragmatic solutions to deal with COVID-related challenges offered ample opportunities for participation, self-determination, innovation, and alternative work processes. Learning from adaptations made during the pandemic and implementing sustainable organisational and systemic changes to increase participation, conducive organisational cultures, and non-hierarchical working styles hold promising potential for health system transformation and health system strengthening.
标题: The importance of organisational culture for health system resilience: A qualitative analysis of factors that supported health care workers in Germany during the COVID-19 pandemic
标题翻译: 组织文化对卫生系统韧性的重要性：对2020年COVID-19疫情期间支持德国卫生工作者的因素的定性分析
摘要翻译: 健康系统的韧性被定义为系统在面对冲击时的准备、管理和学习能力。本研究通过分析支持医疗工作者的系统相关因素，探讨了德国健康系统的韧性，这些医疗工作者是该系统的关键组成部分，特别是在COVID-19疫情期间。我们对来自管理、政策和学术界的关键知情者进行的18次半结构化访谈、17次医疗工作者的深入访谈以及10次医疗工作者的焦点小组讨论的数据进行了主题分析。我们确定了六类在疫情期间支持医疗工作者的因素：(1) 赞赏和鼓励；(2) 团队支持和沟通；(3) 跨专业和机构的合作；(4) 信息、物质和技术支持；(5) 领导力和参与；(6) 创造力和创新。分析突显了系统和组织因素在维持健康系统韧性中的重要性。因应COVID相关挑战而进行的即兴发挥和务实解决方案的开发为参与、自主性、创新和替代工作流程提供了丰富的机会。从疫情期间的适应中学习，并实施可持续的组织和系统性变革，以增加参与、促进有利的组织文化以及非等级化的工作方式，将为健康系统的转型和强化带来光明的潜力。
摘要总结: 魏沙尔等人（2025）通过对18个半结构访谈、17个深入访谈和10个焦点小组讨论进行主题分析，研究了德国健康系统在COVID-19疫情中的韧性。研究发现六类支持医疗工作者的系统因素，包括团队支持、领导力和创新，这些因素为健康系统的变革和加强提供了重要启示。

作者: Wang, Yingli; He, Qinghua; Xie, Jianxun; Wang, Zilun
摘要: Purpose The increasing unexpected contingencies make resilience indispensable for project teams. Drawn on input-process-outcome (IPO) framework, this study aims to investigate how and when team mindfulness (i.e. input) fosters team resilience (i.e. outcome) via team formalization and team improvisation (i.e. process) under boundary conditions of the shared mental model.Design/methodology/approach By conducting a three-wave research design, this paper collects 312 questionaries from the Chinese construction industry. The proposed hypotheses were tested by hierarchical regression analysis and structural equation modeling.Findings The results confirm that team mindfulness exerts a positive effect on team resilience. The positive relationship is mediated by team formalization and team improvisation. In addition, the shared mental model serves as a buffering moderator between team mindfulness and team resilience via team improvisation.Practical implications This study suggests managers take appropriate interventions of mindfulness to foster team resilience. Making explicit procedures for risk management and taking improvisational action appropriately are also key processes for addressing crises.Originality/value This study enriches the literature on the positive prediction effect of team mindfulness on team resilience. Combining team formalization with team improvisation, this study provides new alternatives for the process variables in the IPO framework. Furthermore, this paper reveals the dark side of the shared mental model on the relationship between team mindfulness and team resilience.
标题: Formalization or improvisation: the influence of team mindfulness on team resilience
标题翻译: 规范化还是即兴发挥：团队正念对团队韧性的影响
摘要翻译: 目的 随着意外事件的不断增加，韧性对于项目团队而言变得不可或缺。本研究基于输入-过程-结果（IPO）框架，旨在探讨团队正念（即输入）如何在共享心理模型的边界条件下，通过团队正式化和团队即兴创造（即过程）促进团队韧性（即结果）以及何时促进。设计/方法论/方法 本文通过三波研究设计，从中国建筑行业收集了312份问卷。通过层次回归分析和结构方程模型检验了提出的假设。发现 结果确认团队正念对团队韧性具有积极影响。这种正向关系通过团队正式化和团队即兴创造进行中介。此外，共享心理模型在团队正念与团队韧性之间通过团队即兴创造作为缓冲调节变量。实践意义 本研究建议管理者采取适当的正念干预措施来促进团队韧性。明确风险管理程序和适当地采取即兴行动也是应对危机的关键过程。原创性/价值 本研究丰富了关于团队正念对团队韧性积极预测效果的文献。通过将团队正式化与团队即兴创造相结合，本研究为IPO框架中的过程变量提供了新的替代方案。此外，本文揭示了共享心理模型在团队正念与团队韧性之间关系中的阴暗面。
摘要总结: 王颖丽、何庆华、谢建勋及王子伦（2025）基于三波次研究设计，收集了来自中国建筑行业的312份问卷，运用层次回归分析和结构方程模型检验假设，发现团队正念通过团队形式化和即兴创作积极影响团队韧性，且共享心理模型在其中起到缓冲调节作用，为管理者提供了实践建议。

作者: Aronsson, Karin; Rindstedt, Camilla
摘要: This case study documents social interaction between a nurse and a 4-year-old boy during routine Draw-a-Man assessments at a child health center. Detailed analyses illuminate how the nurse scaffolded head, legs, arms, eyes, and mouth step by step, as elements of a jointly improvised monster story. Nurse-child interaction alternated between scaffoldings and joint improvisations during the child's drawing of a man who would 'guard' a monster. The drawing was co-construed through storytelling and alignments. Divergent participation frameworks were invoked, when the child did not let go of his precious drawing, insisting on taking it home to dad, while the nurse invoked the center's routines (archiving all drawings). This brief micro drama was resolved through whispered by-play between mother and child. The analyses show how a drawing task is co-construed through improvisations and storytelling, and it also illuminates the role of joint performance for building we-teams and adult-child alignments.
标题: Draw-a-Monster: Scaffolding and nurse-child improvisations at a child health center
标题翻译: 画一个怪物：儿童健康中心的支架与护生儿即兴表演
摘要翻译: 本案例研究记录了一名护士与一名4岁男孩在儿童健康中心进行日常“画一个人”评估时的社交互动。详细的分析揭示了护士如何逐步搭建头部、腿部、手臂、眼睛和嘴巴的框架，作为共同即兴创作的怪兽故事的元素。在男孩绘画“守卫”怪兽的人物时，护士与儿童的互动在搭建框架和共同即兴之间交替进行。参与框架的差异在于，当孩子不愿放弃他珍贵的画作，坚决要求带回家给爸爸时，护士则引用了中心的常规（归档所有画作）。这一微小的戏剧通过母亲与孩子之间的耳语互动得以化解。分析表明，绘画任务是通过即兴创作和讲故事共同构建的，同时也凸显了共同表演在建立团队合作和成人与儿童之间对齐中的作用。
摘要总结: Aronsson和Rindstedt（2025）通过案例研究分析护士与4岁男孩在“画人”评估中的互动，发现护士通过逐步引导与孩子共同创造“怪兽故事”，并探讨如何通过即兴表演与讲故事构建成人与儿童之间的关系，强调了联合表现对建立团队合作的重要性。

作者: Zoller, Heather M.
摘要: This paper adopts a critical pragmatist perspective to investigate how the union cooperative movement promotes transformative change. The study describes how 1worker1vote.org network leaders enact pragmatic utopianism by articulating an ambitious counter-narrative to extractive capitalism grounded in worker ownership, sustainability, and solidarity. This project expands the concept of pragmatic utopian organizing, describing how the movement mobilizes realistic hope for this idealistic vision by creating plausibility structures. First, leaders' dialectical framing of perceived values-viability tensions rooted in the status quo contributed to innovations that served as reasons to believe. Second, advocates engaged improvisational strategic capacity building to manage doubts resulting from ongoing disorganizing forces. The conclusion discusses the implications for critical theorizing, alternative economy organizing, and transformative change from below.
标题: Pragmatic utopianism in the union cooperative movement: (Dis)Organizing transformative social change
标题翻译: 实用乌托邦主义在工会合作运动中的应用： (反)组织变革社会变迁
摘要翻译: 本文采用批判实用主义视角，探讨工会合作运动如何推动变革性变化。研究描述了1worker1vote.org网络领导者如何通过阐述一个雄心勃勃的反叙事，基于工人拥有权、可持续性和团结，实践务实的理想主义。该项目扩展了务实理想组织的概念，阐述了运动如何通过创建可信度结构，调动对这一理想愿景的现实希望。首先，领导者对根植于现状的感知价值与可行性紧张关系的辩证构建，促成了作为信念理由的创新。其次，倡导者们通过即兴的战略能力建设来应对来自持续解构力量的疑虑。结论讨论了对批判理论、替代经济组织及自下而上的变革性变化的启示。
摘要总结: Zoller（2025）采用批判实用主义视角，研究工会合作运动如何推动变革，发现网络领导通过构建反资本主义叙事，促进工人拥有权、可持续性和团结，创造合理化结构并应对疑虑，从而实现理想目标，并探讨此对替代经济组织和自下而上的变革的影响。

作者: Wang, Zhiwei; Wei, Lican; Wang, Song
摘要: Perceiving, interpreting, and predicting disruptive innovation ex ante are crucial but challenging. Although recognizing disruptive innovation opportunities is more likely a result of collective efforts, prior research has primarily focused on external organizational drivers and individual-level attributes or only focused on simple effect of single factors. Recent studies highlight the strategic role of team learning in building the micro-foundations of organizational dynamic capabilities. This study employs a configurational approach (fsQCA) to examine how individual and team-level antecedents interact to facilitate the recognition of disruptive innovation opportunities through team learning processes (intuition, interpretation, and integration). Drawing on field data from 65 teams, we identify three distinct configurations: Sharing-integrated, Improvisation-inspired, and Star-led. Specifically, teams can proactively recognize disruptive innovation opportunities through collective wisdom, which is generated by sharing and integration within the team, inspired by a learning process of improvisation, or catalyzed by the guidance of star performers in the team. This study contributes to the existing literature on disruptive innovation by elaborating how teams can collaboratively and creatively recognize disruptive opportunities through learning processes. Furthermore, it advances micro-foundations research on organizational capabilities in effectively managing disruption. The configurational approach provides a nuanced understanding of opportunity recognition within the context of disruptive innovation.
标题: Navigating disruptive innovation through opportunity recognition: A configurational approach to team learning
标题翻译: 通过机会识别驾驭颠覆性创新：一种团队学习的结构化方法
摘要翻译: 感知、解释和预测颠覆性创新的前瞻性是至关重要但具有挑战性的。尽管识别颠覆性创新机会更可能是集体努力的结果，但先前的研究主要集中在外部组织驱动因素和个体层面属性，或仅关注单一因素的简单效应。最近的研究强调了团队学习在构建组织动态能力的微观基础中的战略作用。本研究采用配置方法（fsQCA）来检验个体和团队层级的前因如何相互作用，通过团队学习过程（直觉、解释和整合）来促进对颠覆性创新机会的识别。依据来自65个团队的实地数据，我们识别出三种不同的配置：共享整合型、即兴启发型和明星引领型。具体而言，团队可以通过集体智慧主动识别颠覆性创新机会，这种智慧源于团队内部的分享与整合、即兴学习过程的启发，或受到团队明星表演者的指导所催化。本研究通过阐述团队如何通过学习过程合作和创造性地识别颠覆性机会，为现有的颠覆性创新文献做出了贡献。此外，它推进了微观基础研究，助力有效管理颠覆的组织能力。配置方法提供了在颠覆性创新背景下对机会识别的细腻理解。
摘要总结: 王志伟、韦立灿和王松（2025）基于65个团队的实地数据，采用配置方法（fsQCA）研究团队学习过程中的个体和团队水平先行因素如何协作促进对颠覆性创新机会的识别，发现分享整合型、即兴启发型和明星引领型三种配置，并为组织动态能力的微观基础研究提供了新视角。

作者: King, Diane K.; Ondersma, Steven J.; Mcree, Bonnie G.; German, Jacqueline S.; Loree, Amy M.; Harlowe, Amy; Alford, Daniel P.; Sedotto, Robyn N. M.; Weber, Mary Kate
摘要: Background: The United States Preventive Services Task Force recommends annual alcohol screening and brief behavioral intervention (alcohol SBI) with general adult and pregnant populations. Implementation of alcohol SBI in primary care has encountered numerous barriers to adapting procedures and infrastructure to support its routine delivery. This collection of case studies describes the implementation strategies used by 4 academic health system teams that were funded by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to implement alcohol SBI within healthcare systems to prevent alcohol-exposed pregnancies. Methods: We used constructs from the Framework for Reporting Adaptations and Modifications-Expanded (FRAME) to describe planned and unplanned adaptations to implementation strategies, and the SBIRT (Screening, Brief Intervention, and Referral to Treatment) Program Matrix to identify key questions, challenges, and recommendations for improving alcohol SBI implementation. Participating systems were 2 regional affiliates of a national reproductive healthcare organization, an integrated non-profit healthcare system, and an urban medical center and its affiliated network of community health centers. Results: Planned adaptations included expanding the target population for brief interventions to include patients drinking at low levels who could become pregnant, modifying workflows and systems to support routine screening, and customizing training content and logistics. Unplanned adaptations included varying site recruitment and pre-implementation awareness-building strategies to enhance local receptivity of systems with decentralized management, and pivoting from in-person to virtual training during the COVID-19 pandemic. Fewer unplanned adaptations were observed for health systems with centralized management structures and practice teams that were fully engaged in implementation planning, training, roll-out, and problem-solving. Conclusions: Unplanned adaptations were observed across the 4 cases and emphasized the importance of flexible, adaptive designs when implementing evidence-based practice in dynamic settings. Participation of the health system in planning, including decisions to modify electronic health records and workflows, supported adapting to unplanned circumstances to achieve implementation goals.
标题: Using Planned and Unplanned Adaptation to Implement Universal Alcohol Screening and Brief Intervention to Prevent Alcohol-Exposed Pregnancies in Four Primary Care Health Systems
标题翻译: 利用计划内和计划外的适应措施在四个初级保健系统中实施普遍酒精筛查和简短干预，以防止酒精暴露妊娠
摘要翻译: 背景：美国预防服务工作组建议对一般成人和孕妇进行年度酒精筛查和简短行为干预（酒精SBI）。在初级保健中实施酒精SBI面临许多障碍，需调整程序和基础设施以支持其常规提供。本案例研究集合描述了由疾病控制与预防中心资助实施酒精SBI以预防酒精暴露怀孕的4个学术医疗系统团队所采用的实施策略。 方法：我们使用扩展版适应和修改报告框架（FRAME）中的构建块来描述实施策略的计划和非计划适应，并使用SBIRT（筛查、简短干预和转介治疗）程序矩阵来识别改善酒精SBI实施的关键问题、挑战和建议。参与的系统包括一个国家生殖保健组织的两个区域附属机构、一个综合非营利医疗系统以及一个城市医疗中心及其附属社区健康中心网络。 结果：计划的适应包括将简短干预的目标人口扩大至低水平饮酒的可能怀孕患者，修改工作流程和系统以支持常规筛查，以及定制培训内容和后勤。非计划的适应包括因地制宜的招募和预实施意识提升策略，以增强地方管理分散系统的接受度，以及在COVID-19大流行期间将面对面培训转为虚拟培训。对于管理结构集中且实践团队完全参与实施计划、培训、推广和问题解决的医疗系统，观察到的非计划适应较少。 结论：在四个案例中观察到非计划适应，强调在动态环境中实施循证实践时灵活适应设计的重要性。医疗系统在规划中的参与，包括修改电子健康记录和工作流程的决策，支持针对非计划情况进行调整，以实现实施目标。
摘要总结: 金迪安·K.等人（2025）通过案例研究分析4个学术卫生系统团队实施酒精筛查和干预的策略，使用FRAME框架描述计划和非计划适应，结果显示灵活的适应性设计在动态环境中执行循证实践的重要性以克服实施障碍。

作者: Tsou, Christina; Yeung, Justin; Goode, Melanie; Mcdonnell, Josephine; Williams, Aled; Andrew, Stephen Colin; Tetlow, Jenny; Jamieson, Andrew; Hendrie, Delia; Reid, Christopher; Thompson, Sandra
摘要: BACKGROUND: Telehealth is a recognized and rapidly evolving domain in the delivery of emergency medicine. Research suggests a positive impact of telehealth in patients presenting for emergency care; however, the regional challenges of acute telemedicine delivery have not been studied. The WA Country Health Service (WACHS) established the Emergency Telehealth Service (ETS) in 2012 to provide telehealth and other technology-enabled services to regional Western Australian hospitals and clinics. The WACHS ETS supports 87 rural and remote WACHS-operated hospitals as well as 10 non-WACHS health clinics via high-definition audio-visual equipment installed in the resuscitation bay of the emergency department (ED) at each site. This 12-year practical application of emergency telemedicine offers a unique opportunity to explore the experiences and perceptions of clinicians delivering virtual care to rural and remote communities.OBJECTIVE: This study explores the perceptions of ETS clinicians regarding acceptability, appropriateness, and clinical decision-making when delivering emergency telemedicine in rural and remote settings.METHODS: This qualitative study used semistructured interviews to explore the perspectives of ETS clinicians regarding the factors influencing their clinical decision-making. It explored how ETS clinicians determine and modify clinical risks associated with using audio-visual equipment to deliver care. Emerging themes were compared with the concepts arising from the interim guidance of the Medical Board of Australia, and both the Australian and New Zealand, and American Colleges of Emergency Medicine.RESULTS: Overall, 16 doctors, 4 clinical nurse coordinators, and a nurse educator from WACHS ETS provided their experiences and perspectives. Accurate clinical decisions, especially regarding patient disposition, were crucial to virtual care. Timeliness and accuracy were enhanced through a mutual learning model grounded in the local context. Mitigation strategies such as improvisation and flexible technology use compensated for technological barriers.
